tuv.seg: 2000铜币一瓶的价格，属于绝对的良心老板了。
The price of 2000 copper coins per bottle was absolutely reasonable.
304不锈钢一体锻造而成的大茶缸，只是被麦格看了一眼，便直接被挤压成了一块薄薄的铁片。
The tea mug that was forged from one piece of 304 stainless steel, was crushed into a thin piece of metal with one look from Mag.
30年陈酿的泰坦酒，价格是3000铜币一瓶，999铜币一杯。
The 30-year-old Titan Liquor brew was priced at 3000 copper coins a bottle and 999 copper coins a cup.
rbq！rbq！
Rbq! Rbq!
——观察者：晞代号：9527
- Observer: Codename: 9527
“101，不能再多了。”麦格果断道。
"101. That's all." Mag said decisively.
“20万铜币？就这地段和人流量，这价格有些贵了吧？”中年男人眉头一皱，对这个价格显然不满意。
"200,000 copper coins? Isn't it too expensive for such a location and human traffic's conditions?" The middle-aged man frowned. He was obviously not very satisfied with price.
“48分！接近满分的成绩了！”
"48 points! It's almost a perfect score!"
"50 points!"
“一个一个套太慢了。”艾米拿起了三个竹圈，然后天女散花一般丢了出去。
"It's too slow to catch them one by one." Amy picked up three bamboo rings, and threw them out like a flower girl scattering petals on a wedding.
“一个十级，三个九级，府邸内外有三百多名护卫，巡逻没有死角。”麦格把绿豆酥给两个孩子，看着伊琳娜轻声说道。

"A 10th-tier, three 9th-tiers, and more than 300 guards inside and out of the mansion. There are no blind spots in the patrol routes," Mag told Irina softly as he passed the two mung bean pancakes to the kids.
“一个可能是运气，但连续两个……这应该是实力了吧？”
"One might be luck, but two continuously… This should be her potential, right?"
“一个道行不足的小妖精。”麦格嘴角微微上翘，这种程度的魅惑，对他来说已经毫无吸引力。
"An incapable little vixen." Mag smiled. That amount of charm was of no effect to him at all.
“一份品相糟糕的酒鬼花生，失败！”
"One helping of ugly-looking drunkard peanuts. Fail!
“一份尚可的拍黄瓜！可上菜单。”
"An acceptable Smashed Cucumber Salad! Can be placed in the menu."
“一份焦香浓郁的酒鬼花生，失败！”
"One helping of charred drunkard peanuts. Fail!
“一份趋于完美的凉拌猪舌头！”
"One helping of almost perfect pig tongue salad!
“一份辣味过于浓郁的酒鬼花生，失败……”
"One helping of too spicy drunkard peanuts. Fail…"
“一会有的是机会发挥。”梅兰特重新拿起旱烟抽着。
"You will have the chance to use it." Merante continued smoking.
“一会要是全套中了，怎么拿回去啊？”麦格则是有些担忧的和伊琳娜问道。
"How are we going to bring them back if we catch all of them?" Mag asked Irina worriedly.
“一共是264铜币哦……”艾米已经算好了账。
"It's a total of 264 copper coins…" Amy was already done with the calculations.
“一共是……十七万八千六百四十二个铜币！小姐，我们发财了！”
"The total is...178,642 copper coins! Miss, we're rich!"
“一半？”埃菲瞪眼。
"Half?" Eiffie glared.
“一只怎么够吃，下次回森林的时候，我再带你去抓吧，吃个够。”伊琳娜笑着默默艾米的脑袋说道。
Irina patted Amy's head and said, "One isn't enough. I'll bring you to catch more when we return to the Wind Forest again and we can eat to our hearts' content."
“一圈三鹅！”
"Three geese with one ring!"
“一壶酒？”埃菲有些惊讶，快步走到酒馆门口，看着斜对面的塞班酒馆门前聚着的十几个人，的确是围着那酒馆门口柱子上挂着的一个小铁笼子。

"A cup of liquor?" Eiffie was slightly taken aback. She strode to the tavern's door, and looked at the 10-odd people gathering in front of Saipan Tavern, which was diagonally across the street. They were indeed surrounding a small metal cage that was hanging on the pillar at the tavern's door.
“一天五十瓶全部卖完的话，那我们一天的营业就能够上十五万铜币了呢！”玛拉两眼放光。
"If we sell out all 50 bottles a day, we would be able to reach 150,000 copper coins in a day's revenue!" Mala's eyes lit up.
“一天就搞定了？”伊琳娜左右打量着装饰一新的酒馆，有点惊讶道。
Irina sized up the completely redone tavern, surprised, and said, "It's all done in one day?"
“一天的营业又结束了。”麦格目送马车远去，翻转了门上挂着的木牌，今日的情报收获不小，对于当前洛斯帝国官场的情况有了一个大致了解。

"A day's operation has ended once again." Mag watched the horse-drawn carriage leave, and flipped the wooden plaque at the door. There was quite a lot of information gained today, which allowed him to have a rough understanding of the current situation in the Roth Empire's court.
“一定是特别的缘分。”麦格微笑点头，瞄了眼她微微打颤的修长小腿。
"It must be a very special kind of providence." Mag nodded with a smile. He flicked a glance at her slightly quivering calves.
“一百万铜币呢，好多小钱钱。”艾米又在一旁坐下了，掰着手指盘算着。
"It's 1 million copper coins, that's a lot of money." Amy sat at the side again as she counted her fingers.
“一百多栋，都是你的？”左边那位高瘦的中年男人有些惊讶道。
The tall and thin middle-aged man on the left said with shock, "Over 100 properties? All yours?"
“一种绿色植物。”系统和谐补充。
"A kind of green plant." The system harmoniously added.
“一般来说，几十个还是要有的。”
"Usually speaking, you still need to fight a few dozen in the least."
“三……恭喜这位美女，一圈三只……”老板的表情已经彻底垮了，他算是看出来了，他这三十只鹅还不够人家套的呢。
"Three… Congratulations to this beautiful lady. Three geese with one ring…" The boss looked crestfallen. He finally realized that his 30 geese were not even enough for them to catch.
“三个全中！！！”
"Three hits!!!"
“三剑啊。”康妮随口答道，又补充了一句：“我看他废话太多，所以又给他补了一剑。”
"Three strikes." Connie answered casually before adding on, "I thought he talked too much, so I gave him one more strike."
“三十个圈子，给你放这了，慢慢套，别着急。”老板笑眯眯的把三十个竹圈放在艾米脚边。
"30 rings. I'll put them here for you. Take your time. We are not in a hurry." The boss placed the 30 bamboo rings next to Amy's feet.
“三十岁的女人，正是最肥美多汁的年纪，懂事又会疼人，你会不喜欢？”伊琳娜笑吟吟的问道。
"A 20-year-old woman is at her prime. She would be sensible and doting. Don't you like it?" Irina asked with a smile.
“上去！”伊琳娜一把将诺亚丢上了紫纹狮鹫，和梅兰特也是跳上了狮鹫背。
"Go up!" Irina threw Noya up the purple-striped griffin as Merante jumped on the griffin's back as well.
“上来，我们杀不死他，先离开这里。”晞冰冷的声音在麦格耳边响起，船舱打开了一条通道。
"Hop on. We can't kill it. Let's leave here first." Xi's icy cold voice sounded next to Mag's ears and the ship's cabin let out a passageway.
“下次再来啊。”老板苦笑着说道，他当然希望这辈子都不再遇到这一家子，下次要是看到他们来坊市，立刻就收摊回家。
"Please come again," the boss said with a miserable smile. Of course, he didn't want to see this family ever again. He would pack up and leave as soon as he saw them come to the square again.
“下面是第五十组。”主持人宣布道，很快有工作人员端上了一个黑色的细长酒瓶。
"Next, it's the 50th group." The emcee announced and the staff member quickly carried a black and narrow bottle up.
“不……不会就是那个傻子买了半条街吧？”酒馆老板娘埃菲摘下了嘴里的烟斗，有些难以置信道。
The nearby tavern's lady boss, Effie, removed her pipe, and said with disbelief, "I-is he that idiot who bought up half of the street?"
“不……不可能……”奥斯特无力的趴伏在地上，表情狰狞的昂着头看着康妮。
"Im-impossible..." Auster slumped onto the floor weakly and looked up at Connie with a ferocious expression.
“不……不是我，是我爷爷。”诺亚连忙摇头，闻到了伊琳娜身上的酒味，看她完全醉酒的状态，又不禁有些担忧的，这样真的还能施法吗？
"N-not me. It's my grandpa." Noya quickly shook his head. He could smell the alcohol on Irina, and she seemed rather drunk. Noya could not help but worry if she could work her spells properly.
“不……不用了。”麦格眉梢微挑，这黑市……还真他娘的会做生意啊？
"It's... it's okay." Mag raised hsi brow. This black market... is really good at making business?
“不了，茅台已经是最好的了。”麦格摇摇头。
"No, thanks. Maotai is already the best." Mag shook his head.
“不仅仅只是杀人，他的目的恐怕是挑起一场新的种族战争，只是一两个小村落，以他和魔鬼的也行都不会满足。”麦格沉声道。
"It isn't just killing people. I'm afraid his motive is to trigger a new racial war. The devil and he won't be satisfied with just one or two villages," Mag said gravely.
“不会吧？”麦格挑眉。
"Are you for real?" Mag raised his eyebrows.
“不会呢，做的挺好的。”麦格笑着摸了摸她的头。
"No, it's pretty well done." Mag patted her head with a smile.
“不会哦，田螺的壳是不能吃的，我们只能吃它的螺肉。”麦格指着盆里一只吸附在盆边缘的田螺，“你看，壳里边的就是肉了，那是柔软的部位。”

"No. The shell cannot be eaten. We can only eat the meat." Mag pointed to one escargot that was sucking on to the side of the basin and said, "Look, there is meat within the shell. That is the soft part."
“不信的话，一会你们就知道了，而且我还把绿豆糕改良了，今天让你们尝尝什么叫做真正的绿豆糕。”麦格自信满满的出门去。
"You will see it later if you don't believe me. Moreover, I have improved the mung bean cake. I will let you try the real mung bean cake today." Mag walked out confidently.
“不光是第一届的金奖，泰坦酒当年十年内三度获得金奖，在精品之上不断精进，才是真正的传奇。”
"It didn't just win the first year's gold award. It won the gold award three times with 10 years back then. Its continual strive for excellence was what made it a real legend."
“不光酒酿的好，连下酒菜也做的如此美味。”弗格斯把嘴里的凉拌猪耳朵咽下，又是抓了几颗花生丢嘴里。
"Not only did he brew great liquor, even his side dishes are so scrumptious." Fergus swallowed the pig ears salad before popping a few peanuts into his mouth.
“不可以。”
"No, you can't."
“不可思议啊，小小的一颗花生，竟然也能炒制的如此美味，而且，的确非常下酒啊。”麻辣的滋味在嘴唇上绽放，亚伯罕惊叹于这酒鬼花生的美妙滋味的同时，也是不自觉的打开了手边的酒。

Incredible. A tiny little peanut could be done so beautifully. Besides, it goes really well with the wine. The numbing spiciness attacked his lips, and just as Abraham was exclaiming at the wonderful taste of this drunkard peanuts, he unknowingly opened up the wine beside him.
“不同意！”
"We won't agree to it!"
“不吸收怨气，而是选择控制这些尸体，乔修想要做什么？”伊琳娜收回手，冷声道。
Irina retracted her hand and coldly said, "He didn't absorb the resentment, but instead chose to control these bodies. What does Josh want to do?"
“不和你们聊了，我要去溜猫了。”艾米轻轻踢了一脚出门就在门口趴下的丑小鸭，小声训斥道：“赶紧动起来，吃饭前先绕着亚丁广场跑一圈，跑不完不许吃完饭。”

"I can't chitchat with you guys, I gotta go walk the cat now." Amy gently kicked Ugly Duckling, which crouched on the ground as soon as it got out of the door, and softly lectured, "Move your butt quickly. You've got to run around Aden Square once before dinner, otherwise you're not allowed to eat."
“不在暮光森林，也不在洛斯帝国边境，我有点好奇这个家伙究竟藏到哪里去了。”麦格慢慢搅拌着锅里的粥。
"He wasn't in the Twilight Forest, nor was he at the borders of the Roth Empire. I'm a little curious where this fellow is hiding." Mag stirred the porridge in the pot slowly.
“不多说，咱们先尝尝。”
"Say no more. Let's try it first."
“不太合适是吧……”麦格沉吟，思考了一会，道：“那就做红烧肉吧。”
"It's not really suitable, right…" Mag murmured. After thinking for some time, he said, "The red braised pork, then."
“不好吧……两个孩子还在家……”
"That's not very appropriate… The two kids are still at home…"
“不好意思，就在今天，最后三十三栋楼已经被打包买走了，目前罗莫街上应该没有可以出售的商铺了。”费奇摇头道。
Fitch shook his head and said, "I'm sorry. Just today, the last 33 properties were already sold and there were no shops for sale on Romo Street currently."
“不好意思，我没有兴趣。”麦格微微摇头。
"I'm sorry, but I'm not interested." Mag shook his head.
“不好！”
"Oh no!"
“不客气。”卡诺也是笑着摇头。
"You're very welcome." Canault shook his head, also smiling.
“不客气。”麦格大方的摆摆手，转身进了酒馆。
"You're welcome." Mag waved his hand generously, and turned to walk into the tavern.
“不客气。”麦格微微摇头，瞄了一眼坐在一旁的伊琳娜。
"You're welcome." Mag shook his head slightly and glanced at Irina, who was sitting at the side.
“不客气，邻居嘛，是该互相帮助的。”麦格摇摇头，好在老婆不在家，不然这种奇怪的前后句，肯定会引起不必要的误会。

"You're welcome. As neighbors, we should help each other." Mag shook his head. Thankfully, his wife was not home. Otherwise, if taken out of context, their conversation might lead to a misunderstanding.
“不少了。”埃菲连忙摇头。
"It's not." Eiffie quickly shook her head.
“不应该啊，无论从哪个角度看，在这场夺嫡之争，乔修都还有一半的胜率，他又何必在陛下尚未作出选择之前，作出这等蠢事？”
"He shouldn't have done it. No matter how we look at this fight for the throne, Josh still has a 50% chance of winning. Why did he do such stupid things before His Majesty has made his decision?
“不必了，我已经看过。”晞微微摇头，心中却是有些疑惑，有些迟疑是否需要对这个人类进行记忆搜索。

"There's no need for that. I have already seen it." Xi shook her head slightly, but she still had some suspiscions. She was deliberating if she should conduct a memory search on this human in front of her.
“不必客气。”麦格与他碰了一下酒杯，然后抿了一口。
"You're welcome." Mag clinked his glass with Merante's before taking a sip.
“不必客气，我们有着共同的目标，互相帮助本是应该。”麦格连忙把他搀扶起来，倒也没觉得自己昨晚做了什么大事。
"Don't worry about it. We have a common goal, so we should help each other out." Mag quickly helped Merante up. He did not think that he did anything great last night.
“不怕，不怕。”麦格看了眼艾米，小家伙什么时候戏精上身了，这就演上了。
"It's alright, it's alright." Mag glanced at Amy. When did this little fellow become such a drama queen?
“不想娶人家乔治娜姑娘了？”
"You don't want to marry Miss Georgina?"
“不愧是传说中的麦老板，只是香味便已经让人无法抗拒。”安奈林擦了一下嘴角的泪水，小声感慨道。
Aneurin wiped the saliva away from the corner of his mouth, and softly lamented, "He's indeed the legendary Boss Mag. Just the aroma alone is irresistible."
“不愧是哈迪斯先生！108家还远低于他的预期吗？难道他还有更大的蓝图？”
"He's indeed Mr. Hades! Is 108 businesses still below his expectations? Perhaps, he has a greater plan?"
“不愧是我的男神！连温妮莎公主殿下都被迷得神魂颠倒的男人。”
"He's indeed my idol! He is really the man who can even mesmerize Princess Vanessa."
“不愧是第一届的金奖美酒，光是闻着酒香，便已经有了三分醉意。”
"It's indeed the gold award liquor of the very first liquor tasting event. Just its smell alone was enough to intoxicate a person."
“不愧是老狐狸，比我想的更快，也更果决。”第二天早上麦格也拿到了这份消息，将密信递给正在喝豆浆的伊琳娜。
"He's indeed a sly old fox. He's much faster and decisive than I expected." Mag received the news earlier the next morning too. He passed the secret missive to Irina, who was drinking soybean milk.
“不愧是被神灵选中的神女，果然不同凡响。”希利轻声赞叹道。
"She is indeed the holy maiden selected by the Holy Spirit. She's indeed extraordinary," Seely marveled softly.
“不敢……不敢……”奥尔登连忙摇头，额头上汗水大滴小滴的淌出来。
"I wouldn't dare… I wouldn't dare…" Aulden quickly shook his head as drops of perspiration formed on his forehead.
“不是……可能艾米误会了什么，事情不是这样的。”麦格表情委屈，“坐久了嘛，肯定有点腰酸。”
"No...Amy might be mistaken about something. That wasn't what happen." Mag had an aggrieved look. "My back, of course, would hurt after I work for a long time."
“不是不是，我是说我在酒窖里坐着给她解释那蒸馏设备的原理和用法。”麦格连忙解释道。
Mag quickly explained, "No, no. I meant I was working hard at explaining the principles and usage of the distillation equipment in the cellar."
“不是你想的那样的。”麦格连忙道。
"This is not what you imagine," Mag quickly explained.
“不是哦，是我自己偷偷跑出来的，父亲大人可能还在睡觉觉，我就是想给他买早餐，让他多睡一会呢。”艾米笑着摇摇头道。
Amy shook her head and smilingly said, "No. I snuck out alone. Father might be still sleeping right. I just want to buy breakfast for him and let him sleep in for a while."
“不是失败品，这是它独有的芳香。”
"It's not a failure. It's its unique fragrance."
“不是我找到它，是他找到了我。”麦格摇摇头，说道：“他说在我身上感受到了克苏鲁的气息，所以找上门来，我把它从洛都引到这里。”
"I didn't find it. It found me." Mag shook his head and said, "It said it sensed the presence on Cthulhu on me, so it came to look for me. I lured it here from Rodu."
“不是瞎酿！”埃菲俏脸一红，宽广的胸怀颤了颤，有些激动道：“我父亲留下了一本酿酒册，里边记载了他会酿的所有酒，我是照着那册子学的酿酒！”

"I'm not doing it without knowing how!" Eiffie's face reddened and her chest shook as she said agitatedly, "My father left me a wine-brewing manual with a record of all the wines that he brewed. I learnt from that manual!"
“不是这根，是那根，笨死了你。”
"It's not this string, it's that one. So stupid.
“不是魔鬼，是古老者。”麦格降低了几分声音道。
"It's not the Devil. It's the Elder Things," Mag lowered his volume.
“不是，好像是那老板放了一壶酒在门口，就把人给吸引过去了。”小伙计摇摇头。
"No. I think the boss placed a cup of liquor at the door, and the customers were all attracted by it." The waiter shook his head.
“不是，我是说我们先先找个地方落脚，等麦格先生回来，顺便按个摩。”
"No, What I mean is we should find a place to stay first and wait for Mr. Mag to return. While we're at it, we go for a massage."
“不是，是母后这段时间也吃不下什么东西，我想给她带点开胃菜回去。”温妮莎摇摇头。
"No, Royal Mother has not been able to eat anything recently, either. I want to bring some back for her as appetizers." Vanessa shook her head.
“不是，这里有一半是我要吃的呢。”艾米摇摇头说道。
"No. Half of them are for me." Amy shook her head.
“不理解？就像这瓶酒，哪怕它的年纪和你差不多大，可到现在为止，你依旧酿不出它的一半美味。”麦格接着解释道。
"Don't understand? It's like this bottle of wine. Even though it's almost your age, you're still unable to come up with a brew half as good as this," Mag continued.
“不用了不用了，你太客气了。”艾米摆摆手。
"There's no need to. You're being too nice." Amy waved her hands.
“不用拘谨，咱们去喝两杯，赫克托走了，咱们院里会喝酒的人不多了。”卢西恩微笑着说道，笑容中透着几分悲伤。
"Relax, let's get a couple of drinks. After Hector's gone, there aren't many here who know how to drink," Lucien said with a sad smile.
“不用换了，这样挺好的，我给你套个外套就行。”麦格从一旁取了羽绒服，直接给她裹上，然后搀扶着她下楼去了。
"No need to get changed. This is fine. I'll just get you a jacket." Mag took the down jacket lying at the side, and put it on Irina before helping her down the stairs.

"Supervisor, you are so out of this world. You just sold 33 properties in a blink of an eye." The staff member who went to call Fitch in earlier, looked at him with admiration.
“主管，是不适合见面的人吗？”那工作人员见费奇脸色不太好，试探着道：“要不我让他走？”
"Sir, is he someone that you should not be meeting?" The staff member saw that Fitch did not have a very good expression on and asked, "Should I get him to leave?"
“主管，这一切会不会都在哈迪斯先生的计划中。”手下咽了咽口水，看着费奇问道。
The subordinate gulped and asked Fitch, "Supervisor, is all this part of Mr. Hades' plan?"
“主管，那位老板什么家庭啊，一百多栋楼说买就买，就算再便宜，那也是一两个亿的铜币现金砸下去，真的这么有钱吗？”手下手里干着活，还是忍不住好奇的问道。

The subordinate couldn't help asking as he worked, "Supervisor, what background that boss comes from? He simply bought up over 100 properties. No matter how cheap they are, he will still need to pay one to two billion copper coins in cash. Is he really that rich?"
“乔以前常和我们说自由，可我们从来没有见过，可能离开了农场，就能见到了吧。”安东伸出大手揉了揉阿尔宾的脑袋，“记住，别回来了。”
"Joe used to taell us about freedom but we've never seen it. Maybe after leaving the farm, you would see it." Anton reacched his big hand out and stroked Albin's head. "Remember, don't come back."
“乔修恐怕已经和从封印中逃脱的魔鬼汇合了。”伊琳娜蹙眉道。
"I'm afraid Josh had already met up with the Devil that had escaped from the seal," Irina said with a frown.
“乔修来过这里？”麦格皱眉道。
Mag frowned as he said, "Josh was here?"
“乔修殿下！”骑士一惊，下意识的停住了脚步。
"Prince Josh!" The knight was stunned, and paused instinctively.
“乔修这蠢货，终于还是被他自己淘汰了，真是得来全不费工夫。”肖恩看着手中刚刚得到的情报，肆意的笑着。
"Josh, that idiot. He finally kicked himself out of the race. I won it effortlessly." Sean laughed heartily while looking at the intel that he had just received.
“乖。”麦格笑着伸手揉了揉艾米的头，然后看着埃菲微笑道：“埃菲小姐，早啊。”
"Good girl." Mag said as he caressed Amy's head. After that, he looked at Eiffie and greeted with a smile, "Good morning, Miss Eiffie."
“也好。”希利点头。
"That will do too." Seely nodded.
“也好，万事小心，如果遇到什么麻烦，可以到塞班酒馆来找我。”麦格点头，分头行动可以减小目标。
"Alright. Do be careful. If there's any trouble, you can look for me at Saipan Tavern." Mag nodded. Splitting up could narrow down their search targets.
“也好，你今天是喝了不少了。”弗格斯点点头。
"Alright. You have already drank a lot today." Fergus nodded.
“也好，劳烦夫人了。”波比点点头，放下酒颇为深情的看着她说道。
"Alright. Sorry to trouble you," Bobby told his wife seriously as he placed the wine down.
“也好，如果我没有猜错的话，亚历克斯和伊琳娜现在应该也在洛都，他们是现在最了解魔鬼的人，或许我们可以通过他们更快找到魔鬼的踪迹。”路易斯也是点头，又道：“对了，伊丽莎白好像离开混乱之城了。”

"That works. If I am not wrong, Alex and Irina should already be in Rodu. They are the people who know the devil the best. Perhaps we could find the tracks of the devil even faster through them." Louis nodded, and said, "Oh, right. I think Elizabeth has left Chaos City."
“也好，路上小心些。”伊琳娜点点头，直接用传送阵返回酒馆。
"Alright. Be careful on the road." Irina nodded and returned to the tavern right away with the teleportation portal.
“也带来了。”
"She's here too."
“也是哦……”熙熙若有所思的点点头，把饭盒往地上一放，“那我也去看看，学点厨艺。”
"That's true…" Xixi nodded thoughtfully. She put the lunch box in her hands down, and said, "In that case, I'll go and take a look to learn some culinary skills."
“也没什么重要的事情，就是老婆孩子热炕头在家等着，回去睡个早觉。”麦格一脸平淡道。
"It's nothing important. It's just that my wife, kids, and a warm bed are waiting for me at home. I can go back to sleep in for a while," Mag replied calmly.
“也要带上我哦，我很能打的。”艾米把埋在碗里的脑袋抬起来，同样一脸认真的说道。
Amy looked up from her bowl, and seriously said as well, "You've got to bring me along too. I'm a good fighter."
“买主委托我们帮忙出租这些房子，所以我们要去贴出租公告。”费奇说道。
"The buyer wants us to help rent out these properties, so we are going to stick for rent notices there." Fitch asked.
“事情真的不是这样子的啊！”
"It's not what you think it is!"
“五五开。”
“五成。”多米尼克说道。
"50%" Dominic asked.
“亚伯罕公爵和这酒馆老板的关系肯定不一般！”
"Duke Abraham and the owner of this tavern have some special relationship!"
“亚伯罕叔叔，最近是不是发生什么事情了？怎么感觉父皇好像不是很开心？”温妮莎坐在马车里，看着亚伯罕问道。
Vanessa sat in the horse-drawn carriage, and asked, "Uncle Abraham, did something happen recently? Why do I feel that Father doesn't seem to be very happy?"
“亚历克斯……怨念可真是不小呢，放心吧，我会帮你抓住他的，让他生不如死……”
"Alex...The resentment is quite strong. Don't worry. I'll help you get him and make his life hell..."
“亚历克斯！你深夜来访，所谓何事？！”一道中气十足的声音从城楼上响起。
"Alex! What matter do you have here so late in the palace?" A powerful voice shouted from the city wall.
“亚历克斯，伊琳娜，请坐。”安德烈笑着抬手道。
"Alex, Irina, please take a seat," Alex said with a smile as he motioned for them to take a seat.
“人倒是被吸引来了，可这酒馆还没开门啊，得晚上六点钟才开门。”
"We are indeed seduced, but this tavern isn't open yet. It'll only open at 6 pm."
“人家……人家就是说说嘛。”小丫鬟吃痛，捂着脑门有些委屈道。
The maid felt pain. While covering her forehead with her hand, she aggrievedly said, "I-I was just saying."
“人家八个老婆加起来，也没你一个漂亮啊。”老板看了眼伊琳娜，有些羡慕道。
The boss looked at Irina, and enviously said, "Your wife is much more beautiful than his eight wives combined."
“人家还没有开始做饭呢。”
"He hasn't start cooking yet."
“人找到了吗？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"Did you find the person?" Irina asked.
“人生嘛，总要做一些新的尝试。”
"Oh well, we always have to try new things in life."
“人类的的身体同样有着无限的潜力，而机械终究是有上限的。”麦格淡定道。
"The human's body also have an unlimited potential, while machinery always has an upper limit." Mag calmly replied.
“什么叫全家最丑……有这么说话的吗？”麦格翻了个白眼，这些人觉得他是聋子吗？
"What ugliest in the family… How can they speak like that?" Mag rolled his eyes. Did these people think that he was deaf?
“什么情况？怎么伤成这样？”麦格这才问出了困扰了他许久的问题。
"What happened? How did he get so seriously injured?" Mag finally asked the question that troubled him for so long.
“什么情况？！”艾略特穿着睡衣出门来，皱眉道。
"What's happening?!" Elliot came out in his pyjamas and said with a frown.
“什么样的强者？”麦格皱眉。
"What kind of powerhouse?" Mag frowned.
“什么！”
"What!"
“什么！双金奖！”费奇和手下同时瞪大了眼睛。
"What! Twin gold awards!" Fitch and his subordinate widened their eyes at the same time.
“什么？！”正在伏案工作的加兰猛然抬头，有些诧异的看着那编辑。
"What?!" Garlan, who had his head in his work, suddenly looked up at the editor in shock.
“仆从？”麦格皱眉，这个家伙果然不是被克苏鲁简单控制的魔兽。
"Servant?" Mag frowned. This fellow was indeed not a magic beast that was controlled by Cthulhu.
“今天外面是挺冷的啊。”麦格跺了跺脚，虽然室内的暖气让门口稍微暖和一点，但也难抵这萧瑟的寒风。
"It is rather cold outside today." Mag stomped his feet. Although the warmer inside made the air at the door feel slightly warmer, there was still the chilling wind.
“今天的营业额呢？”伊琳娜伸出了手，笑吟吟的看着麦格。
"Where are the earnings for today?" Irina reached her hand out to Mag with a smile.
“今天这水也有些醉人。”埃菲瞪了她一眼，示意她赶紧吃饭。
"The water today is rather intoxicating." Eiffie glared at Mala and hinted at her to eat quickly.
“今天酒馆开业第一天，我就不喝了，一会喝醉了不好接待客人。”麦格笑着摇头，他还没有狂妄到认为自己喝白酒也能千杯不醉。

"Today is the first day of the tavern's opening. I won't be drinking, otherwise, I won't be able to serve the customers properly." Mag shook his head with a smile. He was not so conceited to think that he could drink shot after shot and not get drunk.
“今日任务发布：勇敢的走向未知！请小主前往五百米外的早餐店，替全家人购买今日份的早餐。任务完成可获得一次大转盘奖励！”

"Today's mission: Going into the unknown bravely! Could the little mistress please go to the breakfast shop 500 meters away to buy breakfast for the whole family. You will receive a chance to spin the wheel when you complete the mission!"
“今日错过了，以后想要在这茫茫冰原上再找到它，恐怕就不是一件容易的事情了。”麦格皱眉。
"We missed it today. It won't be easy to find it again in this vast snow field." Mag frowned.
“今晚你要卖什么酒？啤酒吗？”回到酒馆，伊琳娜看着在厨房做准备工作的麦格。
After returning to the tavern that night, Irina directed a question at Mag, who was doing preparation work in the kitchen. "What kind of alcoholic drinks are you selling tonight? Beer?"
“今晚你还要出门吗？”伊琳娜突然抬起头来看着麦格。
"Are you still going out tonight?" Irina looked up at Mag.
“今晚回去得加个班了。”麦格在心里想道。
I have to work overtime tonight, thought Mag.
“今晚我要去一趟风之森林，这里就交给你了。”伊琳娜放下碗，优雅的擦拭了一下嘴唇，微笑道。
"I'll be going to the Wind Forest tonight. I'll leave this place to you." Irina placed her bowl down, wiped her mouth elegantly and smiled.
“今晚酒馆要开业吗？”伊琳娜问道。
"Are you opening for business tonight?" Irina asked.
“今晚？”伊琳娜看着麦格。
"Tonight?" Irina looked at Mag.
“介娘们不好惹！”埃菲看了一眼抓着椅子把手的伊琳娜，她也是见过世面的人，第一时间便感受到了冰冷的杀气，让她都有种退避三舍的冲动。

This woman is not to be trifled with! Eiffie glanced at Irina, who was grabbing a chair. She had seen many things, and the moment she felt the cold murderous intent, she felt the urge to run for her life.
“从上面过！”
"From the top!"
“从今天开始，撤去你的所有职务和身份，回到你的城堡，孤独终老吧。”海伦娜冷笑着看着艾略特，“这是看在莎莉的份上，给你的最轻惩罚，你应该庆幸生了个好女儿。”

"From today onwards, you will be stripped of all your duties and status. Return to your castle and lead your lonely life." Helena looked at Elliot and scoffed. "This is the lightest punishment I'm giving you on account of Sally. You should be glad you gave birth to a good daughter."
“从你刚刚那个手下那里拿的，外面的蜡被我去掉了，药效应该更好了。”麦格微笑道。
"I got it from your subordinate. I've removed the wax on the exterior. The effect should be better." Mag said with a smile.
“从时间上判断，会不会是艾米的那个系统干的？”麦格突然想起了一个变数。
"Judging from the timeline, could it be done by Amy's System?" Mag suddenly thought of a factor.
“从这方面来说，是这样的。”麦格点头，看了眼楼梯口的方向，两个孩子这会应该还在楼上玩耍。
"In this sense, it is like that." Mag nodded. He looked towards the staircase. The two children should still be playing upstairs.
“从龟甲石的微弱反应来看，方向是没有错的，只是轨迹很混乱，想要找到他不容易。”梅兰特闭着眼睛悠悠道，龟甲石悬浮在他的面前轻轻转动。

"Judging from the weak reaction on the septaria oracle, there isn't a mistake in the direction. It's just that the trails are a bit messy, so it won't be easy finding him," Merante said calmly with his eyes closed. The septaria oracle that was suspended before him spun gently.
“他……他们……”埃菲被烟雾弹呛到，红着眼睛看着进门来的麦格。
"Th-they..." Eiffie was choked by the smoke bomb and she looked at Mag with reddened eyes.
“他不想让人知道这件事，那我们就让诺兰大陆的所有人都知道，让乔修彻底沦为过街老鼠，找到他，然后杀死他。”道格拉斯声音冰冷道。
"Since he doesn't want people to know about this, we will make this known to everyone on the Norland Continent, and make Josh a wanted man. We will find him, and then kill him," Douglas said coldly.
“他们不会喝醉吗？”一直没有说话的伊琳娜看着台上的评委说道。
Irina who has been quiet, looked at the judges on the stage and said, "Won't they get drunk?"
“他们不是跟随奥斯特的吗？”
"Aren't they Auster's followers?"
“他们在肖恩府邸遇到了伏击，应该是中了乔修的计，看来他已经注意到我们了。”麦格说道。
"They were ambushed in Sean's mansion. I think they fell into his trap. It looks like he had noticed us," Mag said.
“他们家终于开窍搞开业活动了？”埃菲伸了个拦腰，宽松的棉衣下的曼妙的身材尽显，有些慵懒的笑道。
Eiffie stretched out, displaying her curves under her loose cotton clothes as she lazily said, "Did they finally decide to have an opening promotion?"
“他们想在栏杆上挂上更多的尸体，让我们知道反抗的下场，这是我中午听到的。”
"They want to hang more bodies on the pole to let us know what is would happen if we fight back. This is what I heard in the afternoon."
“他们找父亲有点事情，小米你和安妮先上楼吧。”麦格说道。
"They have something to discuss with Father. Little Amy, go upstairs with Annie first," Mag said.
“他们是被迫成为守卫的，他们的心灵是善良的，还曾经为我们提供过帮助。”一位年迈的精灵大声说道，说服了同伴们放过那几位守卫。
"They were forced to become guards. They are kind and even provided help to us before." An elderly elf said loudly, convincing his companions to let those few guards go.
“他们的酋长想要加入我们和平派，但是部落内部出现了分歧。”
"Their chief wants to join the pro-peace group, but there are differences internally."
“他们要南下？”
"Are they heading south?"
“他们要是能看得懂的话，早发财了。”麦格笑了笑，胸有成竹道：“不用等明年，明天来问商铺的人就会变多了。”
"If they could understand it, they would have long made it big." Mag smiled and said confidently, "It would not even take a year. Tomorrow there would be mroe people asking about shops here."
“他们说吞噬怨念的是一个可怕的年轻人，看不清楚相貌，但他的身上有着可怕的气息，实力是九级，尚未突破十级。部落被屠后不久，他就出现了，不过不知什么原因匆匆离去。”梅兰特起身，看着麦格说道。

Merante got up, and said to Mag, "They said it was a young man who was devouring the resentment. They couldn't see his face, but he had a terrifying presence on him. His power was 9th-tier. He hadn't broken through to the 10th-tier yet. He appeared soon after the tribe was massacred, but somehow he left in a hurry."
“他凶我。”艾米立马一脸委屈的说道，大大的眼睛里，泪光闪烁。
"He is so fierce to me." Amy immediately looked pitiful and whined. There were tears glistening in her big eyes.
“他在这里停留过，就在不久之前，从魔气判断应该不是魔鬼的本体，但这个出卖了灵魂的家伙入魔已深，吸收了众多精血和怨气之后，实力暴涨，会越来越难对付。”梅兰特在遗迹之中转了一圈，最后在中央那座土堆前站定，神情有些凝重道。

Merante walked one round in the ruins, and finally stopped in front of the earthen mound. He gravely said, "He stopped here briefly, and it was not too long ago. Judging from the aura, it wasn't the devil itself. However, the chap who sold his soul to the devil was in way too deep. His potential increased exponentially after absorbing so much blood essence and resentment. He will get harder and harder to deal with."
“他已经断了，需要一个锻造师来将他们重新焊接在一起，这显然不是小主你能做的事情。”系统劝说道。
"It's already broken. You'll need a weaponsmith to forge it back together. This is obviously not what you can do," the System persuaded.
“他想遮丑，那我们就扯掉他的底裤。”
"We will pull off his underwear since he wants to cover it up."
“他是一个魔法师，从未学过剑法。”安德烈皱眉。
"He is a magic caster who has never learned how to wield a sword." Andre frowned.
“他是个好人，这样走了，太可惜了，太突然了。”卢西恩看着面前被满上的酒杯，轻声说道。
"He was a good man. It's such a pity that he left just like that. This is too sudden," Lucien said softly as he looked at the filled glass in front of him.
“他现在有两个脑子，想到这一点并不难。”麦格微微摇头。
"He has two brains now, so it isn't hard to think about that." Mag shook his head slightly.
“他的理念一直和我们接近，和平联盟和新的抵抗联盟就交给他了，比我们更专业。”两个孩子还没有睡醒，麦格自己盛了一碗粥在伊琳娜对面坐下，“如果恶魔族那几个种族和奥斯特还要继续跳脱，就先把他们收拾了，签下和平条约再北上。”

"His ideas have always been similar to ours. Let's leave the Peace Alliance and the new Resistance Alliance to him. He's much more professional than us." The two children were still asleep. Mag got himself a bowl of porridge and sat across from Irina. "If Auster and those few demon tribes are still making trouble, we'll take care of them first before signing the peace treaty and set off for the north."
“他的确在这里出现过，而且不止在一个地方逗留。”梅兰特看着漂浮在面前滴溜溜旋转的龟甲石，神情格外凝重。
"He has indeed appeared here before, and he has stayed in more than one place." Merante looked at the hovering and spinning septaria oracle with an exceptionally grave expression.
“他的身法飘忽古怪，并未与臣正面交手，但实力应当不弱于九级，绝非魔法师能够比拟。而且他的身上散发着一种令人不适的气息，一靠近便令人恐惧。”利尔回想起昨晚与那黑袍人交手的情形，依旧觉得后背有些发凉。

"His movements were shifty and weird. He didn't fight with me directly, but his power should be above the 9th-tier, and not that of a magic caster's. Furthermore, there was an uncomfortable aura emanating from him. It made one fearful when one got close to him." Lear recalled the situation where he fought with the man in black robe last night. He was still getting chills down his back.
“他要是有这贼胆，早就先摸上我的床了，还轮得到外面的小婊砸？呵，男人。”伊琳娜放下笔，合上日记本。
"He would have climbed into my bed if he has the guts. Why will the little b*tches out there ever stand a chance?" Ha, men." Irina put down her pen and closed the diary.
“他说是普通家庭，你信吗？”费奇看了他一眼。
"He said he comes from a normal family. Do you believe him?" Fitch threw him a look.
“他说：刚烧开的水其实是可以直接喝的，只要你不怕烫就行。
"He said: 'You can actually drink water that is freshly boiled, as long as you're not afraid of being scalded.'
“他隐忍这么多年，虽是二皇子，但已经成了王位的有力竞争者，哪怕是肖恩也没有绝对把握能够胜了他。在这种时刻，突然做出这样的举动，让自己完全出局，令人费解。”

"He had been enduring for so many years. Although he's the second prince, he was still a very strong contender for the throne. Even Sean would not have the confidence of defeating him. Doing this suddenly at this time would disqualify him. This is bewildering."
“以哈迪斯先生的酒馆目前的势头，就算不参加这品酒大会，也能客满为患。”埃菲在麦格对面坐下，一双美眸盈盈的望着他，“不过，想来哈迪斯先生也有着让更多的人知道自己酿的美酒的野心吧。”

"Judging from the popularity of your tavern, I think you would be able to get a full house even if you don't join this liquor tasting event." Eiffie sat opposite to Mag and looked at him with her beautiful eyes. "However, I think you also have the ambition of letting more people know about your wine."
“以洛斯帝国之兵力，与那亡灵军团一战，有几分胜算？”大殿中，安德烈看着多米尼克问道。
In the great hall, Andre asked Dominic, "With the Roth Empire's military might, what are our chances of defeating that Army of the Dead?"
“任务前置奖励：秘制酒鬼花生菜谱一份、凉拌猪耳朵菜谱一份已发放！”

“公爵大人，您听我……”
"Your Highness, listen to me…"
“公爵大人，那您的早餐？”
"My Lord Duke, what about your breakfast?"
“公爵大人，麦米餐厅关门了，门上挂着的公告说要孩子放假，要出去游玩和取材，歇业一个月。”那骑士有些紧张不安道。

"My lord, Mamy Restaurant is closed. The notice hanging on the door said the restaurant was closed for one month because his children were having a term break, and they were going away for a vacation and looking for ingredients," that knight replied nervously.
“公爵？大人？”奥尔登到了嘴边的话瞬间噎住，摘掉盖住他眼睛的一片猪耳朵，看清楚了那高大胖子的模样，双脚一软，当场就给跪在了地上的盘子碎片上。

"Your Highness?" Aulden was stumped. He removed the pig's ear that was covering his eyes, and saw what the large man actually looked like. His legs went jelly, and he kneeled down immediately on the broken pieces of the plate.
“兰克斯特果然被魔鬼控制了，而且实力得到了一定的提升，能够与亚历克斯一战而不弱下风。”道格拉斯神情复杂道。
"Rankster is indeed controlled by the devil and his power is elevated. He is able to fight with Alex head on." Douglas said with a complex expression.
“兰克斯特还保有一丝神志，尚未完全被控制。”麦格反驳道，但没有提伊丽莎白的事情。
"Rankster still has a hint of consciousness. He has yet to be fully under control," Mag retorted. However, he did not mention Elizabeth.
“兰克斯特！伊丽莎白一直在找你！你难道要让她看到这样的你吗？！”麦格喝道。
"Rankster! Elizabeth had been looking for you! Do you want her to see you like this?!" Mag shotued.
“兰克斯特！兰克斯特！”
"Rankster! Rankster!"
“关于安妮的来历，抱歉我对你撒了谎。”麦格有些歉然道。
"It's concerning Annie's origin. I'm sorry, I lied to you," Mag said apologetically.
“关关关，我关你老母啊！”就在这时，一道骂咧咧的声音从角落里响起，一道肥壮的身影从角落里冲了过来，啪的一下，扬手将一盘吃了一半的凉拌猪耳朵就盖在了奥尔登的脸上。
"Prison your head!" Just then, a shout came from the corner. A big silhouette rushed over from the corner, and he pressed a plate of half-eaten pig ears salad into Aulden's face with a smack.
“兵部就在那边，发生那事之后，加强了防守。”麦格用眼神示意斜对面那一排黑色的房子。
"That's the Ministry of Defense. Its defense has been heightened after that incident happened." Mag used his gaze to indicate the row of cottages at the opposite side diagonally.
“兵部的先关着，一个都不许放出去，相关的消息也不能走漏半点。”安德烈很快恢复了冷静，声音微沉道：“把当日和乔修接触过的法师塔魔法师全部控制起来，然后让理查德来见我。”

"Keep those from the military locked up. Don't release any of them, and none of this news should be leaked." Andre regained his composure very quickly. He said in a deep voice, "Get all the magic casters Josh met in Magus Tower that day under control, and tell Richard to come to me."
“其他人都退下，利尔留下。”安德烈说道。
"All of you may go now. Lear, stay back," Andre said.
“其他可以食用的蜗牛也行。”麦格接着道。
"Other edible snails will do too." Mag continued on.
“其实安妮是那日我在封印混乱之城外那个魔鬼的时候，那魔鬼被雷电劈出来的一个纯粹的善良人格，那日我差点迷失在魔鬼的幻境之中，是她指引我方向，救了我一命。”麦格解释道。

"Actually, Annie is a purely kind personality that the thunderstrike struck out from the Devil that day when I was resealing the Devil outside of Chaos City. I almost fell into the Devil's hallucination that day and she was the one who pointed the way out for me and saved me," Mag explained.
“其实我不认识她，就是中午的时候碰了个面，打了个招呼，她多半是看上我多财多亿，才故意来碰瓷的。”麦格解释道。
"I actually don't know her. We just met in the morning and exchanged greetings. She's probably here to find trouble after seeing how talented I am," Mag explained.
“其实我偶偶会想，你可能就是因为这辈子都没有遇到一个爱你的男人，才会变成现在这样偏执的老太婆。”
"In fact, sometimes I even think that you became such an obstinate old lady because you never met a man who loves you in your life."
“其实我挺好奇你究竟是谁，神？或者是与那些被封印的家伙一样的存在？”麦格站到了安妮的身前，看着晞说道。
Mag stood in front of Annie and said to Xi, "Actually, I'm very curious about who you are? A god? Or a being similar to those sealed fellows?"
“其实我更期待泰坦酒能够在品酒大会再现辉煌。”
"Actually, I expect the Titan Liquor to reclaim its glory at the liquor tasting event more."
“其实要揪出幕后黑手很简单，只要完成黑市任务，把你交给他，自然就能知道是谁在操纵这一切了。”麦格微笑道。
"Actually, it's easy to seke the mastermind out. Just complete the mission and hand you over to him. That way, we would know who is orchestrating all this at the back," Mag said with a smile.
“养殖场和种植场都安装有实时监控系统，不存在强攻击性魔兽突然闯入的可能性，并且现场监控也没有留下任何痕迹。

"There are surveillance cameras located at the farms as well. It is not possible for any magic beast to intrude no matter how powerful it is. Besides, there was no trace left behind in the surveillance cameras.
“兽人永不为低头！”
"The orcs will never submit!"
“再多找几家印刷厂，让他们全力印制，但一定要保证质量。”加兰表情认真的说道：“经销商那边也和他们打好招呼，绝对不能出现加价售卖的情况，一旦出现，将会被收回经销权，并且被十全十美列入黑名单。”

"Find a few more printing factories and get them to work full force, but maintain the quality." Garlan said seriously, "Also, go talk to the distributors and never allow resale at a higher price to happen. If it happens again, we will take back their distribution rights and put them in the Perfect Food blacklist.
“再来一次嘛，再来一次。”
"One more time. One more time."
“再次重申！本系统是一个完美的厨神系统，那个系统的存在可能只是一个意外！”系统严肃道。
"I repeat! I am a perfect God of Cookery Cultivation System. That System's existence could only be an accident!" the System said seriously.
“再见。”帕萨摆摆手，微微摇晃着离去。
"Goodbye." Pasa waved his hand, and staggered off.
“再见了艾米，安妮。”亚北米娅拥抱了一下艾米和安妮，然后道别离去。
"Goodbye, Amy and Annie." Yabemiya hugged Amy and Annie before leaving.
“再见哦小朋友。”温妮莎笑着和艾米道别，顺便撸了一把丑小鸭。
"Goodbye, little kid." Vanessa smiled and bade Amy farewell while she gave Ugly Duckling a little caress.
“再见小姐姐们，我会想你们的。”艾米站在门口，和大家挥手道别。
"Goodbye, Big Sisters. I will miss you guys." Amy stood at the door, and waved goodbye to all of them.
“写……我写……”系统在线卑微。
"I'll... do it..." the System said in a lowly tone.
“准备马车，我去一趟皇宫。”
"Prepare the horse-drawn carriage. I'm going to the palace."
“几位法部的大人，不知我有没有这个荣幸帮你们倒酒啊？”亚伯罕接过管家递来的丝巾擦拭着手上沾染的红油，似笑非笑的看着众人问道。

"Lords of the Ministry of Law, I wonder if I may have the honor of pouring your wine?" Abraham asked with a seeming smile as he received the handkerchief handed over by his butler to wipe the red oil on his hand.
“几位请问要喝点什么。”麦格不卑不亢的问道，丝毫没有被他们这群人身上穿着的官袍和那一身官威唬住。
"What would you gentlemen like to drink?" Mag asked calmly. He wasn't intimidated by their officials' attire and aura at all.
“几次可疑地点都只是短暂逗留，从魔气的轨迹来看，他可能进了洛斯帝国境内，也可能去了人迹罕至的北边。”紫纹狮鹫悬停在暮光森林边缘，梅兰特说道。

"He only stopped briefly at a few suspicious locations. Judging from the traces of the evil aura, he has most likely entered into the Roth Empire's territory. He could also have gone to the remote north, which is off the beaten track," Merante said while the griffin hovered over the edge of the Twilight Forest.
“出……城往西……”领头的骑士只留下了一句话，便歪头晕厥了过去。
"Out of the...city, to the west..." The leading knight fainted immediately after he said that.
“出发吧，过来，我带你们飞。”伊琳娜冲着三人招了招手，脚下金光一闪，三人已是消失在餐厅中。
"Let's go. Come over, I'll bring you all away." Irina waved to the three of them. A golden light flashed underneath their feet, and they all disappeared from the restaurant.
“刚出炉，里边的汤很烫，你们吃的时候要小心一点，小口小口的吃。”麦格给两个小家伙的浅口盘里各夹了一只蟹黄灌汤包，一边提醒道。

"This just came out of the steamer and it's very hot inside. Be careful when eating. Have it in small bites," Mag placed a crab roe soup dumpling onto each of the two children's plates as he reminded them.
“刚刚上楼去的不是温妮莎姐姐和累死胖鹰鹰的爷爷吗？”艾米一手拿着牛骨，有点惊讶道。
Amy held a beef bone, surprised, and commented, "Were those Big Sister Vanessa and the grandpa who has tired the fat eagle out who have just went upstairs?"
“刚刚你们有没有听到什么声音？”
"Did you hear anything just now?"
“刚刚小老板不是说要去溜猫吗？”
"Didn't the Little Boss say that she's going to walk the cat?"
“刚刚有没有看到什么东西飘过去？”
"Did you see anything pass by just now?"
“刚刚那东西是什么情况？”把两个孩子都哄睡了，伊琳娜看着刚洗完澡，裹着浴巾从浴室里出来的麦格问道。
"What is that just now?" After putting the two children to sleep, Irina asked Mag, who just came out of the shower with a towel wrapped around him.
“刚刚那个家伙看起来心思深沉，不像好人。”伊琳娜看着麦格说道。
"That fellow seemed to be in deep thoughts just now. He did not seem like a good person," Irina told Mag.
“刚好合适呢。”麦格眼睛一亮，不愧是高级文明的戒指，竟然还能根据佩戴人来适应大小，“那以后安妮就戴着它吧，挺好的。”
"It fits just right." Mag's eyes lit up. An advanced civilization ring indeed. It could even adjust its size based on the wearer's finger. "In that case, just keep it on from now on. It looks good."
“别光喝酒，你吃点菜。”麦格看着端着酒杯又要再来一口的伊琳娜提醒道。
"Don't just drink, have some food," Mag reminded Irina, who picked up her glass for another shot.
“别光喝酒，吃点花生啊。”麦格来到波比面前坐下，把那叠还没有碰过的酒鬼花生往波比面前推了一点。
"Don't just drink, have some peanuts." Mag sat before Bobby. He pushed the plate of drunkard peanuts that had not been touched yet towards Bobby.
“别别别，我没有你这样的儿子，艾米会嫌弃的。”麦格连忙拒绝，看着那开在冰崖上的洞穴入口。
"Don't, please don't. I don't have a son like you. Amy will despise you." Mag quickly rejected him and looked at the entrance of the cave on the ice cliff.
“别哭别哭，要是难过的话，你就看看笑话大王嘛，还有那个属性鉴定技能，可好玩了。”系统硬着头皮哄道。
"Please don't cry. You can read 'The King of Jokes' if you feel sad. Besides, the ability of 'Attribute Identification' is really fun." The system tried its best to pacify her.
“别对我龇牙，不然我把你剩下的脑袋也打爆。”麦格看了一眼它的其他两个脑袋。
"Don't hiss at me, otherwise I'll bust the rest of your heads." Mag flicked a glance its other two heads.
“别急啊，哈迪斯先生。”埃菲却是伸手轻轻拉住了他的衣袖。
"There's no rush, Mr. Hades." Eiffie pulled Mag's sleeve gently.
“别担心小主，只是一个切菜台而已，我相信你父亲不会怪你的，毕竟你那么可爱……”
"Don't worry, Little Mistress, it's just a kitchen counter. I believe your father would not blame you. After all, you're so cute…"
“别挣扎了，我在匕首上抹了毒，算算时间，也该发作了。”康妮一脸淡然道。
"Don't struggle. I've put poison on the daggers. Looking at the time, it should be acting right now." Connie said calmly.
“别提了，听说最近朝廷里出了大事，大人们人心惶惶，那里还有心思来吃饭，连酒都不敢来喝了。”隔壁娇媚的酒馆老板娘深深吸了一口银烟斗，然后目光迷离的将白色的烟雾吐了出来。

"Don't talk about that. I heard something huge happened at the court recently, and all the lords are terrified. How can they be in the mood to come and eat? They don't even come to drink." The seductive lady boss of the tavern next door took a puff of white smoke from a silver tobacco pipe, and then blew the white smoke out with a glazed gaze.
“别紧张，坐着慢慢谈。”伊琳娜自己在高脚椅上坐下，俯视着麦格。
"Don't be nervous. Take a seat, we'll talk it through nicely." Irina sat on her barstool as she looked down on Mag.
“别误会，我不是馋你的酒谱，我是想根据你的酿酒方法给你定制一套蒸馏设备，一步到位，尽量减少操作可能带来的影响。”麦格解释道。

"Don't be mistaken. I'm not after your brewing manual. I simply want to custom make a set of distillation equipment for you according to your brewing methods. We will settle everything at one go and minimize any operational mistakes." Mag explained.
“别说小姑娘了，那圆滚滚的东西也惹不起。”
"Don't mention the little girl. Even that round thing isn't to be trifled with."
“别说，还真想招一个。”麦格诚实的点头。
"I really am thinking of it." Mag nodded honestly.
“别踩！我说！我都说！”巨汉慌忙叫道，生怕麦格又来一个意外。
"Don't step! I'll tell! I'll say everything!" the man shouted quickly, afraid that another accident would happen again.
“到了。”马车停下，车夫的声音从外边响起。
The horse-drawn carriage stopped, and the coachman said, "We've arrived."
“到时候我和你一起去，只有圣光才能净化魔气，就由我来亲手送他上天。”伊琳娜的声音有些冷。
"I will go with you, then. Only the Holy Light can purify the evil aura. I will send him to heaven personally." Irina's voice was cold.
“前……前辈啊，你说咱们虽然是别人眼中的官老爷，可也不过是个普通人，你倒还是个六级骑士，我连骑士都算不上，平日里没干啥坏事，都是听上边的安排，这出了事，咋就都是咱们的不是呢？”

"S-Senior, say, although we're officials in people's eyes, we're still ordinary people. You were at least a 6th-tier knight. I'm not even a knight. We didn't do anything bad. We just followed orders from above. Now that something happened, why is it our fault?
“前两天看了杂志，连做梦都在想呢，可惜混乱之城太远了，现在又走不开，否则一定要亲自去尝尝那位麦格先生的厨艺。”埃菲点头，眼中满是憧憬。

"I saw the magazine two days ago and was even thinking about it in my dreams. It's a pity Chaos City is too far way and I can't really leave now. otherwise, I would definitely want to try Mr. Mag's cooking for myself." Eiffie nodded with longing in her eyes.
“前日凑巧遇到了这家新开的酒馆，品尝到美酒滋味不错，才敢带诸位大人前来品尝。”波比连忙谦逊道，这里他官职最低，这次卢西恩带他来，恐怕也是有了提携之意，他自然要好好表现一番。

"I happened to bump into this newly opened tavern two days ago, and the drinks were not bad, so I dare to bring my lords here to try them out," Bobby humbly replied. His rank was the lowest among them, and Lucien probably brought him along to give him a leg up in his career. He naturally had to put on his best performance.
“前辈！”
"Senior!"
“前辈，你带我喝了那么多好酒，今天这酒你肯定没喝过，给你倒一杯，尝尝吧。”波比把倒好酒的酒杯放到了对面，沉默了一会，才给自己又倒了一杯。

"Sir, you've brought me to places to try good wine. This wine here must be one you've never tried before. I'll pour you a glass. Give it a try." Bobby placed the filled glass in front of him, and fell silent for a while before pouring another glass for himself.
“前辈，这第一杯，敬你当年的提携之恩。”波比端起酒杯，仰头一饮而尽。
"Sir, this first glass is a toast to you for helping me at work all these years." Bobby picked up the glass, and finished everything in a shot.
“加多少？”
"How much more?"
“劳烦给孩子们发放一下，每个孩子一串牛肉串和一串羊肉串。”麦格看着站在一旁的工作人员微笑着说道。
"Please give them to the children. Each child will have one beef kebab and one mutton kebab," Mag said to the staff members standing at the side with a smile.
“北面局势有些紧急，我希望纺织厂能够暂停手中的所有业务，全面赶制这一批火炮。”麦格将一叠图纸交给艾许莉。
"The situation in the north is tense. I hope the textile factory could stop all its current production first and quickly produce this batch of cannons." Mag passed the stack of blueprints to Ashley.
“十一点了！”麦格微微一惊，这何止是太阳晒屁股，这都中午了。
"It's already 11am!" Mag was slightly taken aback. This was already more than the sun shining down his butt. It was already noon.
“十万册！混乱之城的订单，预付款已经送到了。”那编辑确认道，呈上一张订单。
"100,000 prints! The preorder bill had been sent over from Chaos City," the editor said as he placed a receipt on Garlan's table.
“十个会不会太少了？”艾米问。
"Are 10 too few?" Amy asked.
“十五年前，我的父母死于一场抢劫案。凶手在营业结束后进入酒馆，杀死了他们，抢走了所有的钱。从那之后，再也没有人能酿出正宗的泰坦酒。”埃菲的眼眶微红，但依旧平静。

"15 years ago, my parents died in a robbery case. The perpetrator came to the tavern after we were closed for the day, killed them, and took all the money. From that day on, no one could brew the authentic Titan Liquor anymore." Eiffie's eyes reddened but she was still as calm.
“单纯的，就想看看靠做菜，我能有多出名。”麦格一脸认真的说道。
"I simply want to see how famous I can get by cooking alone," Mag said seriously.
“卖萌也可以维持生活吗？”亚伯罕笑道。
"Can acting cute sustain a living?" Abraham asked with a smile.
“卢西恩大人。”波比有些惊讶的看着那位官员，这可是兵部衙门里的副主事，真正的实权人物。
"Lord Lucien." Bobby was a little shocked to see him as the other party was the deputy manager of the Ministry of Defense, and was someone with legitimate power.
“卢西恩大人，罗莫街似乎已经不剩几家酒馆了，除了那家泰坦酒馆，可他们家太嘈杂了，要不咱们还是换一个地方吧。”几位兵部官员跟在卢西恩的身侧，走在罗莫街上，一位官员说道。

A few Ministry of Defense's officials followed Lucien on Romo Street, and one of them said, "Lord Lucien, there aren't many taverns left on Romo Street apart from Titan Tavern, but Titan Tavern is too boisterous. Why don't we go somewhere else?"
“卢西恩大人，这酒真有那么好？”先前怒怼麦格的那位大臣问道，有点不太相信。
"Lord Lucien, is this alcohol really that good?" The courtier who had criticized Mag was in disbelief.
“印刷机已经被我运回混乱之城，其他东西我可以去取给你。”麦格转身上楼，不一会提着一个超大的木箱子下来，直接放在晞的面前。
"I have already shipped the printing machine back to Chaos City. I can give the other items to you." Mag went upstairs and came down a gigantic wooden box. He placed it right in front of Xi.
"Danger!"
“危！”麦格心中暗道糟糕，千算万算，忘了家里的财政大权已经落入了伊琳娜的手中，而他现在花出去的每一分钱都叫私房钱。

Danger! Mag thought to himself. After so much calculation, he forgot that the family finances had already landed in Irina's hands. Right now, every single cent he spent would be considered his secret stash.
“厉害啊，没想到亚历克斯不仅实力强大，还是一位谋略超群的人，实在令人敬佩。”诺亚有些崇拜的看着麦格。
Awesome. I didn't expect Alex to be such a strategist apart from being powerful. He's so admirable. Noah looked at Mag with adoration.
“原本是这样的，不过，现在恐怕来不及了。”海伦娜摇了摇头，抬了抬手，虚空中开始播放一段留影。
"I am, initially, but now, I'm afraid it's not going to be in time." Helena shook her head. She lifted her hand and a video began to play in the void.
“原来……父亲大人他们为了照顾我的感受，连这种味道都可以接受。”艾米看了一眼厨房的方向，然后目光一转，落到了正趴在柜台上伸懒腰的丑小鸭身上。

"So…Father, Mother and Annie even tolerated such a horrible taste just to take care of my feelings." Amy looked at the kitchen before she turned her gaze to Ugly Duckling, who was stretching out lazily on the counter.
“原来……系统也不是无所不知的……”麦格轻叹了一口气。
"So... the System is not all-knowing..." Mag sighed.
“原来如此，这就好办了。”梅兰特点头，也不废话，直接在那坟堆前坐下，再次开始作法。
"Oh, I see. This will be easy, then." Merante nodded. He didn't waste time talking, and immediately sat down in front of that grave mound, and began to do his spell.
“原来我的厨艺如此惊人，果然过去都是浪费才华了。”诺亚放下碗，一脸惊叹。
"To think that I am so good at cooking. It was all wasted talent," Noya exclaimed as he put his bowl down.
“原来是亚伯罕公爵的大人，没想到他也在这里喝酒啊。”
"So it's Duke Abraham. I didn't expect him to be drinking here too."
“原来是同行啊。”
"So he's one of us."
“原来是波比大人推荐的地方，那必然是有好酒了。”众官员若有所思，同时也是留了个心思。
"So it was Lord Bobby who recommended this place. Then, it must have great drinks." The officials were thoughtful and mindful at the same time.
“原来是藏在下面。”
"So, it's hidden down there."
“原来是这样啊。”埃菲若有所思的点点头，看来哈迪斯先生的舌头一定非常灵活，而且很擅长吸东西……
"I see." Eiffie nodded thoughtfully. It seemed Mr. Hades's tongue was very numble, and he was also very good at sucking...
“原来是那位老板的女儿，好嘞，有埃菲老板娘带着，那就没问题了。”老板恍然，立马麻利的盛了三碗汤，用食盒小心装着递给玛拉。

"So, she's the daughter of that boss. Alright, since Lady Boss Eiffie is carrying them for her, there's no problem." The boss was convinced. He quickly scooped three bowls of soup, put them in a takeaway box and passed to Mala.
“厨神信仰值，是要基于对方对于您的厨艺产生学习的想法，并且对此付诸行动而产生的。”系统的解释在麦格脑海中响起。
"The God of Cookery's faith value is based on the other party being inspired to learn to cook by you and act upon that thought." The system's explanation rang in Mag's head.
“去他娘的和平条约！”
"Fu*k that peace treaty!"
“去吧。”伊琳娜点头，他的精神完全能够覆盖这个庄园，让两个孩子出去晚会也不会有什么意外。
"Go ahead." Irina nodded. Her spiritual power could cover this entire manor. Nothing would happen even if the children went out to play for a while.
“去吧。”那人吩咐道。
"Go." That man instructed.
“去吧，干活去。”埃菲挥了挥手，把玛拉赶出酿酒坊。
"Go and work now." Eiffie waved her hand and chased Mala out of the brewery.
“去最近的标记点看看。”麦格扫了一眼龟甲石，驾着紫纹狮鹫向着斜下方落去。
"Let's take a look at the nearest marked point." Mag swept a glance at the septaria oracle, and drove the purple-striped griffin downwards diagonally.
“去看看现场吧。”梅兰特起身，神情凝重。
"Let's take a look at the scene." Merante stood up with a serious expression.
“去黛蓝工厂。”歌洛璃娅上了马车，便吩咐道。
Gloria got onto the carriage, and instructed, "Go to the Blue Suede Factory."
“参加这个品酒大会，还真是去对了。”麦格满意的点点头。
"It's indeed right to take part in this liquor tasting event." Mag nodded with satisfaction.

"Another fire? Could it be done by someone again?" Louis looked out at the blazing roof afar.
“又来了哦。”艾米提示了一声，又丢出了一颗绿豆。
"Here it comes again," Amy hinted again before throwing out another mung bean.
“又来？”麦格皱眉，开门一看，站在门外的不是希利和卡诺，而是一身冰霜长裙的伊丽莎白。
"Again?" Mag frowned. He opened the door to take a look. It wasn't Seely and Canault at the door, but Elizabeth in a frost long dress.
“又歇业了？有钱人开酒馆就是这样枯燥的吗？”埃菲送一位喝的酩酊大醉的客人出门，刚好看到麦格翻转木牌进门的情景，不禁嘀咕道。
"Closed again? Are the taverns opened by rich people so boring?" Eiffie mumbled to herself when she saw Mag flip the wooden plaque as she sent a drunk customer out.
“又香又脆，好好吃哦。”艾米的眼睛一亮，把剩下的爆米花分给了众人，开始了自己的搓爆米花的大计。
"This is fragrant and crispy. Delicious." Amy's eyes lit up. She shared the remaining popcorn with everyone else, and started her popcorn operation.
“双金奖，我们邻居也获得了金奖，看来我投资的房子要涨价了。”麦格笑着说道。
"It's a twin gold awards. Our neighbor got the gold award too. Seems like the properties I invested are going to increase in value." Mag chuckled.
“反正下次你要是再去打架，不带上我可不行，就算我不动手，在旁边帮你站岗也行。”麦格一脸认真的看着她说道。
"Anyway, you've got to bring me along when you go for a fight in the future. Even if I don't fight along with you, I can still watch you by the side," Mag said seriously.
“发生什么事情了吗？”艾米一脸疑惑的问道。
"Did something happen?" Amy asked with a perplexed look.
“受伤了吗？”麦格连忙将伊琳娜从阿紫背上抱下，在她的身上并未看到明显的伤势，呼吸也尚且平稳，只是陷入了昏迷不醒的状态。
"Is she injured?" Mag immediately carried Irina off Ah Zi's back. There weren't any obvious injuries on her body, and her breathing was smooth. She was simply out cold.
“受点伤，本该继续追查此事，现在又要耽搁了。”梅兰特叹了口气，有些自责。
"We should be continuing with our investigations, but things have to be delayed now because I'm injured," Merante said self-reproachfully with a sigh.
“变成天鹅可能有点难度，不如变成一只熊猫吧，长这个样。”麦格拿起一旁的平板调出了一张熊猫幼崽的图片。
"It's a little difficult to turn it into a swan. How about a panda? It looks like this." Mag picked the tablet at the side, and searched for a panda cub's picture.
“古尸消失了，从现场痕迹来看，发生的时间距现在并不久远。”梅兰特神情凝重道：“他们应该是被控制了。”
"They are missing. Judging from the marks left behind, it happened recently." Merante gravely said, "They should be controlled."
“古老者曾经立下誓言，不能大规模进入诺兰大陆，你们只能靠自己抵御克苏鲁和他所控制的丧尸狂潮。”晞摇头道。

"The Elder Things had made a promise before. They cannot enter the Norland Continent en masse. You have to depend on yourselves to defend against Cthulhu and the zombie horde that it controls." Xi shook her head.
“古老者的强大，也是有限制的吧？否则又怎会任由那些封印数千年日渐老化而坐视不管？”麦格笑着反问道。
"The power of the Elder Things are also limited, right? Otherwise, why would you have let the seals age without doing anything?" Mag asked in return.
“古老者，究竟是什么？”
"What exactly is the Elder Things?"
“古老者？”麦格微微挑眉，想到了克苏鲁神话中那个长着海星脑袋的纺锤状模样的古老种族。
"The Elder Things?" Mag cocked his eyebrows. He was reminded of that ancient species in the Cthulhu Mythos that had starfish-like appendages.
“古老者？那是什么？”伊琳娜皱眉。
"The Elder Things? What's that?" Irina frowned.

"I'm sorry to bother you, Boss. My master loves your side dishes, and sent me to buy some from you. I wonder if it's convenient?" the old butler asked smilingly.
“只成功了一半，泰坦酒没有两年以上的窖藏，是没有灵魂的。”埃菲笑着摇摇头，道：“玛拉，你去取橡木桶，我要把这些原酒先调配成合格的泰坦酒，再将他们装桶封存。”

"This is only half the success. Titan Liquor without at least 2 years of storage is without a soul." Eiffie shook her head and said, "Mala, go and retrieve the oak barrel. I want to make this brewed wine into a qualified Titan Liquor before string them in the barrel.
“只是一本书而已……应该没什么。”麦格安慰自己。
"It's just a book…It should be nothing." Mag consoled himself.
“只是拥有这种能力的人非常稀少而已。”梅兰特摇头，目光重新看向了那处被烧成白地的府邸，神情肃然道：“可以肯定这和暮光森林的灭族惨案是同一人所为，魔气是同源的。不过应该是作案时间比较匆忙，他只吸收了部分怨念和灵魂，如果能够进入到废墟，应该能够从鬼魂那里获得更多信息。”

"It's just that it is too rare for people to have this ability." Merante shook his head. He looked back at the burnt mansion, and said seriously, "I can confirm that this was done by the same person that wiped out the Twilight Forest tribes. They have the same source of evil aura. However, he was probably in a rush when he committed the crime, so he could only absorb part of the resentment and souls. If we could enter the ruins, we should be able to get more information from the spirits."
“只是过来吃个饭，埃菲小姐不用每次都那么客气的。”麦格看着埃菲手里提着的一套厨具说道。
Mag looked at the kitchenware in Eiffie's hand and said, "It's just a simple lunch. Miss Eiffie didn't have to be so polite every time."
“只有自己变得更强大，才有能力保护自己珍视的人。”麦格平静的说道。
"You can only protect people you care about when you become strong," Mag said calmly.
“只能卖给你十只，要是想补充大鹅数量，隔壁就有专门卖鹅的摊位。”麦格笑着看着老板，这些鹅明显是训练过的。
"I can only sell 10 of them to you. If you want to replenish the number of geese, there is a stall selling geese next door." Mag looked at the boss with a smile. These geese were obviously trained.
“只要你是酒馆老板，那就都可以报名参与，不过必须要使用本酒馆独家酿造的酒。本届活动已经筹办了一个月了，三日后正式举行现场品酒，今日是报名的最后期限。”埃菲说道。

"You can qualify as long as you're a tavern onwner, but you have to use wine brewed specially in yoru tavern. It had already been a month since the preparation for this year's event started and the event itself would be officially launched three days later. Today is the last day for registration," Eiffie said.
“只要怨气不散，他便能够做到，这才是魔鬼的可怕之处。”梅兰特微微摇头，坦然道：“就算是我们鬼族，也能通过一些方法做到。”

"As long as the resentment exists, he is able to do it, but that is exactly the devil's scary part." Merante nodded slightly and honestly said, "Even our Ghost Clan can do it through certain methods."
“只要是能够食用的，一只101铜币是吧？”系统确认道。
"As long as it's edible, 101 copper coins for every single one of them?" The system confirmed again.
“只要让它放凉就可以了是吧？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"We just need to let it cool down, right?" Irina asked Mag.
“只闻其香，便知是好酒，可惜了赫克托品尝不到了。”卢西恩轻叹了一口气，端起酒杯抿了一小口。
"Just the smell of it, and I can tell that it's a good wine. Such a pity that Hector won't be able to try it." Lucien sighed gently, and took a sip of the wine.
“只闻其香，便知晓是难得一见的好酒，没想到这罗莫街一家新开的小酒馆里，还藏着这等美酒。”一位大臣赞叹道。
"I know it's a great liquor just by smelling its aroma. I didn't expect such great liquor to exist in a newly opened tavern on this Romo Street," a courtier praised.
“只闻酒香便知是好酒，看来这届品酒大会要出新酒了。”弗格斯也是眼睛一亮，笑着和库尔特说道。
Fergus' eyes lit up too as he said to Kurt, "We already knew that it's a good liquor just by smelling it. Seems like a new liquor will emerge in this year's liquor tasting event."
“叮咚！”
"Ding dong!
“叮咚！恭喜小主帮助父亲创造了一道新的下酒菜！任务奖励：一套迷你厨具！”
"Ding! Congratulations in helping your Father create a new side dish! Mission reward: A set of mini kitchenware!"
“叮咚！支线任务发布：老父亲的愿望：帮助塞班酒馆获得1000位客人，任务完成后将获得神秘奖励！”
"Ding-Dong! Side mission released: The old father's wish: Help Saipan Tavern reached its 1000th customer. You will gain a mysterious reward after completing the mission!"
“叮！101铜币扣除成功！”
"Ding! 101 copper coins is successfully deducted!"
"Ding!"
“叮！任务发布：来自女儿的请求：请宿主改进本世界的绿豆酥制作工艺，制作出一道完美的绿豆酥！任务成功奖励：获得初级甜品师头衔！并且获得神秘礼包一份！任务惩罚：生吃绿豆一百斤！”

"Ding! New mission, A Daughter's Request: please upgrade the mung bean pancake in this world to produce a perfect mung bean pancake! Mission reward: Amateur Patissier title and a mysterious gift pack! Mission failure: eat 50 kg of raw mung beans!
“叮！恭喜宿主完成绿豆糕改良任务！获得初级甜品师称号！并且获得甜品大礼包一份！请查收！”
"Ding! Congratulations on completing the mung bean pastry improvement mission! You have gained the title of elementary patissier! Awarding a big dessert gift package! Please accept your gift!"
“叮！恭喜宿主完成菜品创造任务！两道下酒菜已发放！请注意查收！”
"Ding! Congratulations in completing the dish creation mission! Two side dishes had been released! Please accept them!"
“叮！恭喜宿主完成阶段性任务：餐厅人气突破1000！获得奖励：香辣田螺菜谱一份！”
"Ding! Congratulations on completing the mission: The tarven's popularity had break through 1000! Reward received: a recipe of the spicy escargot!"
“叮！突发事件激发隐藏任务：开一家富有名气的酒馆！请宿主在洛都开设一家在酒友圈中富有名气的酒馆，成为洛都最富名气的酒馆！”
"Ding! A sudden event has triggered a hidden mission: open a famous tavern! Could the Host please open a tavern famous with the alcohol connoisseur in Rodu, and become the most famous tavern in Rodu!
“可……可不是嘛，他算什么，哪……哪调动的了边军，而且还是对兽人族和精灵族同时发动战争，这种事情说出去恐怕都没有人敢相信吧？”波比点着头，有些含糊道。
"Isn't… Isn't that so. What was he? H-how could he deploy the army from the borders. Besides, it's a war against the orcs and elves. No one would believe it was possible," Bobby mumbled with a nod.
“可不可以把他脸上的血痕消一下，让他看起来走的自然一点。”麦格一手挡着艾米的眼睛，看着伊琳娜说道。
Mag covered Amy's eyes and said to Irina, "Can we remove the bloody scratches on his face and make him look like he had died more naturally?"
“可不是，今年的生意不好做，隔壁那酒馆又在转让了，今年这是第五家了吧？”
"Isn't it so? This year's business is bad. The tavern next door has switched hands again. Is that already the fifth owner?"
“可不是，你刚刚不是看到那食全食美杂志的封面了吗，真是凑表脸，一个美食杂志不好好做美食，竟然把厨师的图像当做卖点了，难道长得帅还能让做的菜变得更好吃吗？而且说不定那厨师真人长得和鬼一样。”老板一脸鄙夷道。

"Oh, yes. Didn't you see that Perfect Food magazine's cover earlier? It's really shameless. “可不是，哈迪斯先生应该超厉害才对。”埃菲在心里想着，连玛拉都看出了一些端倪，她有怎么可能完全没有感觉。
"Ain't I right? Mr. Hades should be very formidable." Eiffie thought. Even Mala could see something, how could she not have any feelings?
“可之前麦老板说希望分两个刊发这两篇文章。”迈洛开口道。
"But Boss Mag said he hoped to release these two articles in two separate issues," Mylo spoke up.
“可人家也没说餐厅正常营业啊。”迈洛苦笑道。
"But he didn't say that the restaurant would be operating as usual too," Mylo said with a bitter smile.
“可他们已经死了无数年，只剩下被冰雪延缓了腐败的尸体，怎么蛊惑？”麦格不解。
"But they were already dead for years. Only their bodies that preserved by the ice and snow. How is he going to enchant them?" Mag didn't understand them.
“可他是乔修，安德烈最喜欢的儿子之一，最有可能成为洛斯帝国下一任皇帝的二皇子，而且还向魔鬼出卖了灵魂。这次他能够越过安德烈，调动军方对兽人族和精灵族同时发动战争，已经证明不能用常理来判断他的能力。”伊琳娜的表情颇为认真。

"But he is Josh, one of Andre's favorite sons and the second prince who is very likely to become the next king of the Roth Empire. Moreover, he has sold his soul to the devil. “可以带我参观一下吗？”麦格来了兴趣，他确定酒坊旁的那个小酒窖应该不是用来长时间囤酒的。
"Can you please bring me to take a look?" Mag's interest was piqued. He was certain that the small cellar next to the brewery wasn't used to store liquor for a long time.
“可以看到这盅汤之中有许多食材的存在，肉类、贝类、菌类，还有许多我不认识的食材。”
"One can see that there are many ingredients in this soup. Meat, shellfish, mushrooms and many other ingredients that I don't know."
“可以进去了。”卡诺连忙说道，和希利一起走入餐厅。
"We can go in now," Canault quickly said, and walked in with Seely.
“可以，这很无发强者。”康妮默默竖起了一个大拇指。
"Alright. This is very much like what the hairless powerhouse would do." Connie gave Rex a thumbs-up.
“可否让我看看那些东西。”
"May I take a look at those things?"
“可她毕竟是一个半精灵，恐怕陛下……”

"But the devil has reappeared now. It's bewitching people. Even the second prince was bewitched and controlled by it. The Holy Spirit hasn't given any instructions about this matter yet. We…"

“可姬娜最喜欢的是叫化鸡。”伊琳娜提出了自己的质疑。
"But Gina's favorite food is the beggar's chicken." Irina raised her doubt.
“可当初我父亲也只卖200铜币一瓶而已。”埃菲惊讶道。

"It's a pity that you're a woman, otherwise I will definitely become sworn brothers with you." Mag sighed softly.
“可惜差一点。”麦格有些遗憾的叹了口气，抬手两剑斩了那大蛇的两个脑袋，只留下了中间那个还在缓慢恢复的脑袋，一剑把它拍晕。

"Such a pity. I was so close." Mag sighed regretfully. He slashed off the two heads of that giant snake, leaving the center head that was still slowly recovering. He smacked it unconscious with his sword.
“可我怕累赘。”麦格看了他一眼。
Mag flicked a glance at him. "But I'm afraid you will be my burden."
“可是……”希尔蹙眉，这的确是巴菲特家族数年前便开始做准备的事情，甚至还算不上最差的结果，毕竟全面的战争尚未开始，还有许多种族已经结成了和平联盟。

"But…" Scheer frowned. This was what the Buffett Family had gotten ready for years ago. It was not even the worst outcome. After all, the war had yet to break out completely. There were many races that had formed the Peace Alliance.
“可是……连塞班酒馆都没有辉煌过，现在就要去帮忙让另一家酒馆变得辉煌吗？”艾米有点疑惑的问道。
"But... Saipan Tavern had not had its glory and I have to help another tavern reach its glory?" Amy asked, bewildered.
“可是……那会不会太危险了。”埃菲有些担忧，她可不想哈迪斯先生一家为她再次涉险。
"But...will it be too dangerous?" Eiffie was a little worried. She didn't want Mr. Hades and his family to put themselves at risk for her again.
“可是你刚刚评价了，说那是一份完美的拍黄瓜。”艾米认真道。
"But you've given your rating just now. It was a perfect Smashed Cucumber Salad," Amy said seriously.
“可是你喝的是水啊？”玛拉更加惊讶了。

“哈迪斯先生可以考虑一下，如果有想法的话，随时可以来里斯酒馆找我。”鲍里斯往旁边站了一点，看着马车说道。
"Mr. Hades, you can consider it. If you have any ideas, you can always look for me at Reese Tavern." Boris took a step to the side as he said toward the horse-drawn carriage.
“哈迪斯先生您好，这么早来找您，没有打扰到您吧。”费奇站在门外，满脸堆笑的看着麦格。
Fitch stood at the door and smilingly said to Mag, "Hello, Mr. Hades. I hope I didn't disturb you by looking for you so early in the morning."
“哈迪斯先生早。”
"Good morning, Mr. Hades."
“哈迪斯先生的意思是……烧掉酒窖和酒馆，然后把我交给那个幕后凶手吗？”埃菲看着麦格，脸色微变。
"Mr. Hades, what you mean is... burn the cellar and tavern, and then hand me over to the mastermind?" Eiffie looked at Mag as her expression changed.
“哈迪斯先生真是一个好父亲。”埃菲点点头，也不勉强，取出钱结了自己的账。
"Mr. Hades is indeed a great father." Eiffie nodded. She didn't force Amy to accept the treat. She took out the money and settled her bills.
“哈迪斯先生邀请我们去吃饭吗？”埃菲眼睛一亮，顿时清醒了许多，不过为了显得矜持一些，准备稍微推辞一下。
"Mr. Hades wants to invite us for lunch?" Eiffie lit up her eyes. She was instantly awake, but to appear more reserved, she was prepared to decline initially.
“哈迪斯先生，你们……”
"Mr. Hades, you..."
“哈迪斯先生，你们一家也是去参加品酒大会吧。”埃菲和玛拉也刚好从酒馆里出来，看到麦格他们一家，笑着打招呼道。
"Mr. Hades, are you going to the liquor tasting event as a family?" Eiffie greeted with a smile as she walked out from the tavern.
“哈迪斯先生，你好，可以耽误你一点时间吗？”麦格正准备上马车，却被叫住。
"Hi, Mr. Hades, can I take some of your time?" Mag was called called back when he was about to board the horse-drawn carriage.
“哈迪斯先生，兰贝街的人气、地段、商业氛围都是这一区域内最好的，特别是这两年，兰贝街已经成为朝廷里当官的大人们吃饭娱乐的首选，刚刚带您看的那几家店铺您真的不再考虑一下吗？”一位络腮胡的中介跟在已经易容过的麦格身旁，不遗余力的说道。

"Mr. Hades, Lambay Street is the most popular in this area. Its location and business atmosphere are the best too. Especially in these two years, Lambay Street has become the first choice for the lords in the court for entertainment. Are you really not going to consider those several shops that you saw earlier?" An agent with a beard strongly encouraged Mag, who had disguised himself.
“哈迪斯先生，您可真是有眼光，相信罗莫街在您的运营之下，肯定会生意火爆，财源广进。”费奇红光满面的看着麦格，这大半天的时间，比他整个职业生涯卖的房子还多，整整一百栋楼，光是提成他就拿了两百多万铜币，可以直接退休回家盖房子讨老婆了。

"Mr. Hades, you really have the outlook. I believe Romo Street will prosper and earn you tons of money under your brilliant operation." Fitch looked at Mag with a glow. He had sold more properties in this half a day than in his entire career. It was a total of 100 properties. Just his commission alone was over 2,000,000 copper coins. He could quit, return home, build a house, and get a wife right now.
“哈迪斯先生，您的这些商铺恐怕……”
"Mr. Hades, I'm afraid these shops are..."
“哈迪斯先生，您真乃神人也。”费奇看着麦格在认购书上爽快签字，心情有些复杂。
"Mr. Hades, you are such an extraordinary person." Fitch watched Mag sign on the subscription documents with complicated emotions.
“哈迪斯先生，您请里边坐。”费奇出门，看到站在门口的哈迪斯，连忙堆上笑脸迎上前道。
"Mr. Hades, please come in." Fitch went out and saw Hades who was standing at the door. He quickly went over with a smile to welcome him.
“哈迪斯先生，我……”她抓着麦格的手，脸蛋微红，激动之心溢于言表。
"Mr. Hades, I..." Eiffie grabbed Mag's hands as her face flushed with gratefulness that she could not put into words.
“哈迪斯先生，我们在这里！”埃菲带着玛拉笑着迎上前来。
"Mr. Hades, we're over here!" Eiffie and Mala came up with a smile.
“哈迪斯先生，我觉得开酒馆可能有些浪费了你的才华。”埃菲看着麦格，由衷的说道：“您的厨艺比起酿酒技艺，丝毫不弱下风，令人惊叹，令人折服。”
"Mr. Hades, I think opening a tavern is a waste of yoru talent." Eiffie looked at Mag and said sincerely, "Your cooking is not any worse than your wine-brewing skills. It's really to die for."
“哈迪斯先生，求你放过我，条件你尽管提，我会满足你的一切愿望，只要你能让我安然离开这里。”鲍里斯看着麦格诚恳的说道。
"Mr. Hades, please let me go. Name your terms and I will satisfy all your wishes, as long as you let me leave here safely." Boris pleaded with Mag sincerely.
“哈迪斯先生，真乃神人也！”费奇心中无比震撼。
"Mr. Hades is such an extraordinary person!" Fitch felt extremely shocked.
“哈迪斯先生，这前边就有一家酒馆正在转让，您可以去瞧瞧，无论是店铺、装修、格局都非常符合你的要求。”中介费奇带着麦格向着不远处的那家挂着‘兰克斯酒馆’的店铺走去。

"Mr. Mag, there is a tavern looking for a new owner in front. Let's go over there to check it out. The furnishing and layout fit your requirements perfectly." Fitch, the agent, brought Mag to a nearby shop that was named "Linxe Tavern."
“哈迪斯先生，需要请其他人帮忙吗？这些零件都很重……”埃菲的话还没有说完，便看到麦格一手提起了一个密封的铁桶，随手放在了一旁的火灶上。

"Mr. Hades, do you need to get other people to help? These parts are all very heavy..." Before Eiffie could finish her sentence, she saw mr. hades lift up a sealed metal barrel in one hand and put it on the stove at the side.
“哈迪斯先生？”费奇拿了钱，准备开溜。
"Mr. Hades?" Fitch took his money, and was about to make his escape.
“哈迪斯老板诚不欺我！男人喝酒喝到七分醉，演戏演到你流泪！”帕萨睁开眼睛瞄了一眼，在心里怒赞。
"Boss Hades did not lie to me indeed! A 70% drunk man can make you cry with his acting!" Pasa opened his eyes to glance at Clara as he exclaimed to himself.
“哈迪斯老板，昨晚发生了什么？”
"Boss Hades, what happened last night?"
“哈迪斯老板，这今天如果有关于这个案子的任何消息，请及时和我们联系。”工作人员把麦格送到门口，叮嘱道：“还有，你也要注意安全。”
"Boss Hades, if you have any news of this case today, please contact us immediately." The staff member reminded Mag after walking him to the door, saying, "Also, do be careful."
“哈迪斯？”费奇抬起头来，思考了一会，突然眼睛一瞪，露出了几分惊色。
"Hades?" Fitch looked up. He thought for a while before his eyes widened in shock.
“哈麻皮？”艾米看着躺在地上的鲍里斯，摇摇头，“父亲大人说，要文明。”
"What's happening?" Amy looked at Boris on the ground and shook her head. "Father said we have to be civilized."
"What?"
“哈？”费奇瞪眼。
"Huh?" Fitch gaped.
“哈？”鲍里斯瞪眼。
"Huh?" Boris glared.
"Huh??"
“哎呦，哈迪斯先生怎么这么见外呢，我这不是应邀来和你切磋切磋吗……”埃菲目光迷离，扭着腰肢又要向着麦格扑来。

"Aiyo, Mr. Hades, why are you behaving like that suddenly? Aren't I here because you invited me over for an exchange…" Eiffie's eyes were glassy, and she twisted around, wanting to pounce into Mag's embrace again.
“哟，今天咋这么多人啊？”亚伯罕领着温妮莎走进酒馆，看着已经有大半位置坐着客人的酒馆，有些意外。
"Yo, why are there so many people here today?" Abraham brought Vanessa into the tavern, and was shocked to see that more than half of the place was filled with seated customers.
“哦——这诱人的香味，不愧是麦老板！”诺亚深深嗅了一口，端出了两份加量版的黄焖鸡米饭。
"Oh… This enticing aroma. He's indeed Boss Mag!" Noah took a deep sniff as he took out two extra-large helpings of braised chicken and rice.
“哦……”伊琳娜若有所思，又道：“那你也可以变成我的样子？”
"Oh…" Irina thought for a while, and asked, "Then can you become me?"
“哦……是的，我也是看着学的。”
"Oh... yeah, I learned it from the magazine."
“哦……这令人惊叹的味道！简直无法形容这种感觉！”埃菲秀气的眉梢微微挑起，比起美味的粥，这肉汤更有侵略性，让人难以抗拒。
"Oh... this is a remarkable taste! It's an indescribable feeling!" Eiffie raised her beautiful brow. Compared to the porridge, this soup was intrusive and irresistable.
“哦。”小丫鬟不疑有他，把手里的食盒放下，一边将里边刚买回来的热菜热饭拿出来，一边道：“小姐，我听说对面酒馆昨晚的生意可好了呢，而且他们家的酒卖的极贵，一个客人至少得花1000铜币。”

"Oh." The maid didn't suspect anything. She put down a takeaway box in her hands, and took out the hot food within while saying, "Miss, I heard that the tavern opposite us had a roaring business last night. Moreover, the liquor that they sell is extremely expensive. A customer's minimum spending is at least 1000 copper coins."
“哦。”玛拉似懂非懂的点了点头。
"Oh." Mala nodded as if she understood Eiffie's words.
“哦。”玛拉点点头，转身向外走了几步，又是回过头来有些不解的看着埃菲道：“可是小姐，你为什么不答应那位鲍里斯先生的邀请呢？这样你不仅可以拥有很多家酒馆，而且还可以都叫做泰坦酒馆，还不用每天在这里辛苦酿酒，天天都可以睡懒觉了。”

"Yes." Mala nodded, turned around and walked a few steps away before she turned to ask Eiffie perplexedly, "But Miss, why don't you accept Mr. Boris' offer? Not you will have many taverns, you can also call them "Titan Taverns". You don't even have to work hard and brew liquor here everyday. You can also sleep in everyday."
“哦。”艾米若有所思的点了点头，两条小短腿悬空晃了晃，突然跳到了地上，跑到厨房门口看着正在准备食材的麦格道：“父亲大人，我想吃油条，就是放在火锅里煮一下的那种油条。”

"Oh." Amy nodded thoughtfully as she dangled her two short legs. She suddenly jumped off the chair, and ran to the kitchen door. While Mag was preparing the ingredients, she said, "Father, I want to have some youtiao. The kind that you put in the hot pot to cook for a while."
“哦，不是呢，这些都是没有拍好的黄瓜，不能用来做拍黄瓜了。”麦格摇头道。
"Oh, no, these are all cucumbers that I did not smash well. I can't use it to make Smashed Cucumber Salad," Mag said with a shake of his head.
“哦，你是有放了火，不过被住在她对面的那家酒馆的老板灭了，如果有需要的话，你可以在这里发布一个报复的任务。”里边传来了稍显轻快的声音。
"Oh, you did set it on fire but it was put out by the owner fo the tavern in front. If there is a need, you can always launch a revenge mission," the voice said in a rather light-hearted way.
“哦，原来如此。”麦格若有所思，然后就感觉自己被冒犯了。
"Oh, I see." Mag thought for a while, and felt offended all of a sudden.
“哦，又有客人来了呢。”艾米从柜台后边探出个小脑袋，有些好奇的看着进门来的一群人。
"Oh, we have customers again." Amy poked her little head out from the counter, and looked at the group of people that just came in curiously.
“哦，她回娘家去了，今天应该会回来。”麦格随口答道，解了围裙上楼去。
"Oh, she went back to her parent's house. I think she would be returning today," Mag gave a casual reply, took off his apron and went upstairs.
“哦，好的。”艾米若有所思的点了点头，低头继续吃牛肉汤。
"Oh, alright." Amy nodded thoughtfully, and continued eating her beef soup.
“哦，我知道了，一定是你去买绿豆酥的时候买了。”就在麦格想着该怎么解释的时候，伊琳娜自己已经给他找了一个完美的理由。
"Oh, I know it. You must have bought them when you went to buy the mung bean pastry." Just as Mag was trying to come with an explanation, Irina had already found a perfect excuse for him.
“哦，我都忘了。”麦格一拍脑袋，果然晚起一时爽，事情全耽误。
"Oh dear. I have forgotten about them." Mag slapped his head. He had indeed messed up all his plans by waking up late.
“哦，拿错了。”伊琳娜顺手把折叠椅丢到一旁，然后掏出了法师杖。
"Oh, wrong one." Irina threw the foldable chair aside, and pulled out her magic caster's staff.
“哦，是那个老家伙啊。”伊琳娜若有所思。
"Oh, it was that old fogy," Irina said thoughtfully.
“哦，是邻居啊。”巨汉把手里的斧头慢慢放下，狰狞的脸上露出了几分憨厚的笑容，打量了一眼麦格，确定他只是一个弱鸡的普通男人，提着斧头慢慢向他走去。

"Oh. You're the neighbors." The bulky guy put down the axe slowly. A silly smile appeared on his ferocious face. He sized up Mag, making sure that he was just a weak and ordinary man before he walked slowly towards Mag with the axe.
“哦，罗莫街还有新开的酒馆？”卢西恩有些意外，这条街这些年如名字一般渐渐落寞，他已经好久没有去那喝过酒了。
"Oh, there's even a new tavern at Romo Street?" Lucien was rather surprised. The street had been getting rather desolate for the past few years, and he had not gone there to drink in a long time.
“哦，要开酒馆的话，那你可以向我多多请教，姐姐我的技术很好的。”埃菲贴身上前，声音变得有些柔媚，张嘴便要往麦格的耳朵里吹气。
"Oh. You can ask me if you want to open a tavern. I have very good techniques." Eiffie got closer, and her voice became softer. She was about to blow air into Mag's ear.
“哦，还有畅销书啊？”麦格有些意外，他虽然收集了不少古籍，但对于这个世界的图书市场并不了解。
"Oh, there are bestsellers here?" Mag was a little surprised. Although he had collected many ancient books, he didn't know the books' market in this world very well.
“哦？”麦格有点意外，小家伙可是一向喜欢夸赞他的，没想到现在竟然会给出一个不贵完美的评价。
"Oh?" Mag was slightly shocked. The little fellow loved to praise him. He did not expect her to give her a not-perfect review.
“哦？真的吗？”麦格有些意外。
"Oh? Really?" Mag was a little surprised.
“哪吒是女的吗？”
"Is Nezha a girl?"
“哼哼……”埃菲看着缓缓关闭的酒馆大门，有些气恼的跺了跺脚，暗自道：“没有我埃菲迷不倒的男人，等着吧，你肯定是我的！”
"Hmph…" Eiffie watched the tavern door close slowly, and stomped her feet in frustration, telling herself, "There is no man that I, Eiffie, can't mesmerize. Just you wait, you will be mine!"
“哼哼。”伊琳娜握了握拳头，觉得自己在这个家的权威受到了挑战，不过肚子还是有些咕噜噜的叫了起来，只好强迫自己从温暖的地铺里爬了起来，然后换上漂亮的仙女裙，下楼去吃给她准备好的美味早餐粥。

"Hmph." Irina clenched her fists. She felt that her standing in this family was challenged. However, her stomach was rumbling, so she could only force herself out from the warm sheets, change into a beautiful dress, and go downstairs for the scrumptious breakfast prepared for her.
“哼！一群软骨头！”奥斯特愤然拍桌。
"Hmph! A bunch of softies!" Auster banged on the table angrily.
“哼，小样，以为这样就能逃得出老娘的手掌心吗……”埃菲看着麦格离去的背影，目光在他的臀部停留了一会，笑容愈发灿烂，轻声自语：“身材还不错。”

Ah. Do you think you can escape from my grasp like this… Eiffie watched Mag's retreat, and her gaze lingered on his butt for a while. Her smile got brighter, and she whispered to herself, "His figure is not bad."
“哼，这群卑劣的家伙，我给他们吃穿，让他们能够活下来，竟然还敢闹事。”艾略特脸色一冷，“这次多杀几个，和前几日想跑的那个老家伙挂在一起，我倒要看看他们究竟多想离开这里。”

"Hmph. These lowly fellows. How dare they make trouble after I fed them and clothe them, allowing them to survive." Elliot's expression turned cold. "Kill a few more of them this time and hang them with that old chap who tried to escape a few days ago.I want to see how much do they want to leave here."
“哼，骗纸！”艾米气愤道。
"Hmph! Liar!" Amy said angrily.
“唉……”帕萨叹了口气，裹紧了自己的小棉袄。
"Ah…" Pasa sighed, and pulled his little blanket tighter around himself.
“唉……一个月吃不到豆浆油条的日子，可真是难熬啊。”汉娜叹了口气，继续嚼着油条。
"Sigh… It's hard to go one month without soybean milk and youtiao." Hannah sighed, and continued chewing the youtiao.
“唉……现在的年轻人，真是让人看不懂了。”
"Sigh… the youngsters nowadays are unfathomable."
“唉……这糊涂账，糊涂啊……”
"Sigh… This is all a mess, a mess…"
“唉。”亚伯罕叹了口气，吸了吸鼻子，控制了一下自己的情绪，放下酒杯，目光落到了一旁的凉拌猪耳朵和凉拌猪舌头上。
"Ah." Abraham sighed. He sniffed and controlled his emotions. He put the glass down, and looked at the pig ears salad and pig tongue salad.
“唉。”波比叹了口气，看了一眼远处还算热闹的泰坦酒馆，那家酒馆他听说过，酒很一般，但老板娘是个相当漂亮的女人。
"Ah." Bobby sighed. He glanced at the crowded Titan Tavern far away. He had heard of that tavern before. The wine there was so-so, but the lady boss there was quite a beauty.
“唉，世事难料啊，我以为我们能一直喝到老，没想到他却这样先我一步走了……”波比深深叹了口气。
"Sigh. Life is so unpredictable. I thought we could drink until we were old. I didn't expect him to leave before me just like that…" Bobby sighed deeply.
“唉，还是来晚了啊。”高瘦中年男人拍着大腿一脸遗憾道。
The tall and lean middle-aged man slapped his thigh and regretfully said, "Sigh. We are still too late."
“唉，这都什么事啊，好好的世道，打什么仗。”亚伯罕站在马车旁，看着正在往飞行坐骑上搬运各种物件的下人们，叹了口气。

Abraham stood next to a horse-drawn carriage, watched the servants carry all kinds of stuff onto a flying steed, and sighed, "Sigh, what's going on? Why are we having a war when we are having such good times?"
“唉，这都是甩不掉的温柔啊。”哈里森摸了摸自己的肚子，有些无奈的轻叹了一口气。
"Sigh. This is all gentleness that can't be shed." Harrison stroked his stomach and sighed helplessly.
“唔……我……今日就不赔诸位大人饮酒了。”奥尔登脸面全丢，这会身上哪哪都疼，就想赶紧找个治疗系的魔法师给他治一治。

"Hmm… I… will not drink with everyone today." Aulden was completely embarrassed. Right now, every part of him was in pain. All he wanted to do right now was to find a healing magic caster to heal him.
“唔……这个烤牛肉串好好吃啊！我还是第一次吃牛肉呢……好好吃……”
"Mmm… This beef kebab is so delicious! This is my first time eating beef… so yummy…"
“商人逐利，本就没有好坏可言，我也没有和他深交的想法。”麦格笑着道。
"Businessmen chase profits. There's nothing good or bad about that. I don't have the intention to forge a deep relationship with him," Mag said with a smile.
“商铺吗？”费奇和手下都露出了几分讶色。
"Shops?" Fitch and his subordinate had a surprise expression.
“啊~好酒。”虽然不太懂酒，但好坏还是知道的，诺亚忍不住称赞道，他爷爷一定会很喜欢。

"Ah~ Delicious." Although he was not very knowledgeable about alcohol, he still knew how to tell what tasted good and what tasted bad. Noya could not help but compliment the alcohol. Grandpa would definitely love it.
"Ah… Josh…"
“啊……不好意思，一时紧张。”麦格收回了脚，退后了半步，有些歉然道。
"Ahh... I'm sorry, I was nervous," Mag retracted his foot and took half a step back as he apologised.
“啊……你们太过分了，吃烤羊腿都不带上我们，宝宝要哭了……”艾米瘪嘴，眼泪立马就在眼眶里打转了。
"Ah… you're too much. You went to eat roasted lamb shanks without us. I'm going to cry…" Amy pouted, and tears started welling up in her eyes immediately.
“啊……你回来了。”
"Ah...You're back."
“啊……咬到舌头了，实在太好吃了吧！”
"Ah… I bit my tongue. It's simply too delicious!"
“啊……她昨天晚上说房间里有老鼠，害怕所以跑到我房间里睡觉觉呢。”麦格连忙把门带上，笑着解释道。
