"Mm-hmm. Get up and have breakfast. I've made some porridge." Mag looked at her pamperingly.
“嗯，软软的，是真的呢。”艾米非常有经验的点点头。
"Mmm. It's soft. It's real." Amy nodded with experience.
“嗯，还是有些鉴赏能力的嘛，知道好东西要留着自己慢慢看。”麦格松了口气。
"Mm. She does have some eye for art and knows that she should keep good things for herself." Mag heaved a sigh of relief.
“嗯，这应该是可以吃的蜗牛了。”麦格点点头，这蜗牛无论是个头还是外表，看起来都和法国蜗牛比较相似，肯定是系统说的那只蜗牛了。
"Yes. This should be an edible snail." Mag nodded. Be it the size or the appearance, this snail looked like the French escargots. It must be the snail that the system said.
“嗯，这是我给父亲大人你们做的彩虹炒饭，你们太辛苦了，所以我想给你们做一份早餐呢。”艾米点着脑袋，看了一眼锅里的炒饭，又是有点不好意思道：“但……现在好像变成了黑土炒饭。”

"Yes. This is the rainbow fried rice that I have made for you guys. You guys have worked very hard, so I wanted to make breakfast for all of you." Amy nodded. She flicked a glance at the fried rice in the wok, embarrassed, and said, "But… it seems to turn into black soil fried rice now."
“嗯，这样就对了，走，去上次那家。”加兰欣然道。
"Mm. That's right. Let's go to the that place last time," Garlan said happily.
“嗯，那行。”麦格笑着点头，今天晚上的艾米的确懂得克制了，只吃了三个成年人的饭量而已。
"Mm-hmm. Alright." Mag nodded with a smile. Amy was indeed controlling herself tonight. She only ate as much food as three adults.
“嗯，非常有天赋。”麦格笑着点头，在这方面，艾米绝对是天才级别的。
"Mm. Very talented." Mag nodded with a smile. Amy is indeed very talented in this aspect.
"Hm?"
“嗯？”伊琳娜看着他的脸微微一惊。
"Hmm?" Irina looked at him, stunned.
“嗯？”埃菲的身体微微发抖。
"Hm?" Eiffie started shaking.
“嗯？”就在他准备向着街对面的泰坦酒馆走去的时候，一丝淡淡的香味却让他停住了脚步。
"Hmm?" Just when he was about to walk to Titan Tavern, a faint alcoholic scent stopped him in his tracks.
“嗯？”正在楼顶晨练的麦格听到了动静，从阳台上探头向外一看，看到了穿着白色羽绒服的艾米，像个小雪球一般在雪地上蹦跳着离去。
"Mmm?" Mag, who was doing his morning exercise on the roof, heard the sounds and looked down. He saw Amy, who was wearing in a white jacket, skip away in the snow.
“嗯？”麦格顺手套上面具，向着门口走去，通过门洞看了眼，外边站着一位老人。
"Hmm?" Mag wore his mask, and walked to the door. He looked out of the peephole, and saw an old man standing outside.
“嗯？我是谁？我在哪？”伊琳娜睁开眼，眨了眨眼睛，有点懵。
Hmm? Who am I? Where am I? Irina opened her eyes. She blinked, a little confused.
“嗯？还有这种事情？”麦格挑眉，感觉好像哪里不太对？
"Hmm? There is something like that?" Mag raised his eyebrows. He felt that something was amiss?
Huh?
“嗯？？？”诺亚一脸问号。
"Hmm???" Noah was full of question marks.
“嗯？？？”诺亚歪头看着麦格。
"Hm???" Noya looked at Mag with bewilderment.
“嗯？？？”麦格看着三人，寻思了一会，有些恍然，“原来你们是说你们要去逛街，并没有包括我是吧？”
"Hmm???" Mag looked at the three of them, and pondered for a moment before he suddenly realized what they meant. "So you guys didn't include me when you said you wanted to go shopping?"
“嗷呜。”被打扮成了小熊猫的丑小鸭打了个哈欠，趴在柜台上继续睡觉。
"Aoo." Ugly Duckling, who was dressed up as a panda, yawned and continued sleeping on the counter.
“嘘，别瞎说。”露娜脸一红，瞪了薇薇安一眼。
"Hush. Don't talk nonsense!" Luna blushed and glared at Vivian.
“嘘，父亲给你们带了好吃的。”帕萨把麦老板给他打包的花生和糖拿了出来，递给三个孩子。
"Hush. I brought you guys goodies." Pasa took out the peanuts and sweets Boss Mag had packed for him, and passed them to his three children.
“嘶~嘶——”巨蛇吐舌，俯身向着麦格冲来。
"Sss~sss—" The giant snake hissed and dashed downwards at Mag.
"Ssss—"
“嘶……”手下倒吸了一口凉气，酸酸道：“那今天卖了房子的那些屋主们，估计得哭死了。”
"Ssshh..." The subordinate sucked in a breath of cold air and jealously said, "Those owners who sold their properties today are going to cry their hearts out."
“嘻嘻。”艾米的脸上露出笑容，又给安妮和伊琳娜各拿了一个蛋黄酥，自己才抓起最后一个蛋黄酥，放到嘴边，咬下一大口。
"Hehe." Amy smiled. She gave Annie and Irina one each before picking up the last salted egg yolk pastry, and took a big bite.
“嘻嘻。”艾米脸上露出了开心的笑容，不过心里却有点疑惑。
"Hehe." A happy smile appeared on Amy's face, but she was a little puzzled inwardly.
“嘻嘻！我就知道父亲大人最好了。”艾米开心道，小脸上满是笑容。
"Hehe! I knew Father is the best," Amy said happily with a smile.
“嘻嘻，好哒。”艾米开心点头。
"Hehe. Alrighty." Amy nodded happily.
“嘻嘻，好的。”艾米拎起地上比她体积还要大的零食大礼包，往肩上一扛，一边道：“我要把这些零食和安妮姐姐分享，这样就是双倍的快乐了。”

"Hehe, alright." Annie carried the snack hamper that was even bigger than her and put it on her shoulder while saying, "I'm going to share these snacks with Big Sister Annie. That way, it would be double the happiness."
“嘻嘻，谢谢父亲大人。”艾米捧着盒子走开，坐在楼梯口，小盒子放在手边，抓起一颗绿豆，冲着丑小鸭叫道：“丑小鸭，你要把它咬回来哦。”

"Hehe. Thank you, Father." Amy left with the box, and sat at the staircase. She placed the box by her side, and grabbed a handful of mung beans. Amy called out to Ugly Duckling, saying, "Ugly Duckling, you have to bring it back."
“嘻嘻，还是亚伯罕叔叔好，找到好吃的都会第一时间想到我。”温妮莎满是感激的看着亚伯罕。
"Hehe, Uncle Abraham, you're the best. You would always think of me the moment you found something delicious." Vanessa looked at Abraham gratefully.
“嘿嘿……”卡托拉尴尬一笑，冲着酒柜的方向道：“老板，不要介意哈，我这个人心直口快，你这酒，的确是好酒。”
"Hehe…" Cataula smiled awkwardly. He turned toward the bar counter, and said, "Sir, don't mind me. I speak before I think. Your alcohol is fantastic."
“嘿嘿。”亚伯罕心满意足的回了自己的座位，笑着自语：“小家伙说话真好听，要是艾米小老板说话有着一半就好了。”
"Hehe." Abraham returned to his seat with satisfaction as he mumbled to himself, "This little fellow is so obedient. If only Little Boss Amy spoke half as nicely as her."
“嘿嘿嘿。”老板发出了一串男人都懂的猥琐笑声。
"Hehehe." The boss made a series of obscene laughter that all men knew very well.
“嘿嘿，以后又多了一位难兄难弟了。”
"Hehe. We'll have another buddy-in-trouble soon."
“嘿嘿，她说的没错，多管闲事是要付出代价的。”巨汉脸上的憨笑消失，满脸横肉堆在一起，狞笑着举起了手中的巨斧，向着麦格劈下，嘴里吼道：“给爷死！”

"Hehe. She's right. You've to pay a price for being a busybody." The silly smile on the big guy's face disappeared. All the flesh on his face squeezed together and he lifted the giant axe up with a sinister smile. He swung the axe at Mag and yelled, "Die!"
“嘿嘿，客官说什么话呢，我看你技术越来越纯熟了，要不要再来十个圈？保证能套个大肥鹅回家，媳妇保管把你夸。”瘦干的地摊老板笑呵呵道，麻溜的吧地上的竹圈捡起来，一边笑着说道。

The lanky game stall boss chuckled, and quickly picked up the bamboo rings on the ground as he smilingly said, "Hehe, what are you talking about, dear customer? I can see that your technique is getting better, why don't you buy another 10 rings? I'm sure you will get a big, fat goose home, and your wife is going to praise you for it."
“嘿嘿，小娘皮往哪里跑！把钱全给大爷，再让大爷爽一爽，我不会杀你们的！”那壮汉狞笑着迈着大步向着埃菲她们追来，一路上桌椅板凳一律被撞开。

"Hehe. Where are you going, ladies?! Give me all the money and then let me have some fun. I won't kill you two!" That strapping man strode over and chased after Eiffie and Mala. All the tables and chairs were knocked out along his way.
“嘿嘿，我吃不到，你们也吃不到，这么一想，心情都变好了许多。”亚伯罕爬上了马车，道：“出发！”
"Hehe. I can't eat it, but neither can any of you. I feel better when I think like that." Abraham got into the horse-drawn carriage, and said, "Let's go!"
“嘿嘿，我就是照着书上背了几段，不过看起来效果还挺不错的，他们看我的目光都不一样了呢。”汉娜有点不好意思的笑了笑。
Hannah chuckled embarrassedly. "Hehe, I have only memorized a few paragraphs from the books, but it seems like the effects are quite good. They are looking at me differently now."
“噤声！此事不得妄议和外传，小心你们的脑袋！”一位中年护卫冷声喝道。
"Hush! Do not spread this around. Watch out for your heads!" a middle-aged guard chided coldly.
“嚯，你瞧瞧人家，昨天才刚买下半条街，当晚就住进去了，有钱人的想法，还真是让人捉摸不透啊。”
"Woah. Look at him. He bought half of the street yesterday, and moved in last night. Rich people's thoughts are really unfathomable."
“嚯，好可爱的小丫头。”众人看着那粉雕玉琢的小家伙，眼睛纷纷一亮，脸上不觉露出了笑容。
"Woah, what an adorable little girl." Everyone's eyes lit up as they looked at the exquisite little girl, and they couldn't help smiling.
“嚯，瞧瞧人家那酒馆，还没开门，就这么多大人等着了。”
"Woah, look at their tavern. There are already so many people waiting before it even opened."
“嚯，这一家子颜值可真高。”
"Woah. This family really looks good."
“回到你们的圈里去！你们这些愚蠢卑劣的家伙！”守卫们并不惊慌，魔法师已经开始构筑冰墙和土墙。
"Go back to your cells! You lowly and stupid fellows!" The guards didn't panic. The magic casters were already building ice walls and mud walls.
“回老爷，那家酒馆叫‘塞班酒馆’，开在罗莫街上。”管家小镇答道。
"My Lord, that tavern is called 'Saipan Tavern.' It's on Romo Street," the butler answered softly.
“因为父亲大人每天都那么辛苦，所以我想去买早餐，这样你就不用给我们做早餐了，可以多睡一会。”艾米的小脸上写满了认真。
"Because Father is working so hard every day so I thought that I should get breakfast and that way you would not have to make breakfast for us and can sleep in a little more," Amy said seriously.
“因为菜品未达到创造者的要求，系统判定任务尚未完成，请小主继续帮助父亲改进菜品，完成任务！”系统的声音响起。

"As the dish did not reach the creator's expectation, the System would deem the mission as unfinished. Please continue to assist your Father in improvign the dish to complete the mission!" the System's voice rang.
“圆滚滚，软萌萌的，晚上抱着睡觉一定超舒服。”
"Roly-poly and soft. It must feel great to cuddle it when sleeping at night."
“圣光啊，审判这个邪恶！让一切归于平静吧！”
"Holy Light, judge this evil! Let everything return to calmness!"
“圣光啊，涤荡一切污浊与黑暗吧。”伊琳娜举起法师杖，隐藏道。
"O' Holy Light, wipe out all darkness and filth," Irina chanted as she raised her magic caster's staff.
“圣光术加上超强的治疗魔法，这样的年轻十级强者，恐怕也只有精灵族的那位公主了。”梅兰特笑着道。
"The Holy Light, combined with powerful healing magic. A 10th-tier powerhouse as young as her, I guess it would only be the elven princess," Merante said with a smile.
“在哪呢？”
"Where is it?"
“在家？”
"At home?"
“在这方面，我还是挺有天赋的。”麦格微笑道。
"I am rather talented in this aspect," Mag said smilingly.
“在这里。”麦格表情略微一僵，想到了自己刚刚在门口那得意的模样，不过还是乖乖的从钱袋里把今晚的营业额尽数掏出来交给伊琳娜。
"Here." Mag froze for a while. He recalled his arrogance at the door just now, but still handed over the money bag with today's earnings to Irina obediently.
“在这里！”
"She's over here!"
“地……地……”大蛇的眼睛突然闪烁起来，竟是从麦格的控制中挣脱出来，竖瞳重新恢复，发出了一声嘶吼，向着麦格扑而来。
"Un...Un..." The big snake's eyes suddenly flickered. It actually got out from Mag's control and its vertical pupils regained its conciousness. It let out a hissing roar and pounced onto Mag.
“地下世界、第一守则、地下城……”麦格感觉自己又获得了一些新的信息。
"Underground World, the first rule, Underground City..." Mag felt that he had received some new information.
“地动当然有感受到，房子有明显的震动，还有官差来询问。”麦格点点头，一脸坦荡道：“不过你说的是我们家隔壁的隔壁的房子吧？那的确是我的屋子，但一直空置着，姑娘要是想去瞧瞧，我可以给你开门。”

"Of course, I felt the earthquake. The house shook obviously and officials came to ask questions." Mag nodded and said with an honest expression, "However, are you talking about the house, next, next to us? That is indeed my property, but it has always been vacant. I can open the door for you if you would like to go see it, Miss."
“地底之下有另一个世界？”伊琳娜脸蛋微红，气息还有些喘，但还是好奇的问道。
"There's another world underground?" Irina asked curiously even though she was blushing and had a little shortness of breath.
“坏蛋呢？”艾米看着麦格问道。
"Where's the baddie?" Amy asked Mag.
“坐着，我给你去烧点水洗脚。”克莱拉把帕萨往床上一放，说道。
"Take a seat. I'll boil some water for you to wash your feet," Clara said as he put Pasa on the bed.
“埃菲啊……你真是一个糟糕的女人……”许久之后，埃菲把画册重新塞回被子下，目光有些迷离的拉上窗帘。
"Eiffie... you're a terrible woman..." After a long time, Eiffie stuffed the book back under her blanket and looked dreamily toward the drawn curtains.
“埃菲姐姐是个好人，如果没有她的话，那老板都不肯把那个汤卖给我呢。”艾米看着埃菲的背影说道。
"Big Sister Eiffie is a good person. Without her, the owner of the restaurant would never sell the soup to me," Amy said as she watch Eiffie leave.
“埃菲姐姐那里就有很多小姐姐呀，为什么不找她介绍呢？”在一旁的玩耍的艾米突然说道。
Amy, who was playing at the side, suddenly said, "Big Sister Eiffie has a lot of big sisters with her. Why don't we ask her to recommend us a few of them?"
“埃菲姐姐，你今天好漂亮。”艾米看着穿着一身红色长裙的埃菲，眼睛亮晶晶的说道。
"Big Sister Eiffie, you're very pretty today," Amy said as her eyes sparkled, looking at Eiffie in her long red dress.
“埃菲姐姐，父亲大人邀请你和玛拉姐姐中午去我们那里吃午饭呢。”艾米乖巧的说道。
"Big Sister Eiffie, Father would like to invite you and Big Sister Mala over for lunch at noon later." Amy said well-behavedly.
“埃菲小姐不必客气，我现在去取酒来，还要劳烦你帮忙报名参加那品酒大会。”麦格微微摇头道。
"You're being too polite, Miss Eiffie. I'll go get the liquor now and I'll need you to help me to register for that liquor tasting." Mag shook his head slightly.
“埃菲小姐别误会，我是想说，天赋是上天决定的，如果一件事情的确不适合我们的话，我们可以适当的放弃。”麦格解释道。
"Miss Eiffie, please do not misunderstand me. What I mean is, sometimes, talent is predestined. If something is not suitable for us, we can give it up," Mag explained.
“埃菲小姐太客气了，一点小事而已，你也帮忙报名了。”麦格硬着头皮站起来，看着埃菲客套道：“坐一会吧，这么冷，喝杯热茶。”

"Miss Eiffie is being too polite. It's just a small matter. You helped me to register too." Mag forced himself to stand up and make polite small talk with Eiffie, "Please sit down. It's so cold. Let's have a cup of hot tea."
“埃菲小姐是吧，不知找我的男人什么事？”伊琳娜饶有兴趣的看着埃菲问道。
"Miss Eiffie, right? Why are you here looking for my man?" Irina asked Eiffie with interest.
“埃菲小姐酿酒的时候，是否云雾缭绕，酒香四溢？”麦格笑吟吟的问道。
"Miss Eiffie, when you brew your wine, is there white smoke and wine fragrance coming out?" Mag asked with a smile.
“埃菲小姐，别这样。”麦格收回了自己的小手，向后退了一步，“还有人在，不合适。”
"Miss Eiffie, don't do this." Mag retracted his hand and took a step back. "There are people around. This is inappropriate."
“埃菲小姐，我非常尊重与喜爱马库斯大师，他是一位天才酿酒师，更是一个执著且坚定的酿酒师，哪怕已经过去十五年，他和泰坦酒的传奇依旧铭刻在我们的心中。”库尔特站着看着坐在台下的埃菲，神情有些复杂道：“非常感谢你让我们再次感受到他无与伦比的魅力，但根据品酒大会的规则，孤品藏酒是不能用于参赛的，因为这意味着客人在你的酒馆中无法购买到它。”

"Miss Eiffie, I respect and like Master Marcus very much. He was a genius brewer and one who was dedicated and persistant. The legend of him and his Titan Liquor is still entrenched in our hearts even after 15 years." Kurt stood and emotionally said to Eiffie, sitting under the stage, "Thank you very much for letting us feel his unparallel charm again, but according to the liquor tasting event's rules, a liquor that is no longer being brewed cannot take part in the competition because this means that your customers are not able to buy it in your tavern."
“埃菲小姐，玛拉，你们没事吧？”麦格看着埃菲微笑着问道，语气中带着关切之意。
"Miss Eiffie, Mala, are you alright?" Mag asked as she looked at Eiffie with a smile.
“埃菲小姐，请进来吧。”麦格的声音从里边响起。
"Please come in, Miss Eiffie." Mag's voice rang out from within.
“埃菲老板娘，你的脸色怎么不太好啊？”胖老板回头，看到站在他身后的埃菲，有些关心的问道。
The fat boss turned around to Eiffie, who was standing behind him, with concern, and asked, "Lady Boss Eiffie, you don't look very well?"
“城主，麦米餐厅突然发布公告歇业一个月，麦老板带小老板出门游玩取材去了。”迪克斯给迈克尔汇报完工作，顺便提了一句。

"My Lord, Mamy Restaurant suddenly declared that it would be closed for one month. Boss Mag is bringing the Little Boss out for a vacation and searching for ingredients," Dicus mentioned after he finished reporting to Michael.
“城北的酒馆一条街，现在同等的商铺价格在五百万左右。”费奇努力让自己的表情不那么酸。
"The smiliar shopfronts on tavern street at the north of the city cost about 5000,000." Fitch was trying not to look too jealous.
“基？我们那是纯洁的兄弟情……兄弟情懂吗？”波比歪头看着伊琳娜，加大了几分音量强调道。
"Gay? That's pure brotherhood… brotherhood, okay?" Bobby tilted his head, and he looked at Irina as he emphasized the important part loudly.
“塞班酒馆？”
"Saipan Tavern?"
“塞班酒馆？”亚伯罕若有所思。
"Saipan Tavern?" Abraham was thoughtful.
“外面做的不好吃，不如我们自己买一些绿豆回家试着做一做吧。”麦格提议道，这条街已经逛的差不多了。
"Since the ones outside are bad, why don't we buy some mung beans back home and try to make it on our own?" Mag suggested. They were almost done shopping around this street.
“外面出现了一个强大而可怕的不明生物，请小主务必苟住！”系统连忙答道。
"An unknown powerful and terrifying creature has appeared out there. Please remained indoors, little mistress." The system quickly answered.
“外面的世界，究竟是怎样的？”伊琳娜好奇的问道。
"What is the world outside like?" Irina asked curiously.
“外面都这么说，现在洛都城里都已经传遍了呢，肯定没假的。”小二点头笃定道。
"They are talking about this out there. The news has already spread throughout Rodu, so it has to be true." The waiter nodded with conviction.
“多好的黄瓜啊，丢了多可惜。”艾米端着盆就走了，一遍嚼着拍好的黄瓜，一边道：“那这些就交给我吧，我会把他们全部吃完的。”
"That's a lot of cucumber. What a pity to throw them away." Amy took the basin with her and said as she ate the smashed cucumners, "In that case, hand them over to me. I'll eat them all up."
“大主教大人，您现在打算怎么办呢？”卡诺小心翼翼的问道，他有点担心希利抢孩子，这里毕竟是混乱之城，而且尤利安就住在隔壁不远的地方。
"Lord Archbishop, what do you plan to do now?" Canault carefully asked. He was a little worried that Seely would snatch the child. After all, they were in Chaos City, and Urien was living close by.
“大人。”同桌的法部官员也是有些懵，没想到在这小酒馆里，还有敢这样对奥尔登的人。
"Sir." The other law officials were also stunned. They did not expect someone in this small tavern to do such a thing to Aulden.
“大人不必怜悯，一瓶酒而已，既然他们请不起服务员，那总得找个人给我们倒酒不是。”奥尔登笑着摆摆手，看着坐在柜台后不为所动的艾米脸色一冷道：“小鬼，听不到我说话吗？”

"Sir, there is no need to sympathize with her. It's just a bottle of wine. Since they can't afford service staff, someone got to pour the wine for us, right?" Aulden waved his hand with a laugh. He looked at Amy, who was still sitting behind the counter, and said coldly, "Little brat, didn't you hear what I say?"
“大人，我们兵分四路追踪，但还是失去了那二人的踪迹。”一位骑士上前禀报道。
"Sir, our soldiers have split up to trace them, but we've still lost their tracks," one of the knights reported.
“大人，我们坐这边吧。”波比领着卢西恩在靠近门口的位置坐下，他看得出卢西恩的神态变化，心里倒也不慌，这家酒馆看起来平平无奇，那是因为还没有上酒啊。

"Sir, let's take a seat there." Bobby brought Lucien to a seat near the door. He could tell the change in Lucien's expression, but he was not flustered. This tavern might look ordinary, but that was because the wine was not served yet.
“大人，我昨天喝了茅台酒，要不今天也点一瓶这个试试？”波比看着卢西恩征询道。
"Sir, I had Maotai yesterday. Why don't we try a bottle of that today?" Bobby asked Lucien.
“大人，既然你是官，对一个小朋友提出这样的要求，就不太妥当吧。”麦格从厨房里走了出来，手里还握着一把菜刀，站在了艾米的身旁，看着奥尔登说道。
"Sir, since you're an official, isn't it inappropriate to bring up such a request to a child?" Mag walked out from the kitchen with a cleaver in his hand as he stood beside Amy.
“大人，求您救救我爷爷吧。”诺亚恳求道。
"Please, save my grandpa," Noya pleaded.
“大人，要给您备车入宫吗？”管家小声问道。
"My Lord, should I prepare the carriage for you to go to the palace?" the butler asked softly.
“大叔，这你就不知道了吧，这可是我们的男神第一次接受杂志的正式访谈，而且据说杂志里边还有他的画像呢。”那小姑娘看了他一眼，有些兴奋的说道。

That young maiden flicked him a glance before excitedly saying, "Mister, you might not know, but this is the first time that our idol is accepting a magazine's interview formally. Moreover, it's said that there is a picture of him in the magazine."
“大圣诚不欺我。”麦格看着掌心中的金色小棒槌，忍住了把它塞进耳朵的冲动。
"The Monkey King did not lie to me indeed." Mag looked at the tiny golden bludgeon in his palm, and resisted the urge to put it in his ear.
“大大大……”麦格继续念着，绣花针大小的擀面杖开始膨胀，很快涨到了三米的高度，砸厨房里顶天立地。
"Big, big, big…" Mag continued to chant. The needle-sized roller pin slowly expanded, and quickly became three meters tall, touching the ceiling and reaching the floor.
“大家先玩着吧，一会做好了我再叫大家过来吃。”麦格也是笑着说道，把两个烧烤架摆开，然后把冰激凌机架起来。
"You guys play first. I will call all of you over when it's done," Mag said as he opened up the two grills and set up the ice cream machine, also smiling.
“大将军这是？！”
"The great general is?!"
“大概也只有男爵大人才有这样的气质吧。”
"Prbably only the Baron has such awe around him."
“大概知道一些吧。”麦格抓了一把绿豆，诺兰大陆的绿豆要更大一些，差不多有黄豆那么大颗，颗粒饱满，表面圆润光滑，手感相当不错。
"A little, roughly." Mag grabbed a handful of mung beans. The mung beans on the Norland Continent were slightly larger, around the size of soybeans. Each bean was round and smooth.
“大男子汉，吃个小甜点都哭哭啼啼的。”梅兰特有些鄙夷的说道。
"A grown man weeping over a tiny dessert," Merante said disdainfully.
“大白天的，就不喝酒了吧。”麦格摇头，看着埃菲道：“关于品酒大会，想向埃菲小姐请教一下详细的内容。”
"It's early in the morning, I shall not drink." Mag shook his head. He looked at Eiffie and said, "I would like to ask you about the details of the liquor tasting event."
“大祭司饶命啊……”
"High Priestess…"
“大祭司饶命！”
"Spare us, High Priestess!"
“大祭司，各大家族都遭到了洗劫和奴隶出逃的情况，请您下令让护卫队出击，抓捕那些暴乱分子吧！再这样下去，风之森林可就真的垮了。”一位中年精灵满脸担忧的看着坐在高台之上的海伦娜说道。

"High Priestess, in the current situation where all the noble families are under attack, and their slaves are escaping, please order the garrison to arrest those rioters! The Wind Forest will collapse if this continues," a middle-aged elf worriedly said to Helena, who was sitting on the platform.
“大祭司，奎恩特家族和巴萨特家族的族长求见，说想要亲自见您，有话想要当面汇报。”一位精灵走进星空洞府，看着高台上背对着洞口盘坐着海伦娜说道。

"High Priestess, the Quant Family's and Basat Family's leaders would like to see you. They have something to report to you." An elf entered the Starry Cave, and reported to High Priest Helena, who was sitting on the elevated platform with her back facing the cave entrance.
“大祭司，生命之城中越来越多的家族宣布烧毁奴隶契约，还族中奴仆自由身，场面已经失去控制。”

"High Priestess. More and more families in the City of Life have announced that they would be burning the slave contract and returning their slaves' freedom to them. The situation has gone out of control.
“大祭司，请宽恕我们的，我们对精灵族和您都是忠诚的。”
"High Priestess, please forgive us. We are loyal to you and the elven race."
“大胆……”一旁的护卫面色一冷，这小丫头竟敢这般称呼公爵大人。
"How dare you…!" The guard at the side turned solemn. How dared this little girl call the lord duke that.
“大转盘是概率抽奖，本系统无法保证小主获得的奖品是什么。”系统解释道。
"The big wheel is a lucky draw based on probability. I am unable to guarantee what your prize would be," the System explained.
“天呐，不是这样子滴，要先穿过来才对，你好笨哦。”
"Oh heavens. It's not like this. You have to go through here first. You are so stupid.
“太可怕了……”诺亚瘫坐在地上，浑身被汗水湿透，仿佛虚脱了一般。
"It's so terrifying..." Noah slumped onto the ground. He was soaked with sweat as though he was exhausted.
“太好了！父亲大人我爱你。”艾米开心的跳起来，抱着麦格的脖子在他的脸上亲了一口。
"Fantastic! I love you, Father." Amy jumped up happily, hugged Mag, and kissed him on his cheeks.
“太好了！竟然增加了一个金奖！”埃菲惊喜的快要跳起来。
"Marvellous! They actually added another gold award!" Eiffie also jumped up in joy and surprise.
“太好了！这个黄瓜真的很好吃呢。”艾米脸上同样满是笑容。
"That's great! This cucumber is really delicious." Amy was all smiles as well.
“太好了，太好了。”玛拉小心抚摸着金奖杯，眼泪已经不争气的往下掉。
"That's great. That's great." Mala caressed the gold award's trophy carefully as tears flowed.
“太好了，洛都可好玩了，可是去了两次都没有玩尽兴呢。”艾米开心的说道，然后转身蹬蹬蹬上楼收拾东西去了。
"Fantastic. Rodu is fun, but I haven't gotten to play everything even after visiting twice," Amy said happily before she ran upstairs to pack her stuff.
“太好吃了，哈迪斯先生，您收我为徒吧，我想跟你学做菜。”玛拉放下筷子，一脸崇拜的看着麦格，表情还颇为诚挚。
"This is too good. Mr. Hades, please accept me as your disciple. I want to learn from you." Mala put her chopsticks down and looked at Mag with sincerity and admiration.
“太阳公公都晒屁股了哦。”艾米也是笑眯眯的说道。
"The sun is already shining down on your butt," Amy also smilingly said.
“夫人好像并没有很高兴的样子。”埃菲看着伊琳娜离开的背影，有点疑惑的说道。
Eiffie watched Irina's retreating back and asked with befuddlement, "Your wife doesn't look very happy."
“失败。”麦格将那啪坏了的黄瓜丢到一旁的盆里，重新取了一根黄瓜。
"Fail." Mag threw the smashed cucumber into a basin at the side and took another cucumber.
“奇怪的知识又增加了。”麦格稍微吸收了一下，然后开始转述给艾米。
"I gained more weird knowledge now." Mag absorbed them briefly before imparting them to Amy.
“套圈可是要钱钱的哦，你大人呢？如果想玩的话，是五个铜币一个圈圈。”老板笑眯眯的说道，这可是送上门的小肥羊。
"You will need to pay money to ring the geese. Where are your parents? One ring costs five copper coins," the boss said smilingly. This was a little sucker who had sent herself right to him.
“套鹅了，套鹅了！五个铜币一个圈，套中的大鹅带回家，红烧、烧烤、炖汤了嘞！“
"Ring the goose, ring the goose! Five copper coins for one ring. You can bring the big goose home when you ring it. You can braise it, barbecue it, or make it into a soup!"
“奥斯特这次家都差点被偷了，应该没有胆量跑到洛都去杀人放火。据说现在兽人族中主战派正在迅速减少，越来越多的人加入到康妮的和平派中，他们自顾不暇，不可能在这个时候继续激化矛盾。”麦格表情有些凝重道：“而这个时候把事情闹大，要么是安德烈想要找一个正当的开战理由，要么就是乔修故意挑起的。”

"Auster almost lost his home this time. He most probably didn't have the guts to go to Rodu to kill and burn. Apparently, the pro-war faction of the orcs is rapidly shrinking now, and more and more people are joining Connie's pro-peace faction. They cannot even take care of their own problems, so they definitely aren't going to intensify the contradictions right now," Mag said with a grave expression. "It's either Andre trying to find an excuse to start the war, or Josh deliberately creating trouble by exacerbating the situation."
“奥斯特这龟孙果然是在打肿脸充胖子，以他的胆子，有怎敢在这种时候再来挑衅朕。”安德烈有些嘲讽的冷冷一笑。
"That coward Auster is still putting up an act. With that kind of guts, he would never dare to provoke me now," Auster scoffed coldly.
“奥特曼星球那么厉害的吗？”麦格表示有点怀疑。
"Ultraman's planet is that impressive?" Mag was still suspicious.
“女人呢？”那人开口。
"The woman?" That person spoke up.
“奶奶太厉害了！我喜欢吃奶奶做的饭！”
"Grandma is fantastic! I love Grandma's cooking!"
“她……她走了吗？”
"I-is she gone?"
“她不是坏人，应该可以算是一个好人。”麦格摇摇头，看来昨晚提着重狙的晞还是吓到安妮了。
"She's not a bad person. I guess you can consider her a good person." Mag shook his head. It seemed that Xi with a heavy sniper last night gave Annie a fright.
“她不是蛋生的吗？那丑小鸭也会变成她这样吗？”
"Did he come out from an egg? Can Ugly Duckling turn into something like her?"
“她做什么其实不重要，重要的是暗夜精灵在做什么，在这动荡时刻，大部分精灵在情感上开始偏向暗夜精灵的时候，如果能够让暗夜精灵的队伍快速扩张，甚至趁机颠覆海伦娜的统治体系，才是最重要的事情。”麦格说道。

"What she's going to do isn't important. What's important is what the Night Elves are going to do. In these times of upheaval, most of the elves are starting to lean towards the Night Elves emotionally. What's the most important is if we can expand the Night Elves quickly, and even topple Helena's ruling system," Mag said.
“她只是一个没得感情的机器人而已，我把三头蛇交给她，并且承诺以后都会将这些稀奇古怪的地底生物交给她，作为这枚戒指的交换条件。”麦格一脸坦然道。
"She is just an emotionless robot. I handed the three-headed snake to her and promised that I would hand all those strange underground organisms to her in exchange for the ring," Mag said.
“她喝了点酒，有些醉了，所以今晚先睡觉了。”麦格微笑着说道。
"She drank a little, and is slightly drunk, so she turned in early tonight," Mag said with a smile.
“她在借用神力。”梅兰特看着伊琳娜，同样有些惊讶。
"She's borrowing the power of god." Merante was also looking at Irina with shock.
“她很强？”
"Is she very strong?"
“她是一个全新的生命，她与克苏鲁不同，她应该拥有正常生活的权力，像一个女孩一样。”麦格从一旁的柜台上拿起了那本美人鱼画册，直接抛向了晞，“以及拥有一个成为漫画家的梦想，这孩子在这方面有着非凡的天赋。”

"She is a whole new lifeform. She's different from Cthulhu. She deserves the right to lead a normal life like any young girl." Mag picked up the Little Mermaid picture book on the counter and tossed it to Xi. "She also deserves to have a dream of becoming a comic artist. This child has an extraordinary talent in this area."
“她的目标是魔鬼，我们的目标也是魔鬼，在某种角度上来说，我们可以是朋友。而且她也没有绝对的把握在杀死了我之后，还能安然走出酒馆，所以我们就和谈了，并且建立了联系。”麦格掏出了晞交给他的通讯设备，一台能够进行语音通话的手机。

"Her goal is the Devil and so is ours. In some way, we are friends. Besides, she was not confident of walking out of the tavern safely after killing me. Therefore, we negotiated and built a connection." Mag pulled out the communication device that Xi passed to him. It was a a phone that could do voice calls.
“她究竟是谁？好强啊。”诺亚昨天亲眼看着伊琳娜施法，而且是在醉酒状态下施法，着实让他无比震撼。
"Who is she? She's really powerful." Noya saw Irina cast the spell yesterday, and in a drunken state on top of that. This made him utterly shocked.
“她还和丑小鸭说会盯着它的，结果只盯了三秒钟……”
"She even told Ugly Duckling that she was going to be watching. In the end, she only watched it for three seconds…"
“她还挺受欢迎的呢。”伊琳娜笑着说道。
"She's really very popular." Irina said smilingly.
“好……好的。”埃菲连忙点头，顺手奉上已经有些凉了的茶水。
"Oh... okay." Eiffie quickly nodded. She handed Mag the tea that had already cooled down.
“好……好的。”小二揣着一肚子的糊涂走了。
"A-alright." The waiter left with befuddlement.
“好……好的，您请稍等，我这就去把这店铺的户主找来，今天就能把合同敲定。”费奇尽力克制着自己的表情，忙不迭用袖子擦拭了一个凳子，请麦格坐下，然后便快步出门去了。

"A-alright. Please give me a moment, I will go get this shop's owner right now. We can get the contract done today." Fitch tried his best to control his expression, and quickly used his sleeve to wipe clean a stool. He invited Mag to have a seat, and then swiftly strode out of the door.
“好……就说我不在。”费奇点点头。
"Yes... Just say that I'm not around." Fitch nodded.
“好。”伊琳娜也拿了一块绿豆酥。
"Alright." Irina took a mung bean pancake as well.
“好。”卢西恩点头，看了眼吧台后边非常简单的酒水单，只有两款酒，茅台酒2000铜币一品，威士忌也是2000铜币一瓶，价格倒是不低。
"Sure." Lucien nodded. He looked at the simple list of alcohol at the bar counter. There were only two types of alcohol: Maotai and whiskey, for 2,000 copper coins each. The price was rather high.
“好。”希利看了眼在厨房里忙碌的麦格，他想带艾米走，必须要经过麦格的同意，这样也可以避免克拉苏和尤利安方面的冲突。
"Alright." Seely threw a glance at Mag, who was busy in the kitchen. He had to get Mag's permission if he wanted to bring Amy away. This could also prevent a confrontation with Krassu and Urien.
“好。”梅兰特点头，没有逞强。
"Alright." Merante nodded. He did not force himself beyond his capabilities.
“好。”梅兰特重新祭出龟甲石，不过这次有些不同，他向龟甲石中注入了一缕残魂。
"Okay." Merante brought out the septaria oracle once again. This time, it was slightly different. He added a soul fragment into the septaria oracle.
“好。”艾许莉郑重点头。
"Alright." Ashley nodded gravely.
“好。”麦格一把抓起那沉甸甸的钱袋和那张纸，起身离开。
"Alright." Mag picked up the heavy money pouch and paper, and left.
“好了。”伊琳娜收了法师杖，眼睛一闭，便向后倒去。
"Alright." Irina kept her magic caster's staff, closed her eyes, and fell backward.
“好了，出门吧。”麦格笑着说道，起身准备出门。
"Alright, let's go," Mag smilingly said. He got up, and was ready to leave.
“好了，我决定收回之前的话，这其实是一道非常难的菜。”麦格看着面前卖相接近完美，但依旧被系统判定失败的酒鬼花生，有些无奈道。

Mag looked at the almost perfect-looking drunkard peanuts that were still struck out by the system, and helplessly said, "Alright. I decided to take back my previous words. This is indeed a very difficult dish."
“好了，我起床给你们做早餐，都想吃点什么？”麦格把丑小鸭的脑袋轻轻移开，从床上爬起来，笑着问道。
Mag shifted Ugly Duckling's head aside, got up, and smilingly asked, "Alright, I'll get up to make breakfast for you. What would you like to have?"
“好了，时候不早了，两位小公主该上楼洗漱睡觉了哦。”麦格反锁好门，微笑着和正在玩翻绳游戏的两个小家伙说道。
"Alright, it's getting late. Our two princesses should go up to get ready for bed," Mag told the two children playing the cat's cradle game as he locked the door.
“好了，都起床了的话，就先吃早餐吧。”麦格说了一声，转身进了屋子。
"Alright. Since we're all awake, let's have breakfast first." Mag informed them before going back to the house.
“好像……我真的很笨？”诺亚瞪着眼睛，看着手中乱成一团的毛线，也是陷入了沉思。
Seems like… I'm really stupid? Noah stared at the bunched up yarns in his hands with wide eyes, and thought hard.
“好冷啊，还是餐厅里暖和。”艾米在门口站了三秒，然后便转身回了餐厅，顺手关上了门，留下了面面相觑的客人们。
"It's so cold out here. The restaurant is much warmer." Amy stood at the door for three seconds before going back into the restaurant, and closed the door, leaving the customers wide-eyed.
“好叭。”艾米点点头，转身上楼洗漱去了。
"Alright." Amy nodded and turned to go upstairs to wash up.
“好叭，那我就先起床了。”艾米小声的爬起来，没有惊动睡在一旁的安妮，又从衣柜里翻出了小围裙，踮着脚尖离开了房间。
"Alright. I will get up first." Amy climbed up softly so that she would not startle Annie, who was sleeping beside her. She dug out a little apron from her wardrobe, and tiptoed out of the room.
“好可怕的威力，这钢铁巨兽竟然恐怖如斯！”诺亚目光呆滞。
"What a terrifying force. This giant iron beast's so terrifying!" Noah stared blankly at it.
“好可惜。”艾米随手就把那大蜗牛丢到了院子外的雪堆里，她已经看到了树上被它爬过的地方，留下的黏液腐蚀了树皮。
"What a pity." Amy tossed that big snail out into the snow beyond the yard. She had seen the area that it crawled by earlier. The slime that it left behind had corroded the tree bark.
“好可爱。”艾米眼睛一亮。
"It's cute." Amy's eyes lit up.
“好可爱的小姑娘。”温妮莎也注意到了柜台后小小一只的艾米，穿着木棉小裙子的小姑娘，小短腿挂椅子边，轻轻晃着，看起来可爱极了。

What a cute little girl. Vanessa also noticed the small Amy behind the counter. It was a little girl in a cotton dress. Her two short legs dangled over the chair, swaying gently, and making her look very cute.

Instead, I want to discuss how are we going to send our troops to attack the Falk Tribe and kill Connie, the evil girl who killed her father!"
“好！我这就去！”系统兴致冲冲道。
"Alright! I'll go right now!" the System said excitedly.
“好，下次你请。”麦格笑着点头，把打包好的酒鬼花生挂在帕萨的腰上，里边还放了三颗糖，听他说家里还有三个孩子。

"Sure, your treat next time." Mag nodded with a smile. He packed the leftover drunkard peanuts, and hung it at Pasa's waist. There were three sweets in there too because he heard about his three children at home.
“好，你且等着，我让人禀报陛下。”多米尼克答道，吩咐手下去禀报。
"Sure. Please hold on while I get my man to report this to his Majesty," Dominic replied and instructed his subordinate to report the matter.
“好，好，好啊！年轻有为。”库尔特连连点头，满是赞赏的看着麦格，又是看了看坐在他身旁的埃菲，有些感慨道：“当年马库斯抱着泰坦酒来这里的时候，也差不多是你这个年纪，同样一鸣惊人。”

"Good, good, good! You're young and promising." Kurt kept nodding as he looked at Mag praisingly. Then, he looked at Eiffie and lamented, "Marcus was about your age when he first brought Titan Liquor here. He, too, wowed the crowd."
“好，就按照你的判断来找他。”梅兰特点头，对于麦格的判断没有半点质疑。
"Alright. We'll search for him according to your deduction." Merante nodded without any doubts about Mag's deduction.
“好，我倒要瞧瞧这酒是不是真有这么烈。”库尔特结了账，笑着回到了自己的座位上。
"Alright, I want to see if this liquor is really so strong." Kurt settled the bill and returned to his seat with a smile.
“好，有你在肯定更容易找到他。”麦格恰到好处的拍了个马屁。
"Okay. With you around, it'll be easier to find him." Mag dropped a bootlick at the right place.
“好，走。”麦格踩着一双拖鞋，推开窗户，直接从二楼跳了下去。
"Alright. Let's go." Mag put on a pair of slippers, pushed open the window and jumped down from the second floor.
“好，那我们就在这里等一等，看看这幕后黑手究竟是谁吧。”
"Alright. Let's wait here for a while and see who's the person behind all this."
“好，那我们明天就出发，我收拾准备一下。”麦格点头，对于洛都之行心里已经有了一个大致的计划。
"Alright. We'll set off tomorrow. I'll go pack up." Mag nodded. He already had a rough plan for this Rodu trip.
“如果不是混乱之城做的，多半就是亚历克斯和伊琳娜那对做的，这手段，釜底抽薪啊。”路易斯跟着点头，倒是颇为赞赏。
"If Chaos City didn't do it, then it was most likely done by Alex and Irina. This is a drastic measure." Louis nodded too. He was rather impressed by it.
“如果他开始玩打一枪换一个地方，那可就有些麻烦了。”麦格眉头紧皱，本以为到了洛都就有机会找到乔修，可这家伙变得比以前更狡猾了。

"It would be troublesome if he started to play hide-and-seek." Mag frowned. He thought that there would be a chance to find Josh after coming to Rodu, but this fellow had become even craftier than before.
“如果你愿意的话，我也不介意在洛都开一家小酒馆。”麦格笑着点头。
"If you are willing to, I don't mind setting up a small tavern at Rodu." Mag nodded smilingly.
“如果你是他，下一个目标你会选谁？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"If you were him, whom would you choose as your next target?" Irina asked Mag.
“如果你的目标同样是那个逃脱了封印的家伙，或许我们可以坐下来谈谈，而不是在这里先分出个生死。”麦格平静的看着晞，天都剑出现在他的身侧，剑尖指着晞，“我知道你很强，我也很强，在你杀死我之前，我有把握杀死你。”

"If your target is also the fellow that had escaped from the seal, perhaps we should sit down and talk about it instead of fighting to death first." Mag looked at Xi calmly. The Tian Du sword had appeared next to him, with the tip pointing at Xi. "I know you are very strong. I'm very strong too. I'm confident that I can kill you before you kill me."
“如果只是泰坦酒馆获得金奖，我或许会觉得是运气。”费奇扬了扬手中的计划书，苦笑道：“但塞班酒馆也得了金奖，而且哈迪斯先生还拿了这样一份完备的计划书给我，已经说明了一切。”

"I will think it's perhaps luck if only Titan Tavern got the gold award," Fitch waved the proposal in his hands and bitterly said, "but even Saipan Tavern got the gold award. Furthermore, Mr. Hades even gave me such a detailed proposal. It already explains everything."
“如果哈迪斯先生一家因为我而出事的话，我的灵魂永远都不会得到原谅的。”埃菲看着玛拉的眼睛说道。
"If something happens to Mr. Hades's family because of me, my soul would never be forgiven," Eiffie told Mala.
“如果天道无所不在，无所不知，却又是未知和无法形容的存在，通过系统与外界进行交流，通过系统控制的宿主统治一个又一个的世界……那你觉得他像什么？”麦格的喉咙滚动了一下，感觉自己的想法的确有些危险。

"If God is everywhere and all-knowing, yet it was also unknown and indescribable, communicates with the outside world through the system,and rules world after world by controlling the hosts through systems... what do you think it's like?" Mag swallowed. He did think that his thoughts were rather dangerous.
“如果恶魔族还有希望战争的，那就告诉他们，联军在北上狙击亡灵军团之前，第一步就是扫除后方的一切不稳定因素。”麦格笑着说道。

Mag smilingly said, "If there are still people who crave for war in the demon race, tell them to eradicate all unstable factors in the rear before the allied forces go to the north to attack the Army of the Dead."
“如果我们一会不够喝呢？”库尔特一边掏钱袋，一边打趣道。
"What if we need more to drink later?" Kurt teased as he took out his money bag.
“如果我没有记错的话，现在的罗莫街是真的寂寞啊，街道两旁的店铺倒闭了大半，剩下的也是半死不活吊着。”
"If I remember correctly, Romo street is really destitude now. Most of the shops there are closed and the rest are barely hanging on too."
“如果我父亲听到你的称赞，他一定会非常开心。”埃菲的脸上终于露出了笑容，颇为骄傲的说道：“这个酒坊，以及整个酒馆和地下酒窖，全部都是他一手设计的。”

"My father would be very happy if he could hear your praises." A smile appeared on Eiffie's face and she proudly said, "This brewery, the whole tavern and this underground cellar were all designed by him."
“如果是这样的话，北地雪原之上恐怕还有许多这样的冰窟，在这片雪原之下，埋葬着无数战死的古尸。”梅兰特沉声道。

"If that's the case, I'm afraid there are many more such ice caverns on the northern snow plain. There are many more ancient corpses that died in the battle were buried underneath it." Merante said gravely.
“如果有什么需要帮助的，尽管和我说，我会力所能及的提供帮助。”麦格点点头道。
Mag nodded, and said, "If there is anything I can help, please tell me, and I will do all I can to help you."
“如果残留的灵魂和怨念足够，你就能够获得更多的信息是吧？”麦格问道。
"If there are enough residual souls and resentment, you are able to extract more information, right?" Mag asked.
“如果没有人来呢？”埃菲问道。
"What if no one comes?" Eiffie asked.
“如果没有其他事情，那我就送客了。”麦格起身，毫不客气的看着希利和卡诺。
"If there's nothing else, I will have to send you guys away now." Mag got up, and looked at Seely and Canault boldly.
“如果这个世界需要拯救，就让你们所谓的神灵自己来拯救世界，如果你们所谓的神灵只会躲在后边哔哔，那就让你们这群所谓的神灵代言人动手。让一个四岁的孩子来拯救世界，把这种责任放到她的肩上，你不觉得害臊和可笑吗？”麦格笑容毫不掩饰嘲讽。

"If this world needs saving, let your so-called Holy Spirit do it personally. If your so-called Holy Spirit can only talk sh*t behind the scenes, let you guys, the so-called spokespeople of the Holy Spirit, do it. Don't you feel ashamed and ridiculous by asking a four-year-old child to save the world, and placing this burden on her?" Mag didn't bother to disguise his contempt in his smile.
“如果这是品酒大会呈上来的酒，你回打几分？”弗格斯看着库尔特问道。
"If this was presented at the liquor tasting event, how many points will you give it?" Fergus asked Kurt.
“如果这次还是笑话大王的话，那我就不要了。”艾米嫌弃道。
"If the reward is still 'The King of Jokes' this time, I don't want it." Amy said disdainfully.
“如果魔鬼要携亡灵军团南下，你们有何打算？”安德烈看着麦格问道，目光有些深沉。
"If the Devil brings the Army of the Dead down south, what would you do?" Army of the Dead asked Mag.
“如此的话，我们又该如？现在兽人族还群情激奋，各族纷纷关闭通道，进入战时准备。”路易斯皱眉。
"In that case, what should we do? Now the orcs are still very angry, and the other races have all closed off their roads in preparation for war." Louis frowned.
“妙计！”
"Marvellous plan!"
“姑娘，别想那么多，客人就是这样来来去去的，哪有什么长情，不过是价格便宜而已。”一位在旁边围观的客人宽慰。
A customer watching at the side, consoled her, "Miss, don't think so much. Customers come and go. They don't have any loyalty. It's all because of the cheap price."
“威士忌——2000铜币一瓶。”
"Whiskey—2000 copper coins a bottle."
“威士忌和茅台在我心中都是匠心所做，何来糊弄之说？客人何不亲自品尝一下，倘若喝不惯，不喝便是。”麦格不卑不亢道。

"The whiskey and Maotai are both made by me with all my heart. How can you say that I'm trying to smoke my way through? Why don't you try it for yourself? If you don't like it, don't drink it," Mag said as he stood his ground.
“威士忌，不错。”晞微微点头，放下酒杯，抬眼看着麦格。
"Whiskey. Not bad." Xi nodded slightly. She put her glass and looked up at Mag.
“威士忌？”弗格斯有点惊讶道：“能够和茅台卖同价，说明这酒在老板心里和茅台酒是同一个级别的酒啊。”
"Whiskey?" Fergus said with shock, "Since it's priced similarly to Maotai, it meant it's a liquor that is on par with Maotai in the boss' heart."
“婆婆做的鱼香茄子可真好吃。”
"Nanny's eggplant with garlic sauce is delicious."
“媳妇，你消消气，来坐下我给你捶捶背，捏捏小腿，这折叠椅不错啊，坐着刚好合适。”
"Wifey, calm down. Sit here and I'll give you a massage. This folding chair is not bad. It's perfect for me sit on it."
“嫂子好。”诺亚向着伊琳娜礼貌的打了个招呼，虽然这样优雅美丽的女人极其少见，但他能够感受到她的可怕。
"Sister-in-law, how do you do?" Noya greeted Irina courteously. Although such a beautiful and elegant woman was a rare sight, he could still feel her strong presence.
“学会了。”埃菲的眼睛里亮着光，这些年一直困扰着她的许多酿酒上的问题，今天全部迎刃而解。
"Got it." Eiffie's eyes lit up. The problems that had troubled her with regard to wine-brewing were all answered today.
“学会了吗？”麦格收回了点在埃菲眉心的手指，问道。
"Got it?" Mag retracted the finger between Eiffie's brows as he asked.
“孩子们好久没那么开心过了，麦格先生的厨艺实在令人惊叹。”安奈林走了过来，满是钦佩的看着麦格。
"It's been a long time since the children were so happy. Mr. Mag's culinary skills are really amazing." Aneurin walked over, and looked at Mag with admiration.
“孩子们怎么想呢？”伊琳娜看着艾米和安妮。
"What do the children think?" Irina looked at Amy and Annie.
“孩子要玩就让她玩吧，我们看到了。”麦格和伊琳娜上前，笑着说道。
Mag and Irina went forward, and smilingly said, "Let the child play if she wants to. We saw that."
“它控制了那些古尸？让他们为他而战？”多米尼克则是看着麦格问道。
"It controlled those ancient corpses? To make them fight for it?" Dominic asked Mag.
“安东……”阿尔宾哽咽。
"Anton.." Albin chocked up.
“安东！”
"Anton!"
“安妮你想学调酒吗？”麦格笑着问道，这套酒具完全是摆设，他卖的是成品酒，不卖现场调制酒，也不会给客人表演什么调酒。

"Do you want to learn about mixology, Annie?" Mag asked smilingly. This set of mixology utensils was strictly for display. He was only going to sell finished alcohol. He wasn't going to sell cocktails, nor would he perform bartending for the customers.
“安妮姐姐。”杰西卡又是上前和安妮拥抱了一下，那天一起玩耍了一天之后，她们已经成了好朋友。
"Big Sister Annie." Jessica went forward to hug Annie. After playing together for a whole day, they had already become good friends.
“安妮姐姐画的画册是不是很漂亮啊？”麦格又问道。
"Isn't Big Sister Annie's drawing very beautiful?" Mag asked again.
“安妮姐姐，你也来玩吧。”艾米抓了一把绿豆放到安妮的手里，然后顺手丢出了两颗绿豆。
"Big Sister Annie, come and play too." Amy placed a mung bean in Annie's hand, and threw two mung beans out.
“安妮就像艾米一样，都是我们的孩子，我不可能让她把她带走。所以我晓之以情，亮之以剑，将安妮留下。”麦格点头，但有点担忧道：“不过我觉得她可能没那么容易就放弃，毕竟从某种角度来说，在他们眼中，安妮也是魔鬼，哪怕是一个善良的魔鬼也不行。”

"Annie is just like Amy, they are both our children. I would never let her be taken away. Therefore, I used my sword and my reasons to keep Annie with me." Mag nodded. However, he said worriedly, "But I don't think she would give up so easily. After all, from a certain point of view, to them, Annie is also the Devil. They would not let her go even if she is a kind Devil."
“安妮画的可真好，而且速度好快，我才出去两三天，竟然已经画了三本画本了。”伊琳娜翻开着安妮的画本，有些惊讶道。

Irina flipped through Annie's picture books and commented with amazement, "Annie's so good at drawing and she's very fast too. She had already finished three picture books while I was away for three days."
“安妮画的越来越好了，画风很可爱，故事也非常适合小朋友。”麦格合上绘本，忍住了在绘本后边加一道尖椒兔菜谱的冲动。

"Annie's drawing is improving. The illustrations are cute and the story is very suitable for children." Mag closed the picture book and resisted the urge to add a peppered hare recipe to the end of the picture book.
“安妮还在画画，我让她一会早点睡，艾米白天玩累了，洗了个澡上床就睡着了。”伊琳娜脸颊微红，点头道。
"Annie is still drawing. I told her to turn in early. Amy played the entire day and was tired so she slept after showering," Irina said with a nod as she blushed.
“安妮，你先上楼去，不要让艾米下楼来。”麦格侧头和安妮说道。
"Annie, go upstairs first, and don't let Amy come down." Mag turned to instruct Annie.
“安妮，带艾米先上楼睡觉，我们有点事情需要出去处理一下。”麦格解下围裙放到一旁，看着安妮说道。
Mag removed his apron, put it aside and said to Annie, "Annie, bring Amy upstairs to sleep first. We need to go out to settle some matters."
“安妮，有什么事想和我说吗？”麦格微笑着看着安妮问道。
"Annie, do you have something you wish to tell me?" Mag asked Annie with a smile.
“安德烈回到洛都，他再想越过安德烈发动一次战争的可能性不大，除非他能成为洛斯帝国的国王。”伊琳娜微微一笑，“这是他一直梦寐以求的。”

"Andre has returned to the Roth Empire. It's not likely that Josh can go over Andre and start a war again. Unless he became the king of the Roth Empire." Irina smiled. "That is what he has always wanted."
“安德烈这个家伙，对手下大臣还是挺关心的啊。”麦格手里提着一袋绿豆酥饼，看着不远处的大将军府。
Andre is rather nice to his subordinates and courtiers. Mag had a bag of mung bean pancakes in his hand. He looked out at the great general's mansion not far away.
“完美！”
"Perfect!"
“完美，相当完美。”麦格满意的点了点头，先把绿豆糕的菜谱给点了。
"Perfect. It's rather perfect." Mag nodded with satisfaction. He clicked on the mung bean cake's recipe first.
“实力不在我之下。”麦格点头。
"She's not weaker than me." Mag nodded.
“实在是太美味了！”埃菲放下筷子，看着麦格一脸赞叹道：“您的厨艺令人惊叹。”
"This is delicious!" Eiffie put her chopsticks down and looked at Mag as she exclaimed, "Your culinary skills are amazing."
“宵夜的话……当然也可以啊。”艾米不假思索的点了点脑袋。
"If it's supper… sure." Amy nodded without thinking further.
“家里来客人了吗？怎么买这么多食物呢？”埃菲看着艾米几乎抱不下的大纸袋，至少是六人份的早餐了。
"Did you have visitors? Why did you buy so much food?" Eiffie looked at the giant paper that Amy could barely hold on to. The breakfast was for, at least, six people.
“宿主尚未获得该食材开放权限，请继续努力！或者再加点！”系统严肃道。
"Host, you haven't received the permission of that ingredient yet. Please work harder! Or, pay more!" The system gravely said.
“宿主想要再次领取穿越套餐吗？”
"Would you like to receive another transmigration course?"
“宿主的问题已经触及危险领域，请收起这些危险的想法！”系统警告道。
"Your questions have already infringed the dangerous field. Please take back these dangerous thoughts!" the System warned.
“宿主确定！”
"Host confirmed!
“宿主请不要怀疑本系统的专业，基本的太阳能充电功能还是有的，该戒指不仅有定位追踪的功能，还有低血量危险警报功能，如果不是网络尚未构建，小天才掉话手表有的功能它一个都不少。”系统有些得意的声音响起。

"Can the Host not doubt this System's professionalism? The ring has a basic solar-powered charging system. That ring not only has a tracking function, it also has an alarm that warns about low blood volume. If it weren't for the fact there was no internet here, it would have had all the functions of a watch phone." The system's smug voice sounded.
“宿主请注意言辞，本系统是……”
"Please mind your words... the System..."
“宿主，你的行为已经影响到诺兰大陆的正常发展历程，可能会引发一系列动荡，引起天道关注和制裁。”系统的声音响起。

"Host, your behavior has already seriously affected the Norland Continent's normal development. It might trigger a series of upheavals and attract God's attention and punishment." The system's voice rang out.
“宿主，本系统位于无尽海域大龙虾养殖场的水温监控机器人和位于暮光森林大豆种植基地的日光监控仪，以及多个养殖场的机械在这几日突然消失了。”

"Host, the System's water temperature monitoring robot at the boundless sea realm crayfish rearing farm and the sunlight monitoring machine at the Twilight Forest soybean farm, as well as the machiens at various rearing farms had disappeared these few days."
“宿主，本系统还是需要提醒一下你，你的任务主线只是成为这个世界的厨神而已……并没有探索世界未解之谜这一项。”
"Host, I have to remind you that your main mission is only to become the God of Cookery of this world... unravelling the mysteries of the world is not one of them."
"Yes."
“对了城主，今天从暮光森林送回来的早报，奥斯特宣布奥格部落制造了洛都屠杀案，并且对洛斯帝国发出严正警告，如果洛斯帝国再敢入侵暮光森林，将遭受更为惨烈的袭击。”迪克斯从一堆密信中抽出了一份加急信。

"Oh, yes. My Lord, the morning report from the Twilight Forest today. Auster declared that the Aug Tribe had caused the Rodu massacre, and issued a stern warning to the Roth Empire. If the Roth Empire dared to invade the Twilight Forest again, they would suffer an even more deadly attack." Dicus took out an expedited letter from a stack of missives.
“对了老婆，这条街我已经给你买下了，从今往后你不光是这家酒馆的老板娘，还是这条街最靓的包租婆。”麦格突然想起了一件重要的事情，起身从柜台后边拎出一个箱子，啪的一下放在吧台上，然后打开箱子，露出了其中的一整箱房契，说话底气都变得足起来。

"Oh, right, honey. I bought the entire street for you. From today onwards, not only are you the lady boss of this tavern, but you're also the prettiest landlady of this entire street." Mag suddenly thought of a very important matter. He stood up and took out a chest from behind the counter, and placed it on the bar counter with a loud thud. After that, he opened the chest to reveal the whole chest full of title deeds.
“对了！应该将他们拌在一起再看看效果！”麦格眼睛一亮，他过于重视过程，却忽视了两者结合之后可能会出现的反应。
"Right! He should mix them together and see the results!" Mag's eyes lit up. He was too caught up with the process that he neglected the possible reaction that would happen when both were combined.
“对了，伊丽莎白姐姐呢？”菲丽丝左右看了看，有些疑惑的问道。
"Oh yes, where's Big Sister Elizabeth?" Firis looked around her and asked perplexedly.
“对了，你对鬼族有了解吗？昨日那两个家伙就是鬼族的。”麦格又问道。
"Oh, yes, do you know about the Ghost Clan? The two guys yesterday were from the Ghost Clan," Mag said.
“对了，你帮我分析一下，这两日风之森林爆发了游行和烧毁奴隶契约的运动，可海伦娜一反常态，并未对这些运动进行制止，你说她在想什么？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。

Irina asked Mag, "Oh, yes, help me analyze this. Protests and a movement to burn the slave contracts have exploded in the Wind Forest in the past two days, but Helena didn't do anything to stop this movement. She isn't being her usual self. What do you think she is thinking?"
“对了，你早上没有给那爷孙俩做饭，中午也没有给他们送饭。”伊琳娜提醒道。
"Oh, yes. You haven't cooked for that grandfather and grandson duo in the morning, and you didn't send them food for lunch, either," Irina reminded him.
“对了，你父亲当年没有藏酒吗？如果我没有猜错的话，泰坦酒应该是窖藏时间越长，酒味越是醇厚美味。”麦格问道。
"Oh yes, does your father have any liquor collection? If I am not wrong, the Titan Liquor should taste better as it ages." Mag asked.
“对了，你的那台大机器是做什么的？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"Oh yes, what is that big machine of yours for?" Irina asked Mag
“对了，你还得每日限量销售，仅限在店饮用。”
"Oh yes. You have to limit the number of bottles you sell daily and they could only be consumed within the tavern."
“对了，您夫人不在家吗？”埃菲好奇的问道。
"Oh right, is your wife not at home?" Eiffie asked curiosly.
“对了，我有个小礼物要送给你们呢。”麦格从怀里拿出了两个盒子，把其中紫色的大盒子递给艾米，白色的盒子则是递给了安妮。
"Oh, right, I have a little gift for you guys." Mag took out two boxes from his pocket and passed the large purple box to Amy, and the white box to Annie.
“对了，我看你昨天下楼的时候拿了一本新的绘本，是新的作品吗？”麦格好奇的问道。
"Oh, right. I saw that you were holding a new drawing book downstairs yesterday. Is it your new creation?" Mag asked curiously.
“对了，我还想请教一下麦格先生关于蒸酒的设备的问题……”
"Oh yes, I have some questions for Mr. Hades regarding the distillation equipment's problems..."
“对了，昨天我们套回来的两只大肥鹅还没有吃呢。”艾米突然想起了一件重要的事情，“要不我们晚上还是回家吃烤鹅吧。”
"Oh, right. We haven't had the two fat geese we won yesterday." Amy suddenly remembered something important. "Why don't we come back at night to have roasted goose?"
“对了，母亲大人，我们不是找父亲大人谈如何提升酒馆生意的问题吗？”艾米扭头看着伊琳娜，眨了眨眼睛问道。
"Right, Mother, weren't we looking for Father to discuss upgrading the tavern business?" Amy asked Irina as she blinked her large eyes.
“对了，汉娜你的酿酒工厂现在怎么样了？”米娅问道。
"Right, Hannah, how's your wine-brewing factory going?" Miya asked.
“对了，现在街坊邻居们都在你家酒馆门口为你祈福，今天你和玛拉就待在酒馆二楼不要出门和露头。”
"Oh, right. the neighbors are all praying for you in front of your tavern so I think you and Mala should just stay upstairs and not show yourselves."
“对了，老板，这书坊里，什么书最好卖啊？”麦格看着老板问道。
"Oh, yes. What kind of books are the most popular in this book square?" Mag asked the boss.
“对了，要不要把丑小鸭也换个装？”吃饭的时候，麦格看着低头吃炒饭的丑小鸭问道。
When they were eating, Mag looked down at Ugly Duckling, which was munching on the fried rice, and asked, "On, yes. Do we disguise Ugly Duckling too?"
“对于一个三岁半的孩子来说，这的确是富有挑战的任务，但我相信小主一定能够完成这个极具挑战性的任务！”系统鼓励道。
"To a three-and-a-half-year-old child, this is indeed a very challenging mission, but I believe little mistress can accomplilsh this extremely challenging mission!" The system encouraged.
“对于敌人，我的确了解的不少。”麦格有些自嘲的笑了笑，可惜他当初也是因为自诩了解乔修，所以没有杀了他，才有了今天这番屠杀。
"I indeed know the enemy pretty well." Mag laughed self-deprecatingly. It was he who chose not to kill Josh, because he thought he knew Josh well. That was what caused the massacres today.
“对哦！”麦格眼睛一亮，他倒是忘了埃菲这个经营多年的老板娘了。
"Oh yes!" Mag lit up his eyes. He had forgotten about Eiffie, the lady boss who had operated her business for years.
“对哦，昂他们有孩子，这会应该在哄孩子睡觉吧。”
"Right, they have kids. They must be putting their children to sleep now."
“对方的首要目标是你，如果不来的话，没必要费那么大的周章。”麦格微笑着摇摇头，又是看着埃菲认真的叮嘱道：“不过一会衙门的人来的话，埃菲小姐一定要按照我之前教你的话来应对。”

"The other party's number one target is you. He wouldn't have gone through so much effort if he's not coming." Mag shook his head with a smile and seriously instructed Eiffie, "However, Miss Eiffie must use the words I taught you earlier to handle the people from the court when they arrive later."
“对，乔修殿下把兵部的几位实权大臣全部着急在一起，然后拿出了陛下的点将牌，下令让边军出击，进攻兽人族和精灵族。我们兵部做了什么？只是按照陛下当年定下的见点将牌如见他的规则，听从乔修殿下的指令，发出了命令而已。”卢西恩掩面，抽噎了一会，还是忍不住落泪，“可最后定罪的却是我们兵部的那些忠诚的臣子，死的是他们的家人，哪有这种道理……”

"Yes. Josh gathered all the courtiers in power at the Ministry of Defense, and then took out His Majesty's plaque, and ordered them to deploy the border troops to attack the orcs and elves. What did we do? We just obeyed the order to treat the plaque the same as him that His Majesty set back then. We listened to Prince Josh's orders, and gave out commands." Lucien covered his face and held back his tears, but could not help but sob. "In the end, we, the loyal courtiers, are the ones punished for the crime, and the people dead are our families. What logic is this…"
“将军！”骑士面色一变，顾不上后腰的疼痛，扭头向后看去，布卢姆的卧室已然被点燃，火焰熊熊燃烧，并且向外快速蔓延而去。

"General!" The knight's expression changed. He could not care about the pain in his waist, and turned back to check. Blum's room was already ablaze, and the raging fire was quickly expanding outwards.
“将军，那老头被您一枪贯穿，受了致命重伤，此刻必然已经死去，只要我们加大搜查力度，肯定很快能够将他们找出来。”一旁的副将说道。

"Sir, you've pierced right through that old man. After receiving such a fatal blow, he must have died. As long as we increase the scope of our search operations, we will definitely find them very quickly," a deputy general beside him said.
“将这批物资连夜送到乌托部落，他们在这次战争中损失惨重，我会让三位擅长治疗的魔法师带上药材随你们一同前往。”康妮站在一辆马车前，和带队的兽人说道。

"Bring these items to the Uto Tribe immediately. They have suffered great losses from this battle. I will get three healing magic casters to go along with some medicine," Connie told the leading orc as they stood before one of the horse-drawn carriages.
“小丫头，就知道吃吃吃，迟早被人拐了去。”
"All you know is eat, girl. You'll be kidnapped by someone sooner or later."
“小主不用担心，本系统作为生活体验系统，将对您进行全方位的辅助和指导，保证让您做出一份美味的早餐。”系统信心满满的说道。

"Little Mistress, do not worry, as a Life Experience System, I will provide you with all-rounded assistance and guidance to ensure that you can prepare a delicious set of breakfast," the system said confidently.
“小主乖哦，接下来的任务奖励将更丰富，说不定还会有零食大礼包哦。”系统语气变得更为温柔，还带着几分谄媚。
"Be good. The rewards coming up would be even better and there might even be a snack hamper," the System said in a gentle tone.
“小主请冷静，您昨晚不是许了一个愿望吗，我就是来为你实现愿望的。”系统有点谄媚的声音响起。
"Calm down, Little Mistress. Didn't you make a wish last night? I am here to fulfill that wish." The system's voice rang.
“小主，根据系统与宿主绑定守则，小主要对我的存在保密，也就是不能告知任何人我的存在，否则将会受到惩罚。”
"Little Mistress, according to the rules binding us, you have to keep my existence a secret, which means you are not allowed to tell anyone about my existence. Otherwise, you will be punished."
“小场面，她一般不会太在意。”麦格微笑着说道，其实他也没有很兴奋的感觉。
"It's just a small thing, so she usually wouldn't care." Mag smilingly replied. In fact, he also wasn't very excited.
“小姐。”玛拉扭头看着埃菲，表情认真道：“我学会了可以做饭给你吃啊。”
"Young Mistress." Mala turned to look at Eiffie and said seriously, "I can cook for you after learning it."
“小姐。”玛拉揉着还有些惺忪的眼睛在埃菲身边坐下，不过很快又起身冲着麦格打了个招呼。
"Young Mistress." Mala sat beside Eiffie as she rubbed her sleepy eyes. However,she quickly got up again and greeted Mag.
“小姐你听！是哈迪斯先生的声音！”玛拉突然指着上方惊喜的说道。
"Listen, Miss! it's Mr. Hades' voice!" Mala suddenly pointed upwards and exclaimed happily.
“小姐是不想这世上再也没有泰坦酒，你知道这些年她有多努力吗？在老爷和夫人去世前，她可是从来没有酿过酒的。”小丫鬟憋红了脸说道。

"Young Mistress just didn't want Titan Liquor to cease to exist. Do you know how much effort she had put in all these years? Before Madam and Madam passed away, she had never brewed wine before," the little maid said with her face red with fury.
“小姐最近总是莫名其妙的打我是怎么回事？”玛拉摸摸脑袋，一脸不解的关上门。
"Why is Miss always hitting me for no reason recently?" Mala touched her head and closed the door with befuddlement.
“小姐饶命，我什么都没有说啊……”玛拉一边躲，一边委屈道。
"Spare me, Young Mistress, I did't say anything..." Mala said innocently as she tried to dodge.
“小姐！我们……我们拿了金奖吗？！”玛拉看着埃菲手里的奖杯，两眼放光的跑了过来，满脸惊喜之色。
"Miss! Did w-we get the gold award?!" Mala saw the trophy in Eiffie's hands and ran over with glowing eyes and shock.
“小姐，为什么我们不把酒价也调高一些呢？我们的客人一个还不到一百铜币呢。”小丫鬟疑惑道。
"Miss, why don't we increase our liquor's prices too? Our customers' minimum spending is not even 100 copper coins?" the maid asked perplexedly.
“小姐，他……他想杀我们吗？”玛拉的眼中满是惊恐，仰头看着埃菲问道。
There was fear in Mala's eyes when she looked up at Eiffie and asked, "Miss, I-is he trying to kill us?"
“小姐，你怎么了？”玛拉拿起一只田螺也准备试试，看到埃菲脸蛋红红的，有些奇怪的问道。
"Young Mistress, what's wrong?" Mala was about to try with an escargot when she realized Eiffie's face was red.
“小姐，哈迪斯先生做的菜实在太好吃了。”
"Miss, Mr. Hades's dishes are simply too delicious."
“小姐，哈迪斯先生教您酿泰坦酒……那他不是也学会了吗？”正在烧火的玛拉抬头看着埃菲说道。
"Young Mistress, Mr. Hades taught you how to brew Titan Liquor... in that case wouldn't he also have learned how to brew it too?" Mala, who was raising the fire asked Eiffie.
“小姐，哈迪斯先生是不是很厉害啊？”玛拉突然问道。
"Miss, is Mr. Hades very formidable?" Mala asked suddenly.
“小姐，您可真是料事如神，这个酒窖可是救了我们一命呢。”玛拉看着留下了两个深深的斧头印记的地窖门，有些庆幸道。
Mala looked at the cellar's door that was marked with two deep ax's strikes and said with rejoice, "Miss, you're really a clarivoyant. This cellar has saved our lives."
“小姐，您在看什么呢？”丫鬟的声音从背后响起。
"Miss, what are you looking at?" A maid spoke up behind her.
“小姐，成功了吗？”小丫鬟把披风给埃菲裹上，满是期待的看着她。
The little maid came over to put on the cape for Eiffie and looked at her expectantly, 'Miss, are you successful?"
“小姐，现在大家都知道我们拿了金奖呢，还有不少人来祝贺呢。”玛拉兴致冲冲的跑进酿酒坊，看着正在机器前认真操作的埃菲说道。
"Miss, everyone knew that we got the gold award now. Many people came to congratulate us." Mala dashed into workshop excitedly and said to Eiffie who was operating the machine seriously.
“小姐，这不是哈迪斯先生的女儿吗？”玛拉有些惊讶的说道。
"Miss, isn't that Mr. Hades' daughter?" Mala said with surprise.
“小姐，这个价格会不会提的太高了？要是以前的客人来看到，会不会扭头就走啊？”
"Young Mistress, would this price be raised too high? Would the old customers leave if they see the price?"
“小姐，这太重了，只凭我们两个肯定搬不动的。”玛拉拍了拍和她差不多高的橡木桶，这可是能够灌装三百瓶的超大桶。
"Young Mistress, this is too heavy. We won't be able to move it." Mala patted the oak barrel that was almost her height. This was a supersized barrel that could feel 300 bottles.
“小姐，那是……”小丫鬟看着埃菲手里的酒，有些紧张的说道。
"Young Mistress, that is..." the servent maid said nervously when she saw the wine in Eiffie's hand.
“小姐，麦米餐厅到了。”马车挺稳，外便传来车夫的声音。
The horse-drawn carriage stopped, and the coachman informed, "Missy, we have arrived at Mamy Restaurant."
“小姑娘的人气还不低。”希利笑着道。
Seely laughingly said, "The little girl is really popular."
“小姑娘长得真可爱，说的话也可爱。”
"This little girl is so adorable, and she speaks so adorably too."
“小姑娘，你们怎么都要买这本书啊？”麦格凑上前，和一个站在稍微边缘的姑娘问道。
Mag approached a maiden standing at the edge, and asked, "Young lady, why are you all buying this book?"
“小姑娘，你好啊。”亚伯罕笑着打招呼道。
"Hello, little girl." Abraham greeted her with a smile.
“小姑娘，别怕，有胖爷爷在，以后这地方没有人敢欺负你。”亚伯罕走到柜台前，笑眯眯的看着艾米说道，浑然没有了先前的霸道模样。

Abraham went to the counter with a smile, and told Amy, "Little girl, don't be afraid. Fat Grandpa is here. Nobody will dare to bully you again." He was a completely different person from who he was just now.
“小姑娘，是你想套圈吗？”老板笑着问道。
"Little girl, do you want to ring a goose?" asked the boss smilingly.
“小孩子喝什么酒，你负责倒酒就行了，自己去倒点水喝。”梅兰特抬头看着他说道。
Merante looked up, and said to him, "A child can't drink alcohol. You're just responsible for pouring it for us. Go get yourself some water."
“小孩子就不要管这些事情了，现在最重要的是今天中午去哪里吃饭，我听说这段时间塔克坊市开了家味道不错的牛肉馆子，我带你去尝尝。”亚伯罕笑着把话题转开。

"Children shouldn't bother with such matters. What's the most important now is where we will go for lunch. I heard that a nice beef restaurant has opened in Tuck Square recently. I'll bring you there for lunch." Abraham changed the conversation topic smilingly.
“小孩子才做选择，我全都要。”弗格斯笑着摇头道。
"Only children make choices. I am having all of them." Fergus shook his head with a smile.
“小心一点！”
"Be careful!"
“小朋友，还是要多见见世面。”伊琳娜摇了摇头，没有再说什么。
"Kid, you've got to see the world." Irina shook her head, and did not speak further.
“小米一早起来给我们做早餐呢，第一次，磕碰难免嘛。”麦格回头笑着道。
Mag turned around, and smilingly said, "Little Amy got up early to make us breakfast. It's normal to have some accident on her first attempt."
“小米不是有一个许愿井吗？不如就向它许个愿望吧，要一台全自动印刷机，要是连这样小小的愿望都不能实现的话，那我们就把井填了吧。”麦格喝了一口牛奶，淡淡道：“那一定是个假的许愿井。”

"Don't you have a wishing well, Amy baby? Why don't you make a wish for a fully automated printing machine. If such a small wish can't even be fulfilled, we should just fill the well up." Mag took a sip of milk and said, "It must be a fake wishing well."
“小米不说的话，我还真忘了。”麦格笑着摸了摸小家伙的脑袋，起身向着酒柜走去。
"I really would have forgotten about it if Amy hadn't reminded me." Mag patted the little one's head, and then walked to the bar cabinet.
“小米今天的任务是不是要学会拍黄瓜呀？”麦格喝了一口热牛奶，随口问道。
"Is Amy baby's mission today to learn the Smashed Cucumber Salad?" Mag asked as he took a sip of warm milk.
“小米你们先去和小朋友们玩吧，我先去和工作人员谈谈。”麦格看着不远处两位向他走来的工作人员，微笑着说道。
Mag saw two staff members walking towards them, and smilingly said, "Little Amy, go and play with children first. I'll go talk to the staff."
“小米先吃吧，我一会再吃。”
"Little Amy, you will eat it first. I will eat it later."
“小米喜欢大鸡腿！”艾米的脸上笑容绽放，点着小脑袋道。
A smile bloomed on Amy's face, and she nodded her head. "Little Amy likes big chicken drumsticks!"
“小米想去长期旅行了吗？”麦格笑着看着艾米。
"Does Little Amy want to go on a long vacation?" Mag looked at Amy smilingly.
“小米要打几个？”伊琳娜歪头笑着问道。
Irina tilted her head, and smilingly asked, "How many opponents does Little Amy want to fight?"
“小米还有什么事呢？”麦格柔声问道。
"What is it, Little Amy?" Mag asked softly.
“小米这是去哪？”麦格看着平日应该还在酣睡的小家伙，这样的异常举动，多半又是从系统那里领取了什么新任务。
"Where's Little Amy going?" Mag looked at the little one who should be still sleeping. She should have received some new mission from the system again.
“小米，你在做什么？”麦格不知何时出现在厨房门口，看着一片狼藉的厨房，有点惊讶的看着手里还抓着一个锅铲的艾米。
"What are you doing, Little Amy?" Mag suddenly appeared at the kitchen's entrance. He looked at the messy kitchen and Amy, who was still holding a spatula, with shock.
“小米，你太棒了！我们成功的做出了一道不错的下酒菜！”麦格一把抱起艾米，开心的转了两圈道。
"Amy baby, you're awesome! We've made a good side dish successfully!" Mag said happily as he picked Amy up and spun her around twice.
“小米，安妮，我们要出去一趟，要晚点才能回来，你们自己待在家里，在二楼玩耍，不要出门，知道吗？”
"Little Amy, Annie, we are going out for an errand and will only return later. You two stay at home by yourself and don't leave the house, alright?"
“小米，这真是你在梦里听到的？”伊琳娜笑得腮帮子有点发酸。
"Little Amy, did you hear all that in your dream?" Irina was laughing so hard that her jaws were aching.
“小老板你这……你这是双标啊……”哈里森有些委屈。
"Little Boss, y-you have double standards…" Harrison was a little aggrieved.
“小老板，那我呢？”哈里森跟着起哄道。
"Little Boss, what about me?" Harrison joined in the fun too.
“小脑袋里只想着钱钱钱，赶紧把酒馆再收拾一下，今晚我们可是要开始正式营业了。”埃菲拍了一下玛拉的脑袋，没好气道。
"All you think about is money. Clean the tavern up quickly. We are officially opening for business tonight," Eiffie said angrily as she smacked Mala's head.
“小艾一个人去买早餐了吗？”麦格看着艾米怀里抱着的早餐，笑着问道。
"Did Little Amy buy breakfast alone?" Mag asked with a smile as he looked at the breakfast Amy was carryign in her arms.
“小艾米。”露娜笑着摸了摸艾米的头发，看着孩子们手里还没有吃完的烤肉串，还有麦格面前展开的两个烤架，然后看着麦格道：“看来您给孩子们做了好吃的烤肉串。”

"Little Amy." Luna rubbed Amy's head smilingly as she looked at the unfinished kebabs in the children's hands and the two grills in front of Mag before saying to Mag, "Seems like you are making delicious kebabs for the children."
“小艾米今天的头发绑的真好看。”一位年轻漂亮的姑娘称赞道。
"Little Amy's hair is tied up so prettily today," a young and beautiful maiden praised.
“小艾，我们吃不了这么多鹅，不如我们挑两只最肥的，剩下的就卖掉吧。”麦格看着艾米说道，他实在无法想象自己扛着三十只大肥鹅的场景。
"Amy, we can't finish so many geese, so why don't we just take the two fattest ones and sell the rest?" Mag asked Amy. He couldn't imagine carrying 30 big, fat geese on him.
“小艾，这是给你的哦。”埃菲把手里一个装满了各种小吃的篮子直接递给艾米。
"Ay, this is for you," Eiffie passed a basket filled with snacks to Amy.
“小鬼？你是说我吗？”艾米双手托着下巴，有些疑惑的看着奥尔登。
"Little brat? Are you referring to me?" Amy looked at Aulden in bewilderment as she propped her chin on her hands.
“尚可。”雷克斯微微点头。
"Passable." Rex nodded slightly.
“尝尝。”麦格拿起筷子夹了一块黄瓜喂到嘴里。
"Give it a try." Mag picked up a piece of cucumber and put it in his mouth.
“尝尝洛都的本地小吃吧。”麦格笑着说道，买的东西刚刚已经被伊琳娜收起来了，两只大肥鹅也托管在一处店铺里，这会他两手空空，倒也想尝尝地道的洛都名小吃。

"Let's try out Rodu's local snacks," Mag smilingly said. Irina had kept the things that they bought and the two fat geese kept at a shop temporarily. His hands were now free, and he wanted to try the famous Rodu's local snacks too.
“尝尝这个。”麦格拿了两双筷子，其中一双递给艾米，自己夹起一块拍黄瓜喂到嘴里。
"Try this." Mag took two pairs of chopsticks and passed one of them to Amy while he picked up a piece for himself.
“就今晚。”麦格点头。
"Tonight." Mag nodded.
“就像你现在这样吗？”伊琳娜俯视着伊琳娜，“我很意外，你这一次竟然没有带上亚历克斯。”
"Just like you now?" Helena looked down at Irina. "I'm surprised that you didn't bring Alex this time."
“就按照你说的价格定了，咱们把字签了吧。”矮胖中年人催促道。
"Then let's go with the price you decided and sign the documents." The short and fat man hurried him.
“就是不知道她看完之后舍不舍得还给我，要是不还的话，安妮还得重新画一本才能用来印刷呢。”麦格轻轻叹了口气。
"I just don't know if she could bear to return it to me after she's done with it. If she doesn't return it to me, you'll have to draw another one for printing." Mag sighed.
“就是这个味！”
"This is it!"
“就是这了。”波比起身给卢西恩打开车门。
"Here it is." Bobby opened the door for Lucien.
“就是，开一个小破酒馆，还真把自己当一回事了？”
"Exactly, you've only opened a pathetic little tavern, and you think you're somebody?"
“就是，我们也组织一批强者，突袭洛斯帝国，把他们的城镇屠戮数十个，为族人报仇！”
"Exactly. We can also form a group of powerhouses to launch a sudden attack on the Roth Empire, and massacre tens of their towns to take revenge for our people!"
“就知道你三个是吃不饱的，笼子里还有三个。”麦格笑着起身进厨房再拿了一笼灌汤包出来。
"I know three won't be enough for you. There are three more in the kitchen." Mag stood up with a smile and headed to the kitchen to take another steamer of soup dumplings.
“就算不带走那个女孩，我也要带她的部分头发或者指甲回去，我们需要研究她究竟是什么样的存在。”晞看着他说道。
"I want to bring some of the girl's hair or nails back even if I can't bring the girl back. We need to study what kind of being she is." Xi said.
“就算得不到他的人，也要得到他的酒……”
Even if I cannot have him, I have to have his liquor…
“就这么多了，您收好。”麦格往酒馆中间的空地掏出了一座金山。
"Just this much. Please keep it." Mag dug out a mountain of gold from the empty space in the tavern.
“就这些了，如果你需要的话，可以全部拿走。”麦格坦然道。
"That's all. If you need to, you can take them all with you." Mag said frankly.
“就这样。”康妮挥了挥手。
"That's all." Connie waved her hand.
“就这样吧，朴素粗犷一点，喝烈酒也有感觉一点。”麦格确定了装修风格，然后便出门去找施工队了。
"Let's do it that way. Keep it simple and rugged so there's an ambiance when they drink hard liquor." After Mag ascertained the renovation style, he went out to look for a construction team.
“就这，魔鬼一般也看不上。”麦格摇了摇头。
"Him? The devil most probably won't take to him." Mag shook his head.
“就这？”伊琳娜似笑非笑的看着他。
"Just that?" Irina looked at him with a seeming smile.
“就这？”伊琳娜看着手里的竹圈，随手一丢。
"That's all?" Irina looked at the bamboo ring in her hand, and casually threw it out.
“就这？”伊琳娜笑了笑。
"Just this?" Irina smiled.
“就这？”卢西恩看着这家酒馆，外观看起来平平无奇。
"Here?" Lucien looked at the tavern. It looked very ordinary from the outside.
“就这？”艾米坐在床边，晃了晃自己的小短腿。
"That's all?" Amy sat on the bed and shook her little short legs.
“就这？”麦格微微皱眉，“也没学到精髓啊。”
"Just that?" Mag frowned. 'You didn't learn the essence of it."
“就这？也太简单了吧？”艾米看着那五点经验值，然后继续探究这个所谓的系统。
"Just that? It's too simple." Amy looked at the five experience points, and continued to study this so-called system.
“巨佬……”诺亚挑了挑眉，看着麦格的目光多了几分敬佩。
"Rich…" Noya raised his brow, and looked at Mag with admiration.
“差不多了，阿紫，停下吧。”
"About here. Ah Zi, let's stop."
“差不多，直接吓晕了，然后我用吸血蝙蝠把他的精血吸干了，和你上次见到的那具尸体差不多。”伊琳娜点点头，又看着麦格身上破损的衣服，“你还能被他伤到？”

"Almost. He was knocked out from the shock, and then I used a blood-sucking bat to suck out all his blood essence. It looked almost like the corpse you saw previously." Irina nodded. She looked at Mag's torn clothes, and said, "You're injured?"
“已经完全好了，随便折腾都没问题。”梅兰特答道，不过目光完全被面前玻璃杯中的酒吸引。
"I have completely recovered. I can do anything now," Merante answered, but his gaze was completely attracted to the liquor in the glass in front of him.
“已经来到洛都了吗？呵呵，有趣……”一阵黑雾从大皇子府邸的墙上缓缓渗透而出，一个浑身被黑袍笼罩的昂身影从黑雾中走了出来，低沉的声音如金属摩擦般刺耳。

"Already at Rodu? Hehe, interesting…" A cloud of black fog slowly seeped out from the first prince's mansion. A silhouette in a black robe walked out slowly from the black fog. His low voice was jarring to the ears, just like the sound of metal rubbing against each other.
“师父，我刚刚表现的怎么样？”康妮见四下无人，侧头看着雷克斯笑眯眯的问道。
Connie realized that they were alone, so she tilted her head and asked Rex smilingly, "Master, how is my earlier performance?"
“师父，我是不是做的非常好？我都听到了好多悄悄夸我的。”康妮爬上了不远处停着的马车，看着坐在车里的雷克斯有些兴奋道。
"Master, did I do a good job? I hear many people praising me discreetly," Crease asked Rex excitedly after boarding the horse-drawn carriage parked nearby.
“希望他不是这样想的。”伊琳娜皱眉。
"I hope he isn't thinking like that." Irina frowned.
“希望你能够继承马库斯的衣钵，将泰坦酒继续传承下去。”库尔特将奖杯交给埃菲，勉励道。
Kurt gave the trophy to Eiffie and encouraged, "I hope you can carry on Marcus' work and pass on the legacy of Titan Liquor."
“希望小家伙能够清楚的认识到自己做菜的天分，不要每天早上都来折腾一遍厨房和我们的胃。”麦格笑着耸了耸肩。
"I hope that the little one could have a clear understanding of her cooking talent now. Please don't get up to torture the kitchen and our stomachs every morning." Mag shrugged with a smile.
“带一些精灵离开，顺便杀一些不配被称为精灵的家伙。”伊琳娜声音冰冷的说道。
"To bring some elves away and kill those who are not fit to be called elves." Irina said coldly.
“带着孩子也不好每天潜伏，有个正当的身份更好活动，我觉得可以。”
"It's not good to go undercover every day with children. It's easy to move about with a proper identity. I think it's feasible."
“常规操作。”费奇一脸淡然的把手里的资料放在桌上，“把这些资料整理一下，然后跟我去一趟罗莫街。”
"It's just normal operation." Fitch placed the documents onto the table calmly. "Sort out these documents and then follow me to Romo Street."
“干掉他，这二十五万就是兄弟萌的了。”
"Get rid of him and this 250,000 will belong to us."
“干活了，小脑袋瓜子里一天到晚想的都是什么。”埃菲伸手给了她一个板栗，老娘都不敢想的事情。
"Go and do your work. What are you thinking with that little head of yours all day?" Eiffie knocked her on the head. Even her didn't dare to think about it.
“年轻人，你很有趣，对我胃口。”弗格斯伸手拍了拍麦格的肩膀，“那我就期待一下你明年能够给我们带来怎样的惊喜吧。”
"Young man, you are funny. I like you." Fergus slapped Mag's shoulder. "Then, I shall look forward to the surprise that you will bring to us next year."
“年轻人，这酒是你酿的吗？”库尔特见麦格这般年轻，不禁有些惊讶的问道。
"Young man, did you brew this liquor?" Kurt couldn't help asking in amazement when he saw how young Mag was.
“年轻有为，后生可畏。”弗格斯将奖杯递向麦格，笑着道：“我可是把明年的奖杯都拿出来救急了，希望明年还能看到你带来更好的茅台酒。”

"Young and promising. You will be a force to reckon with in the future." Fergus passed the trophy to Mag and chuckled, "I have taken next year's trophy to settle this emergency. I hope to see you bring back an even better Maotai next year."
“床很舒服，昨晚真的非常感谢您。”埃菲走到麦格身前，向他深深鞠了一躬，诚恳的感激道。
"The bed is vrey comfortable. Thank you very much for last night," Eiffie said sincerely with a deep bow when she walked over to Mag.
“库尔特男爵到！”一声高呼响起。
"Baron Kurt has arrived!" Someone announced.
“应该不会吧。”
"It most likely won't."
“应该已经睡下了，我在酒馆外边布置了防御阵法，没人能进得去。”
"They should be asleep. I'll set up a defense spell formation outside the tavern so no one can enter."
“应该是吧。”麦格笑着将奖杯递给已经擦好手手的艾米。
"I guess so." Mag passed the trophy to Amy who had already wiped her cleans clean.
“应该没问题。”麦格心里也没底。
"It should be fine." Mag was uncertain too.
“废物！一个受了重伤的老头都找不到！”那将领沉声喝道，神色大为不悦。
"Useless! You can't even find a heavily wounded old man!" the general chided loudly with displeasure.
“废话太多了，我是来找你打架的，不是来吵架的！”伊琳娜打断了海伦娜的话，提着法师杖一步跨出，消失在原地，出现在高台上空，双手握着法师杖，向着海伦娜当头砸落。

"We talk too much. I came to fight you, and not argue with you!" Irina interrupted Helena. She took a step forward with her magic caster's staff, and disappeared on the spot. She reappeared above the platform, holding her magic caster's staff high above her head with both her hands, and smashed it down onto Helena's head.
“废话，要是晚了的话，岂不少赚了不少钱！”老板把小二推出酒馆，自己把门上的牌子摘了，还不忘叮嘱道：“今天就去把施工队找来，今天晚上就开工，越早完工越好，多给点钱也行！”

"Of course. We will lose money if we are late!" Boss pushed the waiter out of the tavern and removed the sign on the door himself. He didn't forget to remind him, "Go get the construction team here today and we will start the work tonight. The earlier we can finish, the better. It's even fine to pay more!"
“开城门。”多米尼克下令。
"Open the city gates," Dominic commanded.
"Happy!"
“开的很好呢，连漂移都学会了。”麦格从阿紫背上跳下来，笑着说道。
"You're driving really well. You've even learnt how to drift," Mag said with a smile as he jumped off Ah Zi's back.
“开酒馆果然比开餐厅要省力很多啊，入错行了，入错行了。”麦格在柜台后坐着，一边看着两个小家伙坐在小板凳上下跳棋，一边听那群老男人聊天。

"Opening a tavern saves a lot of manpower compared to a restaurant. I went into the wrong field." Mag sat behind the bar counter as he watched the two little fellows play chess on a little stool, and listened to the group of grown men chat.
“弹弹弹。”艾米拿筷子轻轻戳着自己的灌汤包，看着它在盘子里左右颤动，玩的很是开心。
"Boing boing boing." Amy poked her soup dumpling with her chopsticks and watched it wobble on her plate happily.
“当你觉得生活不如意的时候，不要慌，摸摸空荡荡的钱袋，哭出来就好了。”麦格看着坐在他家酒馆门口，眼巴巴的望着斜对面热闹的泰坦酒馆的中年男人，平静的说道。

"When you feel that life isn't working out for you, don't be flustered. Touch your empty pocket, and cry it all out," Mag calmly told the middle-aged man who was sitting at the door of his tavern, and looking out at the crowd at Titan Tavern diagonally across the road.
“当年您几乎每天都来酒馆喝酒，而且一直坐在靠门口的那个位置，除了喝酒，最喜欢的下酒菜是我母亲做的萝卜条。”埃菲笑着点头，“那时候您时常让我帮您加萝卜条，还会给我一些小费，所以我记得您。”

"You came to drink at the tavern almost every day back then and you always took the seat near the door. Besides drinking, your favorite side dish was the preserved radish strips my mother made." Eiffie nodded with a smile. "You used to let me top up preserved radish strips back then and you would tip me, so I remember you."
“当年的泰坦酒，可是洛都城里最好的酒，那滋味，十多年过去了，都忘不了，没想到今天在这里还能闻到它的香味。”
"The Titan Liquor back then was the best liquor in Rodu. That taste. I can't forget it even after 10-odd years. I didn't expect to smell it again today."
“当年靠着一家泰坦酒馆就带起了一条罗莫街，现在加上一家塞班酒馆，罗莫街重回巅峰指日可待。”
"The Titan Tavern alone back then supported the whole Romo Street. With another Saipan Tavern now, Romo Street is expected to return to its former glory."
“当战争来临的时候，敌人只会攻击一切能够攻击的兽人部落，不会特意去区分战争派还是和平派。”康妮看着那兽人，微微摇头道：“无论我们属于哪一派，首先我们都是兽人，属于同一个种族。”

"When war comes, the enemy will only attack any orc tribe they can attack. They will not distinguish between a pro-war tribe or pro-peace tribe." Connie looked at that orc with a shake of her head, and said, "No matter where we stand, we are firstly all orcs from the same race."
“当时我发现她就像是一个刚刚出生的孩子，单纯而善良，因为担心其他人伤害她，所以带她离开了封印之地，并且在后来决定将她收养。她是一个善良的孩子，你知道的。”麦格表情认真道。

"Back then, I realized she was just like a newborn child. She's very pure and kind. I was afraid that others would harm her so I brought her out of the sealed land and decided to keep her. She is a kind child. You know it," Mag asid sriously.
“当然。”麦格拿了一个小碗，给她盛了一碗。
"Of course." Mag picked up a small bowl and scooped a bowl for her.
“当然不是。”洛拉点点头。
"Of course not." Lola nodded.
“当然可以。”埃菲点头，虽然不知道麦格想做什么，但还是领着麦格向着酒馆后边走去。
"Of course." Eiffie nodded. Although she did not know what Mag wanted to do, she still led Mag to the back of the tavern.
“当然可以。”麦格笑着招呼服务员过来，又给艾米加了一碗牛肉汤。
"Of course, you may." Mag got the service staff over with a smile, and got another bowl of soup for Amy.
“当然可以，那一会父亲和你一起去吧，我带上厨具，给小朋友们做烧烤吃。”麦格笑着点头。
"Of course. Father will go with you. I will take the kitchenware along and barbecue for the children." Mag nodded smilingly.
“当然是塞班酒馆，那天就喝了一点点，还没有细细品味，这两天想的心里直痒痒。”弗格斯毫不犹豫的向着塞班酒馆走去。

"Saipan Tavern, of course. We only tasted a teeny bit that day and we didn't get to sample it closely. I've been craving it for the past two days." Fergus headed straight for Saipan Tavern without any hesitation.
“当然，当你用完这个酒窖里的酒时，希望你已经能够将你酿的泰坦酒装桶再次放入酒窖之中。”麦格看着有点出神的埃菲说道。
"Of course, I hope you could already fill this cellar with the Titan Liquor that you brewed after the Titan Liquor in this cellar is finished." Mag said to Eiffie, who was a little out of sorts.
“当真？！”酒馆老板一惊，看着小二问道。
The tavern's boss was taken aback and asked the waiter again, "Are you sure?!"
“当诺兰大陆各族放下成见，决定先联手对付魔鬼时，他需要的是实力足够强大，数量足够充足的帮手。”麦格看着下方密密麻麻的尸坑，神情有些复杂道：“这些尸体将组成一支强大的亡灵军队，随他征战诺兰大陆。”

"When all the races on the Norland Continent decided to put aside the differences and join forces to deal with the devil, Josh will need to have stronger power and more helpers." Mag looked at the densely packed corpses' pits below and said with a complicated expression, "These corpses will a mighty undead army and follow him around to conquer the Norland Continent."
“很奇特的是，我在这里面闻到了酒香，他们竟然用酒来烹饪食物。”
"The unique thing is, I smelled alcohol's aroma in it. They actually used alochol to cook."
“很好，我喜欢。不过，我们要怎么做？”
"It's great. I like it. But, what do we do?"
“很好，继续保持！”
"Excellent, maintain this!"
“很好，这么多年了，终于给老子玩出了一点不一样的花样，我倒要看看，你究竟想要什么。”御书房的门缓缓关闭，安德烈的脸上却露出了一丝意味难明的冷笑。
"Very well. After so many years, you're finally coming up with something different. I do want to see what exactly you want to do." The door to the Royal Study closed slowly, and Andre sneered.
“很少有人这样称赞我。”麦格由衷道。
"Very few people praise me like that," Mag said sincerely.
“很抱歉，对面就有一个。”埃菲在心里叹了口气，她可不就已经被拒绝了一次了吗。
I'm sorry. There's one right opposite. Eiffie sighed inwardly. Hadn't she been rejected more than once?
“得到了一个什么？”麦格笑着问道。
"What did you receive?" Mag asked smilingly.
“微臣……也不知乔修殿下现在身在何处。”理查德声音有些颤抖。
"I… have no idea where Prince Josh is right now." Richard's voice quivered.
“德克·布鲁斯特，艾略特手下第一管家，命令的绝对执行者，染着许多精灵鲜血的刽子手，今日我宣判你死罪，当场诛杀。”没等德克再说什么，伊琳娜拿出了一个黑色的本子，大声宣布道。

Before Dirk could say anything else, Irina took out a little black notebook and loudly declared, "Dirk Brewster. The number one butler under Elliot. The absolute executor of his orders. The executioner tainted with the blood of many elves. Today, I declared the death sentence on you. You will be killed right on the spot."
“忘了定闹钟吗？”麦格侧头看了一眼床头的闹钟，没想到已经是早上九点钟，不禁惊讶道：“这么晚了？！”

"Did I forget to set the alarm clock?" Mag turned to look at the alarm clock on the bedside table. He didn't expect that it was already nine in the morning. He couldn't help exclaiming, "It's already so late?!"
“怎……怎么会呢，我一定会拼尽全力守护森林，一步也不敢后退。”艾略特的额头上全是冷汗，低着脑袋不敢看海伦娜。

"H-how is that possible? I would've done my best to protect the forest, and would've never taken a step back." Elliot's forehead was filled with perspiration, and he lowered his head, afraid to look at Helena.
“怎么了，有什么事吗？”麦格微笑着起身问道。
Mag got up and smilingly asked, "What's up? What's the matter?"
“怎么了？发生了什么事吗？”餐厅中金光一闪，刚刚回到餐厅的伊琳娜看着面色有些沉重的麦格问道。
A golden light flashed in the restaurant, and Irina, who just returned, looked at Mag's grave expression, and asked, "What's the matter? Did something happen?"
“怎么会有如此多珍贵的食材！”系统有些惊了。
"Why are there so many rare ingredients!" The System was stunned.
“怎么会这样！快来人！有刺客！抓刺客啊！”
'What happened!? Help! There's an assassin! Catch the assassin!"
“怎么会，孩子们喜欢就好。”
"It's fine as long as the children like it."
“怎么可以这么好吃！”
How can it be so good?!
“怎么可以这么难吃！”
"How can it taste so horrible!"
“怎么可能，小朋友是不能喝酒的。”麦格连忙摆手。
"How's that possible? Children can't drink." Mag quickly waved his hands.
“怎么样，好吃吗？”艾米满是期待的问道。
"How is it? Is it tasty?" Amy asked with a hopeful look on her face.
“怎么样？”亚伯罕笑着道。
"Try it, it tastes rather similar," Abraham said with a smile.
“怎么样？”麦格看着梅兰特问道。
"How is it?" Mag asked.
“怎么样？冰镇过的绿豆糕，味道如何？”麦格笑着问道。
"How is it? How's the taste of the chilled mung bean pastry?" Mag asked with a smile.
“怎么还是一点创意都没有……”麦格看着那一个个围着不少人的游戏摊位，嘴上虽然嫌弃，却有了几分熟悉的感觉。
"Why aren't there any new innovations…" Mag looked at all the crowded game stalls, and even though he sounded disdainful, he felt a sense of familiarity.
“怎么这么高兴？”弗格斯笑问。
Fergus smilingly asked, "Why are you so happy?"
“怎么，女王也会害羞吗？”麦格上前半步，两人的身体几乎贴在一起，带着几分调笑道。
Mag took half a step forward and their bodies almost touched each other as he teasingly said, "Why? Does a queen feel shy too?"
“怎么，老夫老妻的，晚上没有点什么事还不能来找你了？”伊琳娜笑吟吟的问道，侧身的时候，轻薄的纱裙向下滑了一点。
"Why? We're husband and wife. Can't I come look for you at night even if I don't have any issues?" Irina asked with a smile. Her thin gauze dress slided down a little when she leaned to her side.
“怎么，还有点舍不得？”伊琳娜似笑非笑的看着麦格。
"Why, miss her?" Irina looked at Mag with a seeming smile.
“怎么？想吃宵夜了吗？”麦格笑着说道，他本以为他们已经睡着了。
"Why? Do you want to eat supper?" Mag asked with a smile. He thought they had gone to sleep.
“怎样？”麦格用筷子尝了一下自己的蘸碟，满意的点了点头。
"Like what?" Mag dipped his chopsticks in the dipping sauce and tried it. He nodded with satisfaction.
“怕了？”
"Afraid?"
“总编！混乱之城的经销商要求我们加印十万册！”一位编辑兴冲冲的闯进加兰的办公室，声音都有些发颤道。
"Chief! Chaos City's distributor requested for another 100,000 prints!" an editor rushed into Garlan's office as he said with a shaky voice.
“恐怖猎手，你违反了地下世界第一守则，违规来到诺兰大陆，现在将你的灵魂缉拿归案，将送回地下城进行审判！”晞冷漠的宣判，然后将水晶球收起。

"Horror Hunter, you have violated the first rule of Underground City. You came to the Norland Continent against the rules. I'm now arresting your soul and sending it back to the Underground City for judgement!" Xi declared coldly before keeping the crystal ball away.
“恭喜。”
"Congratulations."
“恭喜宿主创造出第一道无菜谱美食，获得新成就：凭空想象复制者！”
"Congratulations to the Host for creating your first dish without a recipe. You unlocked a new achievement: Imaginary Replicator!
“恭喜宿主获得奖励：面食经验包！”
"Congratulations on receiving the reward: cooked wheaten foods' experience bag!
“恭喜宿主获得物品：神秘擀面杖一根。”
"Congratulations on receiving an item: one mysterious rolling pin."
“恭喜宿主获得能力：精神控制！”
"Congratulations on receiving the power: mind control!
“恭喜宿主，踏出餐厅扩张第一步！”
"Congratulations for taking the first step to expand the restaurant, Host!"
“恭喜小主完成新手任务，获得新手礼包一份，请注意查收！”
"Congratulations on completing the novice assignment, Little Mistress. You have received one novice's gift package. Please accept your gifts!"
“恭喜小主完成购买早餐任务！获得一次大转盘机会！请小主自行前往领取。”系统的声音在艾米的脑海中响起。
"Congratulations on completing your breakfast-buying mission! You have won a chance to spin the big wheel! Please proceed to claim your prize," the System's voice rang in Amy's head.
“恭喜泰坦酒馆和塞班酒馆，现在有请两位酒馆老板上台领取金奖奖杯。”主持人说道。
"Congratulations to both Titan Tavern and Saipan Tavern. Could the owners please come up to the stage to receive your gold award's trophy." The emcee announced.
“恭喜老板的茅台酒大获成功，不过恕在下孤陋寡闻，还不知道塞班酒馆开在哪里，也想过两日亲自去品尝一下这美酒。”麦德勋也不气馁，继续笑呵呵道。

Madison wasn't discouraged and continued to laughingly say, "Congratulations to Boss for the success of your Maotai. However, please forgive me for my ignorance. I don't know where is Saipan Tavern located? I would like to go and try this exquisite liquor personally two days later."
“恭喜获得‘笑话大王’一本，获得‘属性鉴定’技能。”
"Congratulations on receiving a copy of 'The King of Jokes.' You have received the ability of 'Attribute Identification.'"
“恭喜鲍里斯先生，看来今年金奖有望啊。”
"Congratulations, Mr. Boris. Looks like you have a high chance of winning this year."
“恭喜，哈迪斯先生的茅台果然不同凡响。”埃菲侧头看着麦格，笑容真挚的说道。
Eiffie turned to Mag and said with a sincere smile, "Congratulations. Mr. Hades' Maotai is indeed exceptional."
“恭喜，相信你父亲知道这个消息，也会感到欣慰的。”麦格看着她轻声说道。
"Congratulations. I believe your father would be glad to knwo this," Mag told her gently.
“悟了悟了。”麦格点点头，小粉丝嘛，挺好的。
"I got it. I got it." Mag nodded. She was his fan. That was nice.
“您吃的满意吗？”卡诺有点紧张的看着希利问道。
"Are you satisfied with your dinner?" Canault asked Seely nervously.
