“您好，认识一下，我是卡莎酒馆的老板麦德勋。”隔壁的胖子老板满脸堆笑的和麦格说道。
"Hello. Let's get to know each other. I'm the boss of Casa Tavern, Madison." The fatty boss sitting next to Mag said to him smilingy.
“您好，请问您是？”工作人员上前，有些警惕的看着麦格问道，目光打量了一会他身边的烤箱和大箱子。
"Hello, may I ask who you are?" a staff member who came up asked Mag warily, sizing up the grills and the big crate next to him.
“您尝尝，这些都是麦米餐厅非常受欢迎的菜。”卡诺满是尊敬的看着希利，作为一名教廷的边缘人士，能够与大主教同桌共进晚餐的机会可不多。

"Please try them. They are very popular dishes in Mamy Restaurant." Canault looked at Seely respectfully. As part of the marginalized personnel of the Holy See, he usually didn't have many chances to dine together with an archbishop.
“您应该考虑的是一会喝醉了要怎么回去呢。”艾米微笑着说道。
"What you should consider is how to return home after you get drunk later." Amy replied with a smile.
“您是说她是伪装的？”诺亚想了想，又是有些恍然道：“也对哦，麦老板是亚历克斯大人，那他的夫人，也只能是伊琳娜公主了。”
"You mean she was in disguise?" Noah thought for a while. After that, he had an epiphany, and said, "That's true. Boss Mag is Master Alex, so his wife must be Princess Irina.
“您老就消消气吧，昨天那奥尔登可是前车之鉴，这老板不好惹。”同来的官员笑着道。
"Calm down. What happened to Aulden yesterday is a warning. The owner here isn't to be trifled with," an official who came over with him said with a smile.
“您觉得不是兽人族做的吗？”迪克斯有点意外迈克尔的反应，这件事最有动机和行动力去做的，应该就是兽人族才对，而奥斯特也是自己承认了这一点。
"You don't think that the orcs have done it?" Dicus was surprised with Michael's reaction. The orcs had the most motivation and ability to do this, and Auster had admitted to it himself.
“您请。”波比双手捧着酒杯轻轻放在了卢西恩的面前。
"Please." Bobby placed the glass gently in front of Lucien with both hands.
“您请自便。”埃菲微笑道。
"Do as you please," Eiffie said witha smile.
“情况虽然有些复杂，不过这个傻大个为了感谢我制止了他的自残冲动，还是透露了一些信息。”
"The situation might be a little complicated but this giant fool even revealed some information to me to thank me for stopping his self-mutilation."
“想不通……想不通……”一旁梅兰特也是刚好放下勺子，一脸不解。
"Don't understand… Don't understand…" Merante, who had also just placed his spoon down, was puzzled.
“想学啊？”麦格笑了。
"You want to learn it?" Mag smiled.
“想跑？”艾米一巴掌把它按住。
"Trying to escape?" Amy pressed it down with her palm.
“惹不起，咱们就喝酒嘛，听说这里的酒还真不错。”那老大人也不纠结，笑着道。
"Not to be trifled with. We're just here for the drinks. I heard that the wine here is really good," the old courtier said with a smile.
“愚昧，无知。”希利沉闷的憋出了两个词。
"Foolish. Ignorant." Seely blurted out two words solemnly.
“感谢您的救命之恩，和这段时间的款待。”梅兰特端起酒杯，一脸郑重的看着麦格说道。
Merante picked up his glass, and solemnly said to Mag, "Thank you for saving us and for your hospitality."
“慢走，不送。”麦格将最后一位醉醺醺的客人搀出酒馆，交给他的车夫，顺手关上了酒馆大门。
"Goodbye, I will not see you off." Mag helped the last drunk customer out of the tavern, handed him over to his coachman, and closed the door of the tavern behind him.
“懂，就是兄弟比老婆重要嘛，天天下班就和兄弟去喝酒。”伊琳娜翻了个白眼，斜眼看着麦格，带着几分杀气道：“你要是敢这样，我不介意丧偶。”

"Got it. Brothers are more important than your wives. The most important thing after work is to go drinking with your brothers." Irina rolled her eyes. She glanced at Mag, and said murderously, "If you dare to do that, I don't mind being a widow."
“成了！”埃菲的脸上露出了喜色。
"Success!" Eiffie was elated.
“成了！哈哈哈！”
"It's working! Hahaha!"
“成功了！小姐成功了！”刚刚走进酿酒坊的玛拉也是惊喜道。
"It's a success! Young Mistress, it's a success!" Mala, who just walked into the brewery, exclaimed.
“成功把你卖给哈迪斯了。”埃菲撇嘴。
"I have successfully sold you to Hades." Eiffie pursed her lips.
“我……”简犹豫了一会，还是没有说话。
"I…" Jane hesitated for a moment, but she didn't say anything in the end.
“我……”诺亚一时间竟是无言以对。
"I…" Noah was actually lost for words at that moment.
“我……”诺亚张了张嘴，露出了一脸苦涩的笑容，听听，这说的是人话吗？
"I…" Noah opened his mouth, and revealed a bitter smile. Listen to that. Is he for real?
“我……”那精灵一愣，表情有点害怕。
"I..." That elf was taken aback with a terrified expression.
“我……”那精灵面色一变，不过很快又道：“可他们往南边去了，要追的话，不是应该往南边去吗？”
"Me..." That elf went white, but he quickly asked, "But they have gone southwards. Shouldn't we go to the south if we want to pursue them?"
“我……小姐我先去买菜了。”玛拉转身就走。
"I... Young Mistress, I am going to buy some groceries." Mala turned to leave.
“我……就是随便问问。”
"I… am just asking casually."
“我……我……”小丫鬟认真思考了一会，“要是那老板要的话，奴婢还是愿意牺牲一下的。”
"I-I…" The little maid thought seriously for a moment. "If that boss wants me, I'm willing to sacrifice myself."
“我……我也来点？”诺亚小声道，伸手想去拿酒瓶。
"C-can I have some too?" Noah said softly as he reached out for the bottle.
“我……我们……要不要……再来两瓶？”库尔特一手撑着桌子，眯着眼睛看着对面问道。
Kurt pressed one hand against the table and said with narrowed eyes, "Sh-shall we or-order another two bottles?"
“我……我没事……”梅兰特伸手按住了诺亚的手，气息有些不足道。
Merante reached out to hold Noya's hand as he said breathlessly, "I… I'm fine…"
“我……我给你们做早餐啊。”艾米回头看着麦格，挂着两道黑色炭迹的脸上，露出了干净的笑容，眼睛弯弯的，煞是可爱。
"I-I am making breakfast for you guys." Amy turned around to look at Mag. She had two black charcoal traces on her face as she revealed a pure smile with crescent eyes. She looked superbly adorable.
“我……我还在学习。”埃菲强调道。
"I... I'm still learning," Eiffie emphasised.
“我……我那不是迷路，只是偶偶找不着北而已……师父你看，今天的月亮好圆啊，不知道芭芭拉有没有回月亮啊，再让她给我带点月亮石好了。”

"I...I'm not lost. I just occasionally couldn't find my way...Look, Master. The moon is so bright tonight. I wonder did Babla go back to the moon. It'll be great if she can bring back some more moon stones to me."
“我……明明……明明放了火的。”麦格啐了一口唾沫。
"I... did... did light them on fire." Mag spat.
“我……没……”鲍里斯想哭了。
"I...didn't..." Boris felt like crying.
“我一直觉得你像你的母亲，就连做萝卜条的手艺都得到了传承，非常好吃，是当初的味道。”帕萨卡放下筷子，向埃菲竖起了大拇指。

"I always feel that you resemble your mother. You even inherited her skills at making the preserved radish strips. It's very delicious and taste just like before." Pasaca put down his chopsticks and gave Eiffie a thumbs up.
“我下次会离他远一点的。”麦格点点头。
"I will stay away from him in the future." Mag nodded.
“我不同意！洛斯帝国杀了我们那么多族人，屠戮了我们那么多部落，我们要是加入和平联盟，难道就不为他们报仇了吗？这样的奇耻大辱，你们咽的下去，我咽不下去！”

"I refuse! The Roth Empire has killed so many of our people, and massacred so many of our tribes. If we were to join the Peace Alliance, are we not taking revenge for them anymore? I won't be able to take such humiliation lying down even if you can!"
“我不女装。”麦格连忙摆手。
"I don't crossdress." Mag quickly waved his hands.
“我不怕累，我就是喜欢跟您做事，有牌面。”诺亚嘿嘿一笑，以后说出去也是倍有面子的事情啊。
"I'm not afraid of tiredness. I like to work with you. I feel proud." Noah chuckled. It would be a very proud affair to tell people in the future.
“我不是商人，我是一个厨师，只是偶偶会投资一点被严重低估的产业。”麦格一脸坦然道。
"I am not a businessman. I am a chef. I just invest in some assets that had been heavily underrated." Mag said.
“我不知道。”麦格也放下了剑，“但我应该知道一些你所不知道的消息。”
"I don't know." Mag also put down his sword, "but I should know some information that you don't know."
“我不要。”诺亚欲哭无泪的拒绝。
"I don't want it." Noah rejected it with exasperation.
“我之前听闻品酒大会只设一个金奖。”麦格微微点头，然后转身向着厨房走去。
"I heard that the liquor tasting event only has one gold award." Mag nodded slightly before walking to the kitchen.
“我之前得到了一个面具，带上之后可以模仿任何人的样子。”麦格解释道。
"I got my hands on a mask previously. After wearing it, I can change my face to become anyone," Mag explained.
“我也去！我也去！”艾米连忙举起小手，积极参与。
"I'm going too! I'm going too!" Amy quickly put up her hand and took part with enthusiasm.
“我也听到了，而且我还听到利尔大人叫了一声乔修殿下。”
"I did too. On top of that, I even heard Lord Lear call him Prince Josh."
“我也很开心。”麦格同样笑着说道。
"I'm happy too," Mag said, likewise with a smile.
“我也得好好补补。”麦格深以为然的点头。
"I deserved some nourishment too." Mag nodded in agreement.
“我也是10分！泰坦酒和马库斯值得。”弗格斯拿起了号牌。
"10 points from me too! Titan Liquor and Marcus are worth it." Fergus lifted his sign.
“我也是听说的，他肯定是带着酒来的，一会酒上了桌，自然就知道了。”
"I heard about it too. He must have came with his liquors. We'll naturally know when the liquors are served later."
“我也是昨晚偶然转到那里，闻到酒香才进了那家酒馆，的确是难得一见的美酒。”波比说道。
"I also went there by chance last night, and entered the tavern because of the fragrance of the wine. It was indeed a good wine that is hard to come by," Bobby said.
“我也是这样想的。”麦格欣赏的看着伊琳娜，不愧是他老婆，这都能和他想到一块去。
"That's what I think too." Mag looked at Irina. She's his wife indeed. They even had the same ideas.
“我也相信会是这样的。”麦格把那一大叠房契整理好，放入一旁的箱子里。
"I believe so too." Mag tidied up that big stack of title deeds, and placed them in the box at the side.
“我也要试试。”艾米凑上前，张嘴在灌汤包上咬了一个小口，然后把嘴巴贴上去，小口小口的吸溜着汤汁。
"I want to give it a try too." Amy went up and bit into the soup dumpling. After that, she put her mouth to the dumpling and took small sips of the soup.
“我也赞同，兽人族内部分裂成两派，现在和平派实力比我们更强了，只凭我们，恐怕连矮人族和地精族都打不过，拿什么和洛斯帝国打？”很快便有一位酋长出来附和道。

"I agree too. The orcs are currently split into two groups. The pro-peace group is stronger than us now. We might not be able to defeat the dwarves and goblins. What do we have to fight with the Roth Empire?" another chief quickly chimed in.
“我今天早上已经把图纸给了三位老铁匠，三天内应该就能出成品，到时候还要劳烦哈迪斯先生帮忙组装呢。”埃菲看着麦格说道。

Eiffie said to Mag, "I have passed the blueprint to three old blacksmiths this morning. The end products should be ready in three days time. I will have to bother Mr. Hades to help me assemble them then."
“我今日不喝茅台，我要试试这所谓的威士忌是什么滋味。”卢西恩拒绝了波比给他倒酒，而是拿起了桌上那瓶威士忌。
"I'm not drinking Maotai, either. I want to try the taste of this whiskey." Lucien declined Bobby's drink, and instead picked up the bottle of whiskey on the table.
“我他妈……”鲍里斯当场就哭了。
"Damned..." Boris broke out into tears right on the spot.
“我们一直在追踪黑魔气，一路跟到了大皇子府邸，结果我们才刚刚翻墙进去，还没来得及查探，就被埋伏了。

"We had been tracing the evil aura, and traced it all the way to the first prince's mansion. In the end, we were ambushed just after we climbed over the wall. We did not even have the time to investigate anything.
“我们也来帮忙吧，有什么需要我们帮忙的，您尽管说。”先前那位中年工作人员带着几位女性工作人员上前来，看着麦格说道。
The middle-aged staff member brought a few female staff members over, and said to Mag, "Let us help too. Feel free to tell us what you need."
“我们似乎做了一件足以记入史册的事情。”
"We seemed to have done something enough to be put in the books of history."
“我们刚刚准备睡觉，听到了这边不同寻常的声音，所以就过来看看。
"We were about to go to sleep when we heard something strange here so we've decided to come over to take a look.
“我们刚刚到厨房，有位好心的胖叔叔，已经把他们好吃的东西全部给我们吃过一遍了。”艾米往嘴里塞了一个油炸小丸子，摇摇头道：“所以我们可以回家吃。”
"We went to the kitchen earlier and a kind fat uncle had already let us eat all their best food." Amy popped one little fried ball in her mouth and shake her head. "So, we can go home for our meals?"
“我们去的话，坏蛋是挺危险的。”艾米点点头道。
"It's really dangerous for the bad guys if we go there." Amy nodded and said.
“我们吃过早餐了，昨天晚上你还剩下不少绿豆糕，冰箱里也有牛奶。”艾米摸了摸肚子：“不过现在又饿了呢。”
"We already had breakfast. You left quite a bit of mung bean cake from last night, and there is milk in the fridge." Amy patted her tummy. "But, I am hungry again."
“我们已经做了该做的事情，现在的局势已经不是我们能够左右的，只能看各族博弈最后能够得到怎样的结果，至少目前的局势和前景都不是最糟糕的。”伊恩微笑着说道。

"We have done what we should. The situation now is not what we can control. We have to see what comes out of the fight among the races. At least the situation and outlook currently are not the worst," Ian said with a smile.
“我们应该庆幸哈迪斯先生带来的是茅台，不然我们在台上打自己脸的样子实在不太好看。”弗格斯笑着道。
"We should be be glad that Mr. Hades brought Maotai, otherwise it won't look when we contradict ourselves on stage." Fergus chuckled.
“我们应该把乔的尸体收回来，他是那样善良。当年要不是为了救战友，他的腿也不会断，更不应该在这里采一百年的花露，最后还被自己的族人吊死在栏杆上。”

"We should take Joe's body back. He was so kind. If not to save his comrade back then, he would not have broken his leg and would not have been picking dew here for a century and end up being hung dead on the pole by his own people."
“我们必须马上离开了，等到他真正对我们出手的时候，就无法离开了。”梅兰特用鬼刀斩杀了几个隐身出现在他们身后的古尸，沉声道。

Merante used his ghost sabre to slash the ancient corpses that appeared behind them stealthily and said in a low voice, "We have to leave right now. We won't be able to leave if he really starts to attack us."
“我们早上不会真的要吃这个吧？”伊琳娜小声在麦格耳边道。
"Are we really going to eat this early in the morning?" Irina whispered at Mag's ear.
“我们是邻居啊，就住在对面，这大半夜的哐哐哐响，我们就来看看，埃菲小姐是请了施工队来换门和清理地窖吗？”麦格笑呵呵道。

"We are the neighbors. We lived right across the street. We came to check because there is knocking sounds in the middle of the night. Did Miss Eiffie get the construction team to change the door and clean up the cellar?" Mag answered with a chuckle.
“我们最好退后一些，趁这个机会绕过飓风。”梅兰特并未表现的太过乐观，而是和紫纹狮鹫说道。
Merante didn't behave too optimisitc, instead he said to the purple-striped griffin, "We'd better back up a little and take this chance to go through the hurricanes."
“我们有租赁中介业务的，如果是哈迪斯先生的话，我还可以给您打了个折，只收5个点的年租金作为中介费用。”费奇点头。
"We do provide renting services. If you wish, I can give you a discount. I will only take the annual rental fees of five location as the agent fees." Fitch nodded.
“我们没有强者留守，无法抵抗他们的铁骑……”一位负伤的兽人酋长小声道。
"We did not have powerhouses to guard the place, so we were unable to resist their cavalry…" an injured orc chief said softly.
“我们现在要去一趟霍克部落。”雷克斯看着康妮说道。
"We need to go to the Hulk Tribe now," Rex told Connie.
“我们的勇敢的佣兵，完成了什么任务呢？”一道沙哑的声音从空洞后方传来。
"Brave mercenary. What mission have you completed?" came a hoarse voice from behind the wall.
“我们自由了！”
"We're free!"
“我们要从这里离开，地势不利于我们。”伊琳娜扬起法师杖，声光照耀，扑到面前的古尸顿时灰飞烟灭。
"We need to leave here. The terrain is disadvantageous to us." Irina raised her magic caster's staff and the Holy Light burst out. The ancient corpses that rushed towards them were decimated.
“我们要复仇！”
"We want revenge!"
“我们要科学酿酒，凭经验来这种想法已经落伍了，只有按照科学的方法酿酒，保证每一个步骤的规范性，我们才能保证每一瓶出厂的酒都有着同样优秀的品质，这就是所谓的品控。这些天我已经研究出了三套不同口感的朗姆酒的酿造配方……”刚走到酿造车间门外，麦格便听到了汉娜的声音从里边传来。

"We need to brew alcohol scientifically. It's already outdated to brew alcohol based on experience. Only by brewing according to the scientific methods can we ensure that every single step is standardized, and every bottle that leaves the brewery is equally excellent. This is the so-called quality control. I have already come up with three different formulae for three types of rum with different textures…" Mag heard Hannah's voice as soon as he reached the brewery's workshop.
“我们起了个头，这场戏就自己唱下去了，效果倒是比我们预想的还要更好一些。”伊琳娜看着麦格手里的信，也是微笑着说道。
Irina looked at the letter in Mag's hands with a smile, and said, "We simply start the ball rolling, and it just continues to roll by itself. Its effect is much better than what we have anticipated."
“我们运气不错，跑了出来。”麦格丢了两个水壶给他们，“不过运气也不太好，克苏鲁控制了冰原上的古尸，实力暴增，随时可能南下入侵，我们得在他行动之前建立起一个阻击联盟。”

"Our luck is not bad. We escaped." Mag tossed two water bottles to them. "But it isn't too good either. Cthulhu has controlled the ancient corpses in the snow field. Its power has growed exponentially. They may invade the south at any time. We have to establish a resistance alliance before it acts."
“我们这里的孩子三餐都有供应，现在孩子们也都吃过午餐了，感谢您的好意，但这不符合福利院的规矩，您请回吧。”那位中年妇女工作人员表情坚决的拒绝道，没有半点商量的意思。

"Our children are provided with three meals a day, and they already had their lunch. Thank you for your kindness, but this is against the orphanage's rules. Please return." The middle-aged female staff member rejected Mag firmly, leaving no room for negotiation.
“我会在混乱之城住一段时间，神女事关重大，我们必须要把她带回教廷。”希利沉声道。
"I will stay in Chaos City for a while. The holy maiden's matter is important. We've got to bring her back to the Holy See," Seely said in a low voice.
“我会对该事件作出评估，并作出处理。”晞收起了绘本，并未立即对此表达态度，转而道：“不过，现在我们可以来谈谈两天前的地动了，想必那也是你引起的。”

"I will evaluate this matter and then process it." Xi kept that picture book. She didn't reveal her attitude towards this matter, instead she said, "But we can discuss about the earthquake two days ago. I've bet you caused it too."
“我会抹去他们的记忆。”晞看着麦格说道，然后目光落到了伊琳娜的身上。
"I will erase their memories." Xi said to Mag, then her gaze landed on Irina.
“我倒要看看他担心没有多余的金奖可领的威士忌，究竟是怎样的酒。”弗格斯取过那瓶威士忌，拔开了塞子，然后倒入两个杯子中。
"I want to see what the whiskey he's worried about not having an extra gold award to give to, is like." Fergus took that bottle of whiskey, pulled out the cork and poured it into two glasses.
“我出门一趟，去拿封信。”麦格和伊琳娜说了一声，便出门去了。
"I need to run an errant. I'm going to get a letter," Mag informed Irina before going out.
“我刚刚在她的飞船上装了一个追踪器。”系统答复道。
"I just attached a tracking device on her spaceship," the System replied.
“我刚刚看到那边有个军营，你去弄一头铁背鹰来，咱们继续巡查，现在目标方向有了，扫描面积还扩大了那么多，这是百年难得一遇的机会。”梅兰特却是一脸兴奋，一夜没睡也丝毫没有疲惫的样子。

"I saw a military camp over there earlier. Go get us a steel eagle, and we will continue the search. Now that we have a direction, and the detection range is greatly expanded, this is a rare opportunity for us." Merante looked excited. He didn't look tired even after not sleeping for the night.
“我到了，就不跟您聊了，再见埃菲小姐。”麦格微笑着点头，然后转身进了自家酒馆。
"I'm home. I will not chat further with you. Goodbye, Miss Eiffie." Miss nodded with a smile before walking into his tavern.
“我前些年请魔法师帮忙加了这道屏障，防贼，遇到突发状况也可以作为临时避难所。”埃菲解释道。
"I got a magic caster to add this screen a few years ago to prevent theft and this cellar could act as a temporary refuge in case of emergency too." Eiffie explained.
“我劝你们黄金巨龙族还是不要对她有什么奢望，伊丽莎白是冰霜巨龙族。”道格拉斯神情冰冷的看着路易斯。
"I think you Golden Dragons should not have any hopes for her. Elizabeth is a Frost Dragon." Douglas glared at Louis.
“我去取酒。”麦格感觉到气氛不太对劲，准备开溜。
"I'll get my wine." Mag could sense the atmosphere and was ready to scoot.
“我去叫孩子们。”麦格笑着转身带上门。
"I'll get the kids." Mag smiled and closed the door behind him.
“我去开门。”
"I'll open the door."
“我去开门！”艾米跳下椅子，蹦跳着向着门口跑去。
"I'll go get the door!" Amy leaped off her chair and skipped to the door.
“我去拿。”艾米转身蹬蹬蹬跑上楼，不一会就抱着一本画册下来。
"I'll go take it." Amy ran upstairs, and came down with a picture book in a short while.
“我去给您烧洗澡水。”玛拉答应道。
"I'll boil some water for you," Mala replied.
“我只是一个卖酒的，听不懂你在说什么。”麦格尽量平静的说道。
"I'm just a liquor seller. I don't understand what you are talking about." Mag tried to say as calmly as possible.
“我只是一个自由撰稿人啊，每次让我去公干，这样真的好吗？”
"I am just a freelance writer, are you sure it's appropriate for me to keep going on business trips?"
“我只是为孩子们做了一点小事而已。”麦格把东西放在一旁，看着露娜微笑着摇头，顿了顿，又道：“最近局势有些乱，露娜老师要回洛都吗？”

"I'm only doing some small things for the children." Mag placed the things at the side, and shook his head at Luna with a smile. He paused, and then continued, "The recent situation is rather chaotic. Is Teacher Luna going to return to Rodu?"
“我只能算是一位参与者，那并不是一两个人就能完成的事情。”麦格摇头，神态诚恳道：“我是麦格·亚历克斯，一位骑士，我不知道古老者是什么样的存在，但如果你们同样将那些本封印的邪恶存在视为敌人，那在这方面，我们可以是朋友。”

"I can only be considered as a participant. That wasn't something that could be done by one person." Mag shook his head and sincerely said, "I am Mag Alex, a knight. I don't know what kind of existence the Elder Things are, but we can be friends if you guys also deemd those evil existences that should be sealed as enemies."
“我可以卖萌招呼客人哦。”艾米吹着麦格刚给她烫好的毛肚，嘟着小嘴卖了个萌。
"I can entertain the guests with my cuteness." Amy blew on the tripe that Mag had cooked for her as she pouted cutely.
“我可以尝一个吗？”只有艾米满是期待的看着麦格。
"Can I try one, please?" Only Amy looked at Mag with anticipation.
“我可以帮忙收拾。”从不干活的伊琳娜起身，端着自己的碗向厨房走去。
"I can help you clean up." Irina, who never did any work, got up and walked to the kitchen with her bowl.
“我可以负责上菜。”安妮用手比划着说道。
"I can serve the dishes." Annie signed.
“我吃过这位叔叔做的菜，超好吃的！”
"I've eaten this uncle's food before. It's super delicious!"
“我听前辈说啊，这命令不是陛下直接下的，是二皇子殿下以陛下的名义下的，也不知道他用什么法子瞒了所有人，再后来陛下回到洛都，就派兵把兵部围了，把前辈和兵部的几位大臣都给抓了，兵部上下都被审查了一遍……

"I heard my senior say that it was not the king who gave the orders. It was the second prince who did it in the king's name. I have no idea what he did to trick everyone. After that, the king came back to Rodu, sent troops to surround the military, and arrested all the generals. Everyone in the military had to be questioned…
“我听说你们洛斯帝国刚刚偷袭了我们兽人族，而且还屠杀了许多部落，这是真的吗？”那兽人又问道，神色间明显有了几分敌意。
"I heard that your Roth Empire has just launched a sneak attack on us orcs, and massacred many tribes. Is it true?" that orc asked again. His expression was obviously becoming a little more hostile.
“我听说啊，这家酒馆可能是亚伯罕公爵大人开的，这些大人醉翁之意不在酒啊。”
"I heard that this tavern might've been opened by Duke Abraham. These courtiers aren't here for the wine."
“我听说安妮喜欢画画，我也收藏了一些画本，就想着拿来看看安妮喜不喜欢。”
"I heard that Annie likes drawing. I've also collected a few picture books so I brought them over to see if Annie would like them."
“我听说我这条命在黑市上值一百万铜币，哈迪斯先生救了我，这笔钱，就当做是我的答谢礼吧。”
"I heard that my life is worth a million copper coins in the black market. Mr. Hades, you saved me. Take this sum of money as my thank-you gift to you."
“我听说昨天的品酒大会上，你拿出了你父亲窖藏了三十年的泰坦酒，而且还能每日供应一定的数量，所以今天过来看看。”

"I heard that you brought the 30-year-old Titan Liquor that your father kept in the cellar to the liquor tasting event yesterday and promised to supply a certain quantity of it every day, so I came to take a look."
“我听说杂志今天上市，但没想到会是这样的方式。”麦格摊手，他要是知情的话，倒是不介意给编辑部寄一张帅气英俊的全身照，这样才能吸引到更多的女粉丝啊！

"I heard that the magazine would be released today, but I didn't know it would be released like this." Mag shrugged. If he had known, he wouldn't have minded sending the editorial department a good-looking full-length picture of him so that he could attract more female fans!
“我听说，昨天客人增加了不少？”伊琳娜笑吟吟的看着麦格问道。
Irina looked at Mag and smilingly asked, "I heard that there was an increase in the number of customers yesterday?"
“我和她打，有几成胜算？”
"What's the odds of me winning?"
“我和安娜也可以去冰激凌店帮忙。”雪莉尔说道。
"Anna and I can go help out at the ice cream shop too," Shirley said.
“我在他的身上留下了定位追踪器，能够确定他的位置。”晞抬手升起了一个虚拟屏，一个红点正在快速移动中。
"I have placed a tracking device on it. I can locate its position." Xi raised up a virtual screen and a red dot was moving quickly.
“我在这里，你不要……”埃菲跳出了地窖，大声叫道。
"I'm here, don't you..." Eiffie jumped out of the cellar and shouted loudly.
“我太惨了。”温妮莎叹了口气，目光忧郁的望着车窗外，冷冷的风在脸上拍。
"My life sucks." Vanessa sighed and looked out of the window with a wistful gaze. Cold wind blew against her face.
“我套了五十个圈都没有套中一个，小姑娘口气可真不小，三十个圈子就想套三十只大肥鹅呢。”先前套圈那男人也是笑了。

"I didn't even get one goose with 50 rings. This little girl is quite boastful. She wants to catch 30 big, fat geese with just 30 rings." The man who was trying to ring the geese earlier was also laughing.
“我好像听到布卢姆大人最后好像叫了一声乔修……”
"I think I heard Lord Blum call out 'Josh'…"
“我将从你们当中选拔组建一支精锐的暗夜精灵精锐部队，我希望能够给海伦娜的是一记重拳，但不希望你们会因此受到不必要的伤亡。
"I would choose from among you to form an elite team. I hope that you can deal Helena with a heavy blow, but I do not wish for any unnecessary death or injury because of that.
“我尝尝就知道了。”艾米张嘴啊呜一口咬在了奖杯上，在杯口上留下了两排整齐的小牙印。
"I'll know once I tasted it." Amy bit the trophy, leaving two neat rows of little teeth marks on the edge of it.
“我就前些天受了点账回来，没多少。”
"I just collected some payments a few days ago. It's not much."
“我就喜欢从三开始数，你寡我！”艾米哼了一声。
"I just like to count from three. None of your business!" Amy snorted.
“我就想知道我哪里比不上他？”
"I just want to know, how am I less than him?"
“我就知道大家一定会喜欢的。”艾米站在一旁，脸上露出了笑容，小声道。
Amy stood at the side with a smile, and whispered, "I know everyone will like it."
“我尼玛……”巨汉破口大骂。
"F*ck..." the man cursed.
“我已经有预感了，等老板回来，我肯定会报复性大吃大喝几天，弥补这段日子瘦掉的肚子。”汉娜一脸认真的思考着。
"I already have a feeling that when Boss is back, I would stuff myself for a few days to make up for my stomach that had became smaller during this period," Hannah said thoughtfully.
“我已经约她明日在此地共商和平条约之事，无发行者必然同行。”
"I have already asked her to come and discuss about the peace treaty tomorrow. The Hairless Monk will definitely come along with her."
“我带你们去个好地方，除了罗莫街，其他地方还真寻不到第二家了。”卢西恩微笑着说道。
"Let me bring you guys to a good place. We really can't find another place like it other than on Romo Street," Lucien said with a smile.
“我应该欢呼雀跃吗？”麦格眉头微挑，不过挺开心的就是了。
"Should I cheer happily?" Mag cocked his eyebrow a little, but he was still rather happy.
“我应该没有什么仇家，这些年泰坦酒馆的生意一直不好，更谈不上什么同行嫉妒。”埃菲摇头。
"I don't suppose I have any arch enemies. Titan Tavern's business hadn't been good all these years so it would not be jealousy from someone in the same field." Eiffie shook her head.
“我很喜欢。”安妮用手语说道，抬手把手指对着灯光，看着在灯光下闪耀着微光的戒指，脸上露出了笑容。
"I like it very much," Annie said in sign language. She put her hand up to the light and watched the ring shine under the light as she smiled happily.
“我很欣慰，你把她留下了。”
"I'm glad you kept Annie with you."
“我怎么可能是这种人，她不是我喜欢的类型。”麦格神态坚定的摇头。
"I'm not like that. She's not my type." Mag shook his head resolutely.
“我怎么就收了这么个没有方向感的杀手徒弟。”
"Why did I take in a disciple who has no sense of direction?"
“我想吃蛋黄酥，还有烤肉肉、烤猪眼、烤鱼……”艾米从柜台后边探出个小脑袋，第一个报名道。
Amy poked her little head out from behind the counter, and was the first to announce, "I want to eat salted egg yolk pastry, grilled meat, roasted pig's eyes, grilled fish…"
“我想它应该不是为了给这些亡灵在冰原上办一个亡灵派对才把他们复活的。”麦格微笑道。
"I think it did not revive these dead souls to throw them a party on the icy plains," Mag said with a smile.
“我想干掉安德烈·爱德华父子三人。”
"I want to get rid of Andre Edward and his two sons."
“我想干掉旧日支配者克苏鲁。”
"I want to get rid of the Great Old One, Cthulhu."
“我想无伤消灭亡灵军团。”
"I want to destroy the Army of the Dead without any casualty."
“我想知道像这样的家伙还有多少？他们藏身于何处？”麦格看着晞问道。
"I want to know how many more such fellows exist? Where are they hiding?" Mag asked Xi.
“我想，您应该需要一个帮你把门踹开的人。”一个身材壮硕的精灵从二层床铺上跳了下来。
"I think you would need someone to kick the door down for you." A fit elf jumped down from the upper deck of the double-decker bed.
“我意已决，要是不除掉康妮，奥格部落便再无出头之日。”奥斯特一挥手道。

That orc tried to reason with Auster, only to be abruptly cut off as Auster waved his hand, and said, "I have already made up my mind. The Aug Tribe will never rise up again if we don't get rid of Connie."
“我所做的所有事情，都是海伦娜不希望看到的，包括我的存在。”伊琳娜看着德克，突然咧嘴一笑：“那你觉得我应该怎么做？让我彻底消失吗？”

"The things that I did were all what Helena didn't want to see, including my existence." Irina looked at Dirk and suddenly laughed. "Then, what do you think I should do? Should I disappear completely?"
“我抽中了欸！”艾米惊喜道。
"I've got it!" Amy exclaimed.
“我数到三哦。”艾米双手叉腰，“三！”
"I'll count to three." Amy put her hands on her hips. "Three!"
“我无法保证。”晞冷漠的答道。
"I can't guarantee that." Xi coldly replied.
“我昨天去了一趟纺织厂，让暗夜精灵帮我造一批武器，艾许莉那边需要你的授权。”麦格给伊琳娜盛粥，一边说道。
Mag scooped a bowl of porridge for Irina as he told her, "I made a trip to the textile factory yesterday and got the Night Elves to build me a batch of weapons. Ashley might need your authorization."
“我昨天把艾略特的老巢给抄了，把所有农奴和奴隶都放了，把他们带回了混乱之城。”伊琳娜说道。
"I wiped out Elliot's nest yesterday, set all the farm slaves and servants free and brought them to Chaos City," Irina said.
“我昨天看过了，没有。”亚伯罕笑着道。
"How was it?" Abraham asked with a smile.
“我昨日来过此地，他应该是感应到我的存在，所以匆匆离去，没来得及把怨气全部吸收。”麦格说道。
"I came here yesterday. He should have left in a hurry when he sensed my presence, so he didn't absorb all the resentment in time," Mag said.
“我是一个生活体验系统，立志于提升小主的生活体验而存在的系统，做吃的属于超纲要求。”系统认真的道。
"I am a Life Experience System. My aim is to help you upgrade your life experience. Making food is out of my job scope," the System said seriously.
“我是个车夫，去过不少地方，暮光森林、风之森林、混乱之城……我都去过，就那恶魔群岛没去过，听说恶魔吃人，而且要坐船，我就没去了……”帕萨和麦格闲聊起来，不过没有讲心酸的生活，讲的是他但车夫这些年行走于诺兰大陆上的所见所闻。

"I'm a coachman. I've been to many places. Twilight Forest, Wind Forest, Chaos City… I've been to all of them. The only place I haven't been to is Demon Islands. I heard that demons eat humans. Besides, you need to take a ferry there, so I didn't go…" Pasa started chatting with Mag. However, he did not talk about his hard life, but about the things he saw and heard as a coachman roaming around Norland Continent for all these years.
“我是你爹，不要搞错辈分。”麦格回道。
"I'm your daddy. Don't get the hierarchy wrong." Mag answered.
“我是认真的。”伊琳娜强调道。
"I mean it," Irina emphasized.
“我是说……他肯定不会要我的。”小丫鬟连忙摇头，又是看着埃菲，“不过，如果是小姐的话，我觉得他一定拒绝不了的，这天下，哪有能拒绝的了小姐的人呢。”

"I'm saying… he definitely won't accept me." The little maid quickly shook her head, and then looked at Eiffie. "However, if it was Miss, I don't think he could ever reject you. No one could reject Miss in this world."
“我是说吃饭……”汉娜停下了嚼油条的动作，眨了眨眼睛。
"I'm talking about my meals…" Hannah stopped chewing and blinked.
“我是鲍里斯，恭喜你酿造的茅台酒获得了品酒大会的的金奖。”鲍里斯笑着向麦格伸出了手。
"I am Boris. Congratulations on winning the gold award in the liquor tasting with your maotai." Boris reached his hand out to Mag with a smile.
“我是鲍里斯，放过我，我可以给你们很多钱……”鲍里斯双手撑着地面踉跄着爬起身来，神情虽然慌乱，但还是看着伊琳娜说道。
Boris tried to get up by pressing both his hands on the floor. Although he looked panicked, he still said to Irina, "I'm Boris. Let me go and I can give you a lot of money..."
“我最近也忙着拯救世界，不用两头跑倒是刚好。”芭芭拉跟着点头，最近城主府方面经常找她讨论阵法之类的问题，作为月之国的头号联络人，为了这个世界她也是操碎了心。

"I'm also busy saving the world recently. It's great that I don't have to run around." Babla nodded with similar sentiments. The city lord's castle had been looking for her frequently to discuss spell formations recently. As the number one contact person of the Moon Nation, she had been worried sick for this world.
“我有个朋友要过来，我先去接一下他。”
"I have a friend coming over. I'll go fetch him."
“我有钱。”艾米摸出了两个银币递给老板，“找我五十个铜币。”
"I have money." Amy took out two silver coins, and gave them to the boss. "Give me 50 copper coins as change."
“我来帮你开瓶吧。”麦格适时到来，从卢西恩的手中接过威士忌，先去了封帽，然后用开瓶器拔出了木塞。
"Let me open it for you." Mag approached just at the appropriate time. He took the whiskey from Lucien, and removed the seal before using the opener to remove the cork.
“我来找麦格先生是为了品酒大会的事情，我们昨天谈的也是工作哦。”埃菲微笑着解释道，声音并未刻意控制，就是要说给里边的人听的。

"I came to look for Mr. Hades regarding the liquor tasting event. We were discussing about work yesterday too." Eiffie smilingly explained. She didn't deliberately control her volume as she wanted to the people inside to hear her too.
“我正准备去铁匠铺看看，今天应该都能拿到了，就怕工匠怠慢了，所以亲自去取。”埃菲说道。
"I am about to go to the blacksmith to take a look. I should be able to get everything today. I'm just afraid that the worker would be slow so I'll be going over to retrieve it, Eiffie said.
“我没事，一点小伤而已。”麦格摇摇头，看了眼手臂上被兰克斯特的枪尖划破的伤口。
"I'm fine. It's just a small injury." Mag shook his head. He looked at the wound on his arm that was slashed by Rankster's spear.
“我没有兄弟。”麦格看着三分醉意，三分杀气的伊琳娜，连忙澄清道。
"I have no brothers," Mag quickly clarified when he saw the half-tipsy, half-vengeful Irina.
“我没有权限告知你这些问题。”晞冷漠回答。
"I don't have the permission to answer those questions." Xi coldly replied.
“我没有骂人……”鲍里斯又气又委屈。
"I'm not scolding you..." Boris was furious and aggrieved.
“我父亲在世的时候，常说您是一位令他钦佩和尊重的长者，这瓶酒请允许我送给您。”埃菲微笑着说道。
"When my father was still alive, he had always said that you are an admirable and respectable elder. Please allow me to gift this bottle of wine to you," Eiffie said with a smile.
“我现在无法对你的说法表示完全信任，也无法准确判断那个女孩的情况，我需要将你们带回去，让长者来做出判断。”晞看着麦格说道。
Xi said to Mag, "I can't trust what you said completely right now, and neither can I judge that girl's situation accurately. I need to bring you guys back to let the elders make the judgement."
“我现在比较好奇的是，品酒大会可以出现两个金奖吗？”麦格眉头微皱道。
"Now, what I am curious about is, will the liquor tasting event give out two gold awards?" Mag said with a frown.
“我的一共是52铜币，请找我48铜币。”艾米已经递出了自己的金币。
"Mine's a total of 52 copper coins. Please give me 48 copper coins back." Amy had already given the boss her gold coin.
“我的茅台酒和你这泰坦酒的酿造工艺有相似之处，所以我能看出你这套装置的问题。当然，你的酿造工艺上也可能有问题，不过我没有看过你酿酒，不好说。”麦格解释道。

"My Maotai's brewing process is similar to your Titan Liquor's, that's why I can pinpoint the problems with your equipment. Of course, there might also be a problem with your brewing techniques, but I can't say much as I haven't seen how you distill your liquor." Mag explained.
“我相信。”埃菲点头。
"I will." Eiffie nodded.
“我看不像，这可不是鲍里斯这种投机商人能弄出来的酒。”
"I don't think so. This isn't a liquor that an opportunistic businessman like Boris can come up with."
“我看不止是想扶一把，而是想扶一晚吧。”伊琳娜似笑非笑的说道，空气都似乎变冷了几分。
"Maybe he wants to help you the entire night," Irina said with a seeming smile. The air around seemed to have gotten a little colder.
“我看你只是怕死而已，如果你的领地在北边，也应该和那些逃跑的蠢货一样，第一时间逃跑或者迎接洛斯帝国的骑兵进入森林吧？”海伦娜脸上的笑容愈发嘲讽。

"I think you're just afraid to die. If your land had been in the north, the first thing you would've done would probably have been to run away just like those fools, or invite the Roth Empire's cavalry into the forest, right?" Helena smiled mockingly.
“我看她这酒馆，不光有茅台酒，还有一种名为‘威士忌’的酒，和茅台酒一样都是2000铜币一瓶，所以我各点了一瓶，等会尝尝味，再点。”

"I saw that there is another type of liquor called "whiskey" in this tavern beside Maotai. It's also priced at 2000 copper coins as Maotai, so I ordered a bottle of whiskey and a bottle of Maotai each We can order more later after we taste them."
“我看您的酒馆已经步入正轨，当初为了获得第一批客人，我可是花了不少时间和精力呢，您可真是优秀。”埃菲说道。
"I can see that your tavern is already doing quite well. I have spent quite some time and effort to gain my very first batch of customers. You're really outstanding." Eiffie said.
“我看要不了多久，这条街上就没有商铺了。”手下瞅了眼隔壁虚掩着门的酒馆，小声道。
His subordinate flicked a glance the tavern with its doors half-closed and whispered, "I think it won't take long before all shops close down on this street."
“我看都差不多，都是一个壳，还有一圈一圈的螺纹。”伊琳娜不以为然。
"They looked to the same to me. They all have a shell and rings of swirls." Irina didn't disagree nor agree with Mag.
“我知道你缺钱，但你缺的不是地上的这些钱。”麦格绕到了另一边，然后一脚踩住了他的另一只手，慢慢增加力道，继续微笑着问道：“所以，是谁答应给你一笔更多的钱，让你对付埃菲老板娘的？”

"I knew you need money, but you don't need the money on the floor." Mag went to the other side and then stepped onto his other hand. He gradually stepped harder as he smilingly asked, "So, who promised to give you more money to deal with Lady Boss Eiffie?"
“我知道麦格先生在洛都已经见过教皇，此次我奉教皇之命来混乱之城，是想要带神女前往洛都，接受教廷的册封和洗礼。”希利看着麦格的眼睛说道。

Seely looked into Mag's eyes, and said, "I know Mr. Mag has already met the pope in Rodu. I came to Chaos City under the pope's orders. My purpose is to bring the holy maiden to Rodu for her to accept the Holy See's canonization and baptism."
“我站在潮流的这一边，现在风之森林中的大多数精灵都会赞同她的做法。”莎莉依旧保持着平静。
"I stand with the trend. Majority of the elves in the Wind Forest will agree with what she did now." Sally was still as calm as ever.
“我给你加钱啊。”
"I'll pay you more."
“我给对面酒馆安装设备去了，前两天答应的事情，期间喝了三杯茶，活刚干完就回来了，准备给孩子做晚饭。”

"I went to help the tavern across the road install their apparatus. I promised the owner two days ago. When I'm there, I had three cups of tea. I came back after I'm done with my work to cook for kids."
“我自己觉得可帅了呢。”康妮撇撇嘴，对雷克斯的点评并不太满意。
"I think I looked awesome." Connie pursed her lips. She wasn't satisfied with Rex's review.
“我草……”奥尔登有些回过神来，瞬间暴怒。
"F*ck…" Aulden came back to his senses and was furious.
“我菜做的比酒好多了。”麦格自信道。
"The dishes that I made are much better than my liquors." Mag said confidently.
“我要一瓶这茅台酒，下酒菜各来一份。”那男人说道，便和同行的男人在一旁坐下。
"I would like a bottle of this Maotai and a helping of each side dish," that man said before taking a seat with the man who came with him.
“我要三十个圈。”
Right at that moment, a soft voice said, "I would like to have 30 rings."
“我要三本食全食美！”
"I would like to have three copies of Perfect Food!"
“我要先吃一个小熊，再吃一个小企鹅。”艾米刷的带上了一次性小手套，一手一只，捏着小熊绿豆糕就往嘴里塞，一口咬掉了小脑袋。

"I want to have a little bear, and then the little penguin." Amy put on her disposable gloves immediately, and grabbed one animal in each hand. She stuffed the little bear mung bean pastry into her mouth, and bit its head off.
“我要全地形的车哦。”艾米提醒道。
"I want an all-terrain vehicle," Amy reminded.
“我要去把他的尸体收回来，或者让我和他一起挂在那里，那样我至少会舒服一些。”
"I want to take his body back. I might be hanging up there with him. At least I would feel a bit better."
“我要尝尝这个凉拌猪耳朵。”艾米夹起了一片猪耳朵。
"I want to try this pig ears salad." Amy picked up a piece of pig ear.
“我要是喝醉了，岂不便宜了那群臭男人。”埃菲有些自嘲的笑了笑
"Won't those men get themselves a good deal if I get drunk?" Eiffie laughed in a self-mocking way.
“我要是有这个能力，老板睡觉都能笑醒。”加兰撇嘴笑道：“不过老板让我们再去一趟混乱之城，争取让麦老板给我们长期供稿，实在不行能够给我们提供素材也行。”

"If I have that ability, our boss could even wake up laughing." Garlan pressed his lips and smiled. "However, Boss told us to go to Chaos City again to ask Boss Mag to provide us with long-term content. If it can't be done, he can provide us with just the materials as well."
“我要杀了你们！”
"I'm going to kill you guys!"
“我要这个玉米做成的大饼，三个！然后要这个看起来不错的汤，三碗！还有这个蛋，要……四个，还有这个，这个，这个……”艾米已经迫不及待的开始点餐，看起来有好多想吃的东西呢。

"I want this pancake made with corn. Three of them! Then, this is soup which looks qutie good. Three bowls of them! And this egg, I want... four of them. And this, this, this..." Amy already began to place her orders. There were many items she wanted to eat.
“我觉得我们还是可以好好谈谈的。”麦格的喉咙滚动了一下。
"I think we can talk things through nicely." Mag swallowed.
“我记得那个叔叔，是艾米的爸爸，上次给我们带了非常好吃的食物呢。”
"I remember that uncle. He's Amy's dad. He brought us very delicious food previously."
“我该回去了，这里交给你们，随时保持联系，找到人的话，别急着行动，先通知我，我会尽快赶到。”麦格看着两人说道。

"I should be going back now. I'll leave this to you guys. Let's keep in contact at all times. If you find him, don't react in a rush. Contact me first, and I'll rush over as soon as possible," Mag said to the two of them.
“我说了不可以啊。”
"I said no, you can't."
“我说我和温妮莎没什么，你应该相信的吧？”麦格看着伊琳娜说道。
"I told you there's nothing between Vanessa and me. You should believe me now, right?" Mag said to Irina.
“我说我捡的……你信吗？”
"If I said I found it… would you believe that?"
“我说过了，艾米不是什么神女，只是一个四岁的孩子，我希望她能够快乐的长大，这里边没有任何与成为教皇有关的计划。”麦格没有接信，看着希利平静的说道。

Mag didn't accept the letter. He looked at Seely, and calmly said, "I have just said that Amy isn't whatever holy maiden. She's just a four-year-old child. I want her to grow up happily, and that has nothing to do with the plan of becoming the pontiff."
“我谢谢您啊。”丑小鸭一个翻身从地上拍起来，晃了晃脑袋，冲着艾米叫了一声。
Ugly Duckling flipped over, and got up on the floor. It shook its head, and called out to Amy, "I really have to thank you."
“我谢谢您啊。”男人表情艰难的点了点头。
"Thanks." The man nodded woefully.
“我还站在这里，便没有人比我更有这个资格，我将让精灵族再次伟大。”海伦娜自信道。
"I am still standing here. No one has that right other than me. I will make the elven race great again," Helena said confidently.
“我还要再来一碗汤可以吗？”艾米咕嘟咕嘟把碗里的牛肉汤喝完，仰起头看着麦格说道。
Amy gulped down the beef soup, and looked up at Mag. "May I have another bowl of soup, please?"
“我还要打包一瓶茅台酒，三种下酒菜各打包一份。”亚伯罕说道。
"I also want to take away a bottle of Maotai and one each of the three side dishes," Abraham said.
“我这么好的人，应该没有人会骂我吧。”麦格笑着走了过来，从伊琳娜手里接过红酒，在她的脸颊上轻轻吻了一下，“孩子睡了？”
"I am such a nice person. I suppose no one would scold me." Mag walked over with a smile. He took the red wine from Irina's hand and gave her a peck on her cheek. "Are the kids asleep?"
“我这孙子，虽然没什么用，但多少还是能当个诱饵的。”一直没开口的梅兰特出声道。
"Although my grandson isn't of much use, he can still act as bait." Merante, who had kept quiet, finally spoke up.
“我这是在帮艾米调教她的系统，被系统调教什么的，不存在的。”麦格悠悠道。
"I'm helping Amy educating her system. There's no such thing such as the system educating the host." Mag said calmly.
“我这是怎么了！埃菲，你不是这样的女人！”埃菲看着麦格离开酒馆，跺了跺脚，脸蛋羞红。
"What's wrong with me! Eiffie, you're not such a woman!" Eiffie watched Mag leave the tavern and stomped her feet as her face flushed red.
“我送奥尔登大人出去吧。”一位官员搀着奥尔登向外走去。
"I'll see Lord Aulden out." One of the officials helped Aulden out.
“我都成年了。”诺亚辩驳道。
"I'm already an adult," Noah rebutted.
“我都让你不要再发布让我做菜的任何任务了，你这是看得起谁呢？又是在为难谁呢？”艾米认真道。
"I've already told you not to give me any cooking missions. Whoa re you trying to look down on? And who are you trying to make things difficult for?" Amy said seriously.
“我闻到了它的香味，这里面应该有着某种菌类、海鲜、肉食，笼统的概念很难形容这种香味，他们有着分明的层次感，却又完美而和谐的融合在一起，是非常美妙而诱人的香味。”

"I smell its aroma. There should be some kind of mushrooms, seafood and meat inside. It's difficult to describe this smell with a vague idea. It has clear layers of smell and yet they all fused together perfectly and harmoniously. It's a very exquisite and enticing aroma."
“我闻着这茅台酒香已是馋的很，这酒恐怕更对我的口味，还是先试试这个吧。”
"I have been craving this Maotai because of its fragrance. I'm afraid this alcohol might not be to my liking. I think I will try this first."
“我，伊琳娜，绝不可能从床上掉下去的！”伊琳娜一脸认真道，脸颊微红。
"I, Irina, would never roll off the bed!" Irina said seriously as she blushed.
“或许不是，他应该是知道有重兵在那里蹲守，故意用魔气引我们到那里，借刀杀人。”梅兰特摇了摇头，表情有些凝重：“看来我们的追踪已经被发现，接下来要更加谨慎了。”

"Maybe not. He must have known that there were troops waiting there, so he used the evil aura to lure us there on purpose so that others would do the dirty work." Merante shook his head. He had a grave expression as he said, "It seems like we were found out. We have to be even more cautious moving forward."
“或许他们的身体已经拥有快速分解酒精的能力。”系统答道。
"Perhaps, their bodies already have the ability to break down alcohol quickly." The system answered.
“或许她在策划什么阴谋，又或许她觉得大势已去，不想再挣扎了？”麦格摸着下巴，也是无法理解风之森林现在的状况。
"Perhaps she is planning something. Perhaps she had already lost her power and did not want to struggle anymore?" Mag stroked his chin. He, too, was unsure of the situation in the Wind Forest now.
“或许我们应该去一趟洛都。”
"Perhaps we should take a trip to Rodu."
“或许是性格使然，不过这位老板酿的酒，那的确是好酒。”波比笑着解释道。
"Perhaps that is his character. However, this boss does indeed brew great alcoholic drinks," Bobby explained with a smile.
“或许是无尽的虚空吧，芭芭拉说过，月球之外的世界，是一片茫茫星海。”麦格说道。
"Perhaps it's an endless space. Babla mentioned that the world outside the Moon was a vast sea of stars," Mag said.
“或许有这种可能……”
"There might be this possibility..."
“战争有什么好的，我看那洛斯帝国的国王就是脑子坏了。”那兽人嘟囔了一句，拿起酒杯一饮而尽，闷着不开腔了。
"What's so good about war? I think that the king of the Roth Empire is crazy," that orc mumbled, and downed his beer in one go. He then kept quiet sulkily.
“战争派摊上奥斯特这个胆小鬼，这次可是损失惨重，不知道他们还会不会跟着那个家伙一条道走到黑。”
"The pro-war group has really suffered heavy losses because of Auster, that coward. I wonder if they will continue following that fellow."
“戴上试试，看看合适不。”麦格看着安妮微笑着说道。
"Put it on and see if it fits," Mag told Annie with a smile.
“所以……你没有吃的，也不会做吃的？”艾米歪头。
"So… you have no food, and you can't cook too?" Amy tilted her head.
“所以……真就瞎酿？”麦格终于忍不住问道。
"So... you are just doing it without knowing how?" Mag could not help but ask
“所以你们就打了一个晚上的老鼠，没有睡好吗？”艾米若有所思，“所以你们就起晚了。”
"So, you guys didn't sleep well because you spent the night whacking the mouse?" Amy was thoughtful. "Hence, you guys woke up late."
“所以呢？”
"So?"
“所以我也就当是给自己放了个寒假，先回来玩一段时间。”亚伯罕点点头。
"So, I gave myself a winter break too, and came back for some time first." Abraham nodded.
“所以接下来酒馆要卖甜品了吗？”伊琳娜又拿了几个蛋黄酥放入冰盒子里冷却，随口问道。
Irina placed a few more salted egg yolk pastry into the icebox to cool down, and casually asked, "So, is the tavern going to sell desserts?"
“所以，为了完成新手任务，正式踏入主线任务阶段，请小主积极参与生活，获得更多的生活体验值。”系统尽量温柔道。

"Therefore, in order to complete the novice mission and officially journey onto the main mission stage, please participate actively in life to gain more life experience points," the System said as gently as it could.
“所以，你是给我来送吃的吗？”艾米眼睛一亮，满是期待道：“永远吃不完也吃不腻的美食！”
"So are you here to give me food?" Amy's eyes lit up. With utmost anticipation, she said, "A delicacy that could never be finished and I would never be sick of!"
“所以，你还背着我和那什么编辑做了什么见不得人的事情吗？”伊琳娜审视着麦格。
"So, did you do anything scandalous with that editor behind my back?" Irina looked at Mag judgingly.
“所以，成了小弟的我，一切都是一颗话梅糖的错？”
Hence, it's all this little preserved plum candy's fault that I became your little brother?
“所以，我们今天晚上是选哪一家呢？”
"So, which tarven are we going tonight?"
“所以，我们应该做什么呢？”艾米两只小手的食指轻轻对点着，有点纠结。
"So, what should we make?" Amy pointed her two index fingers together gently as she fell into a dilemma.
“所以，接下来呢？我该怎么做？”艾米把所有东西都放在切菜台上，满是期待的问道。
"So, what do I do next? What should I do?" Amy placed everything on the kitchen counter and asked expectantly.
“所以，父亲大人，接下来我们要去哪里呢？”艾米关上门，满是期待的看着麦格。
"So, Father, where are we going now?" Amy shut the door, and looked at Mag expectantly.
“所以，这些人馋的只是我的身体？”麦格后退了半步，多了几分警惕。
"So, these people are only after my body?" Mag took half a step back with caution.
“所以？”
"So?"
"Only 108 of them?"
“才两瓶啊？小姑娘是没有见过我们年轻的时候，一人喝十瓶的样子。”弗格斯也是跟着笑了起来。
"Just two bottles? The little girl hasn't seen how we drank 10 bottles each when we were young." Fergus laughed too.
“打倒海伦娜！”
"Defeat Helena!"
“扛不住的话，最先被灭的必然是洛斯帝国。”麦格点头。
"If you can't the Roth Empire would definitely be the first to be wiped out." Mag nodded.
“扶……扶我起来。”伊琳娜下令道。
"H-help me up," Irina commanded.
“找到他，把他带回来见我。”安德烈说道。
"Find him and bring him back to me," Andre said.
“把他们抓起来，明日在生命广场上斩首示众，有什么话，就让他们和所有精灵当面说吧。”海伦娜冷漠的声音响起。
"Arrest all of them, and hold a public execution in Life Square tomorrow. They can say anything they want to all the elves there," Helena said coldly.
“把你送给对面酒馆的老板，从他那里换酒吗？”埃菲气笑道。
"So, should I exchange you for the liquor with the boss of that tavern opposite?" Eiffie replied with an exasperated smile.
“把希望寄托在一个四岁的孩子身上，这一次，神灵也是正确的吗？”虽然有些不敬，可希利还是忍不住在心中想着。
Pining our hopes on a four-year-old child, is the Holy Spirit right this time? Although it was a little disrespectful, Seely couldn't help thinking about that.
“抱歉哦，我你以为你会更硬一点的。”麦格有点歉然的看着惨叫的巨汉，收回脚的同时，在他的身上擦了擦鞋底。
"Oops, sorry. I thought you would be tougher." Mag looked at the screaming big guy apologetically. Mag wiped the bottom of his sole on him when he retracted his foot.
“抱歉，不是每一个人的品格都和你一样卑劣。”麦格摇摇头，然后慢慢俯下身，冷笑着看着他，“而且，你知道吗，我买了半条罗莫街，懂吗？半条。我靠炒房赚钱的啦，死扑街。”

"I'm sorry. Not everyone is as despicable as you." Mag shook his head before crouching down and looked at him with a smirk. "Moreover, do you know that I have bought up half of Romo Street? Half. I made my money by speculating in properties. A**hole."
“抱歉，我为自己先前鲁莽的话语道歉。”麦格歉然道。
"Apologies, I'm apologising for my rash words just now," Mag said.
“抱歉，我对于缔造什么传奇没多大兴趣，如果有的话，那我就是传奇。”麦格微微一笑，跨步登上马车，示意车夫可以开车了。
"Apologies. I am not interested in becoming a legend of any sort. If any, I am the legend." Mag smiled and boarded the horse-drawn carriage as he told the coachman to set off.
“抱歉，过程中我好像忘记了解说。”
"I'm sorry. I seem to have forgotten to explain the process."
“抱歉，这个提议我无法接受，安妮是我的女儿，不是某件需要评估的物品。”麦格摇头，看着晞神情认真道：“或许古老者是更高等级的存在，你们有着强大的实力，但请不要低估一位父亲保护女儿的决心。

"I'm sorry, but I can't accept that suggestion. Annie is my daughter and not something that needs to be judged." Mag shook his head and said to Xi with a serious expression, "Perhaps the Elder Things are a more advanced existence, but please don't underestimate a father's determination to protect his daughter.
“拍黄瓜是凉拌菜，不是蘸着吃的。”麦格笑着重新拍了一根黄瓜，然后按照先前的配方调配了一份酱汁，将酱汁淋在黄瓜上，拌匀之后，放入冰箱冷藏。

"Smashed Cucumber Salad is a salad. You don't eat it as a dip." Mag said with a smile. He smacked another cucumber and made the sauce according to the previous recipe. He drizzled the sauce over the cucumber, mixed them well, and placed them into the refrigerator.
“按照人类的饮食习惯，会对食物进行加热处理，从而灭杀病菌，并且让食物获得更好的口感和香味。”
"According to the human's dining habits, they will heat up the food to kill the germs and bacteria and make the food taste and smell better."
“按照老板套中脖子就算命中的规则，这三只鹅都是那位美女的了。”
"According to the boss' rule, it's a hit as long the ring lands on the goose's neck. These three geese belong to that beautiful lady."
“按照说明书来看，是一台核动力印刷机。”麦格说道。
"According to the instruction manual, it's a nuclear-powered printing machine." Mag answered.
“挺……挺好的。”伊琳娜点点头。
"N-not bad." Irina nodded.
“挺好的。”麦格把手里的公开信收起，看着伊琳娜微笑着道：“今天心情好，吃顿好的，想吃什么，你们自己点。”
"This is quite good." Mag kept the open letter, and smilingly said to Irina, "My mood is great today. Let's have a good meal. Order whatever you want."
“挺好的，以后这个位置就是我的了。”伊琳娜在吧台后的一个高脚椅上坐下，这里掌管着酒馆的财政大权，也能看着整个酒馆，当之无愧的C位。

"It's rather nice. This position will be mine in the future." Irina sat on a barstool behind the bar counter. This place was in charge of the tavern's finances, and she could see the entire tavern from this position. This was, without a doubt, the center position.
“挺好的，把问题一次性都解决了。”伊琳娜微微点头。
"That's good. We will settle the problems once and for all." Irina nodded slightly.
“挺好的，现在已经开始正常生产了，下个月就可以出厂第一批酒了。”汉娜点点头道。
"It's alright. We've started normal production and we should be able to produce our first batch of wine next month," Hannah said with a nod.
“挺好的，至少眼睛没瞎。”伊琳娜点点头道。
Irina nodded and said, "That's good. At least you're not blind."
“挺好的，要是能再提升一下等级就更好了。”麦格点点头，这也就能抗住三级的攻击，他用手指头都能戳破。
"It's not bad. It will be even better if only we could improve it a little." Mag nodded. This could only withstand a 3rd-tier attack. He could destroy it with just a poke of his finger.
“据说现在混乱之城咱们的杂志新刊一册难求，二手的杂志已经被炒到五百铜币一份，依旧是有价无市。”那编辑有些激动道：“主编，看来我们要创造奇迹了！本月期刊销量已经突破十五万册，现在各大经销商还在疯狂要求加印。”

"It was said that our magazine was hard to buy in Chaos City. even second-hand ones were sold at 500 copper coins per magazine and it was still hard to come by." The editor said agitatedly, "Sir, I think we are making a miracle! The sales of this issue had already broken through 150,000 and all the distributor were still asking for more copies."
“接下来我们尝尝这汤之中的食材。”
"Now, we will taste the ingredients in this soup."
“提前放入植物油，或许能够减少水分析出，小主或许可以从这方面进行提示！”系统立马就给出了提议。
"Putting plant oil in beforehand might be able to reduce the amount of liquid seeping out. You can try to hint your Father in this direction!" the System quickly suggested.
“提醒宿主：请尽快提升酒馆的知名度，目前酒馆知名度：8！先定一个知名度1000的小目标吧！加油！干巴爹！”
"Reminder: please quickly increase the popularity of the tavern. Current popularity points: 8! A small goal for popularity points can be set at 1000 first! Go for it! Gambatte!"
“握草……”先前套了五十个圈都没能套到一根鹅毛的大汉张大了嘴巴，呆若木鹅。
"Damn…" The big guy who failed to catch a single goose with 50 rings opened his mouth wide in a daze.
“支线任务发布：进击的黄瓜！请小主学会拍黄瓜这道菜，体验真正的做菜。”
"Side Quest: Attack on Cucumber! Please learn to make this dish and experience cooking for real."
“放心吧老板，我一定会做好的。”亚北米娅一脸认真的点头。
"Don't worry, Boss. I will do a good job." Yabemiya nodded with a serious look.
“故意的，不然怎么能在不经意间让他看到我的真实面貌呢。”麦格还得戴着乔修的面具，笑着伸手把面具摘下。
"On purpose. How else could I let him see my true looks accidentally?" Mag was still wearing the mask with Josh's face. He now took down the mask with a smile.
“敌袭！救火！”
"Enemy attack! Put out the fire!"
"Enemy attack!!!"
“救命啊！爷爷，有鬼啊！”
"Help! Grandpa, there are ghosts!"
“教廷来的大主教？这是来做什么？”厨房里，麦格抬头看着正准备结账离开的卡诺和希利，从两人的衣着不难判断两人的身份。

The archbishop from the Holy See? What's he doing here? In the kitchen, Mag looked up at Canault and Seely, who were paying their bills, and were about to leave. It was easy to deduce their identity from their clothing.
“教皇，圣女不知去向，我们该如何是好？”大主教看着教皇说道。
The archbishop asked the pope, "Your Holiness, we don't know where the holy maiden is, so what do we do now?"
“散了吧。”安德烈起身离去，众大臣躬身送驾。
"Dismissed." Andre turned to leave as the courtiers bowed to see him off.
“敬这狗屁的生活。”帕萨也端起酒杯，轻轻碰杯，然后一饮而尽。
"To this dog a*s life." Pasa picked up the glass, clinked with Mag, and chugged the liquid down.
“新手任务发布：请小主获取十点生活体验值！任务完成之后，将获得新手礼包！”
"Novice mission: please gain 10 life experience points! Upon completion of the mission, you will receive a novice hamper!"
“新手大礼包是零食大礼包吗？里面有什么？”艾米又问道。
"Is the novice hamper a giant snack hamper? What's in there?" Amy asked again.
“新手指引开始，发布支线任务：请小主为家人做一顿美味的早餐。与家人的互动可以快速获得生活体验值，并且加深感情。任务成功将获得额外奖励一份。”系统快速发布了支线任务。

"Novice instructions begin. Side quest: make a sumptuous breakfast for your family. Interacting with your family is a fast way to gain life experience points and deepen your relationship. An additional reward will be given out upon successful completion." The System quickly released a side quest.
“新的支线任务发布：来自埃菲的愿望：帮助埃菲让泰坦酒馆重现父亲时代的辉煌！请小主积极参与这个过程，本系统将会根据小主的参与度和影响力决定任务奖励！”就在这时，艾米的脑海中却响起了系统的声音。

"New mission: A wish from Eiffie: Help Eiffie bring Titan Tavern back to the glory of her father's times! Please participate actively in the process. The System would decide on the mission reward according to your participation and influence!" Just then, the System's voice rang in Amy's head.
“新的支线任务发布：求知的蜗牛！请小主找到可以食用的蜗牛，并且将它烹饪成食物！”系统的声音在艾米的脑海中响起。
"New quest: Inquisitive Snail! Please find edible snails and cook it!" the System's voice rang in Amy's head.
“新的甜点？”
"New dessert?"
“方……便……面？这个名字听起来，好像有点邪恶啊？”诺亚蹲在桌边认真观察着这个神秘包装的食物。
"Instant... noodles? This name sounded rather evil?" Noya observed the mysterious pack of food while squatting by the table.
“方向是对了，大体的口感、口味也有了，不过距离完美还有非常遥远的距离，看来还得找时间进一次厨神试炼场才行，还有不少可以改进的地方。”麦格吃完了一块绿豆糕，给自己找到了诸多问题，又开始了新的一轮尝试。

"This is the right direction. There is an overall texture and taste, but it is still far from perfect. Looks like I have to find some time to go into the test field for the God of Cookery. There are still many places to improve on." Mag found a lot of issues after trying a piece of the mung bean pastry, and started on another trial.
“族人们最关心的，其实还是女王陛下的态度，不知您现在是否还能够与女王陛下沟通。”艾许莉说道。
"The people are the most comcerned about Her Majesty's stance. Could you communicate with Her Majesty?" Ashley asked.
“族长……族长被杀了！！！”
"Chief...The chief is murdered!!!"
“族长，他们已经走了，往南去了。”外面有人答应道。
"Chief, they're already gone. They have gone southwards." Someone outside answered.
“族长，山猫和土狗部落，前两日已经加入和平联盟，今日都没有派人来参加会议。”一旁的属下凑上前，在他耳边小声道。

A subordinate standing the side went up to Auster and whispered in his ear, "Chief, the Lynx Tribe and the Mutt Tribe have already joined the Peace Alliance two days ago. They're not sending anyone to our meeting today."
“族长，是农场奴隶圈那边出了点问题，已经派族里的卫队过去了，翻不出什么大浪来。”一位管家模样的中年精灵上前来恭敬说道。

A middle-aged elf that looked like a butler approached and respectfully said, "Chief, there are some issues with the slaves at the farm. We have already sent the garrison over. There won't be any big trouble."
“无妨，客人满意便好。”麦格回应道。
"No worries, as long as you like it," Mag replied.
“无妨，此事倘若真如他所言，该道歉的是洛斯帝国和我们。”希利摇头，意外于这位兽人的通情达理，也对这场战争表达了自己的态度。

"It's fine. If this matter is exactly as he said, then it should be the Roth Empire and us who should apologize." Seely shook his head. He was surprised that this orc was being so reasonable, and he showed his opinion on this war at the same time.
“无妨，现在已经完全可以确定乔修就在洛都，而且已经发现我们在追查他的下落。”麦格笑了笑，“如果继续顺着他留下的魔气追查，只能被他牵着鼻子跑，很容易便再次陷入他的圈套中。”

"It's alright. Now, we can confirm that Josh is in Rodu, and he already found out that we are tracking him." Mag smiled. "If he continues to leave his evil aura for us to trace, we will only be led on by him, and will easily fall into his trap again."
“无论如何，都得带他一起走。”伊琳娜看着那向着麦格蠕动而去的克苏鲁，闭上了眼睛。
"No matter what, we have to bring him along with us." Irina looked at Cthulhu that was wiggling towards Mag and closed her eyes.
“既然他能设局弄我们，我们同样可以设局逼他出来，或者压缩他的生存空间。”麦格看着梅兰特道：“你先修养一段时间，等到伤势好了再继续追查，这几天就先交给我们。”

"Since he can set up a trap for us, we can also set up a trap to force him out, or limit the space he can move in." Merante looked at Merante, and said, "Rest well for some time. When you're better, you can continue with the investigations. Leave things to us for the next couple of days."
“既然你诚心诚意的发问了，我们就大发慈悲的告诉你！为了防止世界被破坏，为了守护世界的和平，贯彻爱与真实的邪恶，可爱又迷人的艾米，就是我了。”

"Since you ask sincerely, we'll let you know out of kindness! Preventing the world from being destroyed, protecting the world's peace, upholding love and punishing evil, the cute and mesmerizing Amy is me."
“既然姑娘已经打开了酒馆的门，那便请进吧，我有酒有肉，不知姑娘可有故事？”麦格微笑着看着女人说道。
Mag smilingly said to the woman, "Since you have already opened the tavern's door, please come in. I have meat and liquor and I wonder what is the story behind you, lovely maiden?"
“既然存在高等文明，是不是意味着这个世界真的存在有神？只是藏身于我们未知的地方？所以他们能够通过一些方式与他们的继承者或者族人建立联系。”麦格疑惑道。

"Since an advanced civilization existed, does it mean that there are really gods in this world? They are just hiding in places where we can't see them? That means they could communicate with their successors or people through certain means?" Mag mumbled questionably.
“既然已经没有商铺好买，那我也不妨实话告诉你，今天的品酒大会上，这罗莫街上的泰坦酒馆和塞班酒馆双双捧回金奖，而且还都是满分的金奖酒。”矮胖中年人有些感慨道：“现在的罗莫街让你爱理不理，但以后的罗莫街可就让你高攀不起了。”

"Since there is not shops for us to buy any more, I don't mind telling you the truth. Both Titan Tavern and Saipan Tavern on Romo Street won the gold awards at today's liquor tasting event, and they both got full marks." The short and fat middle-aged man lamented, "You might look down on the current Romo Street, but you won't be worthy of the Romo Street in the future."
“既然让他们跑了，那就是我们南下的时候，我们沉寂太久，可能已经有很多人忘了我们的存在……”乔修轻轻摩挲着把手，冷笑道。

"Since they have escaped, then it's time for us to move southwards. We have been quiet for too long. Perhaps, many have already forgotten our existence..." Josh rubbed his hands together gently and smirked.
“既然这个世界还有更高的上限，那我会变得比现在更强大，不会再让任何人威胁我们。”麦格神情认真的说道。
"Since there is an even higher upper limit in this world, I will become stronger than I am now so that no one can threaten us again," Mag said with a serious expression.
“早啊。”麦格礼貌性的和众人打了个招呼，毕竟是邻居嘛，接下来的一个月还是要好好相处的。
"Good morning." Mag greeted all of them courteously. They were neighbors, after all. They still had to get along for the next one month.
“早安哈迪斯先生，我刚刚在早餐店碰到小艾，就顺路送她回来了。”埃菲微笑着说道。
"Good morning, Mr. Hades. I ran into Amy Baby at the breakfast place so I sent her back," Eiffie said with a smile.
“早餐，要做什么呢？”艾米问道。
"Breakfast, what should I make?" Amy asked.
“时隔十六年，泰坦酒要第四度摘得金奖了！”
"After 16 years, Titan Liquor was about to take down the gold award for the fourth time!"
“昂。”艾米点点头，她也想做一个诚实的孩子，可系统不允许啊。
"Yup." Amy nodded. She also wanted to be an honest child, but the system wouldn't allow her to.
“昂，父亲大人做的小龙虾和烤鱼真好吃。”艾米点点头，不过很快又抬起头来，小脸上的表情满是认真道：“但是，下次你们吃夜宵的话，可不许再把我们忘了哦。”
"Yes. Father's crayfish and grilled fish are really delish." Amy nodded. She quickly looked up with a serious expression, and said, "But, don't forget us when you guys eat supper in the future."
“昂，超漂亮的，比我们买的那些画册都要漂亮呢。”艾米点着小脑袋道。
"Mm. It's gorgeous. It's even better than those we bought," Amy said as she nodded her little head.
“明日一早送到宫里去，向父皇汇报此事。”肖恩收回目光，沉声下令道。
"Deliver this over to the palace early in the morning tomorrow and report this to Royal Father," Sean commanded solemnly and looked away.
“明日，在法克部落将举办第一届兽人部落和平联盟大会，我希望能够看到你们每一个人。”康妮坐在马上，居高临下的看着那些兽人酋长们，声音清冷的说道。
Connie sat on the unicorn, looked down at the orc chiefs and said in a cold voice, "Tomorrow, the Falk Tribe will hold the very first orcs' peace meeting. I hope to see everyone of you there."
“明明和我刚刚说的那些特征完全不符合好吗？！”麦格走上前，看了眼那三只普普通通的蜗牛，滑腻可怕，连忙摇头：“不，他们都不能吃，我们再找找吧，一般他们还会躲在树根处。”

"They obviously look different from the traits that I've described earlier, alright?!" Mag went forward to take a look at those three ordinary snails. They looked horribly slimy. Mag quickly shook his head. "No. They're not edible. Let's look around. They usually hide around the roots of the trees."
“昨天一位车夫将您送回府，说是您在酒馆喝醉了。”夫人倒了杯水给他，有些心疼的看着他说道。
"A coachman sent you back yesterday. He said you got drunk in a tavern." Bobby's wife poured a glass of water for him. Her heart went out to him.
“昨天你滚到地上去了，为了防止你二次滚落，所以我直接帮你把床铺铺在地上了。”麦格笑着点头。
"You rolled to the floor last night, so I laid the sheets on the floor for you to prevent you from rolling to the floor again." Mag nodded with a smile.
“昨天我看到哈里森叔叔了，他变瘦了呢。”帕默说道。
"I saw Uncle Harrison yesterday. He had slimmed down," Parmer said.
“昨天我还觉得哈迪斯先生挺帅的，现在看来，全家最丑是没得说了。”一位面馆老板笑道。
A noodle shop's boss laughingly said, "I thought Mr. Hades was rather handsome yesterday. Looking at them now, he's, without a doubt, the ugliest in his family."
“昨天晚上那家酒馆叫什么？”亚伯罕看着候在一旁的管家问道。
"What's the name of that tavern that I went to last night?" Abraham asked the butler, who was waiting at the side.
“昨晚你家老爷帮我们酒馆解了围，这点花生就算是我的一点心意作为感谢了。”麦格微笑着摇头。
"Your master helped the tavern last night. These peanuts are the token of my appreciation." Mag shook his head with a smile.
“昨晚有一个姑娘，在营业结束后突然闯入，手持古怪兵器，自称是古老者的观察者，并且看出了我曾经与魔鬼有过接触，认为我可能已经与魔鬼交换了灵魂，曾想杀死我。”麦格说道。

"A lady barged in last night after operating hours suddenly. She had a strange weapon with her and said that she was the Observer of the Elder Things. Sh said she could tell that I had contact with the Devil and thought that I might have swapped souls with the Devil. She even thought of killing me," Mag said.
“昨晚睡得还好吧？”正在盛粥的麦格看着下楼来的埃菲，笑着问道。
"Did you sleep well last night?" Mag asked Eiffie with a smile as he scooped up some porridge when he saw her coming down the stairs.
“昨晚这酒……”亚伯罕坐在床边，任由漂亮的丫鬟们服饰他穿衣洗漱，还在回味昨晚喝的那顿酒。
That liquor last night… Abraham sat on his bed to let his beautiful handmaidens wash up and dress him. He was still reminiscing about the liquor that he drank last night.
“昨晚，我救了个人还是鬼？”喝粥的时候，伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"Did I save a human or a ghost last night?" Irina asked Mag while having her porridge.
“是……”新酋长低头，颤声答道。
"Yes..." The new chief lowered his head and answered in a trembling voice.
"Yes."
“是。”众护卫虽然惊慌，却也连忙应下，紧忙开始灭火，防止火势蔓延开来。
"Yes." Although the guards were horrified, they quickly did what they had to to prevent the fire from spreading.
“是。”利尔答应一声，连忙退出了御书房。
"Yes," Lear answered, and quickly retreated out of the royal study.
“是。”管家微笑着领命而去。
"Yes." The butler left with a smile after receiving their order.
“是。”那位官员答应，转身快步离去。
"Yes." That official left quickly.
“是。”那精灵快步离去。
"Yes." The elf left quickly.
“是。”那精灵神色一凛，快步离开洞府。
"Yes." That elf shuddered, and left the cave quickly.
“是。”黑衣人应道，身体渐渐虚幻，然后彻底消失在夜色中。
"Yes," the man in black replied, and his body faded into the darkness.
“是不同于诺兰大陆任何有记录的种族的未知生物，实力强大，不是小主目前能够应对的存在。”系统答复道。
"It's an unknown creature that is different from any recorded species on the Norland Continent. It's very powerful. It's not a being that little mistress can handle." The system answered.
“是不是体验到了战斗的快感？”一道声音从一旁响起。
"Did you get the thrill of combat?" A voice spoke up at the side.
“是不是想招个伶俐的服务员啊？”伊琳娜从楼梯上走下来，笑吟吟的说道。
"Are you thinking of recruiting a server?" Irina asked with a smile as she walked down the stairs.
“是什么？”
"What is this?"
“是伊琳娜公主！”
"It's Princess Irina!"
“是你！”
"It's you!"
“是克苏鲁！”
"It's Cthulhu!"
“是厨房炸了吗？怎么一股焦糊味？”伊琳娜皱着眉头走到厨房门口，看着一片狼藉的厨房，愣了一下，“还真炸了啊？”
"Did the kitchen explode? Why is there a burnt smell?" Irina walked to the kitchen's entrance with a frown. She was stunned for a moment when she saw the messy kitchen. "Did it really explode?"
“是吗。”伊琳娜不置可否，纤细的手已是再次缠上了他的脖子。
"Is that so?" Irina was not convinced. Her thin hands were already around his neck.
“是吗？”伊琳娜不太相信的样子。
"Really?" Irina did not seem to believe it.
“是吗？我这才刚刚起步呢。”麦格微笑道。
"Really? I am just getting started." Mag said with a smile.
“是吗？那我一定呀先尝尝了。”埃菲拿起筷子，夹了一块茄子，小口吹了吹，然后喂到嘴里。
"Really? In that case, I must give it a try." Eiffie picked up her chopsticks, took a peice of eggplant and blew on it. After that, she put it into her mouth.
“是吧，系统。”艾米不忘问道。
"Am I right, System?" Amy didn't forget to ask.
“是哦，哈迪斯先生聪明又能干，就是快了些。”玛拉点点头。
"That's true. Mr. Hades is smart and capable. It's just a pity he was taken too early." Mala nodded.
“是啊。”艾米有点含糊的应道，系统说了，今天是最后的日期了，必须要学会拍黄瓜。
"Yeah," Amy mumbled. The System said that today was the last day and she had to master the Smashed Cucumber Salad.
“是啊是啊，我家小姐酿酒的时候可壮观了呢。”玛拉有些得意的点头。
"Yes, yes. It's a grand sight when our young mistress is brewing wine." Miss nodded proudly.
“是啊是啊，真的非常好吃！”
"Yes, yes. It's really very delicious!"
“是啊，一般刚见面就搂搂抱抱，叫人家爱妃，还邀请人家上门切磋的邻居可不多见。”伊琳娜微笑着说道。
"Yeah, there aren't many neighbors who start hugging, using nicknames, and even invite the other over for an exchange," Irina said with a smile.
“是啊，今天好冷，但哈迪斯先生的酒馆里好暖和，是烧了暖炉吗？”埃菲笑吟吟的在麦格身旁的椅子坐下，冻得通红的手在火炉旁烤着，冲着麦格露出了一个灿烂的笑容：“好暖和啊。”

"Yes. It's so cold today, but Mr. Hades' tavern is so warm. Do you have a furnace on?" Eiffie sat down on the chair next to Mag smilingly. She toasted her reddened hands over the furnace and gave Mag a bright smile. "It's so warm."
“是啊，你母亲做的萝卜条，和你父亲酿的酒，都是我最难忘怀的记忆。”帕萨卡有些感慨的点头。
Pasaca nodded and lamented, "Yes, the preserved radish strips your mother made and the liquor your father brewed are my most treasured memories."
“是啊，全家最丑的是孩子他爹。”
"Yes. The father is the ugliest in the family."
“是啊，刚刚开始就没有见到她。”姬娜跟着问道。
"Yes, we didn't see her from the start," Gina added.
“是啊，只差一点点。”埃菲也是心有余悸的点了点头。
"Yes. It was really close." Eiffie also nodded with lingering fear.
“是啊，只是这么有钱的一家人，为什么要突然跑到落寞的罗莫街来开酒馆呢？”
"Yes. But why is such a rich family coming to the deserted Romo Street to open a tavern?"
“是啊，可惜了马库斯这样一位天才酿酒师，英年早逝。”
"Yes. It's a pity that a genius brewer like Marcus died so young."
“是啊，吃了烤羊腿，可香了呢。”伊琳娜却是笑吟吟的说道。
"Yes, we went to have roasted lamb shanks. It was delicious," Irina said with a smile.
“是啊，听起来像个刚开业的酒馆，不然我肯定知道。”
"Yes. It sounds like a newly open tavern. Otherwise, I would have known."
“是啊，咱们法克部落也算是因祸得福了，没有落到恶魔的手里，还得了这样一位能干的酋长。”
"Yes. We of the Falk Tribe should count ourselves lucky that we did not fall into the hands of the devil, and even got ourselves such a capable chief."
“是啊，哈迪斯老板的酒馆就在我们家酒馆对面。”埃菲笑着说道。
"Yes. Boss Hades' tavern is just across from my tavern." Eiffie smilingly replied.
“是啊，在某些方面，的确还是有些天赋的。”麦格点头。
"Yes. He is rather talented in certain aspects." Mag nodded.
“是啊，埃菲小姐多好的人，怎么就偏偏摊上这种事情呢。”
"Yeah, Miss Eiffie is such a great person. How could this happen to her?"
“是啊，她有着一双令所有漫画家羡慕的手。”麦格深以为然点头，或许这就是点了触手怪天赋的漫画家吧。
"Yes. She has a pair of hands that are envied by every comic artists." Mag nodded in agreement. Perhaps, this was a comic artist that had the tentacle monster's natural talent.
“是啊，她的小裙子好漂亮，人也变漂亮了呢。”
"Yes. Her little dress is so pretty, and she looks prettier too."
“是啊，安妮姐姐你快过来坐吧，这是我刚刚买回来的呢，超大一包。”艾米把手里的纸袋放在桌上，颇为自豪的说道。
"Yeah. Big Sister, come take a seat here quickly. I just bought them back. There's a lot of food," Amy said proudly as she put the bag of food on the table.
“是啊，小老板非常受客人们喜爱，长得可爱，说话又有趣，而且不时还会教训一些不守规矩的客人，俨然成了麦米餐厅的守护神了。”卡诺笑着点头道。

Canault nodded with a smile, and replied, "Yes. The Little Boss is adored by the customers. She's cute and funny. She will also teach those unruly customers a lesson occasionally. She's like the guardian angel of Mamy Restaurant."
“是啊，小艾怎么一个人出发来买早餐呢？”埃菲笑着摸了一下艾米的头，小家伙长得太可爱了，嘴巴也甜。
"Yes. Why is Little Amy out buying breakfast alone?" Eiffie patted Amy's head. This little one looked so cute and she was a sweet talker too.
“是啊，就算是1000铜币一杯，也太贵了。”还有人跟着附和道。
"Yes. Even 1000 copper coins a glass is too expensive." Someone chimed in.
“是啊，就这些了。”麦格点头，上前在伊琳娜对面坐下，先给她倒了杯水，然后扯开话题道：“还有件重要的事情要和你说。”
"Yeah. Just that." Mag nodded. He went up and sat in front of Irina and pouerd her a glass of water. After that, he changed the topic and said, "There's another important thing I have to tell you."
“是啊，当年我还常去呢，可惜失传了，现在只剩下一个名字了。”
"Yes. I used to frequent it back then. It's a pity that it was lost. Only the name is left now."
“是啊，我们可是鬼族，和鬼交流不是常规手段吗。”诺亚点点头，“你看，我们长得也不像鬼啊。”
"Yes, we are the Ghost Clan. Isn't it normal for us to interact with ghosts?" Noah nodded. "See, we don't really look like ghosts, either."
“是啊，我们家小姐和邻居们相处的都很好，从来没有红过脸。”玛拉跟着点头道。
"Yes. Our Young Mistress and neighbors have a very good relationship. They've never gotten into a fight," Mala noddedin agreement.
“是啊，我们的泰坦酒拿到了金奖。”埃菲笑着点头。
"Yes. Our Titan Liquor got the gold award." Eiffie nodded smilingly.
“是啊，我们要去维护世界和平了。”麦格笑着点头。
"Yes. We are going to maintain the world's peace." Mag nodded with a smile.
“是啊，我们都准备睡觉觉了呢，被你吵醒了。”艾米嘟着小嘴看着那大汉，“你真是一个糟糕的大家伙。”
"Yes. We're already prepared to go to bed when you woke us up." Amy looked at that big guy with a pout. "You're really a terrible big fellow."
“是啊，我去给大家买早餐了呢，他们家的早餐看起来还不错哦。”艾米点着小脑袋说道。
"Yes. I bought breakfast for everyone. The breakfast looks not bad," Amy said with a nod.
“是啊，我看他们家酒馆昨晚很早就关门了，可能连一个客人都没有接待，这才是真正的体验玩家啊。”
"Yeah. I saw that their tavern closed really early last night. Maybe they didn't have a single customer. This is the real player."
“是啊，我还从来没有闻过这么香的酒，都倒上了，先试试这个吧。”
"Yeah. I haven't smelled a wine so good before. Pour it all out. Let's try this first."
“是啊，才一年没来，没想到已经荒凉成这般模样，怎么说当年也是这周遭吃喝玩乐的首选啊。”也有官员有些感慨道。
Some of the officials lamented, "Yes. It's only been a year, and it's already so deserted. Romo Street was once the top choice for entertainment."
“是啊，挺好的姑娘。”麦格笑着点头，看着手里的食盒和小家伙怀里抱着的一大袋食物，“今天怎么想起去买早餐呢？”

"Yeah. She is a good lady." Mag nodded with a smile. He looked at the food in the lunchbox and the large bag of food in the little fellow's arms and asked, "Why did you suddenly think of buying breakfast today?"
“是啊，有股子烟味。”旁边一人也是点头道，虽然不算难闻，但这是不应该出现在酒里的味道。
"Yeah. There's the smell of smoke," another person agreed. Although it was not a nasty smell, it was not something that should appear in alcohol.
“是啊，现在难得一见的热情邻居。”麦格笑着点头。
"Yes. They are rarely seen good neighbours." Mag nodded smilingly.
“是啊，男人的野心可比女人大多了，都想要三妻四妾。”埃菲笑着道。
"Yes. Men are much more ambitious than women. They all want to have multiple wives," Eiffie said with a smile.
“是啊，真是让人羡慕，咱们罗莫街多少年没见过这场景了。”
"Yeah. How envious. It has been years since we saw such a sight at Romo Street."
“是啊，第一次见哈迪斯先生我就知道，我们之间一定会发生点特别的事情。”埃菲嫣然一笑，撩拨了一下自己的头发，红唇微翘，将自己最有魅力的角度呈现给麦格。

"Yes. I knew from the very first time that I met Mr. Hades that something special is going to happen between us." Eiffie smiled seductively as she flicked her hair and pouted her red lips, showing her most charming angle to Mag.
“是啊，累死了。”巨汉点了点头，眼睛一瞪，猛然转头看向身后。
"Yes. It's so tiring." The giant guy nodded. Then, he glared and turned around to look behind him.
“是啊，要是有一台这样的机器，能够自己把画册画出来就好了。”艾米接道。
"Yeah, if we have a machine like that, we can print the picture book out ourselves," Amy agreed.
“是啊，要是有个地方能坐一下就好了。”男人搓着手点了点头，满是期待的看着麦格。
"Yes. It would be great if there was a place to sit." The man nodded as he rubbed his hands together, and looked at Mag expectantly.
“是啊，让人没有办法假装不知道的一款酒，和往年相比，的确有不小的进步。”库尔特也是笑着点头道。
"Yes. It's a liquor that one can't pretend not to know. It had indeed improved greatly compared to last year." Kurt also nodded with a smile.
“是啊，这些大人们可是踢到铁板上了。”
"Yeah. These lords are in for a good time."
“是啊，这些年的金奖酒可没有能比得上茅台酒的，一届比一届差。”
"Yes. The alcohol from the past few years could not even compare to the maotai. They just get worse as the years pass."
“是啊，这样就会有更多的人能够获得快乐了。”艾米认同的点头。
"Yes. That would bring more happiness to more people," Amy nodded in agreement.
“是啊，这瓶酒获得了二十八年前第一届品酒大会的金奖。”埃菲点点头。
"Yes, this bottle of wine won the top prize in the first liquor tasting event 28 years ago." Eiffie nodded.
“是啊，这老板看起来很年轻，真能酿出好酒？”也有大臣疑惑道。
A courtier also doubtfully said, "Yes. This boss looks very young. Can he really brew great drinks?"
“是啊，这还是麦米餐厅第一次歇业如此长的时间。”迪克斯点头，有些敬佩道：“也就是麦老板这样厨艺超绝的大厨，才敢在一家餐厅生意最火爆的时候突然停业一个月，只是为了带孩子出去玩了。”

"Yes. This is the first time that Mamy Restaurant is closed for such a long time." Dicus nodded before saying with admiration, "Only a highly skilled chef like Boss Mag would dare to close for one month during the restaurant's most popular period just to bring his children out for fun."
“是啊，连温妮莎公主和那小老板都关系那么亲密，这小姑娘也不能惹哦。”
"Yeah, even Princess Vanessa and the little boss seemed quite close. This little girl can't be trifled with."
“是啊，长得可爱也就算了，关键还那么优秀，简直不给普通人活路。”卡诺非常赞同的点了点头。
"Yes. It's already good enough that she is cute. Most importantly, she is even so outstanding. She's not giving the ordinary people any chances." Canault nodded in agreement.
“是啊，闻着好像是酒香，但哪有香味如此浓郁的酒啊。”
"Yes. It smells like liquor's aroma, but where can we find liquor that smells so good?"
“是啊，麦格先生真容大揭秘，加上之前已经颇有名气的鱼香茄子菜谱教学，双重爆点加持，才有了这样奇迹的销量。”编辑也是点头承认。
"Yes. Mr. Mag's face reveal in addition to the recipe tutorial for the popular eggplant with garlic sauce caused this sales miracle." The editor nodded in agreement.
“是啊，麦米餐厅是混乱之城生意最好的餐厅，不过排队是非常公平的入场顺序，而且排队氛围很好，所以客人们都愿意排队等候进场。”卡诺点头，看了一眼前边仅剩的三位客人，笑着道：“您别着急，很快就能轮到我们了。”

"Yes. Mamy Restaurant is the most popular restaurant in Chaos City, but lining up is a very fair system to decide the sequence to enter, and the atmosphere when we line up is great, so many customers are willing to line up to enter." Canault nodded. He flicked a glance at the three customers in front of them, and smilingly said, "Don't worry, it will be our turn soon."
“是啊，麦米餐厅的服务员小姐姐们都特别漂亮。”卡诺深以为然的点头。
"Yes. Mamy Restaurant's service staff are all so beautiful." Canault nodded in agreement.
“是啊，麦老板不光菜做得好，写美食教程也是一等一的好手，甚至让我怀疑他以前是不是写过美食评论？有隐藏的马甲？”加兰深表同感。
"Yes. Boss Mag not only cooks well, he's also excellent at writing cooking tutorials. I even wonder if he has written food reviews before? Did he have another identity?" Garlan concurred.
“是坏蛋吗？”
"Is it a bad egg?"
“是她。”坐在角落位置的那埃菲点点头，看着艾米也是有点诧异道：“没想到小家伙还会自己出来买早餐呢。”
"It's her." Eiffie, who was sitting in a corner, nodded. She also said with surprise when she saw Amy, "I didn't expect the little one to come out and buy breakfast by herself."
“是她救了我们。”麦格说道。
"She saved us." Mag said.
“是她？！”希利的眼睛顿时一亮，这小姑娘看起来冰雕玉琢一般精致可人，小小的一只，可身上却已经散发着令人暗暗心惊的魔法气息。

"It's her?!" Seely's eyes lit up. This little girl looked so exquisite as if she was carved out from a piece of jade. She was very tiny, but she already had a shocking presence of magic emanating from her.
“是安妮在关键时刻解救了我，那一道闪电将她与克苏鲁分离。她是善良的化身，在她的身上没有一丝一毫的恶，就像一个刚刚出生的婴儿，所以我将她收养为女儿，并且对所有人隐瞒了她的来历。”麦格说道。

"It was Annie who had saved me at the critical moment. A lightning severed her from Cthulhu. She's the incarnation of kindness. There isn't any hint of evil on her. She was just like a newborn infant. That's why I adopted her and concealed her identity from everyone." Mag said.
“是我从那个女人那里要来的，能够屏蔽安妮身上的气息，防止那些东西找上她。”麦格解释道。
"I got it from that woman. It could block off the aura on Annie so those things would not look for her," Mag explained.
“是我酿的新酒，本来打算在麦米餐厅推出的，但现在看来在塞班酒馆用正合适。”麦格探出脑袋来解释道，顺便指了指一旁的酒柜角落摆着的那两排瓷白色的小酒坛，“那是茅台酒，你要是感兴趣的话，一会吃晚饭的时候可以试试。”

"They're the new liquors that I made. I have intended to introduce them in the restaurant, but I think they're just nice for Saipan Tavern now," Mag explained as he poked his head out. He also pointed at the two rows of small white porcelain wine urns displayed in the corner of the wine cabinet. "That is the Maotai. You can try it later at dinner if you are interested."
“是我，进来吧。”麦格用百变面具换了张脸，两人认不出来也正常。
