"It's alright, I can settle the cashier's role." Irina waved her hand calmly.
“没关系，等过两天我自己回去操作。”麦格也不放心让别人操作，那可是核动力的印刷机，要是操作失误自爆了，那混乱之城可就真是核平了。

"It's fine.I'll return to operate it myself two days later." Mag wasn't going to let someone else operate it either. That was a nuclear-powered printing machine. If it exploded due to mishandling, Chaos City would be completely leveled.
“没关系，麦格先生说的都是实话。”埃菲摇摇头，脸上重新露出了微笑，“就像您说的，和我父亲酿的泰坦酒相比，我酿的酒不值一提，甚至辱没了他的名声。”

"It's alright. What you said is true." Eiffie shook her head. SHe siled and said, "It's just like what you said, the wine and I brewed can't even be compared to the one my father brewed. It would even sully his name."
“没办法，人的精力是有限的，有时候必须要作出取舍。”
"It can't be helped. Everyone has their limits. Sometimes, you must know how to give and take."
“没当真就好，写小说和画漫画死路一条，这玩意啊，还真不是谁都能做的，我一天骂哭十几个画手和脚本编剧。”老板笑了笑道。
"It's good that you are not serious about it. Writing novels and drawing comics is a dead end. Not everyone can do it. I make 10-odd illustrators and authors cry daily," the boss said with a laugh.
“没想什么呢，是我昨天晚上睡觉的时候得到了一个……”
"I'm not thinking about anything. When I was sleeping last night, I received a…"
“没想到两位也来了。”麦格把酒菜放下，微笑道。
Mag put the things down and smilingly said, "I didn't expect the two of you to come too."
“没想到你还认得我。”中年那人也有些诧异。
"I don't expect you to remember me." That middle-aged man was quite taken aback too.
“没想到洛都还有这么厉害的厨师，虽然只做了三道菜，但这道凉拌猪耳朵和夫妻肺片一样好吃呢。”温妮莎夹了一片凉拌猪舌头喂到嘴里，然后又沉迷了。

"I didn't expect Rodu to have such a good chef. Even though there are only three dishes, this pig ears salad is as good as the husband and wife lung slice." Vanessa took a slice of pig tongue, and put it into her mouth. She fell right into it.
“没想到竟然吃完了！”希利看着而面前的空盘子，有些惊讶的想着，这些菜刚上来的时候，他还有些担心吃不完会浪费。

I didn't expect that we could finish all that food! Seely, who looked at the empty plates in front of him, thought in a shock. He had just been worried that they wouldn't have been able to finish that food, and would have wasted it.
“没想到竟然还有人比我们来的更早，不应该吃那顿午饭的。”矮胖中年人也是后悔不已。
"I didn't expect that there were people who came earlier than us. We shouldn't have eaten that lunch." That short and fat middle-aged man was also very regretful.
“没想到罗莫街也变得如此萧条落寞了。”一个穿着黑色长袍的中年男人走在罗莫街街头，看着街道两旁关门招租的店铺，轻叹了一口气。
"I didn't expect Romo Street to become so desolate as well." A middle-aged man in a long black robe walked on Romo Street, sighing when he saw the shops by the street closed and put up for rent.
“没想到还真碰到傻子了？！”费奇欣喜若狂，作为一个练习时长两年半的中介练习生，他现在依旧没有掌握中介界的黄金忽悠术，开单全靠运气。

I didn't expect to really meet a fool! Fitch was ecstatic. As an agent trainee who had been practicing for two and half years, he still hadn't gotten the grasp of the golden lying skills in the agents' world. His deals were all closed based on luck.
“没想到这种事情竟然又发生在埃菲老板的身上，真是命运不公啊。”
"I can't believe something like this actually happened on Boss Eiffie. Life is really unfair."
“没想到这老板还有个这么乖巧可爱的女儿。”亚伯罕不禁想起了麦米餐厅，也不知道小老板和麦老板现在走到哪了，还真是有些怀念麦米餐厅的美食了。

I didn't expect this boss to have such an adorable daughter. Abraham couldn't help thinking about Mamy Restaurant. He wondered where Boss Mag and Little Boss were now. He really began to miss Mamy Restaurant's delicious food.
“没想到，这么快就能抱上大腿。”麦格点点头，不需要亲自出手解决一些小问题，自然是最好不过的。
I didn't expect to have a sugar daddy so quickly. Mag nodded. It was naturally the best if he did not have to handle some small problems personally.
“没找到？”伊琳娜不知道什么时候下楼来了，站在厨房门口倚着门框，看着熬着粥有点走神的麦格。
"You didn't find him?" Irina came downstairs, and watched Mag, who was cooking the porridge in a daze, as she leaned against the door frame.
“没有。”系统倒是回复的干脆利落又迅速。
"It's not available." The system's answer was short and sweet.
“没有人派我来，是我自己来的！我知道她们今天赚了很多钱，我缺钱。”巨汉低吼道，布满血丝的眼睛死死盯着麦格。
"No one sent me. I came myself! I knew they earned a lot of money today. I need money." The big guy roared lowly as he stared at Mag with bloodshot eyes.
“没有，他的命属于雪莉尔，我不会杀他。”伊琳娜摇摇头。
"No. His life belongs to Shirley. I would not kill him." Irina shook his head.
“没有，对方比较狡猾，我拿到了地点，但那里没有人，应该是有人盯梢，得看到埃菲小姐的确出现在那里，才会有人出来接头。”麦格摇头道。

"No. The other party is very cunning. I got the location but there was no one there. There should be someone keeping watch. They would only appear when Miss Eiffie shows up." Mag shook his head and said.
“没问题吗？”希利看了一眼那两个兽人，眉头微皱。
"Will there be any problems?" Seely looked at those two orcs, and frowned slightly.
“油条制作太危险，蛋黄酥和豆腐脑的制作又过于繁琐，不是小主能够掌握的，所以现在能够选择的只有扬州炒饭和皮蛋瘦肉粥，我建议您做更简单的皮蛋瘦肉粥。”系统建议道。

"It's too dangerous to make the youtiao, and the procedures for the salted egg yolk pastry and tofu pudding are too complicated. They are not what you could master easily. Therefore, the only choice right now is the Yangzhou fried rice or the congee with pork and congee with pork and century egg. I suggest that you make the congee with pork and century egg. It's simpler," the System suggested.
“油条配豆浆，或者来一份扬州炒饭，皮蛋瘦肉粥也挺好的，豆腐脑有些麻烦，但炒鸡好吃，偶偶还会加一个蛋黄酥……”

"Youtiao with soybean milk, or a helping of Yangzhou fried rice, the congee with pork and century egg is pretty good too. The tofu pudding is a little too troublesome, but the stir-fried chicken is good, and sometimes we would add a salted egg yolk pastry…"
“波比，今晚喝一杯去？”兵部衙门，一位神态沉稳的中年官员从后边拍了拍波比的肩膀说道。
"Bobby, how about we grab a drink tonight?" a mature middle-aged official said as he tapped on Bobby's shoulder at the Ministry of Defense.
“注意看我的吃法哦。”麦格和两个小家伙说了一声，低头轻轻咬了一口包子皮。
"Watch closely at how I eat it," Mag told the two little fellows and bit gently on the dumpling skin.
“泰坦酒馆也有一款酒打算参加品酒大会，只是我觉得在口感上还差了些，想请哈迪斯先生帮我品鉴一番，看看是否有可以改进之处。”

"Titan Tavern is also intending to take part in the liquor tasting event but the wine that we are sending is rather lacking in texture. I hope you could help me taste it and see if there's anything I can improve on."
“洛拉啊，你看这点心盒又大又圆，像不像那火锅的盆啊……”
"Lola, this snack box is big and round. Doesn't it look like a hot pot…"
“活了半辈子，不如一个四岁的小姑娘系列。”
"We are not even a four-year-old girl's match."
“活活吓死的？”麦格在远处看着渐渐熄灭的火焰，侧头看着伊琳娜问道。
"Shocked to death?" Mag turned to ask Irina a question after watching the distant fire being put out.
“流星啊，请赐予我永远吃不完也吃不腻的美食吧！”
"Meteor shower, please bless me with a delicacy that could never be finished and I would never be sick of!"
“浪费我一盘凉拌猪耳朵，这份，我拿走了。”亚伯罕从桌上拿走了一份凉拌猪耳朵，想了想，又顺走了一旁凉拌猪舌头。
"You wasted a plate of my pig ears salad. I'm taking this away." Abraham took the set of pig ears salad away from the table, thought for a while, and took the pig tongue salad along with him as well.
“海伦娜显然不是什么知错能改的人，这个老太婆的偏执我深有领会，绝对不会承认自己是错的。”伊琳娜摇头，眉头微皱道：“那她极有可能在这次运动的热度下降之后，开始对那些参与者进行清算。”

"Helena isn't that kind of person who will turn over a new leaf. I know very well how stubborn that old woman is. She's never going to admit that she was wrong." Irina shook her head with a frown, and said, "Then, she's most probably going to go after those protesters after the movement dies down a little."
“海伦娜竟然没有派兵阻止和逮捕游行的精灵，海伦娜这一次又有什么阴谋？”斯纳尔站在一处二层小楼的二楼窗口，看着街道上渐渐汇聚了越来越多精灵的游行队伍，和远远看着游行队伍的零散护卫队，皱了皱眉。

"Helena actually did not deploy troops to arrest the marching elves. What does she have up her sleeves again this time?" Snarr stood at the window on the second floor of a two-story building. He watched as more elves joined the march, and observed the sparse dots that were the guards around the march as he frowned.
“淡淡的烟熏味是威士忌的特色，并非酒的品质问题，当你接受这个设定的时候，你就会发现这酒同样令人着迷。”麦格微笑着解释道。

"The faint smokey taste is the whiskey's specialty. It's not the problem of the liquor. After you accept that setting, you will discover this liquor is also equally intoxicating." Mag explained smilingly.
“混乱之城那么好，你回来做什么？是麦米餐厅不香吗？”温妮莎有些不解。
"Chaos City is so nice. Why are you back here? Isn't Mamy Restaurant nice?" Vanessa couldn't fathom it.
“混蛋！”安德烈将手边高高一摞奏章扫到了地上，恼怒的叫道。
In the royal study, Andre swept the documents that were piled up high onto the floor, and yelled angrily, "Bastard!"
“混蛋！”骑士提剑向着那黑袍人扑去，黑袍人虽然身形鬼魅，却还是被斩了几剑，突然闪身后退，宽大的黑袍突然向后落下，露出了他的面庞。

"Darn!" The knight pounced at the man in a black robe with his sword. The man in a black robe might seem like a phantom, but he still suffered several cuts. He suddenly darted backward, and the black robe fell off to reveal his face.
“混蛋！混蛋！混蛋！”奥斯特听着属下汇报的兽人族伤亡情况，骂咧咧的摔了一张桌子。
"Scoundrel! Scoundrel! Scoundrel!" Auster smashed a table after hearing the report on the number of deaths and casualties of the orcs.
“渣渣~”
Crunch, crunch~
“渣渣渣。”
Crunch, crunch, crunch.
“渴……水……”没等麦格开口，伊琳娜自己便有些迷糊的说道。
"Thirsty… Water…" Before Mag could open his mouth, Irina was already mumbling.
“滚开！”
"Scram!"
“满足了吗？”麦格从厨房里出来，看着正枕着丑小鸭的肚子小憩的艾米，笑着问道。
Mag came out from the kitchen. He looked at Amy, who was resting on Ugly Duckling's little tummy, and smilingly asked, "Are you satisfied?"
“火已经烧起来了，那就让我们再吹一场大风吧。”道格拉斯冷冷一笑。
"The fire is already raging. Then, let's create a gale." Douglas smiled coldly.
“火焰可以融化钢铁，而冰霜可以让他们重新凝固。”艾米看着切断的台面说道。
"Fire can melt steel, and ice can solidify it again," Amy said as she looked at the broken kitchen counter.
“火锅就挺好的。”伊琳娜说道。
"Hot pot would be fine too," Irina said.
“灭火！然后把那些胆敢造反的卑劣家伙全部抓起来！”管家冷声下令。
"Extinguish the fire! Catch all those despicable fellows who dare to revolt!" The butler coldly ordered.
“灰神殿消息，洛都几位兵部大臣的家遭到了屠杀，满门屠尽，然后一把大火全烧了。”麦格将手中的信递向伊琳娜。
"News from the Gray Temple. Some of the military's senior courtiers were attacked. Their entire families were massacred and then burnt." Mag passed the letter to Irina.
“炸弹。”
"Bombs."
“烟雾太大，他们没看清就互相残杀，太残忍了，我都不敢多看。”麦格挥手赶去烟雾，把埃菲没名堂的龟甲缚解开，只是重新绑住手脚。

"The smoke was too thick and they began to kill each other without a clear vision. It's too cruel. Even I don't dare to look." Mag waved away the smoke and undo the tortoise shell bonds for Eiffie. He only tied up her hands and legs after that.
“烤肉肉！我喜欢！”艾米眼睛一亮，果然立刻就忘了日记的事情。
"Roast meat meat! I like it!" Amy's eyes lit up. Indeed, she forgot about the diary immediately.
“爱妃小姐是想听点好听的话，还是听点真实的评价。”麦格看着她问道。
"Miss Eiffie, do you want to hear something nice or something real?" Mag asked her.
“爱妃？”麦格扫了一眼对面那家装修风格颇有巨人风格的泰坦酒馆，礼貌性的握了一下这位老板娘的手，“你好，我是哈迪斯，也打算开一家酒馆。”
"Eiffie?" Mag threw a glance at Titan Tavern opposite—which had a giant's renovation style—and shook the lady boss's hand courteously. "Hello, I am Hades. I intend to open a tavern too."
“父亲大人、母亲大人，昨天安妮姐姐画了一本画册哦，我去拿给你们看。”吃过早餐，艾米突然说道。
"Father, Mother, Big Sister Annie drew a picture book yesterday. I'll bring it over to show you guys," Amy suddenly said after breakfast.
“父亲大人万岁！”艾米跳下椅子，抱着麦格的脖子亲了一下他的脸颊。
"Hooray!" Amy jumped off her chair, put her arms around Mag's neck, and gave him a peck on his cheek.
“父亲大人你看，这是安妮姐姐画的画呢。”艾米的声音打断了麦格的沉思，他低头看向递到他眼前的画，眼睛一亮。
"Father, take a look at this. This is Big Sister Annie's drawing." Amy's voice interrupted Mag's deep thoughts. He looked down at the drawings that were passed to him, and his eyes lit up.
“父亲大人先来一个。”艾米伸手抓了一只蛋黄酥，直接递向麦格。
"Father will have one first." Amy reached out to grab one salted egg yolk pastry, and passed it to Mag.
“父亲大人最好了！”艾米雀跃的举起两只小爪爪，开心的伸手从竹屉里捏起一只灌汤包放到自己的碟子里，然后继续低头吃了起来。
"Father is the best!" Amy raised her two little hands happily and reached out to put a soup dumpling on her plate. After that, she continued eating.
“父亲大人真的好厉害。”艾米微微张着嘴巴，眼睛里满是崇拜。
"Father is really so formidable." Amy opened her mouth slightly with admiration in her eyes.
“父亲大人说过，生死之外，都是小事，杀了我，你就是自杀，你拿什么惩罚我呢？”艾米歪头，微笑着问道。

"Father said that other than life and death, everything else is nothing. If you kill me, you're committing suicide. So what are you going to punish me with?" Amy asked with a smile and a tilt of her head.
“父亲大人说，你打不过我的，所以，你就认命吧。”
"Father said that you can't beat me, so resign to your fate."
“父亲大人，什么时候才能轮到我们的酒呢？还有……什么时候可以吃东西呢？”艾米看着麦格小声问道，这种场合对于小家伙来说实在是太无聊了，看着台上的糕点已经忍不住咽了好几次口水。

"Father, when will be our turn? And...when can we eat?" Amy asked Mag softly. Such an event was really too boring for the little one. She had already gulped a few times, staring at the cakes on the stage.
“父亲大人，今天要记得招揽客人哦。”艾米见麦格发呆，小声提醒道。
Amy saw that Mag was in a daze, so she softly reminded, "Father, remember to go get customers today."
“父亲大人，他们是谁？”艾米抱着丑小鸭正准备上楼，看着进门来的希利和卡诺，有些好奇的问道。
Amy was about to go upstairs with Ugly Duckling in her arms. When she saw Seely and Canault come in, she curiously asked, "Father, who are they?"
“父亲大人，你也想吃吗？”艾米仰头看着麦格，犹豫了一会，还是笑着把手里的蜗牛递向了他，“那给你吃吧。”
"Father, do you want to eat it too?" Amy looked up at Mag. After a moment of hesitation, she passed the snail to him with a smile, "You can have it, then."
“父亲大人，你也要和我们一起去吗？”
"Father, are you coming with us too?"
“父亲大人，你今天睡懒觉了哦。”艾米笑着说道。
"Father, you overslept today," Amy smilingly said.
“父亲大人，你们是在说今天中午选哪家餐厅吃饭吗？”艾米歪头看着两人，好奇的问道。
Amy tilted her head, and curiously asked, "Father, are you guys talking about which restaurant we are going to have lunch at this afternoon?"
“父亲大人，你没事吧？”艾米从车上跳下来，冲到麦格面前，关心的问道。
"Father, are you alright?" Amy asked with concern as she jumped off the ride and rushed to Mag.
“父亲大人，你知道吗？”艾米求助的看着麦格，萌萌的大眼睛盯着他。
"Father, do you know it?" Amy looked at Mag with her big and cute eyes, seeking his help.
“父亲大人，嘛时候可以吃蛋黄酥酥呢？”艾米歪头看着站在一旁的麦格，满是期待的问道。
"Father, when can we eat the salted egg yolk pastry?" Amy tilted her head and asked Mag expectantly.
“父亲大人，天上在下流星雨呢！”艾米突然从楼上跑下来，从楼梯处探了个脑袋出来，惊喜的叫到。
Amy suddenly ran downstairs, and poked her head out from the staircase as she exclaimed, "Father, it's raining stars!"
“父亲大人，好困啊，可以去睡觉觉了吗？”艾米揉着惺忪的眼睛，从门口探出了一个小脑袋。
"Father, I am very tired. Can we sleep now?" Amy rubbed her sleepy eyes as she peeked her little head into the kitchen.
“父亲大人，对面的酒馆好像有人在闹事呢？”穿着小熊睡衣的艾米拉开窗帘，看着对面被撞开了大门的泰坦酒馆，回头说道。

Amy in her little bear pajamas, pulled open the curtains, looked at Titan Tavern that had its front door broke open, turned her head around and said, "Father, seems like someone is making trouble in the tavern across?"
“父亲大人，我也来帮忙吧。”艾米搬了个小板凳过来，也是学着麦格的样子从盆里抓了一把绿豆，不过绿豆被她放在手里一搓，就变成了绿色的爆米花。

"Father, let me help too." Amy moved a little stool over. She copied Mag, and picked up a handful of mung beans from the pot. However, when she rubbed the beans in her hands, they turned into green popcorn.
“父亲大人，我们上楼去玩了。”艾米和安妮收拾好酒具，非常识趣的给两个成年让出了足够的空间。
"Father, we're going upstairs to play." Amy and Annie cleared up, and left the adults with enough space.
“父亲大人，我们为什么不卖烤肉肉呢？要是卖烤肉肉的话，肯定会有更多的客人来喝酒吧？”艾米看着在铁板上滋滋冒油的肉，咽了一下口水道。

Amy stared at the sizzling meat and gulped before saying, "Father, why are we not selling grilled meat meat? There will definitely be more customers coming here to drink if we sell grilled meat meat, right?"
“父亲大人，我们什么时候可以出去玩呢？就像上次去那海岛上一样，我喜欢装扮成其他模样的感觉。”中午营业结束，艾米凑到刚脱了厨师服坐下的麦格身前，满是期待的望着他。

"Father, when can we go out to play? Like the time we went to the island. I like the feeling of dressing up as another person." After the lunch service was over, Amy went over to Mag, who had just taken off his chef's suit and sat down, and looked at him expectantly.
“父亲大人，我们今天去哪里玩呢？”艾米头上戴着小兔帽，仰头看着麦格，满是期待的问道。
Amy put on her little bunny hat, looked up at Mag, and expectantly asked, "Father, where are we going to play today?"
“父亲大人，我们要饿死了……”艾米的声音从门外传来。
"Father, we're starving..." Amy's voice came from beyond the door.
“父亲大人，我刚刚看到对面酒馆的阿姨拦住你了呢，你们认识吗？”麦格一进门，艾米便迎上前来，说道。
As soon as Mag went in, Amy came to him and asked, "Father, I saw that auntie from the opposite tavern stop you just now. Do you know each other?"
“父亲大人，母亲大人今天这么早就睡觉了吗？”艾米好奇的问道。
"Father, is Mother already asleep so early?" Amy asked curiously.
“父亲大人，母亲大人，你们是不是又背着我们去吃好吃的了？！”艾米有些幽怨道。
"Father, Mother, did you two go out for good food behind our backs again?!" Amy said begrudgingly.
“父亲大人，每个坏蛋都这么有钱吗？”艾米两眼亮晶晶的望着麦格，似乎发现了财富密码。
"Father. are all baddies so rich?" Amy looked at Mag with glowing eyes, as though she had found the secret to wealth.
“父亲大人，灌汤包是什么呢？”艾米有些挪不动脚，好奇的问道。
"Father, what is soup dumpling?" Amy asked curiously without moving.
“父亲大人，这个拍黄瓜超好吃，客人们肯定会喜欢的。”艾米吃着拍黄瓜，已经把手里的盆放下，开心道。
"Father, this Smashed Cucumber Salad is really good. The customers would definitely love it," Amy said happily as she placed the basin in her arms down while eating the Smashed Cucumber Salad.
“父亲大人，这个蜗牛可以吃吗？”艾米练手捧着那大蜗牛，满是期待的看着麦格问道，这是她见过的最大的蜗牛了。
"Father, can this snail be eaten?" Amy held onto that big snail and asked Mag expectantly. This was the biggest snail that she had ever seen before.
“父亲大人，这些邻居好好哦。”艾米面前的桌子上摆满了各种吃食，都是那些前来祝贺的邻居们送的。
"Father, these neighbors are so nice." The table in front of Amy was filled with food. They were given by the neighbors who came to congratulate them.
“父亲大人，这些都是我们今天晚上要吃的黄瓜吗？我觉得好像有点多呢。”艾米看着麦格再次拿起一根黄瓜，忍不住好奇的问道。
"Father, are these cucumbers what we would be eating tonight? I think it's a little too much," Amy could not help but ask when she saw Mag pick up yet another cucumber.
“父亲大人，这是什么啊？”艾米第一个下楼来，看着正在给田螺去尾的麦格好奇的问道。
Amy was the first to come downstairs. "Father, what is this?" she asked curiously as she watched Mag.
“父亲大人，这黄瓜就是蘸着吃吗？”艾米问道。
"Father, is this cuucmber eaten dipped?" Amya sked.
“父亲的酒窖里藏了一些酒，不过他在每一个酒窖外贴了封条，只有到了时限才能打开，这些年我只打开了其中一个小酒窖。”埃菲说道。
Eiffie said, "Father did keep some liquor in the cellars, but he had placed a seal on every cellar. I can only open it when it's due. I have only opened one small cellar in all these years."
“父亲被邻居的漂亮姐姐拉进泰坦酒馆一个小时，而后扶腰而出。”正在窗口写日记的艾米看到这一幕又，又在日记本上加了一句。

"Father was pulled into Titan Tavern for one hour by a pretty big sister. He came out with his hand on his back." Amy, who was writing her diary by the window, saw that scene and added that into her diary.
“父亲，你在哪里？”
"Father, where are you?"
“父亲，你是在偷偷瞄母亲吗？”一个小脑袋凑了过来，接着又有两个小脑袋凑了过来。
"Father, are you peeking at Mother?" A little head appeared, followed by another two little heads.
“父亲，危……”艾米瞪大了几分眼睛，今天的日记不知道还写不写。
"Father. Dang…" Amy's eyes widened, wondering if she still had to write today's diary.
“父亲，麦米餐厅什么时候会重新营业啊？”帕默看着关着门的餐厅，仰头看着杰尔吉问道。
"Father, when is Mamy Restaurant opening again?" Parmer looked at the shut door of the restaurant, and then looked up at Gjerj.
“爷爷。”诺亚上前，梅兰特虽然还没有苏醒，但从他的状态来看，至少是脱离了危险。
"Grandpa." Noya went up. Although Merante had not regained consciousness, it seemed that his life was no longer in danger.
“爷爷啊，咱们在这山里转悠了两天了，鬼影都没有发现一个，会不会是方向错了啊。”诺亚坐在铁背鹰脖子上，一边啃着干粮，一边说道。

"Grandpa, we've already been walking around this mountain for two days, and we didn't even see a single shadow. Are we walking in the wrong direction?" Noya, who was sitting at the steel eagle's neck, said while munching on some dried goods.
“爷爷！”诺亚急着想要扑上前。
"Grandpa!" Noya wanted to rush up.
“爷爷，为什么我觉得她好像变得有些不同了？”诺亚有些回过神来，诧异的看着悬浮在半空中的伊琳娜。
"Grandpa, why do I feel that she looks a little different?" Noah sort of regained his wits and he stared at Irina, who was hovering in midair, with bewilderment.
“爷爷，你不吃点叫化鸡和佛跳墙再干活吗？”诺亚的声音从背后响起。
"Grandpa, don't you want to eat the beggar's chicken and 'Buddha Jumps Over the Wall' before you work again?" Noah's voice sound behind them.
“爷爷，你什么事情想不通？”诺亚好奇的问道。
"Grandpa, what don't you understand?" Noya asked curiously.
“爷爷，你别动。”诺亚连忙扶住他，看着麦格祈求道：“麦老板，求求你救救我爷爷吧。”
"Grandpa, don't move." Noya quickly supported Merante. He looked at Mag, and begged, "Boss Mag, please save my grandpa."
“爷爷，你还好吗？”
"Grandpa, are you okay?"
“爷爷，那我们现在该怎么办？”
"Grandpa, what shall we do now?"
“爷爷，麦老板是不是把我们给忘了啊。”诺亚眼巴巴的望着房间角落里那座简易传送阵，咽了咽口水。
"Grandpa, did Boss Mag forget about us?" Noah stared at the simplified teleportation portal in the corner of the room and gulped.
“牛。”费奇则一脸敬佩的冲着麦格竖起了大拇指，中介费倒是没有少他的，但他的确错估了这位哈迪斯先生，这哪是什么啥都不懂的萌新，这简直是老油条啊。
"Wow." Fitch gave Mag a thumbs-up with admiration. He still got his commission, but he had indeed underestimated Mr. Hades. This was no noob. He was an experienced, wily old fox.
“牛肉也好了，自己夹哦。”
"The beef is done too. I'll get it on my own."
“玛拉。”埃菲嗔怪的瞪了她一眼，看着麦格微微点头，“泰坦酒的酿制便是如此。”
"Mala." Eiffie glared at her. She then turned to nod at Mag. "Titan Liquor's brewing is like that."
“玛拉，你说哈迪斯先生为什么要邀请我们去吃饭呢？”
"Mala, why do you think Mr. Hades is inviting us over for lunch?"
“玛拉，你躲到最里面的酒窖去，无论发生什么事情都不要出来。”埃菲起身，把玛拉往通道里推去。
"Mala, go hide in the innermost cellar. No matter what happen, don't come out." Eiffie stood up and pushed Mala into the walkway.
“玛拉，别说了。”埃菲冲着小丫鬟摇了摇头。
"Mala, cut it out." Eiffie shook her head at the little maid.
“玛拉，我要出去了，我不能让哈迪斯先生因为我遭受横祸。”
"Mala, I have to go out. I can't let anything untoward happen to Mr. Hades because of me."
“玛拉？”埃菲也是有些惊讶的看着玛拉。
"Mala?" Eiffie looked at Mala in shock as well.
“玩归玩，闹归闹，但调好的酒你们可不能喝哈，当然，我可以作为试喝员帮你尝尝味道，这方面，我还是比较专业的。”麦格看着已经兴致冲冲的开始做调酒准备的两个小家伙提醒道。

Mag looked at the two little ones, who couldn't wait to try out mixing the cocktails, and reminded them, "You may play with them, but you cannot drink the finished cocktails. Of course, I can be the tester to try the taste for you. I'm still the professional in this area."
“现在……安德烈多半……也是一个头，两个大。”伊琳娜晃晃荡荡的走到门口，然后不自觉的往麦格的怀里倒来。
"Right now… Andre is probably… stumped." Irina staggered to the door and into Mag's embrace without realizing.
“现在你就是我最想战胜的困难。”艾米嘟嘴。
"You are the challenge that I want to overcome the most right now." Amy pouted.
“现在只能等亚历克斯和安德烈的谈判结果了，如果他能够说服安德烈加入和平联盟，并且签订和平协议，各族便能通力合作，解决魔鬼和亡灵军团。”路易斯微微点头道。

"We can only wait for the results of Alex and Andre's neogotiation. If he can get Andre to join the Peace Alliance and sign the peace accord, then all the races can work together and resolve the devil and its Army of the Dead." Louis nodded and said.
“现在咱们罗莫街也就泰坦酒馆能看到一些客人了，还是埃菲老板的手段厉害，酒量更厉害，这么多年，就没见过谁能把你喝趴下的。”一旁的面馆老板有些钦佩的看着埃菲。

"Customers can only be seen at Titan Tavern on Romo Street now. Boss Eiffie has good business methods, and holds her drink well. I have never heard that anyone defeated you when it comes to drinking." The noodle shop boss looked at Eiffie with admiration.
“现在就出发吗？”伊琳娜走下楼来，看着麦格问道。
Irina came downstairs, and asked Mag, "Are we setting off right now?"
“现在就出发？”伊琳娜从楼上下来，已经完成了换装，穿上了一身黑色的紧身夜行服，将她凹凸有致的身材完美凸显。
"Are we setting off now?" Irina came downstairs. She had changed, and was dressed in tight black clothes that showed her perfect curves.
“现在就是还不清楚古老者那边究竟是什么立场，如果他们能够参战，有再多的古尸也只是炮灰，哪怕只有一架战舰，杀伤力也胜过许多十级强者。”麦格皱眉。

"We're still not sure about the Elder Things' stand right now. If they could part in the war, the ancient corpses will just be cannon fodder no matter how many of them there are. Even the lethality of one battleship is many times of dozens of 10th-tier powerhouses combined." Mag frowned.
“现在怎么搞？看来乔修的确已经变成了魔鬼的傀儡，连布卢姆都杀了，恐怕接下来还会杀更多的人，挑起战争，吸收更多的怨气。”路易斯靠在窗边，看着坐在桌边的道格拉斯问道。

"What's going on now? Seems like Josh has indeed become the devil's puppet. He has even killed Blum. I'm afraid he will kill more people to start a war so that he can absorb more resentment," Louis, who was next to the window, told Douglas, who was sitting at the table.
“现在我们应该担心的是克苏鲁和乔修，只要把他们解决，亡灵军团不攻自破。”伊琳娜微微摇头。
"What we should worry about now are Cthulhu and Josh. As long as we resolve them, the Army of the Dead will be resolved too." Irina shook her head gently.
“现在没有封条了，而你拥有了三百桶三十年份的正宗泰坦酒。”麦格微笑道。
"It's no longer sealed, and you now have 300 barrels of 30-year-old Titan Liquor." Mag said with a smile.
“现在精灵族一片混乱，我有些不明白海伦娜究竟在想什么，以她的性格，不可能任由情况这样恶化下去，不受控制。”伊琳娜眉头微蹙，有些不解的说道。

"The Elves are in a mess right now. I am a little unclear about what Helena wants to do. Given her character, she would not let things spiral downward like this uncontrollably," Irina said in bewilderment as she furrowed her brows.
“现在要去哪里？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"Where are we going now?" Irina asked Mag.
“现在距离餐厅营业结束还有一个多小时，不如我们先出去散一会步吧。”卡诺为了缓解自己的尴尬，提议道。
Trying to alleviate his embarrassment, Canault suggested, "It's about an hour more before the restaurant closes, why don't we go out for a walk first?"
“现在这种局势，谁也不知道明天和意外哪个先来到，假如这是食全食美最后一刊，我希望能够在杂志历史上留下点什么。”加兰的目光扫过在场的每一个人，“我知道诸位都是热爱这个行业，热爱食全食美的杂志人，一切皆有可能，不是吗？”

"In the current situation, no one knows if tomorrow or an accident is to come first. If this is going to be Perfect Food's last issue, I hope it can leave a mark in the magazine's history." Garlan's gaze swept over everyone present. "I know every one of you loves this industry. As someone who loves Perfect Food, anything is possible, right?"
“现在，就看安德烈打算怎么处理此事了。”伊琳娜脸上也是露出了笑容。
"Now, we'll just have to see how Andre decides to settle this." Irina smiled.
“现在，我就是你，你就是我……”
"Now, I am you, and you are me…"
“现在，我带你们离开这里，开始新的生活。”伊琳娜看着下方那些精灵们，大声道：“你们自由了！”
"Now, I'll bring you away from here and start your life anew." Irina loudly said to the elves below, "You're free now!"
“现在，我要来看看我的零食大礼包了。”艾米看着脑海中那个金闪闪的大礼包，满是期待的点开。
"Now, I want to check on my snack's gift package." Amy looked at that shiny gift package in her mind, and clicked it open expectantly.
“现场有护卫看守，喏，那边就有两个，屋顶上还藏了一个，周边都是官员府邸，发生了这种事情，巡逻已经加强了许多，十几支巡逻队交叉巡逻，随便一点生意就能把他们引来，你们要是有把握，就可以下去看看。”麦格淡定道。

"There are guards there. Look, two there and one hiding on the roof. And all around, there are other guards. When something like that happens, they will definitely increase patrols, with tens of patrolling troops overlapping. Any sound will attract them over. If you've got what it takes, you can go over and take a look," Mag said calmly.
“理论上来说是不可能出现这种状况的，龟甲石是神物，对于魔气有着非常敏锐的感知能力，而且现在又有这怨念加持，除非他的实力已经强悍到能够保证不然一丝魔气外泄的程度，否则必然会被龟甲石察觉。”梅兰特摇头。

"Theoretically, this should not happen. The septaria oracle is a divine object, and it is very sensitive to the evil aura. Right now, with the resentment, it would definitely detect the evil aura unless he was already so powerful he could ensure that he would not leak out any evil aura at all." Merante shook his head.
“理论上来说是这样的，但这需要一个铁匠作坊，先将钢铁融化，然后再……”
"Theoretically, it is true. However, it would need a blacksmith to first melt the steel in his workshop and then…"
“生意难做啊，那群客人，要是不陪他们喝两杯，下次酒不来了。”埃菲叹了口气。
"Business is bad. If I don't drink with those customers, they won't come again." Eiffie sighed.
“生活体验值是什么？”艾米被这游戏一般的设定吸引了，她最近偶偶会和父亲一起玩游戏。
"What are life experience points?" Amy was attracted to the game-like setting. She would occasionally play some games with her father.
“生活体验系统绑定中……”
"Adding Life Experience System…"
“生活体验系统，是为了让小主获得更好的生活体验而存在的，困难或许会有，但只要战胜了困难，一切都会变成沿途最美的风景。”系统道。

"The Life Experience System exists to allow the Little mistress have a better life experience. There may be difficulties, but as long as you overcome the challenges, everything would become a beautiful scenery along the journey," the System said.
“生活就是一段修行，我们会因为外物产生喜、怒、忧、思、悲、恐、惊等正面或者负面情绪，情绪便是生活体验非常重要的衡量标准。
"Life is a learning journey. We would have joy, anger, worry, longing, sadness, fear, shock, and other negative and positive emotions. Emotions are a very important measurement to life experiences.
“生活，还是要继续啊。”波比把酒塞重新塞回了酒瓶，目光渐渐坚定，“前辈，你未完成的志愿，接下来就由我来完成吧，而那害了你和你一家的家伙，我一定会让他付出代价的。”

"Life… has to go on." Bobby stuffed the cork back on the bottle of wine, and had a resolute expression. "Senior, let me take over all your unfinished wishes. As for the fellow who harmed you and your family, I will make him pay."
“生蜗牛可不好吃，只有在饿的没办法的时候，我们精灵才会生吃蜗牛。”伊琳娜从艾米手里拿走了那只蜗牛，重新放回到了树上。
"Live snails don't taste nice. We elves only eat the snails live when we are too hungry and have no other choices." Irina removed that snail from Amy's hands and put it back to the tree again.
“用乔修的方式陷害他，想来他得知这个消息，应该会挺开心的。”
"Framing him using Josh's method. I think he would be rather happy if he found out."
“用言语很难形容这汤的味道，它是如此的美味，如此的鲜美，在我品尝过的食物之中，没有能够与之比拟的。”
"It's difficult to describe this taste of this soup. It's so exquisite and fresh. None of the food that I have tasted before can compare to it."
“用错魔法了吧？！疗伤怎么能用圣光呢？！应该用治疗术啊！”诺亚惊道，想要上前阻拦。
"Is that the wrong spell?! How can you use the Holy Light for treatment?! You should use your healing magic!" Noya exclaimed in shock. He went up immediately, wanting to stop Irina.
“由古老者管控的地下世界似乎秩序井然，而诺兰大陆却任由各种族征战，完全是养蛊模式啊。那各族所谓的神灵又在哪里？天上？还是地下？”麦格继续思考。

"The underground world managed by the Elder Things seemed to be very orderly. Meanwhile, in Norland Continent, the various races were allowed to go on war freely. This is some bewitching going on. I that case, where are the so-called gods of the various races? In the sky? Or underground?" Mag continued to ponder.
“男人兜里没钱，腰杆就是硬不起来啊。”麦格幽幽叹了口气，从兜里摸出了晚上刚收的几个金币在手里抛了抛。
"If a man has no money in his pocket, he can never stand up tall." Mag sighed and took out the few gold coins he collected last night, tossing them in his hand.
“男人变态有什么错？”
"What's wrong with a man being perverted?"
“男人嘛，谁没点野心。”麦格微微点头，这倒是个不错的理由。
"All men have ambition." Mag nodded and found that as a good reason.
“男爵真是好福气……酸了。”
"The Baron is so lucky... I'm jealous."
“男的？”伊琳娜表情有些古怪。
"A guy?" Irina had a weird expression.
“男神？”麦格皱眉，“这不是美食杂志吗？怎么还有男神这种东西啊？”
"Idol?" Mag frowned. "Isn't this a gourmet magazine? Why is there an idol in there?"
"Picture book?!"
“画的非常好，漂亮，有趣，而且把一个故事讲好了。”麦格看着安妮，满是欣慰，就像是找到了一个优秀的童工。
"It's very nicely drawn. It's beautiful and interesting, and it tells the story perfectly." Mag looked at Annie with gratification, as if he had just found an excellent child laborer.
“的确是这样的。”库尔特也是笑着跟上。
"That's indeed the case." Kurt followed after him with a smile.
“盛情难却啊。”麦格轻叹了一口气。
"It's hard to reject her." Mag sighed softly.
“目前我们只有一款酒，而且是越卖越少，这个价格虽然贵了些，但问题不大。”埃菲微微摇头，轻叹了一口气都：“至于以前的熟客，只能等我自己酿的泰坦酒能够重新拿出来待客的时候，再推一个低年限的泰坦酒。”

"Currently, only we have this liquor. On top of that, the liquor would decrease the more we sell it. The price might be a little higher but that should not be a problem." Eiffie shook her head slightly. She sighed and said, "As for the regulars, they could only wait for me to brew the Titan Liquor and wait for the launch of a shorter-year Titan Liquor brew."
“目前来看，是存在这种可能。”系统答道。
"Looking at it now, there is such a possibilty." The system answered.
“直接去和安德烈谈判？”
"Go straight to negotiate with Andre?"
“相信您酿造的美酒，能够在品酒大会上一鸣惊人。”
"I believe the liquor that you brewed will wow on the liquor tasting event."
“相比之下，就算是让温妮莎当女王作为过渡，都是一个不错的选择。”麦格若有所思。
In comparison, letting Vanessa be the queen as the transition is a good choice too. Mag was thoughtful.
“看他傻头傻脑的样子，一看就是新手，随便听点吹捧的话，肯定就猴急的要交钱，从此踏入深渊。”

"Look at his silly look, and you know he is a noob. He will definitely pay in a hurry as long as you say some flattering words to him, and he will get himself in deep trouble from that point onwards."
“看似青铜，实则王者！”
"She looks like a noob, but is, in fact, an expert!"
“看吧，我说他们不需要再来一瓶的。”艾米双手托着下巴，看着被抬走的两人笑着说道。
Amy propped her chin on her hands and smilingly said as she watched them being carried away, "See, I said they won't need another bottle."
“看来不止我们在盯着这件事。”道格拉斯看着手中的情报，有些惊讶的说道。
Douglas looked at the intel in his hand with surprise, and said, "Seems like we are not the only ones monitoring this event."
“看来以后泰坦酒馆又是一个好去处了！”
"It seems Titan Tavern would be a good place to hangout again!"
“看来你们之前的判断是对的，黄金龙岛下的封印与兰克斯特有关，他已经向魔鬼出卖了灵魂。”多米尼克沉声道，神情中有着几分遗憾。

"It seems your previous conjecture was right. The seal beneath the Golden Dragon Island is realted to Rankster. He had already sold his soul to the Devil." Dominic said solemnly and had a hint of pity in his eyes.
“看来你对这家餐厅挺了解的，经常来吃？希利回头看着卡诺。
Seely turned around, and asked, "Seems like you know this restaurant very well. Do you often come here to eat?"
“看来参加这个比赛，还是有点价值的。”伊琳娜接过奖杯，伸手弹了一下，酒杯发出而悦耳的声音。
"Seems like joining this competition is quite worth it." Irina took the trophy and flicked it with her finger. The trophy made a crisp sound.
“看来塞班酒馆的下酒菜有三道了。”麦格满意的点点头，然后退出了厨神试炼场。
"Seems like Saipan Tavern will have three dishes to go with the drinks." Mag nodded in satisfaction before exiting from the test field for the God of Cookery.
“看来她已经提前收到通知了。”卡米拉说道。
"Seems like she has received the notice in advance," said Camilla.
“看来安德烈并不想让其他人知道这件事，所以哪怕被他儿子坑了一道，回来之后依旧自己默默抗下这一切。”道格拉斯冷声道：“可我们不能让他就此揭过，如果连他也被魔鬼控制的话，诺兰大陆便再无宁日。”

"It seems like Andre doesn't want anyone else to know about it. Even when his son has done him a misdeed behind his back, he would rather undertake all this silently himself after he came back," Douglas coldly said. "But we can't let him cover this up. The Norland Continent will never have peace if the devil assumes control over him too."
“看来就算是神，也要稍微节制一些啊。”麦格在心里叹了口气，无视了脑海中浮现的蓝色药丸的广告。
"It seems like even gods have to practice restrain." Mag sighed to himself.
“看来我们要去一趟洛都了，我打算把餐厅歇业一个月，带着艾米和安妮前往洛都，寻找乔修的踪迹。”麦格看着伊琳娜说道。
Mag looked at Irina, and said, "Seems like we need to make a trip to Rodu. I decided to close the restaurant for a month, and bring Amy and Annie to Rodu to look for Josh."
“看来艾米昨晚做了一个有趣的梦。”麦格嘴角也还挂着笑意，虽然他的笑点没伊琳娜那么低，但也的确被艾米讲的一些冷笑话给笑到了。
"Seems like Amy had a funny dream last night." Mag was still smiling. Although he wasn't as easily amused as Irina, he was still very much entertained by Amy's lame jokes.
“看来贫穷的确会限制人的想象力。”
"It seems poverty would limit one's imagination."
“看来这又是一个难解难分的夜晚。”麦格将红酒倒入醒酒器，猩红的酒液微微摇晃，就如这夜色一般让人迷醉。
"It seems it would be a night of entanglement once again." Mag poured the red wine into a decanter and swirled the red liquid. It was just as intoxicating as the night.
“看来这就是从龙岛之下跑出来的那一只。”伊琳娜的神情也是变得无比凝重，手中捏住了数张一次性符咒。
"Seems like this is the one that escaped from under the Dragon Island." Irina's expression turned very grave too. She was grabbing a few one-time-use talismans.
“看来这是个圈套，他从一开始就知道我们要来。”
"Seems like it's a trap. He knew that we're coming right from the start."
“看来这系统也有些寒酸啊。”
"It seems this system is quite stingy too."
“看来，你也赞同伊琳娜的做法。”海伦娜看着莎莉。
"Seems like you agree with what Irina did." Helena looked at Sally.
“看来，这炒饭也没有想象中那么糟糕嘛，大家好像都还挺喜欢的。”艾米拿起勺子，满是期待的舀了一勺炒饭喂到嘴里。
"Seems like this fried rice isn't as bad as I thought. Everyone seems to like it." Amy picked up her spoon and popped a spoonful of it into her mouth.
“看着不错，先尝尝这酒鬼花生如何。”亚伯罕直接上手，捏起一颗花生丢进嘴里。
It looks not bad. I will try these drunkard peanuts. Abraham reached out and threw a peanut into his mouth.
“看起来好像蜗牛啊。”艾米凑上前，眼睛亮晶晶的盯着它，又是很快抬头看着麦格：“那蜗牛可以吃吗？我昨天在后院看到好多呢。”

"It looks like a snail." Amy inched over and stared at it with her eyes shining bright. She quickly looked up at Mag and asked, "In that case can snails be eaten? I saw many in the backyard yesterday."
“看起来有些油腻，我就喝粥吧。”伊琳娜表示拒绝，端过皮蛋瘦肉粥，她受伤的肠胃需要暖粥的安抚。
"It looks rather greasy. I will just eat the congee." Irina declined it and went for the congee with pork and century egg. Her injured stomach needed the comforting from the warm congee.
“看，又有个傻子被大头带来看店铺了，不知道他会不会着了道。”酒馆老板娘目光迷离的看着麦格，笑容中透着几分嘲讽。
"See, Big Head is bringing another idiot here to look at the shops. I wonder if he will be swindled." The tavern's lady boss looked at Mag with a glazed gaze and a mocking smile.
“真好看，不知道可不可以让麦老板也帮我绑一个呢……”姑娘脸蛋微红道。
"Yes, indeed. I wonder if Boss Mag can tie my hair for me too…" the maiden said with a blush.
“真是一个乖巧懂事的孩子。”希利目送艾米上楼，称赞道。
Seely watched Amy go upstairs, and praised, "What an obedient child."
“真是一个固执的老男人！”系统给了麦格一个标注。
"What a stubborn old man!" the System tagged Mag.
“真是一个狡猾可怕的家伙。”诺亚握拳。
"What a sly and scary fellow." Noya clenched his fists.
“真是善良的好孩子。”工作人员由衷的称赞道。
"What kind children," the staff member praised sincerely.
“真是幸福有钱的一家人啊，令人羡慕。”
"What a rich and happy family. I am so envious."
“真是让人羡慕嫉妒……”
"How envious…"
“真没了。”
"None."
“真的一滴都没了……”
"Not a single drop left…"
“真的假的？做梦都能学做菜吗？”伊琳娜半信半疑的看着麦格。
"Are you for real? Can you learn to cook in your dreams?" Irina looked at Mag with doubt.
“真的吗？”艾米眼睛一亮。
"Really?" Amy's eyes lit up.
“真的吗？中午也可以去蹭饭吗？！”玛拉已经从后边跑了出来，满脸写满了惊喜，点着脑袋道：“好的，我们一定会去的，谢谢小艾。”
"Really? Can we really go have lunch at noon!?" Mala already ran out from the back with surprise on her face and nodded. "Alright. We'll definitely be there. Thanks, Ay."
“真的吗？！”
"Really?!"
“真的吗？！”小丫鬟惊喜道。
"Really?!" The little maid said with surprise.
“真的吗？！”玛拉一脸认真的看着埃菲。
"Really?!" Mala looked at Eiffie seriously.
“真的就这么一小瓶？”梅兰特有些不信，伸手把诺亚的衣服翻了一遍。
"It's really just this small bottle?" Merante was still in disbelief. He reached over, and searched Noya.
“真的是零食大礼包欸！”艾米惊喜道。

“真的走了？”艾略特有点不太相信。
"Is she really gone?" Elliot couldn't quite believe it.

Eiffie said to Mag with gratitude, "Thank you so much, Mr. Hades."
“真的！”
"Really!"
“真的？”温妮莎有些不信。
"Really?" Vanessa was in disbelief.

"Really?" Noah threw a glance at the tiny candy in Amy's palm and gulped.
“真的？！”诺亚眼睛一亮，在深山老林里转悠了两天，吃不好，住不暖，可憋屈了，能去洛都这样的大城市，简直令人兴奋。
"Really?!" Noya's eyes lit up. After staying in the mountains for two days, without eating well or staying warm, he was excited to finally be able to go to a big city like Rodu.

"What do you intend to do if we really catch up with them?" Elliot looked at him.

"Fire! Fire!"

“祖父，洛斯帝国边境已封锁，现在只有和平联盟各族留有必要的通道，但商人被限制出入，恐怕此次要生大变故了。”希尔站在湖边，看着抱着暖炉，提着一根细竹竿在冰面凿开的窟窿垂钓的伊恩·巴菲特说道。

"Grandfather, the borders of the Roth Empire have been closed. "Congratulations, Teacher Vivian," Mag said with a smile. He knew Vivian had intended to go be a teacher at the Chaos School. He didn't expect her to end up at the Hope School.

"Would gods catch a cold too?" Mag muttered under his breath as he rubbed his nose.
“神灵已经降下旨意，圣女才是解决此次浩劫最重要的存在。”教皇却是微微摇头，“找到她，说服她，让她带领教廷破除浩劫，保护这个世界才是我们现在最重要的事情。”

"The Holy See has already given the instruction. The holy maiden is the most important existence to resolve this catastrophe." The pope shook his head slightly instead. "Find her. Convince her. Let her lead the Holy See through this catastrophe. Protecting this world is our most important concern now."
“禀陛下，从现场遗留的痕迹来看，应该是兽人干的，能够做到这一点的，至少是十级兽人，但据查，那日兽人族的十级强者都在暮光森林，这痕迹有造假的可能。”在他身后，一道影子渐渐凝实，一个全身被黑袍包裹的人微微躬身答道。

"Hold on." Mag went upstairs, and came down in all black as well. However, he was wearing a loose black robe and a large hat whose shadow could cover his face completely.
“窖藏三十年的泰坦酒可以每日供应五十瓶！当年马库斯大师竟然藏了如此多的好酒！”
"Titan Liquor that had been kept for 30 years and there would be a supply of 50 bottles everyday! Master Marcus actually hid so many good wine back then!"
“立刻向生命之城发起求援，然后飞鹰传书给大祭司，就说伊琳娜杀死了布鲁斯特家族数百守卫和兵士，劫走三千奴隶，往西南方向逃窜而去了，布鲁斯特家族已经派出兵士追击，请求支援。”艾略特下令道。

Elliot ordered, "Ask for reinforcement from the City of Life immediately and then send a letter with the eagle to the High Priestess. “竟然是脆的！”
"It's crunchy!"
“竟然跑了呢，有趣……”
"They actually escaped. Interesting..."
“竟然都是新菜啊，你什么时候偷偷背着我学的？”伊琳娜看着三道下酒菜，有些意外道。
"They are all new dishes. When did you learn it behind my back?" Irina was surprised when she saw the dishes.
“章鱼小丸子好好吃！”
"The octopus ball is so good!"
“章鱼须加工厂少了一台切割机，他们应当是知晓旧日支配者的存在，并且多半站在善良守序阵营，否则摧毁封印对他们而言轻而易举。”系统答道。

"A cutting maching from the octopus processing plant is missing. They should be aware of the Great Old Ones' existence and should most probably be on the side of kindness and order. Otherwise, it would be a piece of cake for them to destroy the seal," the System replied.
“笨蛋系统，不许说我父亲大人的坏话！”艾米生气道。
"Stupid System, you're not allowed to speak badly about my Father!" Amy said angrily.
“笨蛋，我们的客人都没什么钱，十铜币一杯的酒还嫌贵呢，涨价？再涨连这点客人都维持不住了。”埃菲没好气的伸出青葱手指弹了一下小丫鬟的脑门。

Eiffie flicked a finger at the maid's forehead with exasperation. "Silly girl. Our customers are not rich. They even thought that 10 copper coins for a glass of liquor was expensive. Increase the price? We're going to lose this group of customers too if we do so."
“第一组，第一瓶酒，来自卡鲁斯酒馆的卡鲁酒，得分31分！”主持人很快介绍道。
"The 1st group, the first bottle. It's the Karoo Ratafia from the Karoo Tavern. 31 points." The host quickly announced.
“第三十二组，第三瓶酒，来自里斯酒馆的爆炸酒，得分48分！目前的最高分！”主持人的声音都不禁提高了几分！
"The 32nd group, the third bottle. It's the Explosive Liquor from Reese Tavern. 48 points! The highest score now!" The emcee couldn't help raising his voice a little!
“第五十五组，开始品酒。”主持人的声音都有些沙哑了。
"The 55th group. Begin the tasting." Even the emcee's voice sounded hoarse.
“等……等我换个衣服。”伊琳娜扭头看向衣柜。
"W-wait for me to get changed." Irina turned to look at the closet.
“等一下。”埃菲重新按住麦格，“我还有一瓶酒，请哈迪斯先生再帮我品一品。”
"Hold on." Eiffie pressed Mag down again. "I have another bottle of wine. Please help me try it."

"Wait a sec." Mag reached out to stop Amy who was about to bite the head of that snail off.
“等一下。”麦格叫住他，从口袋里摸出了一枚银色的戒指，上前交给她。
"Wait a sec," Mag called out to her. He took out a silver ring from his pocket, and passed it to her.
“等一下，小艾不是喜欢吃甜品吗，昨天有个朋友送了些糕点，我给你拿一些。”埃菲叫住艾米，转身进去，很快提了一个小竹篮出来，里边装满了各种吃的。

"Wait a sec. Ay loves to eat desserts, right? A friend gave me some pastries yesterday. Let me give you some." Eiffie stopped Amy and went back to to get a little basket filled with all kinds of goodies.
“等一下，抱歉啊两位老板，这酒馆，我不转了。”酒馆老板却是笑着摇头道。
The tavern's boss shook his head smilingly. "Wait a sec. I'm sorry, gentlemen. I'm not selling this tavern anymore."
“等一下，楼下有个重伤员急需治疗，要不你先给她来个治疗术再睡吧。”麦格连忙扶住她，不让她倒下。
"Wait. We have an injured patient downstairs. Why don't you treat him first before going back to sleep." Mag quickly held her up so she would not lie back down.
“等一会你们就知道了。”麦格却卖了个关子。
"You'll find out later." Mag kept it mysterious.
“等等……这些食物……为什么会出现在这个世界？！”
"Hold on… this food… what are they doing in this world?!"
“等等我。”路易斯也是连忙跟上。
"Wait for me." Louis followed behind quickly.
“等等！”费奇叫住了走到办公室门口的工作人员，深吸了一口气，道：“算了，还是我自己去吧。”
"Hold on!" Fitch called the staff back. he took a deep breath and said, "Forget it. I'll go on my own."
“等等，你这不按套路数啊。”
"Wait, you can't do this."

"Forget it, leave them be for now. No matter how advanced they are, they are still made of flesh and blood. If they really come knocking, I can only hack their heads off." Mag shook his head and left.
“算了，我直接去买一本回来以证清白。”麦格无奈的向着那书店走去，他其实也想看看食全食美的这期杂志做得如何，是否能够达到他预期的宣传效果。

"Forget it. I will just go buy one copy to prove my innocence." Mag walked towards that bookshop with exasperation. In actuality, he also wanted to see what the Perfect Food did with this issue. Could it achieve his anticipated effects of publicity?
“算了，说了你也不会懂，你又不会做菜。”那姑娘有些鄙夷的收回了目光，带着几分清贵道：“这才是我们吃货的男神，一个身来就是为了改变吃货世界的男人。”

"Forget it. You won't understand even if I tell you. You don't even cook." That young maiden retracted her gaze disdainfully before nobly saying, "He is the idol of us chowhounds. A man who was born to transform the world of chowhounds."
“算算多少钱，我一起结账。”埃菲取出钱袋。
"How much are they? I'll pay for them as well." Eiffie took out her money bag.
“米娅小姐，我们要一只烧鹅，一份红烧肉，一份鱼香茄子，还有一份麻婆豆腐，一个剁椒鱼头，还有给这两位先生再续一杯冰啤。”卡诺熟练的说道。

"Miss Miya, we want one helping of roast goose, one helping of red braised pork, one helping of the eggplant with garlic sauce, and one helping of the steamed fish head with diced hot red peppers, and please give these two gentlemen another mug of beer each," Canault said with familiarity.
“精灵族那边，现在情况如何？”
"What's the situation like at the Elves' side?"
“糟糕！中计了！”
"Oh no. We've been tricked!"
“系……小米觉得它已经非常完美了呢。”艾米把统咽了回去，说道。
"Sy… Seriously, Amy baby thinks it's perfect already," Amy baby swallowed her words.
“系统对于一个陌生世界的了解，除却通过天道获得的基础信息之外，也是要进行探索才能知晓的。”
"A System's understanding of a foreign world could only be known through exploration other than obtaining basic information from God."
“系统，你变了！”
"System, you have changed!
“系统，你在吗？”
"System, are you there?"
“系统，你确定那东西能定位成功吧？没电了怎么办？”麦格在心里嘀咕道。
"System, are you sure that thing can locate her accurately? What if the battery died?" Mag murmured inwardly.
“系统，你能不能搞一个地底世界探测器，直接打穿地壳的那种，我现在高度怀疑这些家伙藏在地底之下，可能还在下面建立了一个新的世界。”

"System, can you get me a underground world detector? The kind that can go right through to the core of the earth. I am highly suspecting that these fellows are hiding underground and might have even built a whole new world down there."
“系统，你说古老者的智者们会不会迷失在三年高考五年模拟的海洋里？”麦格关上门，突然有点心疼那些即将被知识的题海洗礼的智者们。

"System, do you think the wise men of the Elder Things will lose themselves in the ocean of the practice exercise books for the college entry exams?" Mag closed the door and suddenly felt a little sorry for those wise men who were about to get "batipsed" by those knowledge and questions.
“系统，发生什么了？”艾米在心里问道。
"System, what happen?" Amy asked inwardly.
“系统，我需要一点奇怪的知识。”麦格在心里说道。
"System, I need some weird knowledge." Mag said inwardly.
“系统，有没有二手印刷机卖啊？”麦格在心里问道。
"System, do you sell second-hand printer?" Mag asked inside.
“系统，要不你把我娇妻在怀，萌娃在侧，飞剑斩敌，挥斥方遒的样子，发一点给当初咒我的厨师瞧瞧嘛。”麦格在心里道。
"System,why don't you send pictures of me with my beautiful wife, cute children, and wielding a sword to slay enemies to those chefs who cursed me back then?" Mag said inside.
“系统，请你以后不要再发布什么让我做早餐的过分任务，这是对一个拥有着完美厨艺的父亲的侮辱。”艾米在心里认真的说道。

"System, please don't issue anymore unreasonable mission such as asking me to make breakfast in the future. This is an insult to someone who has a father who has perfect culinary skills." Amy seriously said inwardly.
“系统，这不会是个机器人吧？一个没有感情的杀手？”麦格在心里问道。
"System, this isn't a robot, right? She's also not an assassin with emotions, right?" Mag asked inwardly.
“系统，这可是一个有高等文明存在的世界，人家都开星际战舰，玩电磁炮了，我弄个火炮应该不算过分吧？
"System, this is a world where an advanced civilization existed. They are already driving intergalactical battleships and using electromagnetic guns. It isn't too much for me to use cannons, right?
“系统，这就是你所谓的高等级文明的存在吧？要是我们把她捕捉了，你能研究出多少东西？”麦格在心里说道。
"System, is she the so-called advanced civilization? How many things can you study out of her if we capture her?" Mag said to the system inwardly.
“系统，那我算是完成任务了吗？”艾米在心里问道。
"System, in that case, have I completed my mission?" Amy asked inside.
“绑了一个女人。”麦格在那条木凳上坐下，将那块令牌随手丢进了那个黑色的孔洞，神情漫不经心，目光却是在细细打量着那幽黑的孔洞。
"Kidnapped a woman." Mag took a seat on the wooden stool and threw that tablet into that black hole. He looked as if he did not care but was actually carefully observing the hole.
“结账，请给我打包一份酒鬼花生。”晞取出金币放在桌上，看着麦格说道。
Xi placed a gold coin on the table and said to Mag, "Bill, please. I would like to takeaway a helping of drunkard peanuts too."
“绕开它们！”伊琳娜一边给阿紫施加治疗魔法，一边冷静的下令道。
Irina applied healing magic onto Ah Zi while coldly instructing, "Avoid them!"
“给你。”艾米把掌心里的糖倒到诺亚的手上。
"For you." Amy placed the candy on Noah's hand.
“给你一个月的时间，等我回来的时候，我希望酿酒厂的朗姆酒已经可以出厂销售了。”麦格看着她笑着说道。
"I'll give you one month's time. When I return, I hope the rum from the brewery can be ready for sale," Mag replied smilingly.
“给安妮印画本的，那是一台可以彩印的机器，能够印制有颜色的画本。”麦格解释道。
"It's for Annie to print her picture books. That's a machine that could print colored picture books." Mag explained.
“给小爷爬！”
"Crawl for me!"
“给我找到他，但关于这件事的任何消息，我都不想在其他地方听到。”安德烈冷声道。
Andre coldly said, "Find him. However, I don't want to hear anything about this incident anywhere else."
“给我把凶手找出来，无论是谁，我都要他死！”安德烈愤怒的声音响彻御书房。
"Find me the murderer! No matter who it is, I want him dead!" Andre's furious howl rang through the royal study.
“给米娅留了一封信，和其他没有说。”伊丽莎白摇头，“我不擅长道别。”
"I left a letter to Miya. I didn't tell the rest." Elizabeth shook her head. "I'm not good at saying goodbye."
“给，水。”麦格连忙把苹果汁递上前。
"Here, water." Mag quickly passed her the apple juice.
“继续吃饭吧。”
"Let's eat."
“继续查，我倒要看看究竟是谁敢在朕的洛都做出这样的事情。”安德烈下令道。
"Continue with the investigations. I want to see who exactly dares to do something like this in my Rodu," Andre ordered.
“继续说。”伊琳娜双手抱胸，不为所动。
"Go on." Irina wrapped her arms in front of her chest.
“罗莫街……”麦德勋思考了一下，突然眼睛一瞪，有些惊讶的看了一眼埃菲，又是看着麦格道：“那岂不是和泰坦酒馆在同一条街上？”
"Romo Street..." Madison thought for a while before widening his eyes and flicked a glance at Eiffie. Then, he said to Mag, "Isn't it on the same street as Titan Tavern?"
“罗莫街的房价真的会涨？他们都说你亏了。”伊琳娜有点不信道。
"Will the property prices at Romo Street really go up? They all said that you've made losses," Irina said in disbelief.
“罢了罢了，咱们再去寻其他店铺便是。”矮胖中年人叹了口气，起身向着店外走去。
"Forget it. Let's go look for other shops." The fat and fat middle-aged man sighed and walked out of the shop.
“羊羊真可爱，烤起来更美味！”
"The sheep are so cute. They taste even better when they are grilled!"
“美酒协会是由美酒爱好者牵头成立的组织，从本质上来说，是消费者协会。”埃菲微笑着说道。
"The Wine and Liquor Association is an organization founded by alcoholic drinks lovers. In essence, It's a consumer association." Eiffie said smilingly.
“老大！隔壁街的楼突然塌了，好像还埋了个人！”一个衙役快步跑进院子。
"Chief! A building in the next block suddenly collapse and someone seems to be buried underneath it." A constable jogged into the yard quickly.
“老婆，你听我狡辩……”麦格心态有点崩，连忙把埃菲扶正，正色道：“埃菲小姐，请你放尊重一点。”
"Honey, listen to my excuses…" Mag was about to go crazy. He quickly propped Eiffie up straight, and said, "Miss Eiffie, please watch your behavior."
“老巫婆……还是有些东西的……”伊琳娜趴在紫纹狮鹫背上，目光渐渐迷蒙，然后陷入了昏迷之中。
"That old witch… still has some things up her sleeves…" Irina lay face down on the griffin's back. She slowly lost her focus, and lost her consciousness.
“老板你等一下。”汉娜转身进了一旁的酒窖，不一会就拿了两坛酒出来。
"Wait a sec, Boss." Hannah went into the cellar at the side, and came out with two bottles of rum.
“老板娘你看，对面那家酒馆门口这会就聚了不少客人呢。”泰坦酒馆里，小伙计看着刚午睡下楼来的埃菲说道。
In Titan Tavern, Eiffie just came downstairs after her nap, and a server told her, "Look, Lady Boss. That tavern opposite already has many customers congregating at this time."
“老板娘，再来一瓶酒！”一声吆喝从酒馆里传了出来。
"Lady boss, another bottle!" A shout came from the tavern.
“老板娘，那你以后就不卖酒给我们喝了吗？3000铜币实在太贵了，我们就算一个月不喝酒也喝不起啊。”一个中年男人苦笑道。
"Lady boss, are you not selling drinks to us anymore? 3000 copper coins is really too expensive. We can't afford it even if we don't drink for a month." A middle-aged man said a bitter smile.
“老板我要来一本食全食美。”
"Boss, I would like to have a copy of Perfect Food."
“老板走的时候说要出去玩一个月，估计还要再玩半个月吧。”雪莉尔拿了一根生黄瓜嚼着，用来缓解嘴唇的麻辣感。

"Boss said he would be gone for a month before he left. He probably woul dbe enjoying himself for another half a month," Shirley chewed on a raw cucumber to soothe the burn from the spiciness on her lips.
“老板这下栽了……”
"The boss is in big trouble now…"
“老板，东西给我吧，这是我们家对面新开的塞班酒馆老板的女儿，我帮她提回去，顺便给我用碗盛三碗糊涂汤，一会我让玛拉帮你送回来的。”这时，一道温柔的声音从身后响起。

"Boss, give the things to me. This is the daughter of the boss of the newly opened Saipan Tavern across my place. I'll help her carry them back. Give me three bowls of cucumber soup too. I'll get Mala to send the bowls back to you later." Right then, a gentle voice spoke up behind them.
“老板，人来了。”
"Boss, they're here."
“老板，你们家这酒是论缸卖的吗？”一位客人问道。
"Boss, are you selling your liquor by the vat?" a customer asked.
“老板，你们店里怎么没有卖食全食美的杂志啊？其他店里都卖的非常火爆啊。”麦格扫了一眼店铺，说道。
Mag swept a quick glance in the shop, and said, "Boss, why are you not selling Perfect Food magazine? The other shops are doing a brisk business selling it."
“老板，你参加明天的品酒大会了吗？以茅台酒和威士忌的品质，绝对能够在品酒大会上获得金奖的。”
"Boss, are you joining the liquor tasting event tomorrow? The quality of the maotai and whiskey would definitely bring us some prizes."
“老板，你怎么来了？”不多久，汉娜的声音从麦格身后传来，她快步走上前来，“我听他们说你来了，怎么不直接来找我？”
"Boss, what are you doing here?" Soon, Mag heard Hannah's voice coming from behind. She quickly strode forward. "I heard they said you were here. Why didn't you come look for me right away?"
“老板，你这开门时间还真是分秒不差啊，我们在这里等了这么久，都不让我们提前进去坐一会。”一位客人有些幽怨道，要不是这酒香实在诱人，他可从来没受过这种气。

"Boss, you really open on the dot. You won't even let us in to wait when you see us waiting outside for so long," a customer complained as he had never suffered such grievance before. It was all because that liquor's aroma was simply too enticing.
“老板，她走的时候来向您道别了吗？”亚北米娅留到了最后，看着麦格问道。
"Boss, did she come to bid farewell to you?" Yabemiya stayed back to ask Mag.
“老板，您说什么？”小伙计没听清。
"What are you saying, Boss?" The waiter didn't catch her words.
“老板，请问需要多少钱。”管家拿出钱袋。
"May I ask how much it is, Boss?" The butler took out his money bag.
“老板，那……那冰激凌店还开吗？”亚北米娅的眼眶有些泛红，显然昨晚收到伊丽莎白留下的信后没有睡好。
"Boss, w-will the ice cream shop still be open?" Yabemiya's eyes were a little red. Obviously, she didn't sleep well last night after receiving Elizabeth's letter.
“老爷子，伤势如何了？”麦格打开酒塞，给梅兰特倒了一杯，问道。
Mag pulled out the cork, poured Merante a glass, and asked, "How's your injury, old master?"
“老爷，你还好吧？”一位中年女人从床边坐起身来，拿了一条帕子给他擦拭着头上的汗水，一边关切的问道。
"Master, are you alright?" a middle-aged woman asked worriedly as she sat up beside Bobby, and passed him a handkerchief to wipe his perspiration.
“老爷，带公主殿下去酒馆……会不会不太合适？”管家沉吟道。
"Master, isn't it a little inappropriate to bring the princess to a tavern?" The butler voiced his worries.
“老爷，时候还早，您再休息一会吧，我让他们煮些粥，吃些东西您再去衙门里。”夫人见老爷没有意志消沉，心中暗自松了口气。

"Master, it's getting late. Rest for a little longer. I'll get them to make some porridge so you can have something before going to court." Bobby's wife secretly heaved a sigh of relief seeing that Bobby was not dispirited.
“老爷，现在外边都在传，这家酒馆是您投资开的。”老管家递上丝巾，说道。
"Master, now there are rumors outside that you invested in and opened that tavern," the butler said as he passed Abraham a silk handkerchief.
“老爷，给您准备了点粥，您现在就用餐吗？”管家接着道。
The butler continued, "My Lord, I have prepared some porridge for you. Would you like to have it now?"
“老鼠吗？”房间里，伊琳娜睁开眼睛，慵懒的伸了个懒腰，目光依旧带着几分迷乱，小声嗔怪道：“也不知道温柔一点……”
"A mouse?" Back in the room, Irina opened her eyes and stretched out lazily. Her gaze was still a little confused. She pouted and said, "He should have been more gentle..."
“而且临时加的话，需要做很多工作，今天很难出样刊。”另一位负责排版的主管说道。
Another supervisor in charge of typesetting said, "Besides, we have to do a lot of work if we add it at the last minute. It'll be very difficult to get the sample issue out by today."
“而且今天出门一趟，做了那么多事情，晚上还要开门营业招待客人，一定是又累又困，洗个澡躺床上什么都不想动，立刻就睡着了。”

"Besides, they went out today and did so many things. Then they had to serve their customers at night. They must be very tired. They would probably lie in bed and fall asleep immediately after showering."
“而且她很喜欢你画的画册呢，所以我就把那本美人鱼送给她了。”
"Besides, she loves your picture book so I gave her the one with the mermaid."
“而且我们买下这家酒馆才一天，要是早上就开始营业，人家一进门肯定要怀疑的。”
"Furthermore, we have only bought this tavern for one day. If we open for business the next morning, people will have doubts once they step in."
“联手拦住它，等待支援！”领头的骑士沉喝一声，一脚踏在地上，身形消失在原地，转眼出现在那巨蛇的上方，手中长剑已然出鞘，挥斩而下。

"Let's join forces to stop it and wait for reinforcement!" The leading knight roared. He stomped onto the ground with one leg and disappeared. He reappeared about the snake in an instant and his longsword was already withdrawn. He slashed downwards at it.
“肥瘦均匀才是好食……好鸭子，赶紧行动起来，我会在后边盯着你哦。”艾米神情认真，不容拒绝。
"A good ingred— duck is neither too fat nor too thin. Quick, move it. I will be watching you from behind." Amy had a serious expression. She wouldn't accept "no" for an answer.
“胡说，我是这种不懂事的人吗？”温妮莎睁大了几分眼睛，扮出了几分凶相，只是眼睛瞪圆了，反倒又添了几分可爱。
"Nonsense. Do I look like such an insensible person?" Vanessa widened her eyes, and pretended to look fierce, but only her eyes looked bigger, and she looked cuter instead.
“自己套回来的鹅，感觉更好吃呢。”艾米夹了一块烧鹅肉喂到嘴里，很快就连着骨头都一起嚼了咽下肚，开心的晃着身体道。
"The goose we won feels even tastier," Amy said as she swayed happily. She put a piece of roast goose in her mouth, and very quickly swallowed everything, including the chewed bones.
“自己解决。”麦格掏出一个钱袋，往汉娜面前一推。
"Solve it yourself." Mag took out a money bag, and pushed towards Hannah.
“自由了！”
Free!"
“至少两千铜币一瓶吧，这可是真正的大师遗世珍品，喝一瓶，少一瓶。”
"At least 2000 copper coins. This is a real master's legacy. It's one less bottle left in the world for every single bottle consumed."
“至少这一刻他们是幸福的吧。”安奈林在心中有些感慨的想着，作为这家福利院的负责人，他对每一个孩子都有一些了解。
At least they are happy at this moment, Aneurin lamented inwardly. As the person in charge of this orphanage, he knew a little about each child.
“艾略特并不是一个值得信任的人，他没有胆量与伊琳娜战斗，包括发起任何形式的抵抗。”莎莉平静的说道：“而且，解放奴隶已经在风之森林中达成共识，这是不可抵挡的潮流。”

"Elliot isn't a trustworthy person. He doesn't have the guts to fight with Irina, including having any forms of resistance." Sally calmly replied, "Furthermore, freeing the slaves is already a common consensus in the Wind Forest. This is an irresistible trend."
“艾米说想来看看小伙伴们，我带她过来，顺便给孩子们做了点烤串。”麦格点点头，顺手在一旁的冰激凌机接了一个冰激凌递给薇薇安，“烤串刚好分完，不过冰激凌还是有的。”

"Amy said she wanted to see her friends, so I brought her over, and made some kebabs for the children as well." Mag nodded while making an ice cream from the ice cream machine at the side, and passed it to Vivian. "The kebabs are just finished, but we still have ice cream."
“艾米，你去请埃菲和玛拉姐姐过来吃午饭。”麦格看着艾米说道。
"Amy, go and invite Big Sister Eiffie and Big Sister Mala over for lunch." Mag said to Amy.
“艾米，你来了！”一道小小的身影跑了过来，正是杰西卡。
"Amy, you are here!" A small figure ran over. It was Jessica.

"Peanut with porridge?" Abraham looked at the wooden box filled with drunkard peanuts. He chuckled and threw a peanut into his mouth.
“芳香？”
"Fragrance?"
“若是埃菲小姐信得过我，可带我去看看你的酿酒坊。”麦格看着埃菲说道。
"If Miss Eiffie trusts me, you can bring me to your brewery," Miss told Eiffie.
“茅台是吧，先坐一会，我去整一点下酒菜。”麦格点点头，转身进了厨房。
"Is it Maotai? Take a seat first. I'll go make you some side dishes to go with your drinks." Mag nodded, and went into the kitchen.
“茅台酒——2000铜币一瓶。”
"Maotai—2000 copper coins a bottle."
“茅台酒的香味是每一个好酒之人都无法抵抗的，所以从明天开始，我就倒一杯茅台酒放在酒馆门口，用铁笼子锁着，用来吸引过往的客人和周围的住户。”麦格微笑道。

"The fragrance of Maotai is irresistible to all drinkers. Starting from tomorrow, I will pour a cup of Maotai, and lock it up in a cage at the door to attract the passing customers and surrounding residents," Mag said with a smile.
“茅台酒，两千铜币一瓶，这边还有下酒菜，有需要吗？”麦格提示了一下价格。
"Maotai, 2,000 copper coins a bottle. We have side dishes to go with the wine. Do you need it?" Mag introduced the price.
“茅台酒，应该是一种粮食酒。”波比说道。
"Maotai. It should be a type of grain wine," Bobby said.
“茅台酒？！”看着那酒瓶，波比的记忆一下子清晰起来，他记得昨晚心情郁闷，溜达到罗莫街，结果因为酒香进了一家名为塞班的酒馆。

"Maotai?!" Bobby's memories came back to him immediately when he saw the bottle of wine. He remembered his low feelings, walking at Romo Street, and entering Saipan Tavern because of the wine fragrance.
“茅台？威士忌？”伊琳娜一脸疑惑，她从来没有听说过这两款酒。
"Maotai? Whiskey?" Irina looked confused. She had never heard of these two liquors before.
"Grass[1. Grass in Chinese sounds to the Chinese F-word.]."
“莫非这老板去麦米餐厅取过经？”亚伯罕有些狐疑的回头看了一眼酒柜的方向，那酒馆老板正坐在柜台后一脸淡定的看书。
Could the owner have gone to Mamy Restaurant to learn? Abraham turned to look towards the wine shelf, where the owner of the tavern was sitting behind the counter, reading a book.
“获得绿豆糕基本菜谱一份，需宿主自行探索改进！”
"Mung bean recipe has been issued. The host has to explore and improve the recipe!"
“获得额外奖励：厨神试炼场使用机会3次！信仰之力+10000！”
"Additional reward: three chances to use the test field for the God of Cookery! Power of faith +10,000!
“菜刀用的不习惯嘛，正常的。”伊琳娜看了一眼，淡定道。
Irina flicked a glance and calmly said, "She's not used to holding a chef's knife. It's normal."
“菜单上并未增加新的菜品……”
"There are no new dishes on the menu…"
“营业结束。”麦格翻转了门上挂着的木牌，顺便关掉了招牌灯，第一天营业就这样结束了。
"Closed for the day." Mag flipped the sign hanging on the door, and switched off the light for the signboard. A day had ended just like that.
“蒸馏设备已经调试好了，接下来我要教你如何使用这套设备，用来酿造泰坦酒。”麦格脱掉手套，看着端着茶站在一旁的埃菲。

"The distillation equipment is already set. Next, I will teach you how to use this apparatus to brew Titan Liquor." Mag removed his gloves and looked at Eiffie, who was standing at the side with a cup of tea in her hands.
“虽有五成胜算，但就算最后我们赢了，陛下也将再无可用之兵。”
"Even though there is a 50% of winning, Your Majesty won't have any usable soldiers left even if we won."
“虽然中午我吃了三碗饭，但我觉得现在我又可以了。”
"Although I had three bowls of rice at lunch, I feel that I can eat again."
“虽然奥斯特不太聪明的亚子，可现在自顾不暇的情况下，哪里还有能力在洛都组织一场屠杀。”迈克尔摇头。
"Although Auster isn't too bright, in the current circumstances where he couldn't take care of himself, how could he have the ability to organize a massacre in Rodu?"
“虽然局势动荡，但这不是我们拖更的理由，把麦老板的鱼香茄子教程加进去，就放在麦老板的采访稿后边，封面给最大标题，今天内我要看到样刊，三天后新刊照常发行，让印刷厂做好加印的准备。”食全食美主编办公室，加兰看着在场的编辑部骨干认真道。

In the office of the chief editor of Perfect Food, Garlan seriously said to the main staff of the editing department, "Although the current situation is tumultuous, it isn't a valid reason for us to delay the update. Add in Boss Mag's tutorial of the eggplant with garlic sauce after his interview script. Put it as the biggest headline on the cover. I want to see the sample issue today, and we will release the new issue as usual three days later. Tell the publisher to get ready to print additional copies."

"Although I thought of many things to say, Master said the antagonists died because they talked too much. Silence is an assassin's basic demeanor."Connie retracted her gaze and threw the beast oil lamp in her hand onto the quilt at the side.
“虽然我酒酿的没我父亲好，但我从母亲那里学会了如何做萝卜条。”埃菲微笑道。
"Although the liquor I brewed isn't as good as my dad, I learnt how to make preserved radish strips from my mother." Eiffie smilingly said.
“虽然脑子不太好使，可他真有钱啊……一百多栋楼，再便宜也得过亿了。”旁边的胖老板嗑着瓜子，一脸羡慕。

"Although his brain isn't really functional, he is truly loaded… Over 100 properties. It would have cost over 100,000,000 even if they had been cheap," the fat boss munching on sunflower seeds at the side said with envy.
“虽然马库斯大师走了，但他的传奇又要重新开始了！”
"Although Master Marcus is gone, his legacy is just about to begin!"
“蜗牛也是这样的，可能它没有毒性，但它的口感很糟糕，或者本身带着难以入口的味道，这样的蜗牛也不能被称为可以食用的蜗牛。”麦格接着说道。
Mag continued on, "It's the same with the snails. Perhaps it's not poisonous, but its texture can be very bad or it can have a horrible taste. Such snails are not edible snails either."
“蜗牛品类繁多，其中大多数具有毒性不可食用，而在地球上能够食用的蜗牛品种，例如法国蜗牛、庭园蜗牛和玛瑙蜗牛等，在诺兰大陆上暂时不知是否存在。

"There are many varieties of snails, most of them are poisonous and inedible. Meanwhile, we're not sure if the edible species of snails on Earth, such as the French escargots, the garden snails and achatinella are available on the Norland Continent.
“蜗牛啊……”麦格第一反应是摇头，但略一思考，法国蜗牛可是法国名菜，要说不能吃，那也是不对的。
"Snails..." Mag's first reaction was to shake his head. However, after thinking about it, french escargots was a famous french dish. It was not right to say that snails could not be eaten.
“行。”弗格斯笑着点头，说起来已经很多年没有因为担心无座而去占位置了。
"Sure." Fergus nodded with a smile. Speaking of it, it had been years since they had to worry about getting a seat.
“行了，到时候我去和陛下说说，他要是同意，我就带你去。”亚伯罕笑着道。
Abraham smilingly replied, "Alright. I'll go talk to His Majesty when the time comes. I'll bring you along if he agrees."
“行了，就当做不认识我们，别影响人家做生意。”亚伯罕抬手制止了各位还想继续上前问好套近乎的人。
"Alright, just take it as you don't know us. Don't affect their business." Abraham raised his hand to stop the bootlickers who wanted to come over.
“行了，楼上没有房间了，你们住在酒馆里也不方便，一会我下来带你们去隔壁房子，你们先暂住在罗莫街一段时间吧。”麦格说道，抱着伊琳娜上了楼。

"Alright. There are no rooms upstairs. It's rather inconvenient to have you staying in the tavern. I'll come back down later to bring you to the house beside. You can stay at Romo Street for the time being," Mag said as he carried Irina upstairs.
“行动。”
"Go."
“行吧。”伊琳娜伸出手，一把折叠椅出现在她的手里。
"Alright." Irina reached her hand out, and a foldable chair appeared in her hand.
“行啊，我有几瓶不错的酒可以拿出来喝，不过不包括这瓶。”库尔特笑着点头。
"Sure. I have a few bottles of good wine that I can take out. Not this." Kurt nodded with a smile.
“行家啊。”要是前辈在这里的话，一定会称赞一声。
"Professional." If his senior had been around, he would definitely have praised it.
“行，大人都说好，那我也来一杯试试。”那大臣端起酒杯喝了一口。
"Sure. If you say that it's good, I'll give it a try too." That courtier picked up the glass, and took a sip.
“行，就算是龙潭虎穴，兄弟也陪你走一遭！”
"Sure, even if we're going to a dragon's cave, I will go with you!"
“行，那咱们去尝尝。”卢西恩点头。
"Sure. Let's try it out." Lucien nodded.
“行，那我回去尝尝。”麦格接过酒，口说无凭，他的确想检验一下汉娜用新机器酿出来的朗姆酒是否依旧保持着高水准。

"Alright, I will bring it back and try it out." Mag accepted the rum. Words alone were no proof. He indeed wanted to check if the rum produced by Hannah with the machine still retained a high quality.
“行，酒菜都上了，咱们也不拘束了，喝起。”卢西恩端起酒杯，不忘笑着提醒道：“先和你们提醒一句，这酒可了不得，劲儿大得很，都悠着点喝。”

"Sure. The side dishes are all served. Let's be at ease and start drinking." Lucien raised his glass with a smile, and reminded them, "Let me warn you first, this alcohol is really strong. Drink it slowly."
“衙门那边应该没有为难你吧？”麦格放下碗，问道。
"The court did not make things difficult for you, right?" Mag asked as he put his bowl down.
“衙门那边我已经通知了，他们应该很快就会赶到，把暴徒抓了，这件事也就算了结了。”麦格在车外答应道。
"I've already informed the court. They should be arriving soon to arrest the thugs and this issue will be considered over." Mag answered outside of the carriage.
“被我打跑了啊。”麦格笑着说道。
"I chased him away," Mag said with a smile.
“被打包买走了吗？全部？！”矮胖中年人瞪眼看着费奇道。
The short and fat middle-aged man stared at Fitch and said, "Were they all bought up? All of them?!"
“褶子上有黄点的是蟹黄灌汤包，没有黄点的是普通灌汤包，你们试试喜欢吃哪一种。”
"The ones with a yellow dot on the folds are the crab roe soup dumpling and those without the yellow dot are the normal soup dumpling. Try and see which ones you like."
“要一瓶茅台酒，然后三样下酒菜各来一样吧。”波比看着麦格说道。
"A bottle of Maotai and all three side dishes," Bobby told Mag.
“要不咱们合伙先去罗莫街弄个铺子，也开家酒馆？大哥吃肉，咱们说不定还能喝口汤，毕竟高端酒都是限量的不是。”
"Why don't we go get a shop at Romo Street first and open a tavern too? We might get catch some of the straying customers. After all, all the high-end liquors are limited in quantity."
“要不小艾和小安先去外面玩一会吧，玛拉就在外面，让她带你们去吃好吃的。”埃菲看着艾米微笑着说道。
"Why don't Ay and An go out and play for a while first? Mala is just outside. She can bring you to go eat nice food." Eiffie smilingly said to Amy.
“要不把你送过去吧。”埃菲翻了个白眼。
"Why don't I send you over?" Eiffie rolled her eyes.
“要不是好吃的，以后我就不理你了。”艾米哼了一声。
"If it's not something yummy, I'm going to ignore you from now." Amy snorted.
“要不是罗莫街，的确没有这么便宜的商铺，但也正是罗莫街，它才不应该是这样的价格。”高瘦中年男人笑着摇摇头，伸手指了指不远处那家挂着转让的酒馆，“那就酒馆转让费+一年的租金，也就二十万铜币，接手就能营业，岂不更香？”

"It's true that we can't find such cheap shops if we aren't on Romo Street, but it's precisely why it shouldn't be this price because it's on Romo Street." The tall and lean man shook his head with a smile. He pointed at a tavern that had a "For Sale" sign hanging on its door. "That old tavern's stamp duty + one year's rental is only 200,000 copper coins, and we can start our business as soon as we take over it. Isn't that better?"
“要不要通知衙门那边？我们去的话，会不会有危险呢？”埃菲坐在马车上，看着坐在她对面的伊琳娜和艾米，有点担心道。
Eiffie sat in the carriage. Looking at Irina and Amy sitting across from her, she asked, "Do we need to inform the court? Will it be dangerous if we go there?"

"Why don't we let Firis and the ladies come over to help out?" Irina said to the bothered Mag, "After all, they should be free right now."

"Why don't we join the Peace Alliance too? The Roth Empire is too strong, and we have suffered really heavy losses. We are no longer able to fight against them." One of the chiefs broke the silence.

"I'm going to cry… This is too delicious."

"If everyone had been so clear-headed like you, the Wind Forest and the City of Life would probably have ended up with the Roth Empire," Helena mocked.

“要有素质哦，不许说脏话。”
"You need to have some substance. No cursing."

"In terms of stealth and invisibility, there is no race that does it better than us, the Ghost Clan." Merante smiled confidently.

"The bestselling books have to be the knights' storybooks. Alex's story books were breaking all the sales records back then. Men, women, adults, and children were all crazy over Alex's storybooks. The boss looked wistful, with a hint of nostalgia.

"Rules?" Mag laughed and kicked on the floor. A giant ax flew up and landed on his hand. "I always follow the rules. No one can touch my people. That's my rule."

“警告！警告！警告！请小主注意保密守则！”生活体验系统的警报声立刻响起。
"Warning! Warning! Warning! Please abide by the secret rule!" the Life Experience System's warning alert rang immediately.
“计划的实施并无问题，战争也已经拉开了序幕，你更是靠着那些怨气得到了现在的实力，是有糟糕的家伙打乱了我们的计划，你要找到他们，然后杀死了他们，我会帮你的，这个世界的一切，都将是你的，所有人都将向你臣服。”沙哑低沉的声音在山洞中响起，黑色的影子也是随着微微摇晃。

"There is no problem with the plan's execution, and the war has already started. You have even gained your current power with that resentment. "He's a man who makes people envious…"

"You must have spent a lot of money. Thank you." Mag was clear how much such exquisite coloring books would cost. If it was from a famous artist, its price would be no lesser than 10,000 copper coins.

"Let her wear this ring. Other Cthulhu, no one else could sense her abnormality again.
“让我们为埃菲小姐祈福吧，希望人没事。”

"Let me take a look at what goodies Father made!"

"Remember. Do not open the door no matter who comes along. The door is locked from within. No one can enter."
“评委们的酒量都相当好，一般情况下是没有问题的，而且就算真的有评委喝醉了，也还有几位预备评委可以上台，以保证品酒大会能够正常进行下去。”埃菲微笑着解释道。

Eiffie smilingly explained, "The judges' alcohol tolerance are quite good, so there's no problem usually. Even if the judges were tipsy, there are a few reserve judges that could go up and take their places, making sure that the liquor tasting event could go on."
“评比现场就在前边的大教堂里，应该快开始了，我带你们过去吧。”埃菲和麦格说道。

"Of course, I will try it. I have never gotten drunk." Irina waved her hands, and a small white porcelain wine urn landed in her hand.
“该定一个什么价格呢？”
"What price should I set then?"

"Damn Irina..." Elliot paced around in the room. Then, he suddenly stopped and clapped his hands together. "Yes! We have to go after them!"

"Damned magic caster!" The giant guy spat and took a break. He lifted the axe over his head and tensed up all his muscles. A black glow consolidated on the axe's blade and then he crashed it down hard.
“说了这酒劲大，不信邪吧。”麦格看着沾到他怀里就睡着了的伊琳娜，有些无奈的笑着把她横抱起来，直接送上了楼。
"I told you this was strong, and you didn't believe it." Mag looked at Irina, who had fallen asleep in his embrace, and picked her up with a pampering smile to send her upstairs.
“说人话。”
"Speak properly."
“说什么呢，这种事情是这两个教士朋友能够影响和决定的吗？他们可能也和我们一样还不知道具体发生了什么。”坐在他对面那个兽人拍了一下他的肩膀，然后笑着看着希利道：“抱歉啊，我这位兄弟脾气有些急躁，没有敌意。”

"Why are you asking that? Can these two missionary friends affect and decide on such a matter? Most likely, they don't know what exactly happened, just like us." The orc sitting across from him patted his shoulder, and then smilingly said to Seely, "My apologies. My buddy has a hot temper, but he didn't mean any harm."
“说出来吓屎你们。”麦格嘴角微翘，他自然清楚这些大人们在想什么。
You'd be shocked if you knew. Mag smiled. He naturally knew what these lords were thinking.
“说到乔修来到兵部大院，然后以陛下的名义将各位大臣召去。”麦格顺口接道。
"You said that Josh came to the Ministry of Defense, and then gathered all the courtiers in His Majesty's name," Mag replied.
“说吧。”
"Speak."
“说吧，你是什么东西？为何来找我？又是如何找到我的？”麦格问道。
"Pray tell, what are you? Why did you come looking for me? And, how did you find me?" Mag asked.
“说吧，是谁派你来的？”麦格俯视着巨汉，微笑着说道：“如果你不想另一只手也变成这样的话，最好不要试图耍任何小动作。”
"Say it. Who sent you here?" Mag looked down at the big guy and smilingly said, "If you don't want your other hand to become like that, better not try any tricks."
“说起来，老板他们走了也快两个星期了吧？不知道什么时候会回来呢。”亚北米娅夹了一片毛肚在锅里涮着，有些感慨的说道。
"Say, Boss had left for almost two weeks, right? When would they be back?" Yabemiya lamented as she dipped tripe in the pot.
“说起来，这地方还是波比带我来的。”卢西恩看着站在最边缘的波比说道。
"Come to speak of it, it was Bobby who brought me here," Lucien said to Bobby, who was standing at the edge.
“请多米尼克将军和亚历克斯、伊琳娜进殿！”候在门口的官员高声道。
"Marshal Dominic, Alex and Irina, please!" the official at the door said in a loud voice.

"Can the Host please not interfere in the missions issued by the other systems? This is not good for the system who is educating its host." The system warned.
“请宿主再接再厉，复制和创造出更多美味的食物！”
"Please continue to work hard to replicate and create even more scrumptious food!"
“请宿主现在立刻前往后院，第三棵桂花树根部有一只黄褐色蜗牛，无毒可食用。”系统欢快的声音响起。
"Could the Host please proceed to the backyard now. There is a brown snal at the roots of the three osmanthus tree. It's not poisonous and is edible." The system's happy voice sounded.
“请小主努力完成任务，并积极参与其中，最终奖励将根据您的参与度决定。”
"Could little mistress please try to complete the mission and actively take part in it. The final reward will be decided according to your participation."
“请小主按照系统任务去完成，一切解释归系统所有。”
"Please complete the System's mission. The System would reserve all rights for final explanations."
“请慢用。”麦格将威士忌放下。
"Please enjoy." Mag put down the whiskey.
“请慢用。”麦格微微点头，转身退场。
"Enjoy." Mag nodded slightly and left.

"Please hold on." Eiffie was elated. She walked towards the wine cabinet and took out a bottle of wine and a glass from the cabinet in the centre.
“请进。”麦格开门，把那些表情有些幽怨的大人们迎进门。
"Please, come in." Mag opened the door, and welcomed the rather displeased lords.

"Please come in." Amy stepped to the side too, but she still softly reminded her, "Don't antagonize my mother. She's really very formidable."
“请问喝点什么？”麦格微笑着问道。
"What would you like?" Mag asked with a smile.
“请问您要点什么？”一道软萌萌的声音响起。
"May I ask, what would you like to order?" A soft and cute voice spoke up.
“请问有什么事吗？”麦格看着他问道。
"What is the matter?" Mag asked.
“请问需要点什么？”亚北米娅微笑着来到卡诺他们桌旁。

The Plum in the Golden Vase or The Golden Lotus is a Chinese novel of manners composed in vernacular Chinese during the latter half of the sixteenth centuryduring the late Ming dynasty (1368–1644). It was published under the pseudonym Lanling Xiaoxiao Sheng, "The Scoffing Scholar of Lanling," but the only clue to the actual identity is that the author hailed from Lanling County in present-day Shandong. The novel circulated in manuscript as early as 1596, and may have undergone revision up to its first printed edition in 1610. The most widely read recension, edited and published with commentaries by Zhang Zhupo in 1695, deleted or rewrote passages important in understanding the author's intentions. "You really got yourself a bargain." The seller walked away with a banknote with a pained expression. If he hadn't seen that Romo Street had been going into a decline completely, and nobody had been coming at all, he wouldn't have sold the property while making a loss of 1,000,000.
