"There are empty seats there, but we'll need to share a table with those two customers over there." Canault found two empty seats next to the windows. They were vacated by the customers who had left earlier. However, two hunky orcs were sitting at that table too.
“这边经常连个人影都看不到，人渣倒是不少，客官你来做什么？”车夫收了麦格的钱，看了眼破落的巷子，问了一声。
"It's almost impossible to see anyone here but there are quite alot of scums. What are you doing here, Sir?" The coachman took Mag's money and asked as he glanced at the run-down alley.
“这边请。”埃菲带着麦格向着酒坊的角落里走去。
"This way please." Eiffie brought Mag to a corner of the brewery.
“这还不死啊？”伊琳娜看了好一会，歪头看着梅兰特有些诧异道。
"He's not dead yet after all this?" Irina exclaimed in shock after looking at Merante for a while.
“这还只是一纸承诺，只能算作初见黎明。”麦格笑着摇头，“接下来，应该不需要我逐一跑一遍各族吧？”
"This is only a piece of paper, so it's only a glimpse of the dawn." Mag shook his head with a smile. "I don't think you need me to go all the races one by one, right?"
“这酒入口柔绵、清冽甘爽，酒体醇厚丰满，饮下之后，回味悠长，实属百年难遇的美酒！”库尔特许久之后睁开眼睛，忍不住赞叹道。

Kurt opened his eyes after a long time and praised, "This liquor is smooth and refreshing. Its texture is rich and thick. Its aftertaste is linger long after swallowing. It's indeed an excellent liquor that one rarely encounters!"
“这酒哪来的？你这小兔崽子还会背着我藏好酒了。”梅兰特看着诺亚追问道。
"Where is this wine from? How dare you rascal hide such good wine from me." Merante questioned Noya.
“这酒馆要不是和亚伯罕公爵有关系，我非得好好数落那老板一顿不可，让我一个老头在外边站了那么久。”一位老大人锤着自己的腿埋怨道。

"If this tavern hadn't been related to Duke Abraham, I would have taught this owner a lesson. How could it let an old man like me stand outside for so long," an old courtier grumbled as he pounded his legs.
“这酒香也未免太过浓郁诱人了吧？”亚伯罕凑上前嗅了嗅，然后直接推门走进了酒馆。
"This liquor's aroma is simply too enticing." Abraham went up to take a sniff before he pushed open the door, and walked into the tavern.
“这酒香！”
"This liquor's aroma!"
“这酒香！”库尔特男爵一下子站了起来，有些不可思议的看着工作人员端来的酒杯。
"This aroma!" Baron Kurt instantly stood up and stared at the glass brought over by the staff member with disbelief.
“这酒，妙啊！”伊琳娜赞道。
"This wine is marvelous!" Irina praised.
“这酒，的确不错啊。”在厨房里的麦格也闻到了酒香，眼睛一亮，同样忍不住赞叹道。
"This wine is not bad indeed." Mag, who was in the kitchen, could not help but exclaim with his eyes wide when he smelled the fragrance of the wine.
“这酒，还挺不错的啊，有助睡眠。”伊琳娜嘀咕道，拉开门下楼。
"This wine is not bad. It aids sleep," Irina mumbled to herself as she opened the door to go downstairs.
“这里不是还有一个工具人吗？”麦格笑着在那巨汉身边蹲下，笑着拍了拍肩膀道：“是吧？”
"Don't we have someone here?" Mag smiled and squatted beside the man. He patted the man's shoulder and said, "Am I right?"
“这里也要两本！”
"I would like to have two as well!"
“这里就交给你处理吧，我先回去了。”麦格也不指望从她嘴里再套出什么消息，拍了一下阿紫，直接开溜。
"I'll leave all these for you to settle. I'm going back first." Mag didn't expect to get any information from her, so he left right away after giving Ah Zi a pat.
“这里的怨气颇重，竟然没有被完全吞噬。”一落地，梅兰特便有些意外道。
Merante said with surprised as soon as they landed, "The resentment is very heavy. It actually wasn't devoured completely."
“这钱，您必须要收下，不然我会觉得不好意思的。”埃菲没有收回手，表情坚定的看着麦格。
"You must accept this money. Otherwise, I would feel bad." Eiffie did nto take her cheque back. She looked at Mag with resolution.
“这钱，我不能收。”麦格连忙抬手拒绝。
"I can't accept this money." Mag quickly waved his hands to reject.
“这钱，我替他收下了，一会留下吃饭吧，我们也还没有吃。”
"I'll accept this money on his behalf. Stay back a while for lunch. We've not eaten too."
“这难道是酒香？”波比的脸上露出了几分意外和不确定的表情，这香味太诱人了。
"Is that the fragrance of wine?" Bobby was rather surprised and uncertain. The fragrance was too enticing.
“这香味……好特别？！”伊琳娜的鼻子动了动，眼睛一亮。
"This aroma… is rather special?!" Irina's nose twitched, and her eyes lit up.
“这香味！”
"This smell!"
“这鬼东西，怎么会那么多！”诺亚看着雪原之上密密麻麻的古尸，声音有些颤抖。
"Why are there so many of this stuff!" Noya said with a tremble in his voice as he looked at the plain full of ancient corpses.
“这，你就有点管的太宽了。”伊琳娜笑了，“而且，遇上他，是我这辈子最大的幸运，至于那个孩子，更是生命之神赐予我们最美好的礼物。”
"This is none of your business." Irina smiled. "Furthermore, meeting him was the luckiest thing in my life, and that child is the most beautiful gift that the God of Life has bestowed upon us.
"This?!"
“进来吧。”麦格自然不会拒绝两人进来喝一杯的要求，而且既然梅兰特的伤势已经恢复，也该回归继续搜寻乔修的工作，他可是大型人肉雷达。
"Come on in." Mag naturally wouldn't reject their request to come in for a drink. Since Merante had recovered from his injuries, he would return to his search for Josh. He was a giant living radar.
“进来吧，叔叔什么时候骗过你，真有好吃的。”亚伯罕笑着道。
"Come on in. When did I ever lie to you? There really is good food," Abraham said with a smile.
“逆子，误我！”安德烈重重叹了一口气。
"Unfilial son, burden!" Andre let out a heavy sigh.
“选一把趁手的菜刀，把这些食材全部切成小颗粒的状态。”系统开始教学。
"Choose a cleaver that feels good to hold and chop all the ingredients into cube-size." The System started its tutorial.
“遵从我内心的选择。”库尔特拿起了面前的分数牌，给出了10分。
"I will follow my heart." Kurt picked the score card in front of him and awarded a 10 point.
"In that case.."
“那……那我们也卖他们的酒嘛。”小丫鬟瘪嘴。
"Th-then, we can sell his liquor too." The little maid pursed her lips.
“那……那现在该怎么办呢？我把父亲大人的切菜台切坏了，他要是看到的话，一定会很生气的。”艾米突然回过神来，有些焦急道。
"In that case… What should I do now? I broke Father's kitchen counter. If he sees it, he will be very angry." Amy said in a fluster after coming back to her senses.
“那一会现场见。”埃菲微笑着说道，带着玛拉上了小巧的马车。
"See you later then," Eiffie replied with a smile as she boarded a petite horse-drawn carriage with Mala.
“那一定要给我留一瓶。”帕萨卡眼睛一亮，跟着进了门，见门口的座位刚好空下来，便坐了下来。
"Then, you'll have to keep a bottle for me then." Pasaca lit up his eyes and followed her in. He saw an empty seat at the door and sat down.
“那不是学，那是创造。”麦格一脸淡定的拿起酒瓶给伊琳娜倒了一杯茅台酒，“这酒容易醉，和啤酒不同，慢慢喝，慢慢品尝。”

"I didn't learn them. I created them," Mag said calmly. She picked up the bottle of wine, and poured a glass of Maotai for Irina. "You'll get drunk easily with this. It's different from beer. Drink it slowly and savor it slowly."
“那两位老板瞒着消息，想要低价拿我这酒馆，也不太合适吧？”酒馆老板把笑容一收，冷笑道：“泰坦酒馆和塞班酒馆得了金奖的事情我今天没有去参加品酒大会不知道，但两位也不能把我当傻子吧。”

"You two gentlemen hid the news and tried to buy my tavern with a low price. Isn't it inappropriate too?" The tavern's boss stopped smiling and sneered, "I didn't know about Titan Tavern and Saipan Tavern getting the gold awards because I didn't go to the liquor tasting event today, but the two of you shouldn't take me as an idiot either."
“那个让你扶腰而出的漂亮老板娘，又来找你了呢。”伊琳娜似笑非笑的说道。
"That beautiful lady boss, who made you came out with a hand on your back, has come looking for you." Irina said with a mysterious smile.
“那为何不打？”
"Then, why shouldn't we fight?"
“那么大个人，要稳重一点哦。”艾米看着他说道。
Amy looked at him, and said, "You are such a big person. You've got to be more mature."
“那么小一瓶，有点贵了。”
"It's a little expensive for such a small bottle."
“那么母亲大人，什么样的蜗牛才是可以吃的呢？”艾米好奇的看着伊琳娜问道。
"Mother, what kind of snails can be eaten then?" Amy asked Irina curiously.
“那么，我就可以再次当老板娘了吗？”伊琳娜笑吟吟的看着麦格，“管钱的那种。”
"Then, can I be the lady boss again?" Irina looked at Mag smilingly. "The kind that manages the money."
“那么，祝您生活愉快，我先告辞了。”费奇向着麦格深深鞠了一躬，蹦跳着离开，心情愉悦的就像是一只小鹿。
"Then, I wish you all the best. I will make my leave now." Fitch bowed deeply to Mag, and then skipped away happily, feeling as joyful as a little deer.
“那也……过于豪放了吧？”麦格想象了一下自己脖子上挂着三十只大肥鹅的场景，不禁皱眉。
"That will… be too flamboyant?" Mag imagined the scene whereby 30 big, fat geese were hanging from his neck, and couldn't help frowning.
“那什么……我去把厨房收拾一下，然后再做点其他吃的吧。”麦格端着碗向厨房走去。
"Then…I'll go clean up the kitchen and make something else to eat." Mag picked up his bowl and walked to the kitchen.
“那他为何要承认？”
"Then, why did he admit that?"
“那他知道我们在哪里？”诺亚有些紧张。
"So does he know where we are?" Noya was nervous.
“那他这次又是给我们送好吃的吗？”
"Is he bringing delicious food for us again?"
“那以后打坏蛋这种事情，一定要带上我哦。”艾米表情认真的说道。
"In that case, if you want to beat up baddies, you have to bring me along," Amy said seriously.
“那件事，等到营业结束去做也不晚。”
"That thing can wait till we close for the day."
“那位不是泰坦酒馆的老板娘埃菲吗？当年泰坦酒也是名动一时的美酒啊，可惜……”
"Isn't that Lady Boss Eiffie from Titan Tavern? The Titan Liquor was once a famous liquor back then. It's a pity..."
“那你他妈还不往西边追。”艾略特抬腿就是一脚。
"Then, why don't freaking chase them westward?" Elliot gave him a kick.
“那你们古老者是否有办法消除，或者隐藏我们身上与克苏鲁有关的气息？现在这种不断有稀奇古怪的东西找上门的感觉，并不是很好。”
"Then do you Elder Things have any ways to conceal the Cthulhu's aura on us? It doesn't feel good to keep having weird creatures come looking for us."
“那你们好好休息，搬家第一天肯定累了，明天见。”埃菲假装听不懂的样子，转身便走，顺手还给带上了门。

"Have a good rest, then. It must be very tiring on your first day moving in. See you tomorrow." Eiffie pretended that she did not understand what Irina was implying, and turned to leave, even closing the door behind her.
“那你倒是解释啊。”
"So explain it."
“那你去把乔修给我找回来，让他自己当面和我解释。”安德烈声音冰冷道。
"Then, you will go get me Josh, and let him explain to me face to face," Andre said coldly.
“那你只要把每一格都写成全地形车就可以了啊。”艾米认真脸。
"In that case, you can make every section a All-terrain vehicle," Amy said seriously.
“那你可以吗？”
"Then, can you handle it?"
“那你呢。”
"What about you?"
“那你尝尝这个。”麦格把刚调好的那份酱汁拿到艾米面前。
"Try this, then." Mag placed a plate of sauce in front of Amy.
“那你就是打不过，笨蛋。”艾米翻了个白眼，不禁有些担心父亲大人和母亲大人。
"That means you're not his match, idiot." Amy rolled her eyes. She couldn't help feeling worried about her father and mother.
“那你就高兴的太早了，一般跟我做事的人，都很累。”麦格平淡道。
"Then, you are being happy too early. People who worked with me were usually very tired," Mag calmly said.
“那你拿什么保证他是清白的？利尔亲眼所见，布卢姆临死前的惨呼他的名字，你看到他的尸体了吗？如果不是见到大恐怖的东西，一位身经百战的将军，会被活活吓死吗？会被吸干全身的鲜血吗？”安德烈的语气变得尖锐。

"If so, how can you prove that he is innocent? Lear saw with his own eyes. Blum called out his name before he died. Have you seen his body? If he hadn't seen something so horrifying, how could an experienced veteran general have died of fright? How could he have gotten drained of all his blood?" Andre's tone became piercing.
“那你有口福了，父亲大人做的鱼香茄子超好吃的呢，一点都不比麦格先生差。”艾米眨了眨眼睛说道。
"You're lucky, then. Father makes really good eggplant with garlic sauce. It's nowhere worse than Mr. Mag," Amy said with a blink of her eye.
“那你看我行吗？”伊琳娜指着自己道。
"Then do you think I will make the cut?" Irina asked as she pointed to herself.
“那你要小心一点哦，你的小命都掌握在我的手里呢。”艾米微笑道。
"Then you must be careful, your little life is in my hands," Amy said with a smile.
“那你觉得我们看起来像人类吗？”梅兰特笑了笑。
"Do you think we look like humans?" Merante smiled.
“那倒是，真是令人敬佩。”手下跟着点头。
"That's true. It's really admirable." The subordinate nodded too.
“那先谢过哈迪斯先生了。”埃菲感激道，带着玛拉道别离开。
"Then I'll thank you in advance," Eiffie said gratefully as she left with Mala.
“那再见了。”麦格告辞离开。
"In that case, goodbye." Mag made his leave.
“那又怎么样呢，我只是想让我的老朋友能够体面的回到大地母亲的怀抱，而不是让那些厌人的怪鸟啄食侮辱。”先前说话的老人从床上坐起身来，眼睛在黑暗中似乎也闪耀着光芒：“当年他英勇的扑向那些入侵风之森林的恶魔的时候，可从未想过自己是否能够活着回来。”

"So what? I just want my old friend to return to the arms of Mother Earth in a dignified way instead of letting those disgusting strange birds feed on him in humiliation." The old man who spoke first sat up on his bed. There seemed to be a glimmer in his eyes in the dark as he said, "Back then when he threw himself bravely at those demons that invaded the Wind Forest, he did not expect himself to come back alive."
“那古尸呢？”麦格心中突然有些不安。
"Where are the ancient corpses now?" Mag suddenly felt rather uneasy.
“那可不行！”哈里森摇头，“我……我去那边吃个烧饼就散步去。”
"No way!" Harrison shook his head. "I… I'll go over there to have a pancake while I take a walk."
“那可是我高价从其他系统手里淘的高等级追踪器，来自M78星云的最新科技，是从一奥特曼身上拆下来的，才服役两百年。”系统强调道。

"It's a high-tier tracking device that I bought from the other systems with a high price. It is the latet technology from planet M78. It was removed from Ultraman and had only been used for 200 years," the System emphasized.
“那因为迷路找不到房间，最后还是我带着你过去这件事，怎么算？”
"Then, what about the fact that you can't find his room because you're lost and I have to bring you there eventually?"
“那地方还有人租商铺吗？”那人有些疑惑，不过还是拿着资料回了自己的位置。
"Would anyone still want to rent a shop there?" That person was perplexed but he still returned to his seat with the documents.
“那大可不必。”
"There's no need for that."
“那天就喝了几口，没过瘾，自然要再来尝尝。”库尔特看着桌上的两瓶酒，又是有些好奇的问：“哈迪斯先生有两款酒，为何只送茅台来参加品酒大会？”

"We only had a few sips that day. It wasn't enough, naturally we have to come try it again." Kurt looked at the two bottles on the table and curiously asked, "Mr. Hades has two kinds of liquor, why did you only send Maotai to the liquor tasting event?"
“那女人和那个三头蛇都可能来自地底之下，古老者在那里建立了秩序，限制克苏鲁的仆从来到诺兰大陆。”
"That woman and three-headed snake might be from the underground. The Elder Things had set up an order there and limited the Cthulhu's servants from coming to Norland Continent."
“那女人对你还挺好的啊。”伊琳娜笑吟吟的抬头看着他。
"That woman treats you rather well," Irina looked up at him with a smile.
“那好，我去给你打包一份。”亚伯罕起身走到酒柜前。
"Alright. I'll take away a set for you." Abraham stood up and went to the counter.
“那如果我死了的话，你是不是也死了？”
"Then if I die, will you be dead too?"
“那娘们是真的狠，用圣光术给我烧的差点升天，不过也的确厉害啊，把当年留下的一些隐疾都化解了，这么重的伤势也能医好。”梅兰特有些感慨道。

"That b*tch is really ruthless. She almost sent me to see my maker with the Holy Light. But she is formidable. She healed some of my underlying problems from back then, and could even cure such a serious wound," Merante lamented.
“那安妮她……”
"In that case Annie is..."
“那实在是太可惜了。”埃菲也是叹了口气，为其他人无法品尝到麦格的厨艺而感到可惜。
"That is really a pity." Eiffie sighed as well. She found it a pity that others would not be able to try Mag's culinary skills.
“那小姐是觉得我们吃饭的样子比较下饭吗？”
"Then, do you think the way we eat is appetising, Miss?"
“那小鬼，过来给老爷们倒酒。”一个大腹便便的中年官员指着柜台后边坐着的艾米说道。
"Little brat, come over here and pour us some wine," a middle-aged man said as he pointed to Amy, who was sitting behind the counter.
“那就出发吧，现场勘探一下情况。”麦格点头。
"Let's set off then. We'll go to the site to understand the situation." Mag nodded.
“那就好。”埃菲稍稍松了口气。
"That will be good." Eiffie heaved a breath of relief slightly.
“那就是可能在这个平平无奇的世界里，藏着一个瓦坎达咯？”麦格笑了。
"In that case, maybe in this boring world, there's a Wakanda?" Mag laughed.
“那就有劳埃菲小姐了，塞班酒馆初来乍到，也想在这品酒大会上找点存在感。”麦格也不客气，这种门路可遇不可求啊。
"Thank you so much. Saipan Tavern had just opened and I hope that it could be more known through the liquor tasting event." Mag knew that this was an opportunity that was hard to come by.
“那就行，你们先吃着，我再去改进改进。”麦格把托盘放下，自己拿了一个绿豆糕，咬了一小口，开始细细品尝起来。
"That's great. Have it first. I'll go back to improve it further." Mag placed the tray down, took a piece, and tried it.
“那就赶紧贴，天气这么冷，回去烤暖炉不舒服吗。”费奇白了他一眼，也是一手提着胶水桶，一手往门上贴公告。

"Then, let's move quickly. The weather is so cold. Won't it be comfortable to go back and toast ourselves at the fireplace." Fitch rolled his eyes at him. He was also carrying a bucket of glue and sticking the notices on the doors.
“那开学的时候您一定要带上我啊，我也想吃火锅，想吃红烧肉、麻辣烤鱼啊……”温妮莎可怜兮兮的看着亚伯罕。
"Then, you must bring me along when the restaurant reopens. I want to eat hot pot, red braised pork, and spicy grilled fish too…" Vanessa looked at Abraham piteously.
“那得看你们是不是真的把她当成族人了，这么多年过去，这方面你们还是一点长进都没有。”路易斯撇了撇嘴，对道格拉斯的威胁毫不在意。

"We'll have to see if you really see her as one of yours. You guys have made no improvement in that aspect at all after so many years." Louis pressed his lips together. He did not care about Douglas's threat.
“那必须滴。”亚伯罕一脸理所当然的拍着胸膛道：“只要是我觉得好吃的，肯定忘不了你。”
"But of course." Abraham patted his chest, and said, "As long as I have something good to eat, I definitely will not forget you."
“那怎么办？现在我们唯一能够追查的只有魔气了。”诺亚皱眉。
"Then what should we do? The only thing we can do now is to track the evil aura." Noya frowned.
“那我他喵就是个工具人咯？”麦格眼皮狂跳。
"I'm just a freaking tool, then?" Mag's eyelids twitched rapidly.
“那我以后可以给客人们讲笑话吗？说不定就会有更多的客人来酒馆了呢。”艾米看着麦格问道。
"Then, can I tell the jokes to the customers in the future? Perhaps that will attract more customers to the tavern." Amy asked Mag.
“那我们今天早上吃什么？”
"What are we having for breakfast today, then?"
“那我们先从拍黄瓜开始学。”麦格从冰箱里取了两根黄瓜，洗净后放在砧板上，拿起了胖头鱼。

"In tha case, we have to start learning from smashing of the cucumber." Mag picked out two cucumbers from the refrigerator, washed them, and placed them on the chopping board. After that, he picke dup fat head fish.
“那我们去哪里可以找到他？”梅兰特问道。
"Then where can we find him?" Merante asked.
“那我们就先告辞了，工人们还在维修被破坏的场地，我得去看看。”
"We shall make a move then. The workers are still repairing the damaged area. I have to go and take a look."
“那我们就吃一个烧烤大餐吧，我去准备一下。”麦格笑着走向厨房，以彼之计还施彼身，这种感觉倍儿爽。
"Then we will have a big barbecue. I'll go prepare for it." Mag walked to the kitchen smilingly. Letting the other party have a taste of his own medicine felt great.
“那我们是不是应该把她印刷出来，让更多的人也能够看到这样漂亮的画册呢？”麦格笑眯眯道。
"In that case, should we get it printed out so that more people can enjoy the beautiful drawings too?" Mag asked with a smile.
“那我们是去说服他们的吗？”康妮若有所思。
"Are we going to persuade them?" Connie asked.
“那我们晚上还有什么可以送给哈迪斯先生的吗？”玛拉又是看着埃菲，笑着咽了咽口水，“哈迪斯先生做的菜实在太好吃了。”
"Then, do we have anything to send over to Mr. Hades tonight?" Mala looked at Eiffie and gulped with a smile. "Mr. Hades's cooking is simply fantastic."
“那我刚刚喝的是假酒吗？”麦格看了眼一旁的酒瓶。
"So is the wine that I drank just now fake?" Mag glanced at the wine bottle at the side.
“那我去了。”艾米转身又蹬蹬蹬跑上楼。
"I'll go then." Amy quickly turned and ran up the stairs.
“那我去准备一下，你和安妮先玩一会。”麦格笑着摸了摸艾米的脑袋，起身向着厨房走去。
"Then I will go and prepare for it. You and Annie go and play first." Mag patted Amy's head smilingly before getting up to go to the kitchen.
“那我呢？”汉娜咬着油条，问道。
"What about me?" Hannah asked, biting into the youtiao.
“那我和你一起去，我对黑雾比较敏锐。”伊琳娜挥手把地上的金银珠宝全部收了起来，然后说道。
"I'll go with you, then. I'm more sensitive to the black fog," Irina said as she kept the pile of treasures with a wave of her hand.
“那我回家一个月，刚好家里有点事情需要处理。”卡米拉有些慵懒的伸了懒腰，想到以后不用每天起早来切菜，终于可以睡一段时间懒觉，就觉得心情变得愉悦。

"I will return home for a month, then. I happen to have some matters to handle back home." Camilla stretched out lazily. She felt very light-hearted when she realized that she didn't have to wake up early every day to chop ingredients, and could sleep in for a period of time.
“那我就不客气了哈，以后会常来泰坦酒馆的。”库尔特起身把工作人员托盘里的酒和酒塞一起拿走，盖上之后，放在自己手边。

"In that case, I'll help myself. I'll be visiting the Titan Tavern often in the future." Kurt stood up and took the wine and cork on the staff's tray. After putting the cork back, he placed it beside him.
“那我就不打扰你们了。”埃菲起身告辞。
"In that case, I shall not disturb you." Eiffie stood up and left.
“那我带你们去个地方。”麦格重新跳上狮鹫背，带着梅兰特和诺亚离去。
"Let me bring you guys to a place." Mag leaped onto the griffin's back again, and brought Merante and Noah away.
“那我有办法了。”伊琳娜转身进了厨房，里边响起了几道声响，不一会伊琳娜便拿着一个用冰块雕好的盒子出来，上边是敞开的，底下用筷子搭了一个简易的隔水层然后再放了一个浅盘。

"Then, I have a solution." Irina went into the kitchen, and made some sounds in there. Shortly after, Irina came out with a box that was carved out of ice. Its top was open, and chopsticks were used to make a support at the bottom over a plate.
“那我要你何用？还不如丑小鸭呢，至少可以吃。”艾米嫌弃道。
"Then what do I want you for? You're worse than Ugly Duckling. At least Ugly Duckling can be eaten," Amy said in disdain.
“那我还是把冰激凌店开着吧，孩子们挺喜欢的，最近不忙的姐妹也可以来店里帮忙。”亚北米娅笑着说道，看着简：“简，你来冰激凌店帮忙吧。”

"Then, I will keep the ice cream shop open. The children like it, and the ladies who are not busy can help out at the shop," Yabemiya said with a smile before looking at Jane. "Jane, come and help me at the ice cream shop."
“那我陪你一起出去。”玛拉松开了手，同样目光坚定的说道。
"Let me go with you then," Mala said with resolution as she let Eiffie go.
“那把它变成一只天鹅吧。”艾米咽了一下口水。
"Then, turn it into a swan." Amy swallowed her saliva.
“那文明呢？还有比系统更高级的文明吗？”麦格又问。
"What about the civilizaiton? Is there an even more advanced civilization than you?" Mag asked.
“那是什么？”
"What was it?"
“那是什么？！”
"What's that?!"
“那是什么？！”诺亚缓缓站起身来，一脸难以置信的看着半空中漂浮着的超级钢铁巨舰！
"What's that?!" Noah slowly stood up and stared at the super iron battleship hovering in midair with disbelief!
“那是十几二十年前的物价了，你要考虑通货膨胀的啊大姐，当年猪肉才五个铜币一斤呢，现在你在街上要是能找到二十铜币一斤的猪肉，那肯定是注水的。”麦格翻了个白眼。

"That was the price of commodities 20 years ago. You have to take inflation into consideration, Sister. The price of pork was only 5 copper coins per 500 grams back then, and if you can find pork that is priced at 20 copper coins per 500 grams now, you can be sure that it has problems." Mag rolled his eyes.
“那是多少？”
"How many customers is that?"
“那是怎样？”
"Then what is it like?"
“那是我家小姐酿的酒！怎么会是假酒。”小丫鬟插嘴道。
"That's the wine our Young Mistress made! How could it be fake wine?" the servant maid at the side interrupted.
“那是自然。”伊琳娜嘴角微翘，显然非常受用。
"Of course." Irina smiled. This worked very well on her.
“那是自然。”麦格的腰杆都挺直了不少。
"Of course." Mag stood up even straighter.
“那是龙。”
"That's a dragon."
“那是，不看是谁做的。”麦格嘴角也是疯狂上扬，小小一份酒鬼花生，是厨艺的浓缩具现，代表着下酒菜中的王者级别强者。

"Of course, can't you see who's the one who made it." Mag smiled brightly too. The drunkard peanuts were his culinary skills condensed into a small plate, representing the powerhouse of all side dishes to go with alcohol.
“那条白白的长长的是蛇吗？”
"Is that long white thing a snake?"
“那爷爷你先把衣服拉上，注意形象。”诺亚吸了吸鼻子，提醒道。
Noah sniffled as he reminded Merante, "Then pull up your shirt first, Grandpa. Take care of your image."
“那现在我们还要做什么？”伊琳娜看着麦格问道。
"In that case, what else should we do?" Irina asked Mag.
“那瓶酒是您抱回来的呢。”夫人指着一旁桌上那白色的酒瓶说道。
"You carried that bottle of wine back," Bobby's wife said as she pointed to a white bottle of wine on the table.
“那的确是更好的选择。”费奇坦然的点头，这两位显然是聪明的生意人。
"That's indeed a better choice." Fitch nodded in agreement. These two were obviously smart businessmen.
“那睡一觉，应该就没问题。”麦格点头，给她盖上被子。
"Then she should be fine after a sleep." Mag nodded and covered her with a blanket.
“那算了，又不是只有你一个系统，我明天找艾米的系统白嫖一个。”麦格撇撇嘴，悠然道。
"For get it then. You're not the only system around. I'll get one free from Amy's system," Mag said leisurely.
“那编辑是个男的啊。”麦格一脸无辜，这标题党害人不浅啊，为何震惊体在这个世界已经开始蔓延。
"That editor is a guy." Mag had an innocent expression. This headline was really misleading. Why were the shocking headlines already a trend in this world?
“那老头子我就不客气了。”梅兰特端起酒杯，又是一饮而尽，这些天养伤他滴酒未沾，酒瘾早就难捱。

"Then, I won't stand on ceremony with you." Merante picked up his glass, and downed it in one gulp again. He hadn't drunk a sip of alcohol for the past few days while he was nursing his wounds. He couldn't wait to drink alcohol again.
“那行吧，我就再信你一次。”艾米微微点头，然后看向了麦格，说道：“父亲大人，我可以学这个吗？”
"Alright. I will believe you once more." Amy nodded. After that, she looked at Mag and said, "Father, can I learn this?"
“那要来哦，我先回去了。”艾米点点头，转身准备回家。
"You have to come, alright. I'll go back first." Amy nodded and turned to go home.
“那边可以洗手洗脸，我去给你们做点吃的。”麦格指了指一旁的厕所，自己则向着厨房走去。
"You can wash up there. I'll make you some food." Mag pointed to the washroom at the side as he walked towards the kitchen.
“那这个世界是否可能存在高纬文明的可能？或者说他们的文明程度比地球2050更高？”麦格也是表情严肃的问道。
"In that case, is it possible for this world to have high latitude civilization? Or that their standard of civilization was even higher than Earth in 2050?" Mag asked in an equally serious tone.
“那这些黄瓜用来做什么呢？”艾米眨了眨眼睛不解道。
"In that case, what would these cucumber be used for?" Amy asked, puzzled.
“那这第一场，从谁家开始？”
"Then, where should we start from?"
“那这？”麦格看着埃菲手里抱着的酒瓶。
"This?" Mag looked at the wine bottle Eiffie was holding in her arms.
“那进去看看吧。”卢西恩下了马车，他的确是想喝酒了。
"Let's check it out." Lucien alighted the horse-drawn carriage. He wanted to have a drink.
“那里人来人往，我不要面子的吗？而且，这里坐着还挺暖和的。”男人瞥了他一眼，怨气依旧不小。
"There are so many people there. I'll be embarrassed. Besides, it's rather warm to sit here." The man glanced at Mag, and was still plenty resentful.
“那里有魔气，非常浓郁的魔气。”伊琳娜的眼睛微微眯起，神色凝重道。
"There's an evil aura there. A very strong evil aura," Irina said seriously as she squinted.
“那里的书，也就是小朋友读物的程度了。”伊琳娜对于麦格的评价并不是非常赞同，不过也没有反对麦格的提议。
"The books over there are all for children." Irina didn't agree with Mag's review, but she didn't object to Mag's suggestion, either.
“那里！”艾米也注意到那三只蜗牛，快步上前蹲下观察了一会，回头看着麦格，“父亲大人，他们看起来好像都可以吃哦。”

"There they are!" Amy noticed those three snails too. She quickly went over, crouched down and observed them for a while before she turned around to look at Mag. "Father, they look like they're edible."
“那黑白相间圆滚滚的又是什么宠物？看起来好萌啊！”
"What's that black and white roly-poly pet? It looks so cute!"
"If not?"
“郑重提醒宿主，那是一只蜗牛活体，正在缓慢移动中，如果因为宿主太晚前往捕捉而导致蜗牛消失，与本系统无关。”系统提醒道。

"This is a serious reminder to the Host. That snail is alive and is slowly moving. This System is not responsible if the snail disappears because the Host is late to catch it." The system reminded Mag.
“郑重说明一下……那是新手大礼包，不是零食大礼包！”系统强调道。
"Let me solemnly explain… This is the novice gift package, not a snack gift package!" the system emphasized.
“都不知道该如何感谢您了。”埃菲感激的看着麦格。
"I don't even know how to thank you." Eiffie looked at Mag gratefully.
“都怪我，我这个笨蛋，爷爷是为了救我才受了重伤的，我这没用！”诺亚打了自己一巴掌，又气又懊恼。
"It's all my fault. I'm stupid. Grandpa got injured while saving me. I'm so useless!" Noya said with frustration as he slapped himself.
“都给我认真点，今天咱们的目标是黄焖鸡米饭这道菜，谁学的最好，我就任命他当新店主厨，月薪过十万！”一位老板站在自家员工面前，握着拳头颇为激昂的说道。

"Buck up, all of you. Our goal today is to learn the braised chicken and rice. Whoever can recreate it the best will be the new head chef with more than 100,000 copper coins for your monthly salary!" one restaurant owner said passionately with his fists clenched in front of his employees.
“酋长虽然年轻，但做事条理清晰，平易近人，倒是和老酋长有些像。”
"The chief might be young, but she is a very logical thinker, and is very amiable, just like the old chief."
“酋长，原本从属于我们的兽人部落，现在大半倒戈投入到法克部落，我们要是再不做些什么，以后兽人族恐怕就要由法克部落说了算了。”一位兽人看着奥斯特有些焦急道。

"Chief, the orc tribes that used to align with us have mostly joined the Falk Tribe now. If we don't do anything now, the orc race will be dominated by the Falk Tribe in the future," an orc said to Auster in a fluster.
“酋长，奇拉部落是战争派的吧？我们为什么要资助他们？”那兽人有些不解的看着安妮。
"Chief, the Kila Tribe is a pro-war tribe, right? Why are we helping them?" The orc looked at Connie with bewilderment.
“酒。”女人回道。
"Liquor." The woman replied.
“酒味只能算中上，看来这酒在口感上有独到之处。”麦格在心里想着，四十八分的确是个高分，至少从先前的评分来看，这四位评委专业且严格。

"The liquor's taste is only above average. Seems like this liquor has something unique in its texture." Mag thought. 48 points was indeed a high score. At least judging from the previous scores, these five judges were professional and stringent.
“酒是真的一滴都没有了，但麦老板给咱们送了早餐过来，您先吃点吧。”诺亚说道。
"I really don't have a single drop of alcohol on me. But Boss Mag just sent breakfast for us. Have some," Noya said.
“酒柜上的就是了。”麦格指了指里边的酒柜，上面摆满了两种酒。
"They are displayed on the cabinet." Mag pointed at the cabinet which was filled with the two kinds of liquors.
“酒水单在墙上。”麦格尽量微笑道。
"The drink list is on the wall." Mag tried his best to say that with a smile.
“酒量的确挺惊人的。”麦格点点头，他的酒量还可以了，但也没有把握能在喝了两百多种酒后还保持清醒。
"Their alcohol tolerance is indeed shocking." Mag nodded. His alcohol tolerance was okay, but he wasn't confident that he could still stay sober after drinking over 200 kinds of liquors.
“酒馆和餐厅不一样，大早上的没有人来喝酒的，一般晚上才会开始营业。”麦格解释向三个宝贝解释了一下酒馆和餐厅经营的差别。

"The tavern is different from the restaurant. No one will come and drink in the morning. The tavern usually only operates at night," Mag explained the difference between operating a restaurant and a tavern to his three precious.
“酒馆是在晚上开业的，昨天晚上你们在楼上玩耍的时候，我们酒馆已经接待了第一位客人了。”麦格笑着说道。
"The tavern is only open for operation at night. We've already had our first customer when you were playing upstairs last night," Mag said with a smile.
“酒馆每日按时开门，客人只需等太阳落山来即可。”麦格一脸淡定的说道，开门时间是不会更改的，这是酒馆的规矩。
"The tavern will be open on time every day. All of you will just have to come after the sun sets," Mag replied calmly. The opening time would not change. This was the tavern's rule.
“酒鬼花生，尝尝。”麦格夹了一颗花生丢到嘴里，嚼的嘎嘣脆。
"Drunkard peanuts. Try it." Mag threw one peanut into his mouth, and crunched on it.
“酿酒步骤记载的非常详细，想必埃菲小姐这些年也已经手法纯熟，但你的酿酒坊该推翻重建了。”麦格看着埃菲的眼睛：“你应该开启属于你的时代，而不只是守着他留下的荣耀。”

"The steps of the brewing process were very well-documented. I believe Miss Eiffie is already familiar with it, but your brewery needs to be torn down and rebuilt." Mag looked into Eiffie's eyes and said, "You start your own era and not defend the glory that your father left behind."
“醒了？”房间门被打开，麦格站在门口，看着坐在地上的伊琳娜微笑着问道。
"You're up?" The room door was open, and Mag stood at the door, looking at Irina sitting on the floor with a smile.
“里斯酒馆的老板很厉害，旗下有多家酒馆，而且每家酒馆都有多款主打酒，据说他招募了许多厉害的酿酒师，一直致力于研发更好的酒。”埃菲介绍到，看着那男人的目光有些钦佩。

"The boss of Reese Tavern is very formidable. He has many taverns and each tavern has many signature drinks. Apparently, he has recruited many formidable brewers and has been trying to come up with even better alcoholic drinks." Eiffie introduced him, looking at the man with an admirable gaze.
“里面的人听着！你们已经被包围了……”
"Listen up. You are already being surrounded..."
“重建风之森林！”
"Rebuild the Wind Forest!"
“重新封印？”晞目光微闪，一直冷漠的脸上终于露出了一丝讶色，看着麦格道：“中心封印区的克苏鲁是你重新封印的？”
"Resealed?" Xi's gaze flickered and a hint of surprise appeared on her cold face. She said to Mag, "Did you reseal the Cthulhu in the center sealed area?
“错了，是这些。”艾米打开冰箱，然后搬了条小凳子过来踩上去，从冰箱的上层依次取出扬州炒饭所需的各种食材。
"No, it's these." Amy opened the refrigerator, and shifted a little stool over to step on it. She pulled out the different ingredients needed for the Yangzhou fried rice from the freezer compartment.
“闭嘴！”
"Shut up!"
“闭嘴！”奥斯特冷冷扫了他一眼。
"Shut up!" Auster glanced at him coldly.
“闲话短说，我知道大家并不想听我这个老头在这里念叨，只想知道这一年过去，咱们洛都城里是否出现了什么新的美酒。”库尔特笑着道：“没错，我也想知道。那么，接下来我们就正式开始品酒吧，我已经有些等不及了。”

"Let's make it short and sweet. I know you guys don't really want to listen to an old man talking here. You only want to know are there any new liquors that appeared in Rodu in the past year." Kurt smilingly said, "That's right. I want to know too. Hence, let's start the liquor tasting officially now. I already can't wait."
“闻起来有蛋香味，可能是某种鸟类的蛋烤熟了吧？”梅兰特上前拿起一只蛋黄酥嗅了嗅，说着还咬了一口。
"It has the aroma of an egg. Perhaps it is the baked egg of some bird?" Merante picked up a salted egg yolk pastry, and sniffed it before taking a bite.
“阻挡古尸大军是关键，但杀死或者将克苏鲁重新封印，才是解决问题的根源。”伊琳娜沉吟道：“而且，我们今天没有看到乔修，但今天的安排却像是他所为的。”

"Stopping the ancient corpses army is the crux, but only killing Cthulhu or resealing it can solve the root of the problem." Irina lamented, "Furthermore, although we didn't see Josh today, what happened today seemed to be his arrangement."
“阿伟死了……走的很安详……”
"He's dead meat… R.I.P…"
"Ahchoo..."
“阿尔宾是吧，找到杀死了安东和乔的凶手，为他们报仇吧。”伊琳娜的目光看向了下方的一个瘦小的精灵。
"Albin, right? Find Anton and Joe's murderer and avenge them." Irina looked at a thin and small elf below.
“阿尔宾，快走！”老精灵将乔的尸体背负在背上，仰头冲着阿尔宾叫道。
"Albin, leave!" The old elf carried Joe's body on his back as he shouted at Albin.
“阿紫，从通道进去！”麦格跳上了飞到身旁的紫纹狮鹫，然后靠近伊琳娜一把揽住她的腰，直接一头扎入五星战舰的通道之中。

"Ah Zi, enter through that passageway!" Mag leaped onto the purple-striped griffin that flew next to him. They then flew close to Irina and Mag grabbed her waist. They darted straight into the star-shaped battleship.
“阿紫，你先出城去，不要走远，老地方待着。”麦格看着阿紫吩咐道。
"Ah Zi, leave the city first, but don't go far. Stay at the usual place," Mag instructed Ah Zi.
“阿紫，去接他！”伊琳娜举起法师杖，高声吟唱道：“圣光啊，消灭那些邪恶吧！”
"Ah Zi, go pick him up!" Irina raised her magic caster's staff and loudly chanted, "Holy Light, eliminate those evils!"
“陛下有旨，请亚历克斯和伊琳娜进宫！”
"His Majesty has ordered to invite Alex and Irina into the palace!"
“陛下英明！”
"Your Majesty is wise."
“陛下，亡灵军团尚且可以一战，但那魔鬼，单凭我们却是毫无解决的办法。那日在混乱之城的封印之地，臣亲眼所见那东西的可怕，绝非十级强者联手便能击杀和解决的。”

"Your Majesty, we can still fight with the Army of the Dead, but we have no way to resolve the devil on our own. At the seal at Chaos City, I have witnessed the horror of that thing with my own eyes. It cannot be killed or resolved by 10th-tier powerhouses working together."
“陛下，我们需要各族的帮助。”多米尼克打破了沉默，起身看着安德烈沉声说道。
"Your Majesty, we need the help of the various races," Dominic broke the silence as he stood up and told Andre.
“陛下，此事尚未彻查清楚，可民间已经开始流传乔修殿下变成魔鬼的傀儡，杀死朝廷命官满门的消息，微臣认为应当控制这种谣言的传播。”理查德躬身道。

Richard bowed, and said, "Your Majesty, this matter hasn't been investigated thoroughly yet, but there were already rumors about Prince Josh becoming the devil's puppet and massacring the courtiers. I think we should stop the spread of such rumors."
“陛下，这是兵部官员的口供，从口供来看，二皇子应该是使用了催眠魅惑类的魔法对他们实施了控制，从而以您的名义调动西北和东南联军对兽人族和精灵族发动攻击。”一位官员双手捧着一叠厚厚的供词走进御书房，恭敬道。

"Your Majesty, this is the statement by the officials in the military. Judging from the statement, it seems that the second prince used hypnotic magic on them to put them under control. That was how the northwestern allied forces were deployed under your name to start the war against the orcs and elves," a courtier said respectfully after walking into the Royal Study with a thick stack of papers.
“院长你好，我今天和孩子过来，想给孩子们做点小吃，陪孩子们玩一会，不知是否可行。”麦格也是微笑着看着安奈林。
Mag looked at Aneurin with a smile. "Hello, Director. I brought my children here today to make some snacks and play with the children. I wonder if we are allowed to do so?"
“除了我，你还能相信谁……放松，一切才刚刚开始……”那影子的声音渐渐温柔。
"Whom else can you trust besides me… Relax, it's just the beginning…" That shadow's voice became gentler and gentler.
“除了麦米餐厅，这混乱之城还有值得吃的东西吗？回洛都再吃吧。”亚伯罕的声音从马车里传出来。
"What other food in Chaos City is worth eating other than Mamy Restaurant's? I'll eat when I return to Rodu." Abraham's voice sounded from the carriage.
“除非杀死康妮，让法克部落再次陷入混乱，或者倒向我们奥格部落。”奥斯特的脸上露出一丝残忍的笑容。
"Unless we kill Connie and make the Falk Tribe descend into chaos again. Perhaps they will lean towards our Aug Tribe again." A cruel smile appeared on Auster's face.
“随我来。”多米尼克说道，走在前方带着两人向着深宫之中走去。
"Follow me," Dominic said as he walked in front and led the two into the depths of the palace.
“随时都可以吗？”埃菲下意识的撩了一下头发。
"Anytime?" Eiffie swept her hair behind her ear subconsciously.
“随着任务进度，将有更多任务奖励发放！”
"As the mission proceeds, more rewards will be given!
“隐匿和诡惑是我们鬼族的天赋能力之一。”诺亚笑着解释道，带着几分小骄傲。
"Stealth and deception are one of the talents of the Ghost Clan," Noya explained with a smile proudly.
“难道……此事是乔修殿下做的？”
"Could it be… that this was done by Prince Josh?"
“难道你就真的想一辈子都被人嘲笑一个做菜的系统，随意踢出群聊？拥有一个强大的宿主，才能让你在系统史上留下名字，被永远铭记！”麦格慷慨激昂道。

"Do you want to be laughed at by others for being just a cooking system for the rest of your life and be kicked out of groupchats as and when they please? Having a powerful host would allow your name to be inked in the history of Systems and be remembered forever!" Mag said agitatedly.
“难道是冲着艾米来的？”麦格皱眉。
Perhaps he has come for Amy? Mag frowned.
“难道这里还有比你更小的吗？”奥尔登瞪眼。
"Is there anyone smaller than you?" Aulden glared at Amy.
“零件到齐了，埃菲小姐过来和我说一声，我来替你组装调试。”麦格点点头。
"Let me know when all the parts are ready. I'lll try helping you fix them together." Mag nodded.
“需要我从暗夜精灵里帮你安排几位吗？”伊琳娜问道。
"Do you need me to arrange some manpower from the Night Elves?" Irina asked.
“露娜老师！”艾米小跑着上前来，仰头看着露娜叫道。
Amy jogged over, looked up at Luna, and called out to her, "Teacher Luna!"
“露娜老师，这位叔叔做的烤肉串超好吃的。”
"Teacher Luna, the kebabs made by this uncle are super delicious."
“面积的确和酒馆一样大，不过他花了十年的时间，还有两个酒窖没有装满。”埃菲有些遗憾道。
Eiffie regretfully said, "The space was indeed as big as the tavern, but he had spent 10 years of his time and two of the cellars were not filled."
“预料之中，他已经失去了选择的空间，退一步便是深渊，相比于一个失去控制的儿子，做出这个决定并不难。”伊琳娜只是扫了一眼，便又低头继续喝豆浆。

"It's within our expectations. He has already lost his space to choose. It'd already have been the abyss if he'd chosen to take a step back. Compared to losing a son who has already lost control of his actions, this decision isn't hard to make." Irina only took a quick look before she continued to drink the soybean milk.
“额……”埃菲表情一滞。
"Erm…" Eiffie looked taken aback..
“额……”老板还是有些犹豫。
"Erm..." The boss was still a little hesitant.
“额……”麦格沉吟道：“理论上是没问题的。”
"Er…" Mag said. "Theoretically, it should not be a problem."
“额……”麦格的表情略显尴尬，果然有时候话还是不能说的太满。
"Erm..." Mag has an awkward expression. One indeed shouldn't speak too fast sometimes.
“额……”麦格眉梢微挑，感觉这弯拐的有点急。
"Err..." Mag raised his brow. That escalated quickly.
“额……”麦格看着外边密集的客人，已经能够想象到这个鸡飞狗跳的夜晚了。
"Er..." Mag looked at the crowd outside and could already imagine how chaotic it would be.
“额……”麦格看着那爆的很完美的爆米花，一时间也不知道该说什么好了。
"Er…" Mag looked at the perfectly popped popcorn, and was at a loss for words.
“额……”麦格蓝瘦香菇，他可真是比窦娥还冤啊，目光看向了两个孩子，道：“你看两个孩子还在呢。”
"Er…" Mag felt terrible, and felt very wronged. He glanced at the two kids, and said, "Look, the children are still around."
“额……就很高兴。”诺亚要哭了。
"Errr… very happy." Noah wanted to cry.
“额……我是说麦老板非常有眼光。”卡诺有点尴尬的解释道。
Canault awkwardly explained, "Erm… I was saying that Boss Mag had great taste."
“额，好像有点睡过头了。”麦格坐起身来，把趴在他手臂上睡觉的丑小鸭放到一旁，有点小尴尬道。
Embarrassed, Mag sat up and put Ugly Duckling, which was sleeping on his arm, to the side, and said, "Erm. I seem to have overslept a little."
“风之森林里的蜗牛种类有成千上万种，但其中大部分都是不能食用的，其中还有一部分有剧毒，不过也有一些是可以食用的，烹饪之后，还有着不错的味道。”

"There are over 10,000 kinds of snails in the Wind Forest, but most of them are not edible. Some of them are even posionous. However, some are edible and they taste rather nice after they were cooked."
“飞船现在就在洛都城往北一百公里处，高度为10000米！”系统兴奋道。
"The spaceship is 100km North of Rodu at an altitude of 10,000m," the System said excitedly.
“食材已经提前准备好，不过一会需要各位帮忙给孩子们分发食物。”麦格说道。
"The ingredients are already prepared in advance, but I will need help to distribute the food later," Mag said.
“食材的状态恰到好处，如此多不同的食材，却能掌控的如此精确，这个厨师一定有着非常强的控制能力。”
"The food's condition is perfect. There are so many ingredients and yet they are so precisely controlled. This chef must processed very strong control.
“饿了。”伊琳娜的脸上也是带着笑意，以往都是醒来就能吃到准备好的早餐，今天反倒有些不习惯。
"I'm hungry." Irina was also smiling. Breakfast was usually ready when they woke up, so they couldn't get used to it today.
“马库斯当年竟然留下了如此多的藏酒吗？”库尔特闻言也是一脸惊讶，不过很快点头道：“如此的话，这瓶酒是可以参加本届品酒大会的。”
"Marcus actually left so many wine behind?" Kurt was shocked to hear that too. However, he quickly nodded and said, "In that case, this wine is eligible to join this year's liquor tasting event."
“骑士交给我，布卢姆交给你，细节处理要到位，我们只有三分钟的时间。”
"Leave the knight to me. I'll leave Blum to you. Take care of the details. We only have three minutes."
“骗纸！你明明说是来帮我实现愿望的，却给我一本笑话大王，连一包旺仔小馒头都没有，人家不陪你玩了。”艾米瘪了瘪嘴，委屈道。

Amy pursed her lips, and aggrievedly said, "Liar! You said you were here to help me fulfill my wishes, but you only gave me a copy of 'The King of Jokes.' I didn't even get a packet of egg biscuits. I'm not going to play with you anymore."
“骨碌碌~”
"Grrrrr~"
“高等文明的酒量也随之进化了吗？”麦格挑眉，感觉自己有点失策了。
"Did the advanced civilization's alcohol's tolerance evolved too?" Mag raised his eyebrows, feeling that he had misplanned.
“鬼也能交流？”麦格皱眉。
"You can interact with ghosts?" Mag frowned.
“鬼族？很多年前我好像在藏书阁里看到一些有关的记载，这个恶魔种族不是在几百年前的种族战争中已经灭绝了吗？”
"The Ghost Clan? I think I have read some records about them in the library many years ago. Didn't this demon tribe go extinct a few hundred years ago in the racial war?"
“魔鬼和亡灵军团南下，首当其中的是洛斯帝国，避无可避。”麦格看着安德烈，“我是来通知你们做好应战准备的，以免被打个措手不及。”

"If the Dead souls and the Army of the Dead heads south, they would first head to the Roth Empire. That is unavoidable." Mag looked at Andre. "I am here to notify you to be prepare for the battle and not be caught off-guard."
“鲍里斯老板可真是贵人多忘事，我们前两天不是才刚刚在品酒大会上见过面，你这就把我们给忘了？”楼下传来了脚步声和麦格的声音。
Mag's voice and footsteps could be heard coming from downstairs. "Boss Boris is so forgetful. Didn't we just meet at the liquor tasting event two days ago and you've already forgotten about us?"
“鹅已经套完了，要是小客官还想套的话，要不我站里边让你套吧。”老板笑呵呵的说道。
The boss chuckled, and said, "You have caught all the geese, but if you still want to throw the rings, I will stand here and let you catch me."
“鹅！”艾米闻声眼睛一亮，拉着安妮的手便向着远处的摊位跑去，“我们去看看套鹅是什么。”
"Goose!" Amy's eyes lit up when she heard that. She pulled Annie along as she ran towards the stall a distance away. "Let's see what ring-a-goose is."
“麦德勋老板客气了，我们家酒馆才刚开业没多久，不知道也是正常的。酒馆开在罗莫街，晚上营业，有空的话，可以过来坐坐。”对于意向顾客，麦格迅速切换成专业模式。

To a potential customer, Mag quickly switched to the professional mode. "Boss Madison is being too kind. Our tavern is newly opened. It's normal not to know it. The tavern is situated at Romo Street and we operate at night. Please come over whenever you are free."
“麦格先生在信上没说餐厅关门的事情吧？”加兰皱着眉道。
"Did Mr. Mag say anything about the restaurant being closed in the letter?" Garlan asked with a frown.
“麦格先生应该结束营业了吧？不知道现在过去会不会打扰他。”坐在马车上闭目休息的歌洛璃娅在心里想着。
Mr. Mag should have closed for business. I wonder if I will disturb him if I go over now? Gloria, who was resting in the horse-drawn carriage with her eyes closed, thought.
“麦格先生的女儿艾米接受了神之翼，她是被神灵选中的人，也是教廷神女，回归教廷是她最好的选择，她将成为下一任教皇。”希利神情庄重道。

"Mr. Mag's daughter, Amy, has accepted the god's wings. She is the one chosen by the Holy Spirit and the holy maiden of the Holy See. It's the best choice for her to return to the Holy See. She will be the next pontiff."
“麦格先生说过，生活是自己的，只有自己才能左右和决定，既然选择了这条路，义无反顾的走下去就好了。”歌洛璃娅转身走向马车，神态已经恢复了从容与自信，脸上的疲惫之色也是一扫而空。

"Mr. Mag said before that only we ourselves could decide how to lead our lives. Since I have chosen this route, I will just continue on it." Gloria turned to walk to the horse-drawn carriage. She looked relaxed and confident again, and the tiredness on her face went away.
“麦格先生，您好，我是福利院的院长安奈林，露娜老师经常和我提起您。”这时，一位精干的中年男人快步走到麦格身前，看着他有些激动道。
Right then, a lean middle-aged man strode over to Mag, and excitedly said, "Hello, Mr. Mag. I am the orphanage's director, Aneurin. Teacher Luna always mentions you to me."
“麦格先生，我们没有敌意，这是教皇给你的亲笔信。”希利也是站起身来，从随身戒指空间中取出了一封信，递交给麦格。
"Mr. Mag, we don't mean any harm. This is the letter written to you personally by the pope." Seely also got up, retrieved a letter from his space magic ring, and passed it to Mag.
“麦格先生，我是教廷大主教希利，关于你的女儿艾米，有件事想和你交流一下，不知可否。”希尔看着麦格说道。
Seely looked at Mag, and said, "Mr. Mag, I am Archbishop Seely of the Holy See. I have something to discuss with you about your daughter Amy. May I?"
“麦格先生，谢谢你。”露娜走到麦格的身旁，轻声说道。
Luna walked to Mag, and softly said, "Mr. Mag, thank you."
“麦格先生？”这时，一道有些惊讶的声音从麦格身后响起。
"Mr. Mag?" Right then, a slightly surprised voice appeared from behind Mag.
“麦格叔叔做的美食，没有人能够拒绝的。”杰西卡深以为然的点头。
"Nobody can resist the delicious food made by Uncle Mag." Jessica nodded in agreement.
“麦格叔叔好。”杰西卡看着麦格打招呼道。
"Hello, Uncle Mag," Jessica greeted Mag.
“麦米餐厅？难道是亚丁广场上的那个麦米餐厅吗？”那位年轻的工作人员倒是一脸惊讶的看着麦格。
"Mamy Restaurant? The Mamy Restaurant on Aden Square?" The young staff member looked at Mag with shock.
“麦老板……”一直在一旁的卡诺则是有些担忧的看着麦格，这麦老板也太生猛了，什么话都敢说。
"Boss Mag…" Canault, who was standing at the side, looked at Mag worriedly. Boss Mag was being too fierce. He even dared to make such comments.
“麦老板一向以宠女儿出名，他可能只是不想让艾米离开他而已……”卡诺小声说道。
"Boss Mag is known for doting on his daughter. He most probably just doesn't want Amy to leave him…" Canault said softly.
“麦老板不用紧张，我爷爷这是在和他们交流呢。”诺亚笑着道，没想到亚历克斯也怕鬼。
"Don't be nervous, Boss Mag. My grandpa is interacting with them," Noah said with a laugh. He didn't expect Alex to be afraid of ghosts.
“麦老板去寻求各种族层面的联盟，我们鬼族同样可以尽自己的一份力。”梅兰特放下旱烟，“覆巢之下无完卵，如果克苏鲁控制了诺兰大陆，那便彻底完了。”

"Boss Mag went to seek alliances from the other races. The Ghost Clan can also play our part." Merante placed his cigarette down. "If Cthulhu were to take control of the entire Norland Continent, everything will be gone."
“麦老板可真是难得的好男人，你确定不加把劲把他抓住？”薇薇安站在露娜身旁，看着正在收拾烧烤架的麦格小声道。
Vivian stood next to Luna as she watched Mag clear the barbecue rack, and softly said, "Boss Mag is a good man hard to come by. Are you sure you are not going to try harder and take him down?"
“麦老板带着小老板出门玩去了，麦米餐厅关门歇业一个月。”亚伯罕轻轻叹了口气，“你以为我想回来啊，麦米餐厅属实太香了。”
"Boss Mag brought Little Boss out for a vacation, and Mamy Restaurant was closed for a month." Abraham sighed lightly. "Did you think I really wanted to come back? Mamy Restaurant is too delicious."
“麦老板来消息了？”诺亚回头，有些兴奋道。
"There's news from Boss Mag?" Noah asked excitedly as he turned his head back.
“麦老板的文采还真不错呢，辞藻算不上华丽，但恰到好处，少了几分油腻感。写的简单易懂，哪怕是从来没有做过菜的我，看完之后也觉得自己可以了。”温妮莎坐在马车上，翻看着手中的食全食美杂志，笑着说道。

"Boss Mag has quite a flare for writing. Although he does not use flambuoyant vocabulary, it was good as it did not feel cringey. His writing is simple and easy to understand. For someone who hasn't cooked before, even I feel that I can cook," Vanessa, who was traveling in a horse-drawn carriage, said with a smile as she flipped the Perfect Food magazine in her hands.
“麦老板说吃方便面是不需要懂烹饪的，只要把水烧开，然后把这个包装里的所有东西倒进碗里，加上开水等一会就可以了。”诺亚答应了一声，开始动手。

"Boss Mag said that you do not need to know how to cook to eat the instant noodles. You just have to boil water, then pour everything in this packet into a bowl. After that, pour some hot water and wait for a while." Noya replied and started cooking.
“麦老板还真是慷慨之人。”蹲在铁匠铺门口，手里捧着一碗米饭的墨白有些感慨道。
"Boss Mag is such a generous person," Mobai lamented as he squatted at the entrance of his blacksmith store with a bowl of white rice in his hands.
“麦老板这劳碌命，这辈子是不可能这么悠闲了。”亚伯罕收回目光，拿起筷子夹起了一根猪舌头。
Boss Mag has been hustling all his life. He would never be in such leisure. Abraham turned back and picked up a piece of pig's tongue with his chopsticks.
“麦老板，你们来了。”梅兰特从洞穴中快步走了出来。
"You guys have arrived, Boss Mag." Merante quickly strode out of the cave.
“麦老板，你就是我的再生父母！”诺亚咬了一口叫化鸡，热泪盈眶的看着麦格说道。
Noah bit into the beggar's chicken and said to Mag with tears in his eyes, "Boss Mag, you are no different to my parents!"
“麦老板，就上次您给我喝的那种酒，我爷爷可是把我数落了好些天了，说我糟蹋了好酒。”诺亚一脸幽怨道，这些天他因为那一小壶酒可是没少被他爷爷进行爱的教育。

"Boss Mag, we will have the liquor that you gave me previously. My grandpa has been scolding me for wasting good liquor for the past few days," Noah replied miserably. He had been lectured by his grandpa for that small bottle of liquor in the past few days.
“麦老板，带吃的了吗？”狮鹫刚刚停稳，诺亚已经腆着脸上前问道。
"Boss Mag, did you bring any food?" Noah already went up and asked shyly as soon as the griffin landed.
“麦老板，感谢你们夫妇昨晚的救命之恩。”梅兰特向麦格深深鞠了一躬，感激道。
"Boss Mag, I am very thankful to you and your wife for saving my life," Merante said gratefully with a deep bow.
“麦老板，我们还能不能进去喝一杯啊？”门口站着的一老一少看着麦格笑着说道。
"Boss Mag, can we still go in for a drink?" An old man and young man looked at Mag with a smile at the door.
“麦老板，我已经成为希望学园的老师了，以后你可以叫我薇薇安老师。”薇薇安上前来，看着麦格说道。
Vivian came over, and said to Mag, "Boss Mag, I am already a teacher at the Hope School. You can call me Teacher Vivian in the future."
“麦老板，能行吗？”诺亚走到麦格身旁，小声的担忧道。
"Boss Mag, is she up to it?" Noya whispered worriedly to Mag.
“麻辣烤鱼？”麦格不假思索。
"Spicy grilled fish?" Mag replied without any hesitation.
“黄牛怎么会做这种事情呢？那是一种有了智商的魔兽吗？”埃菲惊道。
"Why would the yellow cows[1. The colloquial term for scalpers in Chinese is literally 'yellow cow'.] do that? Are they some kind of magic beast with wits?" Eiffie exclaimed.

Abraham suddenly felt multiple buttons from his shirt burst open, exposing his long johns.
亚伯罕抿了一小口酒，压制住心中的震撼，目光投向了一旁的凉拌猪耳朵。
Abraham took a sip of wine to suppress his shock. He looked at the pig ears salad at the side.

亚伯罕擦了擦手，笑着道：“这家酒馆的老板挺有意思的，他们传就传吧，可以帮他省些麻烦。”
Abraham wiped his hand with a smile, and said, "The owner of this tavern is rather interesting. Let them spread the rumors so that he will have less trouble going for him."
亚伯罕收回目光，正打算去找个地方坐下，刚好看到了坐在酒柜后边安静的小姑娘。
Abraham retracted his gaze. He intended to find a seat when he saw that quiet little girl sitting behind the bar counter.

亚伯罕松了口气，左右看了一眼，好在这不是在麦米餐厅啊，不然小老板可不会说什么害怕，而是直接一个火球招呼了。

Abraham heaved a breath of relief as he looked around him. Fortunately, they weren't at Mamy Restaurant. Otherwise, Little Boss wouldn't say anything about being afraid—she would just release a fireball instead.
亚伯罕沉默思索了一会，摇头道：“不必了，陛下没有召我入宫，也没有正式昭告天下，恐怕只是外面瞎传的小道消息，你传我命令，公爵府不得有任何人谈论此事，否则直接遣散驱逐。”

Abraham pondered silently for a while before shaking his head, and said, "There's no need to. His Majesty didn't summon me, and he didn't announce it to the world, either. I think it's most likely to be just rumors. Pass down my orders. No one in the duke's residence is allowed to discuss this. Otherwise, they will be fired and evicted."
亚伯罕点了双份的下酒菜，又让管家去隔壁饭馆里打了两份米饭过来。

He took a quick look at the drinks' list on the wall, and said, "I will have one bottle of what they are drinking and a helping of each side dish."

Abraham looked at the empty-handed knight and frowned. "Where's the breakfast?"
亚伯罕看着跪在地上的奥尔登，冷笑道：“我看你们是当官老爷当惯了，觉着出门在外谁都得向你们低头是吧？连这么小，这么可爱的小姑娘，都得给你们倒酒？”

Abraham looked at the kneeling Aulden and scoffed. "I think you're so used to being an official that you think everyone has to bow down to you when you're outside, right? Even such a young and cute little girl has to pour your wine?"
亚伯罕突然又叫住他道：“对了，要是他们家还没有开门就算了，要文明。”
Abraham suddenly stopped him. "Oh yes, forget it if they are not open yet. We have to be civilized."
亚伯罕站起身来，看着管家道：“他们家的下酒菜应该也挺下饭的，你遣人去给我买些下酒菜回来。”
Abraham got up, and said to the butler, "Their side dishes should go well with the porridge too. Send someone to buy and bring some side dishes for me."
亚伯罕笑着摇头道：“没事，我和老板打过招呼了，一会我们会自己把饭碗收拾了。”
Abraham shook his head with a smile, and said, "It's alright. I've already told the owner. We'll just bring the bowl back with us later."
亚伯罕笑着道：“你尝尝，味道也有异曲同工之妙。”
Abraham said with a smile, "Try it, it tastes rather similar."
亚伯罕自己有些打累了，这才停下，看了一眼捂着裆躺在地上的奥尔登，说道：“今天这事，就这么算了，我告诉你，以后这家酒馆，我罩了，你们谁要是需要倒酒的，就来找我，我包你们满意。”

Abraham got tired of beating Aulden and stopped. He glanced at the man who was lying on the ground, covering his crotch, and said, "I'll let tonight's incident go. Let me tell you. This tavern is under my care. If any of you need someone to pour your wine, look for me, and I'll make sure to satisfy you."
亚伯罕说道：“掉头，去后边那家酒馆。”
Abraham said, "Turn back to that tavern behind us."
亚伯罕走了，喝的半醉的约瑟夫等人也是纷纷结账离去。
After Abraham left, Joseph, and the others who were tipsy, settled the bill and left.

Eiffie had already sat down, so Mag naturally couldn't chase her away. He could only pour her a cup of tea.
人气不足导致装修的动力不足，现在趁着双金奖的热度，也是让各位老板萌生了升级店铺的心思。
The low popularity caused the inertia to refurbish. With the popularity of the twin gold awards, all the bosses had the thought of upgrading their shops.
人群中，埃菲慢慢向后挪了一点，侧身让自己藏到餐厅老板肥壮的身躯之后，脸蛋微微泛红。
Eiffie slowly backed out in the crowd. She hid herself behind the restaurant's boss's fat body, and blushed slightly.
今天塞班酒馆多了不少新客，没有经历过高度酒调教的他们，很快便醉倒。
There were many new customers at Saipan Tavern today. They, who hadn't tried hard liquor before, got drunk quickly.
今天她是来感谢哈迪斯先生的，顺便告诉他品酒大会已经报名成功。
She specially came to thank Mr. Hades today and to inform him that the registration for the liquor tasting was successful.
今天她穿了一件酒红色长裙，将她凹凸有致的身材完美呈现。
She wore a burgundy red long dress today. It emphasized her shapely figure perfectly.
今天是品酒大会的正赛日期，作为夺冠热门，麦格当然要到场瞧瞧。
Today was the liquor tasting event competition day. As a hot favorite for the champion, Mag had to be there to take a look.
今天的客人进店，不少都问了麦格是否参加品酒大会，可见品酒大会就好酒人士的圈子里还是有着不小的影响力。

Many of the customers who came today asked Mag if he would be joining the liquor tasting event, showing that the alcohol-lovers in the liquor tasting event were still rather influential in the circle.
今天第二个五十分出现了！
The second 50 points in the day appeared!
今天这鱼香茄子做的，是人吃的吗？连最基本的刀工都做不好，茄子一块大一块小，这态度能做出什么好菜来？
The eggplant with garlic sauce today is not fit for eating. Even the most basic cutting is not done well. The eggplant pieces are in different sizes. Can you cook a dish well with this attitude?
今天鲍里斯和她交谈的时候，的确给出了一个非常有诚意的价码，里斯酒馆的合伙人，三成的股份，一年躺赚上千万的分红，还能继续全额保留泰坦酒馆的所有权。

Boris had indeed given her a very sincere price when he talked to her today. Partner of Reese Tavern with 30% shares. She could earn hundreds of millions of dividend every year while keeping Titan Tavern to herself.
今日从兵部出来，刚好看到波比，知道这位小兄弟常与赫克托一起喝酒，他们也一起喝过几次，挺对他味的，所以便邀他一起来喝酒，顺便悼念一下赫克托。

When he walked out from the Ministry of Defense today, and chanced upon Bobby, he invited Bobby to have a drink in memory of Hector since he knew that Bobby had been drinking often with Hector. He also had a few drinks with Bobby on certain occasions, and found that they could get along rather well.
今日在这里再闻到正宗泰坦酒的酒香，的确让不少老酒客有些唏嘘和怀念。
Smelling the authentic fragrance of the Titan Liquor again here today made many old customers of Titan Liquor reminisce its taste.
今日奥斯特召集他们来此，也是和此事有关。
Auster gathered them for a discussion today was most likely related to it as well.
今日法部的几位大臣决定出来喝酒，听兵部过来交接的人说罗莫街上新开了一家酒馆，里边的酒是难得一见的佳酿，一行人便抱着来瞧瞧的心态到了这里。

Today, a few of the courtiers from the Ministry of Law had decided to come out for drinks. They heard from the Ministry of Defense that there was a newly opened tavern on Romo Street, and the wine there was too good to be true. Therefore, they came over to try.
今日白天还听着奥斯特对明日伏杀康妮之事侃侃而谈，现在他却突然被杀了。
Auster was still talking about how to ambush and kill Connie in the day, and now he was killed all of a sudden.
今日的塞班酒馆，比起往日要更为热闹。
The Saipan Tavern today was much more busier than before.
今早无事，所以麦格收拾好东西后，泡了壶水果茶，一家人围坐在桌前。
They had nothing to do in the morning, so Mag made a pot of fruit tea after clearing up and the whole family sat around the table.
今晚之后，暮光森林只有康妮的声音。
After tonight, only Connie's voice would be heard in the Twilight Forest.
今晚的酒馆生意依旧不错，虽然还未达到爆满的程度，但一晚下来，十万铜币还是轻松进账。
Business at the tavern tonight was still not bad. Although it was not at the full house level, earning 10,000 copper coins a night was still rather easy.
从今天开始，泰坦酒馆才算是真正意义上的回归。
From today onwards, Titan Tavern had finally returned.
从他的数据库检索出来的结果显示，这些食物应该都来自于一个名为地球的低阶星球，包括扬州这个地名。
From what it found from its database, this food should be from a lowly star called Earth, which was where the place named Yangzhou was.
从他的衣着打扮来看，虽然不算富裕，但也绝对不是什么流浪汉。
Judging from his attire, although he did not seem rich, he was definitely not a homeless man.
从体型上判断，他没有把握能够从这个贱贱的酒馆老板手里抢到那些金币。
Judging from physical size, he was not certain that he could snatch those gold coins from this darn tavern owner.
从兵部这几天的遭遇来说，他这副样子并不难理解，甚至他能在这个时候来到这里喝酒，说明他的确距离兵部的核心权利圈有些远。

Based on what had happened in the military over the past few days, his exhaustion was not difficult to understand. On top of that, him being able to come here for a drink at this time showed that he wanted to stay further away from the core power struggle in the military.
从冰箱里取出昨晚提前揉好的面团，温度设定好之后，现在正是发酵的最完美的状态。
He took out a ball of dough he prepared last night from the fridge. After setting the temperature, it was at its best state for the yeast to work.
从各种资料来看，教廷在人族的历史上都是非常正面的形象。
Judging from the various resources, the Holy See had always had a very positive image in the human's history.
从员工们散漫的神态，以及老板们眉眼间难掩的忧虑来看，这里的商业环境已经恶化到无法继续经营的程度。

Judging from the employees' relaxed attitude and the bosses' ill-concealed worried looks, the business atmosphere here had deteriorated to the point where it was already very difficult to continue their operation.
从来到这个世界为止，系统都表现出一切尽在掌控的高级感。
Ever since he came to this world, the System had given off the vibe that it was in control of everything.
从现场来看，这是一场一边倒的战斗。
Looking at the scene, this seemed to be a one-sided battle.
从衣着来看，这两位都是有钱的上流人士，莫非还真又让他遇见了冤大头？他的运气也太好了吧？！
Judging from their clothes, both of them should be the rich upper-class people. Perhaps, he had really bumped into idiots? Was his luck really that good?!
从酒柜下边取出前天伊琳娜喝了小半瓶的茅台酒，打开瓶盖倒了一小杯到一个类似于小号熏香炉的小罐子里。

He took out the half bottle of Maotai that Irina had drunk two days ago under the bar cabinet. He opened the cap and put a small glass of Maotai into a small container that resembled a small aromatherapy diffuser.
从麦格和那两个孩子的衣着和气质看得出这是有钱人，这段时间也时常有好心人来看望孩子，可那些有钱人的孩子和院子里的孩子有着明显的差别和隔阂，很难玩到一起。

Judging from Mag and the two children's clothing and temperament, it was obvious that they were wealthy people. Although there were often kind-hearted people visiting the children recently, those rich people's children had an obvious difference and a barrier with the orphanage's children. It was difficult for them to play together.
他一边抵挡着兰克斯特的攻击，一边继续呼唤他，但除了让他变得更加疯狂之外，并未起到什么明显的效果。
As Mag tried to block Rankster's attack, he continued calling out to him. However, there did not seem to be any obvious effect other than making him even more hysterical.
他下意识的想要抬起右手，却发现自己已经失去了整条右臂，左手连忙抓起床边的大刀，向上挥斩而去。
He wanted to raise his right hand instinctively, but he realized his entire right arm was already gone. He quickly grabbed his saber with his left and slashed across.
他不是狂妄，而是有着完全匹配的实力。
He wasn't being arrogant, instead he had the strength to match it.
他不甘啊！
He was indignant!
他不知道乔修为何会招惹上魔鬼，恐怕也没有人会知道。
He didn't know how Josh got involved with the devil. Perhaps no one would ever know.
他主要是怕伊琳娜动不动就把冷冷的折叠椅往客人的脸上拍。
He was mainly afraid that Irina would throw the cold foldable chair at the customers for no rhyme or reason.
他买下的这半条街，价格自然水涨船高。
The value of the half of the street that he bought would naturally increase as well.
他们似乎明白了一直安分的奴隶，今晚为何突然变得亢奋且激进。
They seemed to understand why the usually docile slaves suddenly became agitated and radical tonight.
他们只是赶到现场，保护现场，清理现场。
All they did was rush to the site, ensure security, and clean things up.
他们在小吃街吃了一转，但小家伙没有吃饱，所以又在别人的推荐下来了这家新开不久的牛肉馆子再吃一顿。
They had tried all the snacks on the snacks street, but the little one wasn't full, so they came to this newly opened beef restaurant under someone's recommendation.
他们在这里看了不少人套鹅，可这么小的小姑娘来套，还是第一次见，那大肥鹅要是把脖子伸长了，可不比这小家伙矮了。

They had been watching many people trying to catch the geese, but this was the first time they saw such a little girl trying to catch one. If those geese stretched their necks up, they would be taller than this little one.
他们好不容易出了洛都城，一路风尘仆仆的赶到这里，没想到却吃了个闭门羹。
They finally came out of Rodu and traveled all the way here but did not expect to be locked out.
他们怎么也想不到，原本还只能任他们宰割的奴隶，此刻竟然成了能够对他们肆意生杀予夺的存在。
They had never expected that those slaves who were at their mercy before, had become an existence that could decide their life and death.
他们想要的是横推整个世界，然后当诺兰大陆的君主，让各种族臣服。
What they wanted was to sweep across the whole world, and then become the king of the Norland Continent, making all the races bow to them.
他们想起来了，刚刚这个男人因为身边群美环绕，还差点被认成男爵大人。
They recalled that this man was mistaken to be the Lord Baron earlier because he was surrounded by beautiful ladies.
他们拍打着栏杆和木板，发出了愤怒而绝望的叫吼。
They started hitting the fence and wood as they let out desperate and furious howls.
他们是农场耕种的主力，供养着布鲁斯特家族和风之森林。
They were the main workforce of the farms that provided for the Brewster Family and the Wind Forest.
他们是凭空消失的，并且被屏蔽了定位信号，这是极其异常的情况，所以本系统向你进行告知。”系统严肃道。
They disappeared into thin air and the tracking device had been blocked. This is a very odd situation. Therefore, I am reporting it to you," the System said seriously.
他们本以为自己是猎人，直到现在他们才知道，原来自己是早已入瓮的猎物。
They thought they were the hunters, but now, they finally realized they were, in fact, the prey in the trap.
他们来的不算晚，但已经只剩下两张空着的桌子。
They didn't come too late but there were only two empty tables left now.
他们的热闹与我无关，因为我没钱。
The crowd and noise there had nothing to do with me because I had no money.
他们看着冰墙之外，守卫们侮辱着安东的尸体，却无能为力。
They watched the guards humiliate Anton's body beyond the ice wall helplessly.
他们睡了一觉，被天道所不容，惨遭和谐，所以只能忍痛去了微信公众号……
他们被严令禁止交流，杜绝一切和自由有关的消息传播。
They were strictly prohibited from communicating with each other and all freedom-related news were stopped from spreading.
他似乎看到了一位优雅的女神，令人心生爱慕，却又不敢靠近的女神！
He seemed to have seen an elegant goddess that one would admire but did not dare to go close to!
他倒是有些好奇这个女人的酒量如何，就算是高等文明，只要不是机器人，总是有弱点的。
He was a little curious about how well this woman could hold her drink. Even she was from an advanced civilization, she would still have a weakness as long as she wasn't a robot.
他几乎无法想象竟然有人能够把食物烹饪的如此美味，这原本只是用来填饱肚子，补充能量的东西，竟然也变成了一种享受。
He couldn't imagine how someone could make food taste so delicious. These things that only were used to fill the stomach and replenish energy actually became a form of enjoyment.
他刚从兵部那边出来，因为乔修的事情，不理朝政多年的他还是第一次踏入兵部。

He had just come out from the Ministry of Defense. Because of Josh's incident, he, who hadn't been caring about the official affairs for a long time, stepped into the Ministry of Defense for the first time.
他刚刚完全手忙脚乱束手无策，要不是麦格和伊琳娜出手相助，现在他爷爷恐怕已经没了。
He had been completely flustered just now. If it were not for Mag and Irina, his grandpa would probably be gone now.
他刚给自己打上泡沫，就注意到了对面传来的动静。
He had just soaped himself when he noticed the noises from across.
他又被砸翻在地。
He was slammed to the floor again.
他只在一些非常失败的酒液中闻到过烟熏味，那是在烘干的过程中出现了严重失误。
He had only smelled smokey scent in those liquor that failed badly. That was a serious mistake that happened during the drying process.
他只想一个人安静的喝点酒，什么都不想，喝醉了就回去睡觉，其他的事情就等明天醒来再说吧。
All he wanted to do was to drink quietly. He did not want to think. He just wanted to get drunk, go home, and sleep. Everything else could wait until tomorrow.
他只想一个人安静的喝酒，但现在看来也没有什么更好的选择了。
He just wanted to have a quiet drink alone, but it seemed there was no better choice now.
他只是按照命令，做了他应该做的事情而已……为什么死的是他，还有他那无辜的家人。
All he did was obey orders and whatever he should do… Why were he and his innocent family members the ones dead?
他可是一个系统。
It was a system.
他如果是冲着钱来的，直接提走就行了。
If he was here for the money, he could just take them and leave.
他完全能够理解这些突然被断粮的客人们的不适。
He could completely understand the customers' unease when their meals were cut off suddenly.
他实在是不忍心看麦格倔强的样子，他甚至可以感受那种无助和悔恨。
He really could not bear to watch Mag like that. He could even feel that helplessness and regret.
他家里可是有着一位貌美如花的老婆大人。
He had a beautiful wife at home.
他家里有个更漂亮的。
He had a more beautiful one at home.
他小心观察了一番，有点担心他们会通过菜猜出他的身份。
He observed them carefully, worried that they would guess his identity through the dishes.
他就像是一个外表粗犷的野人，却有着令人震惊的卓越学识，娓娓道来，让人忍不住沉醉其中。
He was like a wild man with an rugged exterior but had astonishing knowledge. He shared his knowledge slowly, making people couldn't help but get lost in it.
他左右看了一眼，对上了蹲在他对面的麦格的目光，又是猛然回头看到了在他身旁悠悠醒来的梅兰特，这才稍稍松了口气。
He looked around and met Mag's eyes. Mag was squatting next to him. Then, he snapped his head around and saw Merante, who was slowly waking up. He finally heaved a sigh of relief.
他已经得到太多了，这一百万铜币撬动的，可是三十亿的巨款。
He had already received too much. This one million copper coins was leveraged on three billion.
他已经能够想象到安德烈或者乔修收到这个消息的时候，该是怎样的愤怒。
He could already imagine Andre's and Josh's fury when they received this news.
他往府邸里丢了一块木头，然后转身离去。
He threw a block of wood towards the mansion and turned to leave.
他很慌。
He was in a panic.
他忍不住又喝了一口，这次他闭上了眼睛，细细品味着酒液的各种滋味，没有果酒的甜腻滋味，也不似一般粮食酒那般苦涩难咽，也不知这酿酒师用了什么工艺，又添加了什么东西，能够让酒味变得如此迷人，令人想要沉醉其中。

He could not help but take another sip. This time, he closed his eyes to taste the various flavors within the wine. It was not sweet like fruit wine, and it was not bitter like grain wine. This wine was so mesmerizing, and could make one fall right into it. Abraham had no idea what skills the winemaker employed or what was added to make the wine like this.
他才不管外面如何洪水滔天，他只要在这座城堡，这个领地上，他依旧是那个至高无上的王，有着杀生予夺的权利。
He didn't what happened out there. He only wanted to be the unparalleled ruler in this castle and this fiefdom and hold the power to kill and rule.
他放下帽子。
He then pulled his hat down.
他无法确定是他的剑更快，还是她的枪更快。
He wasn't certain if his sword or her gun would be faster.
他无疑是这次事件的最大获利者。
He was, without a doubt, the person who benefited the most from this incident.
他昨天才刚刚回到洛都，今天入宫见国王，顺便把温妮莎带出来玩一圈，这个小吃货也有段时间没有离开皇宫了。
He had just returned to Rodu yesterday, and met the king in the palace today, so he brought Vanessa out for a fun trip. This little chowhound hadn't left the palace for quite some time too.
他昨晚进宫，将此事禀报陛下，陛下便震怒，令十数位十级强者在洛都城内搜寻了数遍，可惜未能找到嫌犯。
He reported the incident to His Majesty in the palace last night. The king was furious, and ordered 10-odd 10th-tier powerhouses to comb through Rodu a few times, but the suspect couldn't be found.
他是一个有着二十多年驾龄的远途马车车夫，给商行跑远途运输，去过不少地方，不过今天刚刚失业。
He had been a long-distance horse-drawn carriage coachman for more than 20 years. He had been delivering goods for traders, and had been to several places. However, he had just lost his job today.
他是真正的妇女之友啊！
He was the true friend of women!
他显然无法将兰克斯特唤醒，但说不定古老者有方法，他现在只能寄托于晞看到他的求救信息之后，能够尽快赶到。
It was apparent that he was unable to wake Rankster up. However, there might be an ancient way. Right now, he could only pin his hopes on Xi to arrive quickly after seeing his message for help.
他曾参与了封印克苏鲁上半身的战斗，并在那场战斗中做出了非常重要的贡献。在那场战斗中，克苏鲁遭遇雷电攻击，分裂出一部分善良灵魂，变成一个女孩……」

He has taken part in the battle of resealing the upper body of Cthulhu and made a very important contribution in that battle. The Cthulhu was struck by lightning in that battle and a part of kind soul was rent and it became a little girl...]
他本以为因为上次的事情，这女人应该会避着他一点，但没想到这娘们的脸皮比他想象的更厚一些，看到他丝毫没有避嫌的意思，反倒是笑吟吟的迎上前来，声音娇媚道：“哟，这不是哈迪斯老板嘛，怎么，一个人出来散步？”

Initially, he thought that this woman would be avoiding him because of what happened previously. However, he did not expect her to be more thick-skinned than he imagined. When she saw him, instead of having any intention to avoid him, she went up to him with a smile, and even said coquettishly, "Yo, isn't this Boss Hades? Why are you out alone for a walk?"
他比较担心明天早上醒来，桌上摆着一大锅蜗牛汤。
He was worried to see a table with a large pot of snail soup when he wakes up next morning.
他没有十成的把握把她留下，更没有把握在战斗的过程中她不会将信息实时传回去。
He wasn't completely confident that he could make her stay, nor was he sure that she wouldn't transmit any information back in real time while they were fighting.
他浅饮一口，酒液缓缓滑入口腔，口感干冽，酒味柔和，酒香在口中萦绕，浓郁迷人，优雅而醇和。
He took a sip. The wine slid into his mouth. It was gentle and its fragrance filled his mouth. It was rich and enchanging, graceful and mellow.
他满意的看着面前的爆炒田螺，这才是上品下酒菜啊。
He looked at the stir-fried escargot before him with satisfaction. This was a top-grade dish to go with alcohol.
他点了一瓶酒，两千铜币，酒香浓郁，是他从未品尝过的美酒。
He ordered a bottle of wine that cost 2,000 copper coins. The wine was rich and fragrant. It was something he had not tasted before.
他现在只想埃菲赶紧回家，这种氛围中，男人是最受罪的。
He only wanted to make Eiffie go home as soon as possible. It was the man who suffered the most in such an ambiance.
他现在只想找个地方喝点酒，一个人静静。
He only wanted to find a place to have a drink alone.
他现在想把那个传说中的父亲大人，拉出去一百遍！
Right now, it wanted to drag that legendary father out a hundred times!
他现在还不想被切片研究。
He didn't want to be sliced up and studied yet.
