冰凉凉的绿豆糕入口，甜味被降低了少许，依旧细腻爽口，轻轻一咬便在嘴里化开，口感细润紧密，清香绵软不粘牙，的确十分美味，一改之前甜腻的感觉。

The moment the chilled mung bean pastry went into her mouth, the sweetness also decreased by a lot. The texture was still as fine and refreshing, and the pastry would melt easily in her mouth. It tasted denser, and was fragrant and soft, yet not sticky. It was indeed very delicious, and was not as sweet as before.
冰原之上炸裂出一个大洞。
The ice plain exploded and a large hole was formed.
冰窟下方是一片巨大的冰面，而在那冰面之上却有着密密麻麻的无数人形和兽形的坑洞，就像是有人将某种东西从冰封之中抠出来一般。
There was a huge ice surface below the cave and on top of it were countless human-shaped and beast-shaped holes, as if someone had dug them out from the ice.
冰镇的绿豆糕口感的确更好一些，甜腻感被降低了许多，但绿豆糕本身的细腻口感并未受到影响，但仔细去品味的话，还是有少许的结块状态存在。
The chilled mung bean pastry was indeed better. It was no longer so sweet, but the texture was not affected. But upon meticulous tasting, Mag could still feel that there were some solid pieces.
冰面开始剧烈颤抖，一个如小山般庞大，覆满鳞片的胶状物从冰面下缓缓爬了出来，巨大的蝠翼抬起，遮天蔽日。

The ice on the surface started to shake and a gel-like organism the size of a hill, covered in scales, started crawling out from beneath the ice slowly. It raised its large bat wings, covering the sun.
准备结账的晞打了个一个饱嗝，这让她有点惊讶。
Xi, who was prepared to settle her bill, burped, which surprised her.
几乎同时，系统的声音在麦格的脑海中响起。
The system's voice rang in Mag's mind almost simultaneously.
几乎每一个精灵都感受到了改变。
Almost every elf could feel the change.
几乎没有犹豫，伊琳娜便拔开了酒塞。
Without any hesitation, Irina removed the cork.
几位十级骑士和大魔法师相视一眼，皆从对方的眼中看出了惊骇和忌惮，不敢再多问。
The 10th-tier knights and great magic casters all exchanged looks. They could see the fear and horror in each others' eyes, and did not probe further.
几位大臣闻言脸色顿时拉了下来，他们出来喝酒，还从来没有人敢拿不好的东西糊弄，这老板不厚道。
The other courtiers all pulled a face. They had never been fooled with inferior goods when they were out for a drink. This owner was not being honest.
几位护卫小声议论道，表情渐渐惊悚和害怕。
The guards discussed the matter softly in fear and terror.
几张桌椅替换之后，再把被斧头砸碎的地面修补一下，酒馆外面也就差不多完工了。
After replacing a couple of tables and chairs and repairing the floor that was crushed by the ax, the tavern's external work was almost done.
几番推辞，工作人员们还是接受了麦格的好意。
After declining a few times, the staff members accepted Mag's good will.
凶悍到能够砍翻五级魔法师布下的魔法罩的暴徒，遭遇了哈迪斯父女，却变成了现在这般惨烈的模样。
The assailant that was so ferocious he could destroy a 5th-tier magic caster's shield met Hades and his daughter but ended up in this terrible state.
出了黑市，麦格找了个巷子打开钱袋看了一眼，全是金晃晃的龙币，二百五十枚。
After leaving the black market, Mag found an alley to chekc the money pouch. It was all golden dragon coins inside. 250 of them in total.
出城往东五百里，紫纹狮鹫在一片竹林上空停下。
The purple-striped griffin hovered above a patch of bamboo forest after they were 800 km east from the city.
出息啊！
Well done!
出水过多是扣分项。
Points were deducted as too much juice had seeped out of the cucumber.
出门叫这几位大臣的车夫进来把喝的酩酊大醉的大人们抬走，麦格翻转了门上的木牌，宣告今日份营业结束。
Mag went out and got the coachmen of the courtiers to bring them back. He flipped the wooden plaque at the door, and officially closed for the day.
出门清理了酒馆周遭的血迹，麦格这才回到酒馆里，关上门，看着坐在椅子上，脸色苍白的梅兰特，和满头大汗的诺亚，眉头微皱道：“什么情况？”

After going out to clear the bloodstains around the tavern, Mag went back and closed the door behind him. He looked at the pale Merante sitting on the chair and Noya with beads of perspiration on his forehead. Mag asked, "What's going on?"
切个菜都能把切菜台给砍翻吗？！
Chopping the vegetables became chopping the kitchen counter!
切断的黄瓜自然散开，大小均匀适中，细密的裂痕布满了黄瓜内外，但看起来依旧饱满。
The cut cucumber split naturally into even sizes. The cucumber was filled with cracks but it still looked very full and juicy.
切菜台听了都想把自己掀了。
The kitchen counter would probably flip itself upon hearing that.
切菜台已经被重新连接在一起，台面平整，除了留下一条黑色的印记，和原先并无两样。
The kitchen counter had been joined back together. The surface was smooth, and other than a black line left behind, it was completely the same as it was before.
刚出炉不久的灌汤包，里边的汤汁还有些发烫。
The soup in the dumpling, which was just taken off the stove, was still piping hot.
刚出炉的灌汤包，里边的汤汁还是滚烫的。
The soup inside the soup dumpling that was just served was still boiling hot.
刚刚不少人都注意到了老板那可爱的小女儿，不过三四岁的样子，竟然有人提出让她倒酒的无理的要求。
Many of them had noticed the owner's cute little daughter. She appeared to be only three or four years old. How dare someone come up with such an unreasonable request, getting her to pour wine?
刚刚他去菜市场买菜的时候，还看到一位买菜的大妈正在看食全食美里他的那篇鱼香茄子教学，一边看，一边夸：“这小伙子长得真俊啊！”

When he was marketing, he saw a middle-aged woman who was selling vegetables, reading his tutorial of the eggplant with garlic sauce in the "Perfect Food". She praised as she read, "This young chap is so handsome!"
刚刚写完日志，并作了汇报的晞，在机舱的角落里发现了一个棕色的小盅。
After writing the diary and finishing her report, Xi discovered a brown little soup pot in a corner of the spaceship.
刚刚出锅一会的油条咬着又香又脆，小家伙的嘴角不自觉的上扬，开心溢于言表。
The freshly fried youtiao was fragrant and crispy. The little fellow smiled subconsciously to display her happiness.
刚刚捧回品酒大会金奖的泰坦酒馆老板埃菲小姐，在营业结束后，遭遇暴徒入室抢劫。
Miss Eiffie, the owner of Titan Tavern, that just brought the gold award home from the liquor tasting event, met with an assailant that robbed her after she closed her shop for the day.
刚刚麦格收到了梅兰特的信，他们在北边发现了一处异常的地点，让他前去查看。
Mag had just received Merante's letter. They had discovered an unusual spot in the north and asked for Mag to check it out.
刚到门口，得到消息的牛肉馆老板已是满脸谄笑的迎上前来，领着亚伯罕和温妮莎进了餐厅，然后直上二楼的精美包厢。

The beef restaurant's boss already received the news of their arrival as soon as they reached the door, and came to welcome them with a fawning smile. He led Abraham and Vanessa into the restaurant and straight to the exquisite private room on the second floor.
刚进入工厂，机器的轰鸣声便已传来。
He heard the machine's humming as soon as he entered the factory.
初级甜品师这种称号他其实并不在意，反正这东西只有他自己能够看到，他比较在意的是那甜品大礼包之中有什么。
He didn't really care for the title of "Junior Patissier," and only he could see it anyway. He cared more about what was in the dessert gift package.
利尔倒是很快冷静下来，看着布卢姆的尸首，神情凝重道：“先把火灭了，封锁此地，此事不得外传，我这就入宫禀报陛下。”

Lear quickly calmed down. He looked at Blum's corpse with a grave expression, and said, "Put the fire out first and seal the place. Do not spread the news of this incident. I will report this to His Majesty right away."
利尔先前在火场之中着急救人没有注意，现在看到怀中抱着的布卢尔如此恐怖，惊得将他丢了出去。
Lear did not notice that as he was in a rush to save the general from the fire. When he finally saw the horrifying look of Blum in his arms, he got such a shock that he threw the body out.
利尔回过神来，提着重剑冲向了被大火包围的寝房，长剑拍开掉落的着火木头，冲入火场之中。
Lear quickly came back to his senses. He rushed into the blazing room with his heavy sword, and used it to hit falling flaming wood away.
利尔站在角落里，此时也是神情紧张的低着脑袋。
Lear stood in a corner with his head lowered nervously too.
利尔见护卫用床单将布卢姆的尸首盖上之后，才匆匆离去，径直前往皇宫。
Lear only hurried off to the palace after watching the guards cover Blum's corpse with a sheet.
别人家小朋友从小玩泥巴，他们家孩子从小玩调酒，好像也没有太大的区别，都是玩嘛，以孩子的兴趣为主。
The other children played with mud, while their children played with liquors, but there didn't seem to be a big difference. Both were a kind of playing, and were what the children were interested in.
别人来酒馆都是为了喝酒。
Others came to the tavern for drinks.
别说……
Speaking about it...
到了九点钟，麦格推开门走了出去，一阵冷风吹来，让他打了个激灵。
At about 9 pm, Mag walked out. A gust of cold breeze caused him to shudder.
到现在为止，麦格还是没有查到这只会飞的肥橘子究竟是什么物种的魔兽，战斗力倒是没有发现，但卖萌越来越是一把好手。
Until now, Mag still hadn't found out what species of magic beast this fat orange that could fly was. He still hadn't discovered its combat power, but it was getting increasingly good at acting cute.
刺啦！
Slash!
刺耳的警报声响彻布鲁斯特家族的上空。
The shrill alarms rang throughout the sky above the Brewster Family.
削的好的田螺，刚好削到内脏的位置，清水搓洗几遍，也就干净了。
The escargot were cut to their intestines. They were clean after washing with water for a few times.
前些日子杰弗里正式宣布她成为莫尔顿家族的唯一继承人，而且开始全面放权，让她开始接手负责家族事务。
Jeffree had officially declared her the Moreton Family's only successor a few days ago, and started to give her complete control, and let her take over the family's business.
前冲的精灵兵士下意识的停住脚步，看着伊琳娜，竟是生不起半点发起进攻的勇气。
Some elven soldiers that were charging forward even halted their footsteps instinctively. Looking at Irina, they didn't even have the courage to charge forward.
前者是有需要寻找伊丽莎白的时候的定位，后者则是如果伊丽莎白发生了危险情况，他能够及时收到警报，或许能够救她一命。

The former was to locate Elizabeth when they needed to look for her. The latter was for him to receive an alert if Elizabeth was in a dangerous situation so that he could get there in time to save her life.
前辈不在，所以波比替他称赞了一声。
Now that his senior was not around, Bobby praised Mag in his stead.
前辈说过，好酒得有上好的酒具来配。
His senior once said that a good wine deserves a good wine set.
剩下的十几只鹅，则被围观的看客们全部作价一百铜币买走了。
The 10-odd geese left over were all bought by the onlookers with 100 copper coins each.
剩下的基本是自住和用来收租的，并无对外出售的意向。
The rest were basically lived in by the owners or already rented for income. There were no inclination for sale.
剩余精神波动已消除。
Remaining spiritual activity fluctuations had been removed.
办事处自然不可能一片漆黑，那不过是一个高级的障眼法。
A working place could not be in complete darkness, of course. That was just a very high-level illusion.
加上那厚重的镣铐，他们在强大的军队面前毫无抵抗力。
With those shackles, they were completely powerless in front of the powerful army.
加了淀粉的浓稠糊糊，里边还加了萝卜、瘦肉和某种菇类，咸淡适宜，味道鲜美，冬日的早晨，一碗入肚，从胃到外都暖暖的，感觉整个人都活了过来。

The soup, which had corn flour added in it, was thick and sticky. There were even raddish, lean meat, and various kinds of mushrooms. It was not too salty and was very fresh. Having a bowl of this soup on a winter morning could make one warm from inside out. It was very revitalizing.
加兰叹了口气，摇头道：“咱们平头百姓能知道啥，但我听说兽人族那边有几十个部落被咱灭了，这事多半不能善了，自求多福吧。”

Garlan sighed and shook his head. "What do we normal people know? However, I've heard that dozens of orc tribes were massacred by us. This is most likely not going to end well. Let's pray for ourselves."
加兰和迈洛看着大门紧闭的麦米餐厅，都有些傻眼。
Garlan and Mylo looked at the tightly shut door of Mamy Restaurant in shock.
加兰看了三遍那订单，依旧有些不可思议，“混乱之城单个市场，怎么会如此火爆？”
Garlanlooked through the bill three times and was still in disbelief. How could Chaos City alone have such a good market response?
加兰随手关上了门，走到办公桌后坐下，幽幽叹了口气，“扯淡呢，是大老板担心情况恶化，想最后捞一笔，所以让我把麦老板的那篇文章提前了。”

Garlan closed the door, sat behind his desk, and softly sighed. "It's nonsense. The big boss wants to make a last killing because he's worried about the situation, so I push forward Boss Mag's article."
加热完成。
The heating up process was completed.
动荡的局势是不利于美食传播的，朝不保夕的时候，还有谁在乎美食，保命才是最重要的事情。
A tumultuous situation was unfavorable to spreading good food. Who would care about good food when they could die at any time. The most important thing was to stay alive.
劲道的面皮，包裹着浸满汁水的肉团，不肥不腻，入口爽滑，按又是另一种美妙的体验。
The dumpling skin was chewy and the meat filling, which was sumberged in soup, was fatty but not greasy. The texture was smooth and it was another remarkable experience.
包子的香味夹杂在热气之中，徐徐飘来。
The fragrance of the dumplings wafted over together with the steam.
包子皮微微塌陷，但弹性极好的回弹回来，包子颤了颤，仿佛还有点生气。
The dumpling sank in a little but bounced right back up and shook a little, as though it was alive.
包括五位评委也是这样想的。
Including the five judges.
包括后来的鲍里斯府邸被窃事件，她可是知道的，这个案件中只有一个暴徒，另外一个是哈迪斯先生扮演的。
Including the incident of Boris's residence being burglared. She knew very well that there was only one assailant. The other one was played by Mr. Hades.
化妆易容过后的麦格钻进车厢，提着被捆绑好的埃菲走了出来，然后一脚踹开那破木门走了进去。
Mag, who had put on a disguise, went into the cabin and came out with Eiffie, who was tied up. He kicked open the wooden door and walked in.
北部，茫茫雪原之上。
In the north, in the snow plains.
十五年前她已经失去了父母，今晚她还要以同样的方式失去生命吗？
She had already lost her parents 15 years ago. Was she going to lose her life in a similar way today?
十五年过去了，在泰坦酒馆要重新步入正轨的时候，同样的事情又发生了。
15 years had passed and just as Titan Tavern was going to return to its glory, the same thing happened again.
十名铜奖酒颁布后，本届品酒大会的重头戏也就完美谢幕了。
After announcing the 10 bronze awards, the highlight of this year's liquor tasting event had a perfect ending.
十数位骑士前后簇拥着马车，其中有一位十级骑士领头，还有数位九级和八级骑士护卫左右。
Tens of knights surrounded the horse-drawn carriage. Among them, the leader was a 10th-tier knight. There were other 9th-tier and 8th-tier knights as well.
十级骑士最强大的手段是剑技，对于法则的领悟，让他们能够借助剑技发挥出远超身体极限的力量。

A 10th-tier knight's most powerful methods were his sword techniques and his understandings on the rules and laws. They allowed them to wield strength that were way beyond their bodies' limitations by executing the sword techniques.
半个小时后，城堡收到了来自生命之城的回复信。
Half an hour later, the castle received the response letter from the City of Life.
半个小时后，麦格出门把卢西恩的车夫和护卫叫进来，把喝得酩酊大醉的两位大人抬走。
Half an hour later, Mag went out to call Lucien's coachman and guards in to bring the two drunk officials back.
半个小时后，麦格扶着腰出了泰坦酒馆，和女人解释一些机械原理还真是为难人。
30 minutes later, Mag came out of Titan Tavern with his hand on his back. It was really difficult to explain the principle of machinery to women.
半个小时后，麦格搬了两个烤架，一个冰激凌机和一个装满食材的食材箱，带着艾米和安妮出门。
Half an hour later, Mag carried two grills, one ice cream machine, and a food crate full of ingredients, and went out with Amy and Annie.
半夜鬼敲门，说明这鬼还挺有礼貌。
The ghost knocking on the door at night means that ghost is rather polite.
半密封的小罐子，上边开了几个细密的小孔，正好能让酒香徐徐飘出，但又不会一下子就跑光了气味。
The semi-sealed small container had a few tiny holes on top, which allowed the liquor's fragrance to diffuse out slowly and not escape all at once.
单纯的清汤馄饨，他其实并不是非常喜欢。
He actually didn't like the wontons in clear soup very much.
单论酒香，今日品的两百多款酒，竟是无一能够与其相提并论的。
Just talking about its aroma, none of the 200-odd liquor could compare to it.
卡诺也想不到麦老板一个普通人，竟然敢在一位大魔法师的面前拥有如此勇气，而且还毫不犹豫的拒绝了让女儿成为未来的教廷教皇的机会。

Canault had never expected that as an ordinary man, Boss Mag would have such courage when facing a great magic caster, and he rejected the chance of letting his daughter become the pope in the future without any hesitation.
卡诺作为一个过来人，面带微笑的看着希利大朵快颐，这和他当初刚发现麦米餐厅的时候差不多。
As someone who had gone through this, Canault watched Seely tuck in with a smile. He had behaved almost in the same manner when he had first discovered Mamy Restaurant.
卡诺怕希尔排队等候无聊，就在一旁给他介绍了许多关于麦米餐厅的趣事。
Canault was afraid that Seely would be bored in the line, so he introduced many Mamy Restaurant's interesting facts to him while they lined up.
卡诺是教廷在混乱之城的负责人，一位年轻的教士，不过从小在教廷长大的他，已经是能够独当一面的教士。
Canault was the Holy See's person in charge in Chaos City. He was a young missionary, but was already able to take charge because he grew up in the Holy See.
卡诺有些抱歉的向麦格点了点头，也是转身快步跟上希利。
Canault nodded at Mag apologetically before quickly turning around to catch up with Seely.
卡诺来到混乱之城已经三年，这还是第一次见到从教廷派来的人员，更没有预料到的是来人竟然是主教大人！
Canault had already been in Chaos City for three years, and this was his first time meeting someone sent by the Holy See. Even less expectedly, the person who came was actually the lord bishop!
卡诺的目光在两人之间转着，暗自佩服麦老板作为一个普通人，竟然有着能够和大主教争锋相对的强大气场，又有些担心大主教是否会忍不住暴走。

Canault's gaze jumped between the two other men. He secretly admired Boss Mag for having the powerful presence to go against the archbishop as an ordinary man. At the same time, he was worried that the archbishop would lose his temper.
卡诺的确是偶尔来麦米餐厅吃饭，也就一天两顿。
Canault did indeed come to Mamy Restaurant for his meals occasionally. It was just two meals a day.
卡诺知道希利在担心什么，笑着道：“没问题的，这是麦米餐厅的传统和规矩，只要是进了麦米餐厅的客人都要遵守。”

Canault knew what Seely was worried about, and laughingly said, "There'll be no problem. This is the Mamy Restaurant's rule and tradition. All the customers have to obey it as long as they are in Mamy Restaurant."
卡诺跟着出门，又是小心翼翼的关上门。
Canault followed him out before closing the door gingerly.
卡诺闻言有些脸红的别过脸去，他也不知道希利今日来找麦格和小老板是为了这事。
Canault turned his face to the side with a blush after hearing that. He also had no idea that Seely came to look for Mag and Little Boss for this.
卢西恩不好酒，却也喝过许多美酒，可就算是在皇宫中喝过的上贡美酒，也从未有这般令他惊艳的感觉。
Lucien was not a heavy drinker, but he had tried many good alcohols. However, even those that were presented in the palace did not shock him as much as this wine.

埃菲从麦格的表情已经猜到了大半，不过还是忍不住问道：“哈迪斯先生，您觉得如何？”
Eiffie could already guess from Mag's expression but she still asked, "Mr. Hades, what do you think?"
埃菲伸出手指点了一下她的鼻子，没好气的笑道。
Eiffie tapped on her nose and said with exasperation.
埃菲到了嘴边突然噎住，看着麦格愣了一会，才勉强挤出一点笑容：“那还真是可惜了呢……”
Eiffie swallowed the words that she almost spouted out. She stared at Mag for a while before forcing a smile. "That really is a pity..."
埃菲努力将目光从地上那个脸上三道鲜红杠，两只手不成模样，还有两胯之间似乎有某样东西碎掉的暴徒身上收回。

Eiffie tried her best to look away from the assailant lying on the floor with three red streaks across his face, hands that were utterly disfigured, and something at his groin area that seemed to have been smashed.
埃菲双手捧过奖杯，神情认真的点头道：“谢谢您，我会努力的。”
Eiffie accepted the trophy with both her hands and gravely nodded. "Thank you. I will work hard."
埃菲叹气：“唉，可惜，来晚了。”
Eiffie sighed. "Sigh, what a pity he came too late."
埃菲合上机器，看着玛拉道：“没事别到处乱跑，去外边盯着施工队，咱们这次重新装修和扩张一定要做好，以后的泰坦酒馆和以前不一样了。”

Eiffie closed the machine and said to Mala, "Don't run around if you have nothing to do. Go watch after the construction team. We must make sure the refurbishment and expansion are done properly. The Titan Tavern in future will different from the one in the past."
埃菲和几位熟客打了个招呼，微笑着入座。
Eiffie greeted a few regular customers and took her seat with a smile.
埃菲和玛拉一脸惊讶的看着艾米的一顿操作，闻着空气中飘荡的肉香，看着小家伙嘬饮着肉汤，两人都忍不住咽了咽口水。
Eiffie and Mala looked at Amy in shock. The meaty fragrance of the dumpling wafted in the air. When they watched the little one drink teh soup, they could not help but swallow their saliva.
埃菲和玛拉帮忙收拾了餐桌，然后告辞离去。
Eiffie and Mala helped to clean up the dining table before taking their leave."
埃菲和玛拉微微张着嘴，看着桌上冒着热气和香味的菜肴，然后喉咙不自觉的滚动了两下。
Eiffie and Mala's jaws dropped. They could not help but swallow their saliva when they saw the piping hot and fragrant dishes.
埃菲和玛拉愣了一下，看向了门口的方向。
Eiffie and Mala were stunned for a moment and they looked at the door.
埃菲和玛拉的眼睛都瞪圆了几分，这个一人多高的铁桶，先前可是由四个大汉合力抬进来的，可麦格竟然一只手就轻松提了起来。
Eiffie and Mala's eyes widened. The metal barrel was taller than a man and it was brought in by four large men together. However, Mag managed to lift it up easily with just one hand.
埃菲和玛拉脸色微微发白，但还是用力的将地窖门向上推开。
Eiffie and Mala's faces were slightly pale but they still opened the cellar door outward with their might.
埃菲和玛拉除了在一旁端茶倒水，全程都是一脸迷妹的惊叹表情。
Other than pouring tea and water for Mag at the side, Eiffie and Mala were just in shock and admiration.
埃菲喃喃道：“有这等美酒在手，别说罗莫街，以后洛都酒馆界都必有这塞班酒馆的一席之地。”
Eiffie murmured, "With such excellent liquor, not to mention Romo Street, Saipan Tavern would even have a place in the entire taverns' world in Rodu."
埃菲回过神来，转身看着说话那人，只觉得面前的中年男人有些眼熟，愣了一会，突然眼睛一亮道：“您是帕萨卡先生。”

Eiffie regained her wits and turned to look at the person who spoke up. She felt the middle-aged man in front of her looked a little familar and then she lit up her eyes suddenly, "You are Mr. Pasaca."
埃菲在酿酒坊里忙碌着，按照麦格教授的方法，加上自己这些年的钻研，已经迫不及待的开始用新的设备酿造第一炉泰坦酒。
Eiffie was busying in the brewery, trying to make the first Titan Liquor using the new apparatus based on what Mag had taught her and what she had gained from her years of experience.
埃菲学着夹起了一只灌汤包，薄薄的包子皮里裹着满满的汤汁，夹起之后左右晃动，仿佛随时都会爆开一般，小心翼翼的放进自己的浅盘，这才松了口气。

Eiffie picked up the soup dumpling like them. The thin dumpling skin was filled with soup. When she picked it up, the dumpling swayed from side to side, as though it would explode any moment. Eiffie put the dumpling on her plate carefully and heaved a sigh of relief.
埃菲将手中的钱票递向麦格。
Eiffie passed the cheque to Mag.
埃菲带来的泰坦酒，将本场品酒大会推向了高潮。
Eiffie's Titan Liquor sent the liquor tasting event into a climax.
埃菲微微张嘴，有点受伤的看着麦格：“真的……有那么差吗？”
Eiffie opened her mouth and looked at Mag, defeated. "Is it... really that bad?"
埃菲微微张着嘴巴，看着地上的封条，又是看看那扇酒窖大门。
Eiffie stared at the seal on the floor with her mouth slightly agape before looking at the doors of the cellar.
埃菲微微张着嘴，有些不可思议的看着麦格，难道这个家伙在偷偷观察她吗？
Eiffie stared at Mag with disbelief and an open mouth. Did this fellow observe her secretly?
埃菲恍然，伸手轻轻抚摸着那台老旧的蒸馏设备，过了许久像是下定了决心，回头看着麦格恳切道：“哈迪斯先生，可否请求您帮我改进这套设备，我愿意支付您一笔合适的费用。”

Eiffie finally understood. She reached out to caress that old distillation equipment. After a long time and seemingly set her mind to it, she turned around and sincerely said to Mag, "Mr. Hades, can I ask you to modify this equipment for me? I am willing to pay you an appropriate fee."
埃菲想关心一下他们，但好像目前的状况有些超出了她的认知。
Eiffie wanted to ask if they were okay but it seemed the situation was not what she thought it to be.
埃菲想到了住在对面的哈迪斯先生，不过转念一想，又是放弃了这个想法。
Eiffie thought of Mr. Hades who lives across. However, she gave up on that thought after thinking about it.
埃菲想着想着，目光落到了从被子下露出了一角的那本书上，目光一定。
As she thought, Eiffie's gaze landed on the book under the corner of her blanket.
埃菲愣了好一会，突然一个激灵回过神来，一下收回了自己伸到一半的手，就差打了个立正，露出了一个尴尬而不失礼貌的笑容，“啊哈哈……我是对面酒馆的老板娘，特意来和哈迪斯先生你们一家打个招呼，刚刚和客人们喝了不少酒，有点醉了，差点摔了一跤，还好哈迪斯先生出手扶了我一把，你们好啊。”

Eiffie was stunned for quite a while. Suddenly, she shuddered, and came back to her senses. She retracted her arms which were reached out, and almost stood in salute. She smiled awkwardly, and said, "Ahahaha… I am the owner of the tavern across the street. I came over specially to greet everyone. I've had a drop too much with the customers just now, so I'm a little drunk, and I almost fell. Thank goodness Mr. Hades helped me. Hi, everyone."
埃菲愣住，看着麦格，抿着嘴，眼眶红红的，但却忍住了眼泪。
Eiffie was stunned. She looked at Mag, pressed her lips together, and her eyes reddened. However, she managed to hold her tears back.
埃菲扑了个空，一抬头，那双如丝媚眼刚好对上了酒馆里的五双眼睛。
Eiffie missed. She lifted her head up, and her flirtatious gaze happened to meet with the five pairs of eyes in the tavern.
埃菲找的铁匠手艺还不错，各种零件拼凑在一起，虽然没有达到严丝合缝的效果，却也没有出现太大的误差。

The blacksmith that Eiffie found had rather good skills. When the parts were pieced together, although they did not achieve the result of merging together tightly without a single gap, the difference was not too great.
埃菲把艾米送到酒馆门口，刚准备敲门，门就从里边打开了。
Eiffie sent Amy to the door of the tavern. Just as she was about to knock on the door, it opened from the inside.
埃菲抱着玛拉，神情凝重，脸色同样苍白。
Eiffie hugged Mala with a solemn expression. She was pale too.
埃菲拉着玛拉冲进了酿酒坊，一把拉开了地窖的窖门，把玛拉推了进去，然后直接也跳了下去，用尽全力将厚重的窖门向下拉下。
Eiffie pulled Mala into brewery and pulled open the cellar's door. She stuffed Mala in before jumping in herself. She used all her strength to pull the heavy cellar's door downwards.
埃菲拔开酒塞。
Eiffie pulled the cork.
埃菲捂着嘴，有点不好意思的笑了笑。
Eiffie covered her mouth and smiled embarrassedly.
埃菲接着说道，一边从布袋里翻找着。
As she said that, Eiffie started looking around in her canvas bag.
埃菲接着说道：“品酒大会是洛都酒馆行业一年一度的盛会，洛都城内，甚至是洛斯帝国其他城市的酒馆都会拿出自己最好的美酒，在品酒大会上一决高下。

Eiffie continued, "The Liquor tasting event is a big annual event for the liquor industry in Rodu. The taverns of Rodu, and even all over the Roth Empire, would take out their best wine at the liquor tasting event to compete.
埃菲接过玛拉手里的食盒递了过去，道：“这是那家早餐店特色的糊涂汤，一般不让外带，我和老板挺熟的，所以盛了三碗，等会你们吃了，再让玛拉把碗和食盒送回去。”

Eiffie took the lunchbox in Mala's hands and said, "This is the cucumber soup from the breakfast shop. They usually would not allow people to take the soup away but I am rather close with the owner so I took three bowls with me. When you're done with it, you can get Mala to bring the bowls and lunchbox back."
埃菲握着匕首，爬上了扶梯，掰开反锁的地窖门，用力向上推开。
Eiffie held a dagger and climbed up the stairs. She turned the lock on the cellar door and pushed it open with all her might.
埃菲是个聪明女人，麦格承认这一点。
Eiffie was a smart woman. Mag had to admit that.
埃菲有些不太自在的扭了扭自己被完全捆绑的身体，脸蛋微红，又莫名的有点兴奋？
Eiffie twisted her body which was completely bundled up awkwardly. She blushed a little and was a little excited for no reason?
埃菲朱唇轻启，忍不住发出了一声轻吟。
Eiffie opened her red lips slightly and could not help but let out a soft moan.
埃菲气得跺了跺脚，一阵冷风吹来，冷的一哆嗦，抱着手小跑着回了自家酒馆。
Eiffie stomped her feet angrily. A cold wind blew over. She shivered and ran back to her tavern, hugging herself.
埃菲沉默了一会，神情郑重的点了点头。
Eiffie was quiet for a moment before nodding with a solemn expression.
埃菲没想到麦格这么快就下来，连忙把勺子放下，抿嘴点了点头：“嗯。”
Eiffie did not expect Mag go come down so quickly. She placed her spoon down immediately and nodded as she licked her lips. "Mm."
埃菲没有理会她，双手捧着酒瓶走到桌前，看着麦格道：“哈迪斯先生，请品一品这瓶。”
Eiffie ignored her and brought the wine to the counter. She looked at Mag and said, "Mr. Hades, try this."
埃菲深呼吸平复了一下情绪，勉强挤出一点笑容，“您这小嘴，还真像是抹了蜜一样。”
Eiffie took in a deep breath and calmed herself down before she forced out a smile and said, "Your little mouth is as sweet as honey."
埃菲点头道：“我认识大会举办方的人，如果哈迪斯先生要报名参加的话，我可以帮你报名，只要今天把样酒送上去就可以了。”
Eiffie said with a nod, "I know the organizer fo the event. If you would like to take part, I can help you with the registration. All you need to do is to sen dthe wine over today."
埃菲点点头，她也有些意外自己昨晚竟然还能一沾床就睡着，一觉到天亮，已经许久没有睡得这样舒服饱满了。
Eiffie nodded. She was surprised that she could actually fall asleep the moment she laid on the bed and it was an undisturbed sleep until morning. She had never slept so well in a long time.
埃菲用腰间的玉牌在那屏障上方一晃，屏障立刻消失，一把木梯出现。
Eiffie waved the jade tablet that she hung on her waist above the screen. The screen disappeared immediately and a wooden ladder appeared in its place.
埃菲略一思忖道：“暂时放在酒窖里吧，等凑够了一百万铜币，就去换成巴菲特钱庄的银票。”
After pondering, Eiffie said, "Let's put the money in the cellar first. We'll exchange them into Buffett Bank's banknote after we amassed 1000,000 copper coins."
埃菲的嘴角抽搐了一下，要不是这些年开酒馆练就了好脾气，这会早暴走了。
The corner of Eiffie's mouth twitched. If it was not for her years of experience in the tavern that gave made her extra good-tempered, she would have stormed off.
埃菲的声音从地窖里传了出来。
Eiffie's voice could be heard from the cellar.
埃菲的心里一暖，这些年她自己撑着这家酒馆，赔笑卖酒，听了无数风言风语，却从未想过要依靠谁。

Eiffie felt a warmth in her heart. She had been supporting the tavern by herself. She flirted to sell the liquor and had heard a lot of gossip about her, but she had never thought of relying on anybody.
埃菲的手顿时僵住。
Eiffie's hand froze immediately.
埃菲的父亲那时正值壮年，或许还没有考虑传承的问题，自己了然于胸的操作自然不需要累赘记载。
Eiffie's father was at the prime of his life then, so he didn't consider the issue of passing on his legacy. The operation which he knew very well naturally didn't need to be recorded in detail.
埃菲的目光微微一凝，露出了一个礼貌而不失尴尬的微笑，牵着艾米的手向前走去。
Eiffie spaced out for a while, and smiled courteously as she walked ahead while holding Amy's hand.
埃菲的神情兴奋而又期待。
Eiffie was full of excitement and anticipation.
埃菲的神经紧绷到了极致，时隔多年再遭遇同样的事情就算了，没想到还把哈迪斯先生一家牵扯进来。
Eiffie was extremely tense. Forget that she met with the same situation after several years. She did not expect that this time, Mr. Hades would be implicated
埃菲的脸上终于露出了笑容，微微昂起下巴，骄傲道：“这是泰坦酒。”
Eiffie finally smiled. She lifted her chin slightly and said proudly, "This is Titan Liquor."
埃菲的表情一滞，然后有点欣喜？
Eiffie froze before revealing an ecstatical expression?
埃菲的表情顿时一僵。
Eiffie froze.
埃菲目光坚定道：“迟早有一天，我一定会让泰坦酒重现的！”
Eiffie said resolutely, "Sooner or later, I would make Titan Liquor reappear!"
埃菲看了一眼玛拉，也只好有些无奈的笑着点头道：“那就劳烦哈迪斯先生了。”
Eiffie flicked a glance at Mala. She could only helplessly nod and say, "We'll have to bother Mr. Hades then."
埃菲看了眼被触发的防御法阵，脸色稍缓，从扶梯上下来，蹲坐在地上，搂住了玛拉，拍了拍她的肩膀道：“别怕，地窖里是安全的，他进不来。”

Eiffie looked at the defense spell formation that was triggered with a slight relief. She came down from the ladder and sat on the floor. She hugged Mala and patted her shoulders. "Don't be afraid. The cellar is safe. He can't enter.
埃菲看着一下子走完的熟客，心里顿时空落落的，有种怅然若失的感觉。
Eiffie watched the regular customers go away and felt a sense of loss instantly.
埃菲看着一脸温柔笑容的麦格，惊惶的心似乎得到了抚慰，那种安全感是她许多年都没有感受过的。
Eiffie saw the warm smell on Mag's face and felt her startled heart getting soothed. She had not felt such sense of security in years.
埃菲看着众人，抿着嘴，有些不忍。
Eiffie looked at all of them and pursed her lips. She almost couldn't bear it.
埃菲看着正义凛然的伊琳娜，心里有些感动，又有些惭愧。
Eiffie looked at the righteous Irina and felt touched and ashamed at the same time.
埃菲看着泰坦酒馆的八名服务员，神情颇为严肃道：“今天是泰坦酒馆重装开业第一天，也是我们升级为高级酒馆的第一天，打起十二分的精神，一定不能出任何差错。”

Eiffie looked at the eight service staff from Titan Tavern and said solemnly, "Today is the first day of Titan Tavern's opening. It is also the first day we've upgraded into a high-class tavern. All of you, buck up. No mistakes are allowed."
埃菲看着焕然一新的酒馆，脸上同样露出了欣慰笑容。
Eiffie looked at the brand new tavern and smiled gladly.
埃菲看着脸上变成九宫格的巨汉，又看了眼艾米，有点混乱。
Eiffie looked at the man's face who had become a tic-tac-toe board, and then at Amy, and was utterly confused.
埃菲看着脸上洋溢着自信微笑的麦格，表情微凝。
Eiffie stared at Mag, who had a confident smile on his face, with a frozen expression.
埃菲看着麦格犹豫了一会，还是点了点头道：“请稍等。”
Eiffie stared at Mag and hesitated for a moment before she nodded and said, "Please give me a minute."
埃菲看着麦格的目光则多了几分崇拜与感激。
Eiffie looked at Mag with even more admiration and gratitude in her eyes.
埃菲看着麦格的背影，心里不禁想着：“哈迪斯先生可真是一个好男人，一个人带孩子，还能做这样美味的早餐，羡慕他的太太……”

Eiffie looked at Mag's backview and could not help but think to herself: Mr. Hades is such a nice man. He could make such a delicious breakfast even when he had to take care of his children alone. I really envy his wife...
埃菲看着麦格，心里突然升起了一种冲动：“真的非常感谢您，我甚至不知道该如何回报您，只能以身……”
Eiffie looked at Mag and an impulse suddenly arose in her heart. "Thank you very much. I don't even know how to repay you. I can only mar..."
埃菲看着麦格，郑重点头道：“我会的。”
Eiffie looked at Mag and solemnly nodded, "I will."
埃菲眼睛一亮，豁然开朗，起身感激道：“谢谢您，哈迪斯先生。”
Eiffie's eyes lit up. She suddenly felt relieved and said gratefully, "Thank you, Mr. Hades."
埃菲睁开眼睛，脸蛋微红，瞄了一眼麦格，竟是有种莫名的情愫。
Eiffie opened her eyes, her face slightly blushed. She glanced at Mag ad actually felt an inexplicable affection.
埃菲矜持的笑着，相比于哈迪斯先生他们一家的救命之恩，这一点小小的礼物又算什么呢。
Eiffie smiled reservedly. These little gifts were nothing compared to what Mr. Hades and his family did to save their lives.
埃菲秀气的眉毛微微上挑，竟是忍不住想生气？
Eiffie raised her beautiful brows and actually felt like blowing her top?
埃菲突然知道自己要做什么了。
Eiffie suddenly knew what she had to do.
埃菲站在门外，手里提着一个小篮子，裹紧了自己的小棉马甲，天气还是那么冷，这个该死的冬天显得格外漫长。
Eiffie was standing at the door with a small basket. She pulled her cotton vest tighter. The weather was still so cold. This damn winter seemed especially long.
埃菲紧紧抱着玛拉，让她浑身冰冷的恐惧再次来临。
Eiffie hugged Mala. The fear that made her cold came all over her again.
埃菲终于忍不住泪崩，咬着嘴唇，努力控制着自己的表情。
Eiffie could not hold her tears back anymore. She bit her lips and tried her best to control her expression.
埃菲翻了个白眼道：“别人敢一瓶酒卖两千铜币，那是因为人家的酒的确好，我们拿头跟啊？”
Eiffie rolled her eyes, and said, "He dares to take 2000 copper coins for a bottle of liquor because his liquor is indeed good. How are we going to follow suit?"
埃菲脱口道，不过很快脸蛋微红，有点不好意思道：“又来蹭饭，实在有点不好意思呢。”
Eiffie quickly blushed and said embarrassedly, "I'm here to have a free meal again. I feel very bad."
埃菲觉得心脏又中了一箭。
Eiffie felt as though she was shot in her heart once more.
埃菲认真思索了一会，迟疑道：“可是我会酿的酒很有限，目前根本酿不出能够与泰坦酒相提并论的酒，连接近的也没有。”

Eiffie thought for a while and said hesitantly, "But I only have a limited repertoire of wines I know how to brew. There is currently no wine that can be compared to Titan Liquor at all. It's nowhere near."
埃菲认真思考了一秒，便点头：“好，我同意。”
Eiffie thought about it seriously for a second and said, "Okay, I agree."
埃菲走出门来，看着围在酒馆门口的十几位熟客，先向着他们鞠了一躬，然后直起身来道：“抱歉各位，感谢你们一直以来的支持与厚爱，但泰坦酒馆要升级了。为了秉承我父亲的意志，让泰坦酒馆成为洛都最好的酒馆，我必须让它回归到原先的位置，然后努力让它继续前行。”

Eiffie came out and looked at the 10-odd regulars at the door. She bowed to them first, before straightening and said, "I'm sorry, gentlemen. Thank you for your support in all these years, but Titan Tavern has to upgrade itself. In order to carry on my father's will and make Titan Tavern the best tavern in Rodu, I have to set it back to its original position before moving it forward with all my might."
埃菲走到酒柜后，踩着椅子，从最上层的柜子中央取了一瓶用精致酒瓶装着的酒下来。
Eiffie walked to the wine cabinet, stepped on a chair, and took out an exquisite bottle from the top most cabinet.
埃菲走进门来，从玛拉手里接过一匹水蓝色的绸缎，笑着上前，看着伊琳娜道：“姐姐，这是上好的琉璃绸缎，您的身段那么好，做成裙子一定很好看。”

Eiffie walked in and took a bolt of blue satin from Mala. She stepped forward with a smile and said to Irina, "Big Sister, this is top-grade glazed satin. You have a great figure and would definitely look good in a dress made from this."
埃菲还是败给了自己的肚子，接过了麦格递来的粥。
Eiffie still lost to her stomach and received the bowl of porridge Mag passed to her.
埃菲这话让众人都惊了。
Eiffie's words shocked everyone.
埃菲连忙伸出舌头舔了一下嘴角，脸一红。
Eiffie quickly licked the corner of her mouth and blushed.
埃菲重新拿了一个小酒杯，然后端起酒瓶倒了一小杯。
Eiffie took a new glass and poured the wine out.
埃菲闻言一愣，旋即笑着道：“哈迪斯先生酿造的茅台酒不比泰坦酒差，以他的才智，要是真的贪图我们的泰坦酒，又何必帮我们设计和建造这个酿酒坊。”

Eiffie was stunned when she heard that. After that, she said with a smile, "Mr. Hades's maotai isn't any worse than the Titan Liquor. With his intelligence and talents, if he really was after the Titan Liquor, why would he help us with designing and building this brewery?"
埃菲露出了几分慌乱之色，下意识的抬头看向了站在一旁的麦格。
Eiffie had a panicked look and she instinctively looked up at Mag standing at the side.
埃菲顿时笑靥如花，伸手向艾米，笑着道：“小艾真乖，姐姐带你去吃好吃的。”
Eiffie's smile blossomed like a flower. She reached out to Amy and said with a smile, "Ay, you're so cute. Let me bring you to somewhere with goodies."
埃菲颇为赞赏的看着玛拉，为了给她创造更多的机会，玛拉还真是用心良苦。
Eiffie looked at Mala with admiration. Mala had put in a lot of effort to create more chances for her.
"…" Eiffie.
城北纺织厂前的大广场。
The large square before the textile factory at the north of the city.
城墙之上的奥格部落兵士，几乎没来得及抵抗便被缴了械，整个部落很快便被占领。
The Aug Tribe's soldiers on the city walls surrendered before they could even defend themselves. The entire tribe was soon conquered.
城西书坊是好书之人的天堂，大大小小的书坊，只要你足够用心，总能寻到你想要的书。
The city's western book square was a paradise for people who loved books. As long as one looked hard enough, one could find the books they wanted.
城西书坊，其实就是一片由许多书店聚集而成的坊市，可以说洛都城内大半的书店都集中在这里，各家杂志社也基本将总部设立在此地。

The west city books square was, in fact, just a square that was formed by many bookshops. Almost half of the bookshops in Rodu were situated here, and almost all the magazine press set up their headquarters here.
城西是洛都城的贫民窟，土楼巷这一片更是偏僻，破落的街道两侧全是断壁残垣，路上都长满了野草，人迹罕至。

The western side of Rodu was slums and the side of the Tulou alley was even more desserted. The sides of the streets were run-down, filled with houses falling apart. Weeds were growing by the side of the road and it was almost impossible to see a human.
塔克坊市是洛都规模最大的坊市，聚集了大大小小各类商家，各种美食小吃也是极具名气。
Tuck Square was Rodu's biggest square. All kinds of big and small merchants gathered here, and all the snacks here were famous too.
塞班——
Saipan…
Saipan—
塞班酒馆和之前的龙虾馆不同，麦格买了半条街，是想让它能够一直经营下去，持续获得收益的。
Saipan Tavern was different from the crayfish restaurant previously. Mag had bought up half of the street and he wanted it to continue operating, so he could gain interest from it.
塞班酒馆已经步入正轨，人气逐步上升，目前的酒馆场地有些小了，他考虑是否要把隔壁的店铺打通，增加一些座位。

Saipan Tavern was finally on tracks. Its popularity was rising slowly and the current space of the tavern was a little too small. Mag was considering knocking off the wall to the shop next door so that he could add more seats.
塞班酒馆开业在即，麦格自然不可能等过几年酒酿好了再来吧？所以直接从系统那里购买了一批县城的茅台酒和威士忌。

Now that Saipan Tavern was open, Mag would definitely not turn up only when the wine brewing was done a few years later. Therefore, he purchased a batch of ready-made Maotai and whiskey from the system.
塞班酒馆拿回了一个金奖，这些邻居们是真正的利益相关者，这种热情也是情有可原。
Saipan Tavern brought back a gold award and these neighbors were going to benefit from it directly. It was normal that they were so friendly.
塞班酒馆这边一片和谐。
It was very harmonios at Saipan Tavern.
墙上的影子摇曳，隐约能够看到一条条触须钻入乔修的脑袋然后彻底消失。
The shadow on the wall was swaying, and the tentacles could be seen burrowing into Josh's head before disappearing completely.
外来文明的入侵是极其严重的事件，当年克苏鲁等外神和仆从种族降临，几乎给古老者带来灭顶之灾。

The invasion of an alien civilization was an extremely serious matter. The descent of the Cthulhu gods and its servant species had brought a catastrophe that almost annihilated the Elder Things back then.
外观类似人类女性，身上穿着未知金属制作的战衣。
She looks like a human female. She is wearing a battle suit made of an unknown metal.
外面已经响起了破门声和嘈杂的脚步声。
Door breaking sounds and footsteps could be heard out there.
多一事不如少一事，上边有人罩着的感觉，可爽了。
It was better to have less trouble, and it felt great to have someone powerful backing you up.
多年来一直掌管着精灵族的粮食供应的布鲁斯特家族，领地距离生命之城颇远，有着数量众多的奴隶和仆从。
The Brewster Family, had been helming the food supply for the Elves for many years. Their land was far away from the City of Life and they had numerous slaves and servants.
多米尼克在安德烈的左手边坐下。
Andre sat to the left of Andre.
多米尼克当先向着大殿中走去。
Dominic walked into the hall first.
多米尼克更是从椅子上霍然起身。
Dominic even sprang right up from his chair.
多米尼克沉默，从极北高原一路向南，进入洛斯帝国之后愈发平坦。
Dominic fell silent. The road down south from the northern highlands to the Roth Empire would get increasingly flat.
多米尼克神情认真道：“亡灵与生灵不同，他们没有恐惧，只有被彻底杀死，没有投降和失败的概念。
Dominic gravely said, "The dead is different from the living. They have no fear. They have to be completely killed. They have no idea of surrender or failure.
多米尼克脸色凝重，作为帝国元帅，他非常清楚这样一只亡灵部队意味着什么。
Dominic's expression turned grave. As the Marshal of the empire, he knew very clearly what such ghost soldiers meant.
多米尼克领着数位十级强者从城楼上下来，迎上麦格和伊琳娜。
Dominic led multiple 10th-tier powerhouses down to welcome Mag and Irina.
多精致可爱的小姑娘啊，一身蓬松的白色衣服，愈发衬的她的脸蛋小巧可爱，精致的五官，哪怕是瓷娃娃都无法比拟。
What an adorable little girl. Her puffy white clothes made her face look even smaller and cuter. Even a porcelain doll couldn't match up to her exquisite features.
夜宵是美好的，如果不怕胖的话。
Supper was great, if one was not afraid of getting fat.
夜幕降临，罗莫街一如既往的落寞。
The night fell, and Romo Street was as forlorn as ever.
夜色中，一行人眨眼便消失在罗莫街。
In the darkness, the group disappeared from Romo street in a flash.
大半瓶茅台下肚，梅兰特直接醉倒在桌上。
After drinking half a bottle of Maotai, Merante was knocked out and lying on the table.
大厅里有不少人，看模样都颇为彪悍，特征明显，脸上的面具也就是个摆设。
There were quite a lot of people in the hall who appeared rather ferocious. They had obvious physical characteristics so the masks on their faces were just for show.
大多数人都不看好艾米，毕竟小家伙拿着竹圈看着都觉得费劲，更别说丢出去套中鹅了。
Most of them didn't think Amy could do it. After all, the little one even seemed to have trouble lifting up the bamboo rings, let alone tossing it out to catch the goose.
大大小小的商铺里依旧人头涌动，街头小贩也是热情满满的吆喝着，一片安居乐业的景象。
There were still crowds in all the big and small shops, and the hawkers on the streets were still yelling and promoting their wares enthusiastically. It was a scene of peace and prosperity.
大家都好奇这个名不见经传的酒馆，究竟开在哪里，有这样的美酒，之前又为何籍籍无名？
Everyone was curious about this unknown tavern. Where was it located and why was such an excellent liquor unknown before today?
大家都收到了礼物，就在麦格想着埃菲会给她送什么的时候，她从怀里摸出了一张钱票。
After receiving the gifts, just when Mag was still wondering what else Eiffie would be giving, she pulled out a cheque from her pocket.
大家都知道酒馆老板有对可爱的女儿，所以送的大都是些小吃食和小玩具。
Everyone knew that the tavern's boss had a pair of adorable daughters, so they gave them little snacks and little toys.
大概是品尝她自己做的菜的时候。
Perhaps was when she tasted her own cooking.
大殿里一片寂静，各部落的首领表情各异，一时间无人出声。
The great hall was silent. All the tribal leaders had different expressions and no one made a sound.
大皇子府邸。
The first prince's residence.
大礼包点开之后，系统的提示音响起。
The system's notification sounded after the gift package was opened.
大约三分钟后，虚空一阵晃动，一艘五角星状的飞船出现，悬停在竹林之上。
Three minutes later, the empty space vibrate and a five-pointed-star-shaped spaceship appeared and hovered above the bamboo forest.
大约十五分钟后，里面再次响起了那沙哑的声音，“久等了，经过我们的核实，泰坦酒馆的老板的确被人抓走了，看来她在你手里。
About 15 minutes later, the hoarse voice sounded again. "Apologies for the wait. After checking, we've ascertained that the owner of Titan Tavern was indeed captured. It seems she's in your hands.
大约十几分钟后，不知和那群鬼魂讲了些什么的梅兰特念了一段晦涩难懂的咒语，那些萦绕不去的怨气渐渐散去，周遭也是恢复了清明。

10-odd minutes later, Merante chanted an unintelligible and obscure spell after talking to those spirits, and those lingering whiffs of resentment slowly dissipated. The surroundings were clear again.
大约半个小时后，歌洛璃娅突然站起身来，转身看着麦米餐厅在阳光下熠熠生辉的招牌，脸上露出了灿烂的笑容。
About 30 minutes later, Gloria suddenly stood up, and turned around to look at the Mamy Restaurant's gleaming signboard under the sunlight with a bright smile on her face.
大鹅……危矣！
The geese… were in danger!
天下之大，已经没了乔修的容身之处。
There was already no place for Josh to hide in this vast world.
天空中那只俯冲而来的紫纹狮鹫。
A purple-striped griffin in the sky, diving down.
天色还未黑，两家酒馆门前已经开始有客人徘徊。
Before nightfall, there were already customers pacing around the tavern doors.
天都剑化作一道流光，飞向那如长枪般刺向伊琳娜的触手。
The Tian Du sword became turned a flash of light and flew towards the tentacle that stabbed at Irina.
太晚了。
It was too late.
夫人微微一愣，看着波比的目光微红，脸上也是多了几分笑容，点着头出门去了。
Bobby's wife was slightly stunned. She looked at Bobby, and her eyes went red. She smiled and nodded as she walked out.
夫妻之间，信任是比金石更加坚固的东西。
Nothing was more solid between a husband and wife than trust.
夹起一片被红油包裹的猪舌头，从筷子传递回来的手感是如瘦肉一般的感觉，切成薄片之后，看起来倒是意外的一点都不觉得恶心，就像是牛肉切片一般，裹上红油，点缀着点点熟芝麻，反而颇有些诱人的感觉。

He picked up a piece of pig's tongue that was covered in red oil. The feeling he got from picking it up felt like lean meat. After the tongue was sliced into thin pieces, it surprisingly did not look disgusting. It was just like a piece of beef with a layer of red oil on top, garnished with some sesame seeds. It actually looked rather enticing.
奈何他没文化。
Unfortunately, he wasn't cultured.
套鹅的摊位前围着不少看客，在那小围栏里有着二三十只大肥鹅，零散蹲着，伸着脖子有些挑衅的向着众人叫唤着。

The ring-a-goose game stall was surrounded by many people watching. 20 to 30 geese were kept within a small fence. They squatted around scatteredly, and called out to the people watching with their necks stretched out.
套鹅这边热闹的动静，也是吸引了许多路人围观。
The commotion at the geese game stall attracted even more onlookers.
奥尔登怒极反笑，看着麦格道：“你这个刁民！我们乃堂堂法部大臣，让她倒酒是她的福气，就不怕我关了你这小酒馆，把你们两个都丢到牢里去。”

Aulden laughed. He looked at Mag, and said, "You darn peasant! I am an official in the Ministry of Law. Getting her to pour my wine is her honor. Aren't you afraid that I will close down your little tavern and throw the two of you into prison?"
奥尔登拍桌而起，怒道：“混账！你可知本官是谁？”
Aulden slammed the table, and stood up as he howled, "Impudent! Do you know who I am?"
奥尔登整个人都傻掉了。
Aulden was stupefied.
奥尔登是法部的三把手，今天这个局就是他组的，来的也大都是他的心腹，憋了几天的火，就是来喝酒放松放松。

Aulden was one of the higher-ups in the Ministry of Law. He was the one who organized this drinking session, and most of those who came along were his confidants. After days of suppression, he invited everyone over for a drink and to relax.
奥尔登的声音不小，引得酒馆里不少人回头。
Aulden's voice was not soft, and his command made many heads turn.
奥尔登被从地上扶了起来，有人拿出丝巾把他脸上挂着的猪耳朵和红油擦掉，脸上还有个清晰的盘子印，东一块青，西一块紫的，看起来颇为凄惨。

Aulden was helped up from the ground. Some of his companions took out a handkerchief to help him wipe away the pig's ear and red oil on his face. There was still a very clear plate mark with a bruise here and there. It was a very sorry sight.
奥尔登被揍了一顿，全程不敢还手，不管闪躲，就连惨叫都只能压低了声量，闷哼几声。
Aulden was walloped, but he did not dare to retaliate or dodge. Even his moans had to be stifled.
奥尔登走了，约瑟夫等人有些拘束的喝着酒，虽然美酒在手，却也喝的没什么滋味。
After Aulden left, Joseph and the others drank cautiously. Although they had great wine with them, they were in no mood at all.
奥尔登这也算是因为一张嘴惹了祸端，至少亚伯罕不至于把他当场打死在这里。
Aulden got into trouble because of his words. At least Abraham would not beat him to death there and then.
奥斯特三番两次想要伏杀她，都以失败告终。
Auster had been trying to kill her a few times, but to no avail.
奥斯特只觉得心口骤然刺痛，浑身力气仿佛在一瞬间被抽光，再也握不住大刀，从床上翻倒在地。
Auster only felt a sudden pain in his heart and all his strength seemed to be drained at that moment. He could no longer hold onto his saber. He rolled to the floor from his bed.
奥斯特嘴角上扬，接着道：“我们兽人族绝不低头，可现在法克部落那个小娘们，却想带领那些软脚虾投降答应那些屈辱的条约，你们同意吗？”

Auster's lips curled up and he continued on, "We orcs will never submit to others, but that little girl in the Falk Tribe wants to lead those weaklings and sign those demeaning terms. Will you agree to it?"
奥斯特害怕亚历克斯，所以去参加和平大会的时候带走了所有十级强者，甚至还有一部分九级强者作为护卫。
Auster was afraid of Alex. That was why he'd brought all the 10th-tier powerhouses and even some of the 9th-tier powerhouses with him to the peace meeting as his guards.
奥斯特已死，并且是死在了康妮的手中，意味着暮光森林的至高权利正式更迭。
Auster was already dead, and he was killed by Connie. This meant that the highest authority in the Twilight Forest had already transferred.
奥斯特暴戾无度，贪生怕死，我秉承神的旨意，把他祭天了！
Auster is violent tyrant who is a coward. I have followed the gods' orders and sacrificed him to them!
奥斯特瞪眼，眼看着那把匕首贯穿了他的眉心，然后仰头向后倒去。
Auster glared as he watched that dagger enter his glabella and then fell backwards.
奥斯特站起身来，看着殿中的各酋长道：“最近的事情，你们应该也听说了，魔鬼和亡灵军团现在就在洛斯帝国的北边，如果南下的话，洛斯帝国必然遭受攻击，这可是我们复仇的好机会！

Auster stood up and said to all the tribal leaders in the hall, "You all should have heard about the recent incident. The devil and the Army of the Dead have appeared at the north of the Roth Empire. The Roth Empire is definitely going to be attacked if they move southwards. This is a great opportunity for us to seek revenge!"
奥斯特缓缓坐起身来，重新握住了床边的大刀，怒目瞪着康妮。
Auster sat slowly and grabbed the saber next to the bed as he stared at Connie angrily.
奥斯特自知理亏，看着渐渐不受控制的众酋长，黑着脸沉默着。
Auster knew he had a part to play in this, and his face darkened as he watched the chiefs slowly go out of control.
奥格部落内部短暂内讧之后，新的酋长被推举出来，憋屈的在联盟条约上代表奥格部落签字。
After a brief internal conflict in the Aug Tribe, a new leader was elected, and he signed on the alliance contract on behalf of the Aug Tribe with indignation.
奥格部落的长老们和各部落酋长完全慌了阵脚，龟缩在府邸中不敢出头，直到现在才有些回过神来。
The Aug Tribe's elders and the chiefs were in a complete panic. They hid in their residences and didn't dare to appear. They only managed to regain a little of their wits now.
奥格部落，黑色的城堡之中。
The Aug Tribe. Within the black castle.
女人只是冷漠的注视着他，那张精致的脸犹如万年不化的冰块，就连目光也冷漠的可怕，仿佛没有感情一般。
The woman only stared at him coldly. That exquisite face seemed to be made from ice, even the gaze was horribly cold, as if there weren't any emotions in them.
女人抬头认真的看着墙上的酒水单，过了一会才道：“一瓶茅台酒，一瓶威士忌，一份凉拌猪耳朵、一份凉拌猪舌头、一份酒鬼花生。”

The woman looked up at the drink list on the wall seriously. After a while, she said, "A bottle of Maotai, a bottle of whiskey, a helping of pig ears salad, a helping of pig tongue salad and a helping of drunkard peanuts."
女人，太难。
It was so hard to be a woman.
奴隶不过是一些生命漫长的两脚家畜，但凡是有些姿色，或者拥有魔法天赋的，都不会被留在这里。
The slaves were just two-legged cattle with longer lifespan. Those who looked good, or possessed magical talents wouldn't have been kept here.
奴隶成了一个渐渐消失的词，至少在生命之城中是这样的。
"Slave" is a term that was slowly disappearing, at least in the City of Life.
奴隶是没有资格住在城堡里的，他们像牛羊一样被圈养在城堡外的一处低矮平房中，所以也被成为奴隶圈。
The slaves didn't have right to live in the castle. They were kept in the short houses beyond the castle like cattles, so it was called the slaves' circle.
奴隶精灵们的脸上有着快意，这是他们百年来被欺压时，心中时常所想之事。

巨蛇轰然落地，砸翻了一大片竹子，在地上砸出了一个深坑。

Bobby looked at Mag. He had a rather good impression of this owner, but if there was something wrong with this alcohol, the other party had better explain himself.
波比缓过神来，看了一眼外边已经泛白的纸窗，目光落到了那关切的看着他的中年女人身上，摇摇头，又是有些不解道：“我怎么在家里？发生什么了？”

Bobby came back to his senses. He looked out at the light coming in from the window, and then at the middle-aged woman, who was looking at him with concern. He shook his head, and asked, "Why am I at home? What happened?"
泰坦酒以50分的满分评分回归，一如马库斯传奇的一生。
Titan Liquor had returned with full marks, just like Marcus's legendary life.
泰坦酒历久弥香，越是陈酿，越是迷人。
The Titan Liquor aged with time. The older it was, the more mesmerizing it got.
泰坦酒已经是她酿的最好的酒了，可在麦格的眼中一文不值。
Titan Liquor was already the best wine she had brewed but it was worthless in Mag's eyes.
泰坦酒已经获得了五十分的满分，茅台酒再强，也是有个上限的。
Titan Liquor had already received the 50 points full marks. There was still an upper limit no matter how strong Maotai was.
泰坦酒是三十多年前第一届品酒大会的金奖酒，由酿酒师马库斯创造，凭借着独特的芳香与不可思议的烈性，在洛都的美酒界留下了传奇的身影。

Titan Liquor was the gold award liquor at the very first liquor tasting event 30-odd years ago. It was created by Brewer Marcus. With its unique fragrance and incredible power, it left a legendary shadow in the Rodu's' liquor scene.
泰坦酒的强势回归，已经注定让泰坦酒馆重归巅峰。
The strong return of Titan Liquor had already made sure that Titan Tavern would return to its former glory.
泰坦酒还算是盛名在外，并且曾经创造过三夺金奖的奇迹。
Titan Liquor was still considered famous and had once created the miracle of getting three gold awards.
泰坦酒馆也刚刚关门歇业，对着的那扇窗户关着，但里边亮着灯，偶偶还能看到人影走过，应该是老板娘的闺房。

Titan Tavern had just closed for the day. The windows were tightly shut but the lights were still brightly lit. There was also the shadow of a person passing by occasionally. That probably was the lady boss's room.
泰坦酒馆和塞班酒馆捧回双金奖的第一天，直接放了所有人鸽子，已经成了洛都的酒客们调侃了一天的事情。
On the first day after Titan Tavern and Saipan Tavern both won the gold award, they stood everyone up and this had become an incident that all wine-lovers would diss about.
泰坦酒馆宣布将开启三十年前创始人封存的酒窖，开始供应窖藏三十年的正宗泰坦酒。
Titan Tavern had announced that it would open the cellar sealed by its founder 30 years ago and would start to supply the authentic Titan Liquor stored in the cellar for 30 years.
泰坦酒馆歇业，罗莫街上这会已经没了灯光，一片安静。
Titan Tavern was closed and Romo Street was completely dark and quiet right now.
泰坦酒馆的人气正在快速上升阶段，有了亚伯罕和温妮莎这两块金字招牌，不光可以让酒馆省去许多麻烦，还能源源不断的带来人气。

Saipan Tavern was at the phrase whereby it was getting popular rapidly. With Abraham and Vanessa as the live advertisements, not only would it prevent many trouble for the tavern, it would also bring in many customers.
泰坦酒馆的情况却不太妙。
However, Titan Tavern wasn't doing very well.
泰坦酒馆的面积是塞班酒馆的两倍，而在营业区背后还有着一个面积不小的酿酒坊。
Titan Tavern was twice the size of Saipan Tavern and there was a rather large brewery behind the operating area.
泰坦酒馆虽然依旧开业，但由他的女儿埃菲酿造的泰坦酒，和正宗的泰坦酒相差甚远，逐渐沦为三流酒馆。
Even though Titan Tavern was still in operation, the Titan Liquor that his daughter Eiffie made was far inferior to the original Titan Liquor, so Titan Tavern slowly became a third-rate tavern.
泰坦酒馆重新辉煌，而新开业的塞班酒馆也很快就会成为洛都城里最热闹的酒馆之一。
Titan Tavern would return to its former glory while the newly opened Saipan Tavern would become one of the most popular taverns in Rodu very soon.
洗地的活，当然要交给警察来做了，他只是一个没得人权的诱饵而已。
Of course, the job of cleaning up the crime scene should be left to the police. He was just a bait without any human rights.
洛斯帝国与兽人族和精灵族之战已经过去几日，原本紧张的局势因为乔修事件变得更为扑朔迷离。
The Roth Empire's war with the orcs and the elves was already over for the past few days. The initially tense situation became mysterious due to Josh's incident.
洛斯帝国以北，有着一片无际的永冻雪原。
There was an endless snowplain at the north of the Roth Empire.
洛斯帝国低头，恶魔妥协，兽人族已经不成气候，骑在墙头上的巨魔族立刻表明立场，加入和平联盟。
The Roth Empire had lowered their stance, the Demons had given in, the Orcs were no longer haughty, and the Trolls that could not decide had all made their stand to join the Peace Alliance.
洛斯帝国偷袭我们的部落，杀死我们的族人和兄弟，仇恨不共戴天。而混乱之城却假意惺惺的让我们签订和平条约，而且还要派兵帮助混乱之城抵御魔鬼，凭什么啊？！”

"The Roth Empire launched a secret attack on us and killed our people and brothers. We can never forgive and forget about that. Chaos City tries to make us sign the peace treaty and even wants us to send troops to help defend it against the devil. Why should we?!"
洛斯帝国入侵事件之后，以奥格部落为首的战争部落联盟实力大损。
After the Roth Empire's invasion, the power of the pro-war faction with the Aug Tribe in the lead was greatly diminished.
洛斯帝国入侵事件，对于风之森林的冲击极大。
The Roth Empire's invasion had impacted the Wind Forest greatly.
洛斯帝国对兽人族和精灵族悍然发动战争，让诺兰大陆的局势陷入了紧张之中。
The Roth Empire starting a war on the orcs and the elves had caused the Norland Continent to descend into a tense atmosphere.
洛斯帝国建立之后，王室为了真正掌控权利，有意削弱教廷的影响力，导致教廷日渐式微。
After the Roth Empire was established, the royal family intentionally diminished the Holy See's influence to truly grasp power, and that caused the Holy See to deteriorate as time went by.
洛斯帝国愿意加入和平联盟，并签订新的和平协议。
The Roth Empire was willing to join the Peace Alliance and sign the new peace accord.
洛斯帝国根本没得选。
The Roth Empire had no choice at all.
洛斯帝国的官员收入其实不算特比高，像这位正在爆发中年危机的大叔，一个月大约一万铜币的收入，是否会花两千铜币来一瓶茅台酒并非绝对的事情。

Actually, the officials of the Roth Empire did not have very high salaries. This middle-aged man facing a midlife crisis would only have around 10,000 copper coins a month as his salary. Therefore, he might not spend 2,000 copper coins on a bottle of Maotai.
洛斯帝国的皇子有三位，但公主只有一位。
There were three princes in the Roth Empire, but only one princess.
洛斯帝国身份最为尊贵的几人之一，也是国王陛下最信任和宠爱的兄弟。
One of the most distinguished persons in the Roth Empire, and also the beloved and most trusted brother of the king.
洛都
Rodu.
洛都发生的事情，如飓风一般很快便传遍了诺兰大陆。
What happened in Rodu swept through the whole Norland Continent like a hurricane.
洛都城内几座监狱人满为患，为了抓住兵部大臣灭门惨案的凶手，几乎把洛都城内的罪犯掘地三尺搜了一遍，倒是一下子了结了诸多陈年旧案。

A few of the prisons in Rodu were filled as almost all the crimes in Rodu had been dug out to catch the arsonists or the murders of the generals' families. In the end, almost all the criminals of other age-long crimes had been dug out.
洛都城外，一处幽黑的山洞中，一道暴怒的声音在空旷的山洞中回响。
Beyond Rodu, a furious voice echoed throughout a dark, spacious cave.
洛都城最有钱的酒馆老板数十年积蓄，被一扫而空。
The savings of Rodu's wealthiest tavern owner was wiped clean.
洛都城里不乏价格昂贵的酒，但要论品质，无一能够与茅台酒相提并论的。
There were plenty of expensive alcoholic beverages in Rodu, but none could hold a candle to Maotai when it came to quality.
洛都是一座雄城，也是诺兰大陆上最大的一座城市。
Rodu was a magnificent city and the largest on the Norland Continent.
洛都的治安，并没有表面看起来那么好。
Rodu's public safety wasn't as good as it looked.
洛都皇宫是诺兰大陆上最安全的地方，哪怕亚历克斯的实力再强，也不可能强突皇宫。
Rodu palace was the safest place in Norland Continent. No matter how strong Alex was, he would never be able to barge into the palace.
洛都这座城市，在亚历克斯的记忆中并不是什么陌生的城市。
Rodu was not an unfamiliar city in Alex's memory.
测谎仪显示他没有说谎，说明他的确对那‘核’动力机械一无所知，一个普通人类是无法骗过测谎仪的。
The lie detector showed that he wasn't lying. This meant that he indeed had no idea about that "nuclear"-powered machinery. An ordinary person couldn't fool the lie detector.
浓浓的酒香味从那个白色瓷瓶中徐徐飘来，竟是让从来不饮酒的她也觉得颇为美妙。
The rich liquor's aroma that drifted out from that white porcelain bottle actually made her, who had never drank before, think that it was exquisite.
浓浓的酒香渗入汤汁之中，让这汤更添了几分醉人的滋味。
The rich liquor's aroma seeped into the soup and gave this soup an even more intoxicating.taste.
浓浓的酒香顿时四溢开来，醇厚的香味，和啤酒的清香完全是两种风格。
The strong fragrance of wine diffused nearby immediately. It was a completely different style from the refreshing fragrance of beer.
浓浓的骨汤变成了菌汤，美味更上一层楼，直接喝汤都是极致的美味体验，让原本清淡的清汤锅变得滋味浓郁，符合她的个人口味。
The thick bone soup had become a mushroom soup, making it even more delicious. The soup on its own was already very good. The light, refreshing soup had become rich, just the way she liked it.
浓浓的骨汤，与精心熬制的红油交融，点点熟芝麻在其中沉浮，只是一口汤，也能品味到层层滋味，令人欢喜。

The rich bone broth combined with the red oil that was painstakingly brewed. The roasted sesame floated on top of the soup. One could sense the layers of taste even with just one mouthful. It was exhilarating.
浓郁的酒香，比起先前的泰坦酒更具冲击力。
The rich liquor's aroma was much more impactful than the earlier Titan Liquor.
海伦娜凝视着跪伏在地上的艾略特许久。
Helena watched the kneeling Elliot for a very long time.
海伦娜并未被伊琳娜的话语激怒，神情平静道：“我这一生，为了精灵族鞠躬尽瘁，无愧于心。是非曲直，留与后人评说，但现在，我还要引领精灵族进入下一个阶段。”

Helena wasn't provoked by Irina's words. Instead, she calmly said, "I have exhausted myself, and spared no effort for the elven race. I have no regrets. I'll leave the comments to the future generations, but now I'm going to lead the elves into the next phrase."
海伦娜悬浮在身前的星空水晶球飘起，撑起了一道星空屏障。
The starry sky crystal ball hovering in front of Helena released a starry sky barrier.
海伦娜沉默良久，缓缓转过身来，低头看着下方的几位精灵贵族和领主。
Helena was silent for a long time before she turned around slowly to look at the several elven nobles and domain lords below.
海伦娜笑了，有点感慨道：“但凡艾略特有你一半的智慧和心性，也不至于如此。”
Helena laughed and lamented, "Elliot wouldn't have ended like this if he has half of your wits and temperament."
消失的兰克斯特，麦格没想到会在这里遇见他。
Mag did not expect to meet Rankster, who had gone missing, here.
消息没有错，这小姑娘身上的魔法气息已经不低于七级，一位四岁的高级魔法师，诺兰大陆前无古人的存在。
The information was correct. The magical aura on this little girl was at least 7th-tier. A four-year-old advanced magic caster had never been seen on the Norland Continent before.
淡淡的焦糊味从碗里徐徐飘来，上等的食材，哪怕在这样恶劣的烹饪环境下，还是散发出一丝丝倔强的芳香。
The faint charred smell drifted from the bowl. The best ingredients still managed to give out a whiff of stubborn fragrance under such horrendous cooking circumstances.
淡淡的酒香以塞班酒馆为中心，向着周围慢慢扩散而去。
The faint liquor's aroma spread to the surroundings with Saipan Tavern as its center point.
淡淡的酒香味散开。
The faint liquor's aroma spread out.
淡淡酒香伴着橡木桶的香味涌来，虽然在地底之下，但通风系统做的非常不错，历经数十年依旧没有陈腐的气息。
The faint fragrance of the oak barrels greeted their nose. Even though they were underground, the ventilation system was very well-done. There was no rotting smell even after decades.
混乱之城。
Chaos City.
混乱之城什么都好，但对于一个吃货，在洛都养刁了嘴的人，在这里最大的煎熬是吃不到好吃的食物。
Everything was great in Chaos City, but for this picky chowhound from Rodu, his biggest torture here was that he couldn't get to eat great food.
混乱之城外尚未突破封印的魔鬼，已经让各族见识到旧日支配者的恐怖。
The devil that didn't break through the seal in Chaos City had already let them witness the horror of the Great Old Ones.
混乱之城的教廷分部其实只有一座小规模的教堂，算上卡诺也只有三位教廷人士，主要负责数量不多的教徒的日常祈祷和系列工作。

The Holy See's branch at Chaos City was, in fact, only a small church. Including Canault, the Holy See's personnel numbered only three. They were mostly responsible for the daily prayers of the devoted, which weren't many people.
混乱之城算是开拓的不错的市场，单期销量在三千到五千册。
Chaos City's market was not bad to begin with, reaching a sales of 3000-5000 per issue.
混乱之城虽然是一座中立之城，但如果发生种族战争，没有任何势力是能够绝对中立的，也无法在乱世之中独善其身。
Although Chaos CIty was a neutral city, once the racial war broke out, no party could remain absolutely neutral and stay out of the war completely.
混乱之城，巴菲特庄园。
Chaos City, the Buffett Manor.
混迹江湖嘛，多少都想闯荡出点名头来，所以一般都会把自己打扮的特别一些，最好是一出场就能被扔出来。
Thos who roamed the world would more or less wish they could gain some fame so they would always dress up in a peculiar way so that they could be recognized the moment they appear.
清洗好的田螺放在冰箱里，早上吃田螺时间有点不太合适，而且他还得出门一趟。
The cleaned escargots were placed in the fridge. It wasn't suitable to eat escargots in the morning and he had to go out first.
渣渣渣……
Crunch, crunch, crunch…
温妮莎公主这段时间参加过几次王室的活动，所以朝中大臣对她并不陌生。
Princess Vanessa had attended a few royal events, so the courtiers were all rather familiar with her.
温妮莎咽了一下口水。
Vanessa swallowed her saliva.
温妮莎左右看了看，凑近亚伯罕，小声道：“那我可以打包一份回去吗？”
Vanessa looked around, and inched closer to Abraham as she whispered, "In that case, can I take away some too?"
温妮莎微微眯着眼睛，感觉自己似乎又回到了混乱之城，坐在麦米餐厅里，品尝着麦老板推出的一道新品。
Vanessa closed her eyes slightly, and felt as though she was back in Chaos City, sitting in Mamy Restaurant and trying Boss Mag's new launch.
温妮莎扒拉了一口米饭，额头上已经沁出细密的汗珠。
Vanessa ate a mouthful of rice. There were already beads of perspiration forming on her forehead.
温妮莎把米饭咽下，笑着道：“我想去后厨看看，是不是麦老板被关在里边做菜。”
Vanessa swallowed the rice, and smilingly said, "I want to go over to the kitchen to see if Boss Mag is imprisoned there to cook."
温妮莎的脸上立马露出开心的笑容，点着头道：“嘻嘻，我就知道亚伯罕叔叔最好了。”
Vanessa immediately revealed a happy smile and nodded. "Teehee. I knew Uncle Abraham was the best."
温妮莎目光扫了一圈，落到了一旁那桌客人点的菜上，红亮的凉拌菜，看起来有些像夫妻肺片。
Vanessa glanced around, and saw the side dishes ordered by one of the customers. The bright red salad resembled the husband and wife lung slice.
温妮莎觉得自己的脑袋突然嗡的一声响。
Vanessa felt her head buzz.
温妮莎足够大，完全罩得住。
Vanessa was powerful enough to be able to protect them completely.
温暖的碗，就像他的手一样让人心安，埃菲心里微微荡漾。
The warm bowl was as settling as his hands and that made Eiffie's heart flutter.
温暖的酒馆让两人都放松了一些。
The warm tavern made them a little more relaxed.
温润细腻的酒液浸润嘴唇，然后滑入口腔，醇香馥郁，入口绵柔，口味清冽甘爽，与酒鬼花生相得益彰，咽下之后，更是唇齿留香。

The warm and fine liquid wet his lips, and flowed into his mouth. It had a rich fragrance, and was very gentle and fine with a refreshing taste, complementing the drunkard peanuts. After swallowing the wine, he could still taste the fragrance in his mouth.
溯源追踪再次失败，或与虚空之外的力量有关？
Failure to trace origin once again. Perhaps it is related to the powers outside of space?
满分的评分，意味着这场品酒大会的金奖酒已经失去悬念。
The perfect score meant that the gold award of this liquor tasting event was already decided.
漆黑的街道上连个鬼影都看不到，只有冷风呼啸。
There was not a single soul on the pitch-black street. Only the cold wind blew.
澄澈的透明酒液从出酒口涌了出来，略带刺激的酒香也是随之涌了出来。
Clear and transparent liquid gushed out, together with a strong alcohol fragrance.
澄澈的酒液倒入水晶杯中，端起酒杯，浓浓的酒香直钻鼻孔。
The clear liquid was poured into the crystal glass. Abraham brought the glass up to his nose, and the rich fragrance of the wine wafted into his nose.
灌汤包已经学会有两天了，麦格没有急着展示，红油抄手这两天已经成了艾米的早餐标配，今天他准备给她们换一个口味。

It had been two days since he learnt how to make the soup dumpling. Mag was not in a rush to show it off as the Sichuan spicy wontons in red oil had already become Amy's staple for breakfast. Today, he wanted to change things up for them.
火焰从艾米的右手掌心中出现，如一条火线顺着裂缝蔓延而去，裂缝两边的厚重的钢板开始变色融化。
A flame appeared in Amy's palm, and it traveled along the crack. The two sides of the thick steel started to change in color and melt.
火焰开始熊熊燃烧，而她的身影却再次消失于黑暗之中。
The flames started to burn ragingly but her figure disappeared in the dark again.
火焰点燃了奴隶圈，嘈杂的声音从里边传来，那是战斗与欢呼声。
Fire lit up the slaves' circle and noises could be heard from within. It was battle cries and cheers.
火焰高高窜起十数米高，奥斯特的死讯也是很快传开，整个奥格部落陷入了恐慌之中。
The flames was over 10-odd meters high and the news of Auster's death spread rapidly. The whole Aug Tribe descended into a panic.
灯光从落地窗里照亮。
The light shone brightly behind the floor-to-ceiling window.
灰神殿在洛都有办事处，作为一个获得了极高权限的内部人员，麦格到混乱之城的第一天便已经和该办事处对接上，每天都能收到最新情报。

The Gray Temple had an office in Rodu. As an individual who had received the highest clearance, Mag had gotten in touch with the Gray Temple's office on the first day that he arrived at Rodu. He could receive the latest intel every day.
炖鹅是按照黄焖鸡的方法做的，做了一些改良，放了点香菇，没放土豆。
The stewed goose was prepared like the braised chicken with a little tweak. Instead of potatoes, shiitake mushrooms were added.
点开大礼包，五个经验包随即跳了出来：绿豆糕、红豆糕、双皮奶、芒果班戟、蛋黄酥！
Upon clicking open the gift package, five experience bags popped up: mung bean cake, red bean cake, milk custard, mango pancake, and salted egg yolk pastry!
点点淡金色的光芒落在梅兰特的身上，那恐怖的伤口以肉眼可见的速度开始重生、愈合。
Bits of faint golden glow fell on Merante. The horrifying wound started to regenerate and heal at a visible speed.
烈焰火球从蛇口中吐出，落在那些屋舍中，瞬间轰塌成片的建筑，并且引发了大火。
The snake spit out flaming fireballs and they landed on those buildings, making them explode and crushed instantly and caused a huge fire.
烤串的肉块不小，虽然只有两串，可对于孩子来说还是分量不少，尽管有些意犹未尽，但孩子们的笑容还是挺满足的。

The kebab's pieces of meat were quite substantial. Even though there were only two kebabs for each child, they were enough for the children. Although the children would like to have more, they still had a sated smile.

Chapter 2004: Of Course, I Will Try It
第二只大肥鹅应声而中。
The ring landed on the second goose.
第二天一早，还没有客人来排队前，麦格就把公告牌挂在了门上。
Early on the next morning, before any customers came to line up, Mag already hung the notice onto the door.
第二天一早，这件事就传遍了罗莫街和整个洛都的酒馆界。
The next morning, this incident had spread to all taverns in Romo Street, and Rodu.
第二天一早，麦格做了早餐，顺便从冰箱里拿出了一箩筐田螺开始处理起来。
The next morning, Mag made breakfast. After that, he took a basket of escargot out from the fridge and started cleaning them.
第二天一早，麦格比平时早起了小半个小时。
The next morning, Mag got up half an hour earlier
第二天一早，麦格精神饱满的起床，不过穿上拖鞋出门的时候，明显感觉脚步有点虚浮。
The next morning, Mag woke up energetically. However, when he put on his slippers to go out of the room, he could feel that his legs were rather weak.
第二天早上，麦格被敲门声叫醒。
The next morning, Mag was woken up by the sound of knocking.
第二天麦格一睁开眼睛，又对上了四双眼睛。
The next morning, Mag opened his eyes, and saw four pairs of eyes again.
第四十八刀，阿尔宾将刀刺入那守卫的心脏，然后松开了手，向后退了几步，噗通一下跪在了一旁安东面目全非的尸体旁痛哭了起来。
The 48th stab. Albin stabbed the dagger into that guard's heart before letting go and taking a few steps back. He knelt down next to Anton's body with a plop and cried his heart out.
等了一个上午，就是为了等到他的茅台登场。
He had waited for the whole afternoon for his Maotai to go on stage.
等了一会，麦格终于等到了一辆路过的营运马车，伸手拦下，先把艾米抱上马车，然后让安妮和伊琳娜上车。
After a while, Mag finally hailed a passing horse-drawn carriage. He carried Amy up the horse-drawn carriage first, before helping Annie and Irina up.
等到她醉了……嘿嘿嘿……
After she got drunk...Hehehe...
等到现场稍稍安静下来，库尔特才看着埃菲道：“埃菲小姐，不知我是否有幸能够买下这瓶泰坦酒？我想这是非常有纪念意义的一瓶酒，也是值得细细品味的一瓶酒。”

When the audience had quiten down, Kurt looked at Eiffie and said, "Miss Eiffie, can I have the honor to buy this bottle of Titan Liquor? I think this is a very meaningful bottle of wine and it is worth careful tasting."
等埃菲将第一炉酿制出来的泰坦酒全部装入橡木桶，并且盖上盖子的时候，已经是下午三点钟了。
By the time the first barerel of Titan Liquor was all filled into the oak barrel, it was already three in the afternoon.
等所有人都走了，还留在原位的迈洛有些狐疑的看着加兰，降低了几分声音道：“真是这样？”
After everyone left, Mylo, who was still left, asked Garlan suspiciously in a soft voice, "Is that really so?"
等等，最后这位哥们的口味有点特别啊？
Wait, the one who posted the last one has a rather peculiar taste?
筷子夹起一片猪耳朵，经过麦米餐厅的训练，她对于食材的追求已经抛弃了一切偏见。
Vanessa picked up a piece of pig's ear. After the training from Mamy Restaurant, she had already thrown away all prejudices she had for any ingredients.
管家看了眼麦格，点点头道：“也好，我会转告公爵大人的。”
The butler glanced at Mag, nodded, and said, "Alright. I will tell His Highness."
管家领命出去，亚伯罕则是在大厅中一脸忧愁的踱步起来。
The butler left with Abraham's orders, while Abraham began to pace around in the hall with a troubled expression.
米娅的冰激凌店已经成为了另一个儿童乐园，麦米餐厅歇业，冰激凌店倒是可以全天营业了。
Miya's ice cream shop had become another children's wonderland. The ice cream shop could operate all day long when Mamy Restaurant was closed.
精准而又干净利落的一枪，完美符合晞给他的感觉。
The shot was clean and precise, matching the feeling that Xi gave him.
精灵们在废墟之中挖出了受了重伤的海伦娜。
The elves dug out the seriously injured Helena from the ruins.
精灵们沿着光道，先前走去。
The elves followed the light and walked forward.
精灵和恶魔坐在同一张桌子上，人类和兽人相对而坐有说有笑，矮人和地精举着酒杯碰杯，看起来竟是如此的和谐友好。

The elves were sitting together with the demons. The humans and the orcs were sitting together, and chatting away happily. The dwarves and the goblins were clinking their glasses, and drinking together. Everyone looked so friendly and harmonious.
精灵族作为洛斯帝国为数不多的友邻，数千年来一只维持着不错的关系。
The elves were one of the Roth Empire's few allies, and they were the only ones with a good relationship with the Roth Empire for thousands of years.
精灵的寿命极长，许多参加过种族战争的精灵现在依旧生活在生命之城中，当他们的记忆被唤醒，看着那些曾经和他们一同战斗过的兄弟、朋友，他们和他们的后人竟然成为了身份低微的仆役，那种羞愧让他们再也无法沉默的享受现在这一切。

The elves had a very long lifespan, so many of the elves who had taken part in the racial war were still living in the City of Life. When their memories of the war were awakened, and they saw that the brothers and friends who used to fight side by side with them were actually reduced to lowly slaves, they were so ashamed they could no longer enjoy everything they had in silence.
精瘦干练的鲍里斯看起来颇有风度，典型的钻石王老五，不过看他的样子不像是在撩埃菲，更像是在商量什么事。

The lean and smart-looking Boris looked very charming. He's a typical diamond bachelor. However, he didn't seem like he was flirting with Eiffie, instead, he looked like he was having a discussion with her.
系统也有点懵。
The System was a little stunned as well.
系统令人惊讶的慷慨。
The system was surprisingly generous.
系统咆哮！
"Piss off!" the system hollered!
系统尝试着发布系生第一个任务。
The System tried releasing its first-ever mission.
系统尽量心平气和的说道：“小主平时早上吃什么呢？”
The System tried to speak as amiably as it could. "Little Mistress, what would you normally have for breakfast?"
系统惊了，但还是答道：“理论上是这样的……”
The System was stunned. However, it still replied, "Theoretically speaking, it is true…"
系统感觉自己脆弱的世界观遭受了巨大的冲击。
The System felt that its fragile worldview had met with a huge impact.
系统接连发放的任务奖励，让麦格有些应接不暇。
Mag was a little overwhelmed by the continuous rewards given out by the system.
系统有点头大。
The system was getting a headache.
系统权限等级过低，无能力将其捕获。
The System's permission level is too low to capture it.
系统沉默……再沉默……
The System fell silent... and remained silent...
系统沉默了一会，似乎在分析，道：“可能性极低！如果该系统发现了农场，应当能够判断这个世界存在另一个系统，不可与对方进行接触，更不可对对方的任务进行干扰。”

The System fell silent for a while, as though it was analyzing, and said, "The possibility is very low! If that System found the farm, it should be able to tell that another System existed in this world and would not interact with the other party, much less to intervene with the other party's missions."
系统沉默了一会，答道：“暂时无法排除这种可能性，本系统对于这个世界的了解是片面有限的，尚有许多地方未能进行探索。
The System fell silent for a while and said, "For now, this possibility cannot be ruled out. I have a limited knowledge of this world and there are various places I have yet to explore.

自己虽然是法部的三把手，可在这位公爵大人面前，这点官位又算什么。

至于这场战斗的结果，只能等明天伊琳娜醒来再问她了。
As for the result of this battle, he had to wait till tomorrow morning to ask Irina after she woke up.

至于那点烫嘴的感觉，已经完全被美味所压制。

艾略特打了个哈欠，转身又进了卧室。

艾略特气得从地堡里跳了出来，抬手就是一巴掌，看着那年轻的精灵道：“你一个人去追吗？”
Elliot jumped out from the bunker angrily and slapped that young elf before saying, "Are you going after them alone?"
艾略特的脑袋越来越低，直到埋到土里，身体在微微颤抖。
Elliot's head hung lower and lower until it was buried in the ground. His body was shaking.
艾略特看完信之后，差点把信封都吃了。
Elliot almost ate that letter after reading it.
艾略特脸色大变，膝盖一软，便跪在了地上，颤抖着道：“大祭司，我对精灵族绝对忠心，我只是担心精灵被毁灭才会出此下策，但我真的是全心全意为精灵族在考虑啊。”

Elliot's face changed immediately. He felt his legs go jelly, and he dropped to his knees, shivering as he said, "High Priestess. I am absolutely loyal to the elves. I only suggested that because I was worried that the elves would be wiped out. I am really thinking for the elves wholeheartedly."
艾略特连忙道：“大祭司，我们还是赶紧派出护卫队把他们全部抓起来吧，事情再闹大，可就不好收场了，整个风之森林的根基都会被动摇，这些人可真是糊涂了。”

Elliot quickly said, "High Priestess, we should quickly deploy guards to arrest all of them. If things got even bigger, it would be difficult to clean up the mess. The foundation of the entire Wind Forest would be challenged. These people are so foolish."
艾米一把抱住了准备撤退的丑小鸭，然后捏着他的圆脸，从勺子里捏了几颗炒饭丢进了它的嘴里。
Amy grabbed hold of Ugly Duckling, who was about to retreat. She then pinched its round face and threw a few grains of fried rice into its mouth.
艾米一脸无辜的耸了耸小肩膀，“您说小朋友要诚实的。”
Amy shrugged with an innocent expression. "You said children have to be truthful."
艾米一脸认真的摇摇头，摆手拒绝道：“你看起来一点都不好耍。”
Amy shook her head seriously, and waved her hands as she said, "You don't look fun to kid."
艾米一脸认真的说道：“这是话梅糖哦，酸酸甜甜的，超好吃的，你肯定没有吃过。”
"This is a preserved plum candy. It's sour and sweet. It's super delicious. You definitely have to try it," Amy said with a serious expression.
艾米一脸认真道：“父亲大人说，就算是漂亮姐姐送的东西也不能随便要，女孩子在外面要保护好自己。”
Amy seriously replied, "Father said I can't accept favors when I'm out, even if they are from a beautiful big sister. Girls have to protect themselves when they are out by themselves."
艾米上楼叫她妈下来吃饭。
Amy went up to get her mom down for breakfast.
艾米专心致志的咕噜咕噜喝完了一碗粥，趁着麦格帮她盛粥的间隙，好奇的问道：“父亲大人，我们的酒馆什么时候开业呢？我还没有见到一个客人呢。”

Amy concentrated on finishing her bowl of porridge, and while Mag was giving her a second serving, she asked curiously, "Father, when is our tavern opening for business? I haven't seen a single customer."
艾米丢出了手里的那颗绿豆，圆滚滚的绿豆在地板上滚了出去，发出了一串声音。

艾米从床上爬起来，把房间里里外外的都找了一遍，嘟着小嘴有些生气道：“你再不出来的话，我就要告诉父亲大人了，把你这个坏东西抓出来。”
Amy crawled up from her bed. She searched the room inside out, and pouted angrily as she said, "If you're not coming out, I'll tell Father to catch you.
艾米伸手捏起一截油条，放到嘴边小口呼呼吹着气，然后直接咬了一口。
Amy reached out to take one youtiao. She placed it near her mouth, and blew on it gently before giving it a big bite.
艾米做的这份灵魂炒饭，尽得她的真传。
This soul fried rice made by Amy indeed had the essence of her cooking.
艾米停下脚步，回头看着麦格道：“父亲大人，肚子饿了呢，今天中午我们吃什么好吃的？”
Amy halted her footsteps, and turned to say to Mag, "Father, I'm hungry. What are we eating today?"
艾米单手提着椅子，奶声奶气的说道。
Amy said as she lifted a chair in one hand.

Amy held onto that little folding chair and said to that big guy childishly.

Amy could be the cashier and take orders and Annie could help to serve, but he didn't dare to depend on Irina. He, who had taken on multiple roles, felt way too busy.
艾米吃包子的动作一顿，抬头看着麦格。
Amy paused and look at Mag.

Amy and Annie played a lot of games before stopping in front of a snack street. They turned around to ask Mag, "It's so fun here, but I'm a little hungry now, so where do we go for lunch?"

Amy turned back and said with realization when she saw Eiffie, "It's you, pretty big sister."
艾米大受鼓舞，从碗柜里拿出碗，一边道：“父亲大人和母亲大人都喜欢的话，那我给你们盛哦。”
Amy was greatly encouraged. As she took the bowls out from the cabinet, she said, "Since Father and Mother like it, let me get you two some."

Amy carried Ugly Duckling in her arms and walked into the breakfast shop.

Amy slurped up all the soup in the plate, but she didn't move. Instead, she looked at Mag perplexedly. "But...didn't you just say that the snails in the back yard are definitely not edible?"
艾米抬头看着麦格，小声道：“我好久没有见以前的小伙伴了呢，杰西卡说露娜老师给他们准备了很多吃的，而且也有了住的地方，我想去看看他们，你可以给他们做一点好吃的东西吗？”

Amy looked up at Mag, and whispered, "I haven't seen my friends for a long time. Jessica said that Teacher Luna had prepared a lot of delicious food for them, and they also had a place to stay now. I would like to visit them. Can you make some scrumptious food for them, please?"

Amy carried a stool over and took a soup dumpling out from the pot. After that, she sat in front of Mag, eating her soup dumpling while she asked.

艾米放到嘴里咬了一口，眉头一皱，重新打量着手里多了两个牙印的田螺，摇摇头道：“不好吃。”
Amy put it to her mouth and bit on it. She frowned and looked at the escargot with two teethprints as she shook her head and said, "This is not nice."
艾米最终还是放过了飞镖摊位的老板，倒不是因为游戏难度过大，而是因为那所谓的精美礼品对她毫无吸引力，要是精美礼品换成大肥鹅的话，估计结果就不一样了。

艾米止住了难过，点开了那属性鉴定技能。
Amy stopped feeling sad, and clicked open that ability of 'Attribute Identification'.
艾米用勺子舀起一只抄手，红亮的汤汁给面皮染上了漂亮的颜色，肉香透过薄薄的皮徐徐飘来，几点葱花和香菜点缀其上，看起来极为诱人。

Amy picked up one wonton with the spoon. The bright red soup gave the wonton's skin a beautiful color. The meat's aroma slowly drifted over through the thin dough skin. Spring onions and cilantro were scattered over it, making it look very enticing.
艾米用小手托起下巴，歪头，然后可怜兮兮道：“胖爷爷，小艾三天没有吃饭了，可以给我一点钱钱买面包吃吗？”
Amy propped her chin upon her hands, tilted her head, and said, "Fat Grandpa, Ay hasn't eaten for three days, can you give me some monnies to buy some bread?"
艾米的声音一下止住。
Amy's voice halted immediately.

After Amy's short leg kicked a few times in the air, she tilted her head and pleaded with Mag, "Father, help me kick this."
艾米的生活体验系统，也在同时发布了任务奖励和新的任务。
Amy's Life Experience System released the mission reward and a new mission at the same time.

艾米的眼睛完全亮了起来，欢快的嚼着。

艾米的腮帮子鼓鼓的，湛蓝色的眼睛一亮，眼睛跟着眨巴眨巴着，有些惊喜道：“冰冰凉凉的，清爽可口，好好吃哦。”
Amy's cheeks were puffed out, and her blue eyes lit up. She blinked her eyes in surprise, and said, "It's cool and icy. Very refreshing, very delicious."
艾米的表情瞬间凝固。
Amy's expression froze instantly.

艾米眨了眨眼睛，改口道：“睡觉的时候做了一个梦，梦到了一个很好笑的人，说他自己是笑话大王，然后给我讲了很多笑话呢。”
Amy blinked and then changed her story, "I had a dream when I was sleeping. I dreamt of a very funny man. He said he was the king of jokes and then he told me many jokes."
艾米眼睛一亮，接过篮子，先拿了一串糖葫芦咬了一口，然后有些含糊的感谢道：“谢谢埃菲姐姐。”
Amy's eyes lit up. She received the basket and bit onto the candied haw. After that, she thanked Eiffie with her mouth full, "Thank you Big Sister Eiffie."
艾米眼睛一亮，期待的看着他道：“那可不可以带上我一起去啊？我也很能打的。”
Amy lit up her eyes and looked at him expectantly, "Can you bring me along too? I can fight very well too."
艾米眼睛一亮，父亲大人开心，她也开心。
Amy lit up her eyes. She was happy as long as her father was happy.
艾米碗里全是菜，埋头吃着，根本停不下来。
Food was piling up in Amy's bowl, and she could not stop eating.
艾米秀气的眉毛微微上扬，眼睛亮晶晶的，像是发现了新大陆一般。
Amy's beautiful eyebrows rose and her eyes sparkled, as though she found no man's land.
艾米端起可乐，仰头便是吨吨吨吨吨的灌了几大口。
Amy put the bottle to her mouth and gulped down huge mouthfuls of the drink.
艾米笑容依旧，不过在诺亚的眼里却变成了小魔鬼的笑容。
Amy was still smiling brightly, but in Noah's eyes, that smile became the smile of a little devil.
艾米笑眯眯的看着他说道：“吃了我的糖，你以后就是我的小弟了哦。”
Smiling, Amy said to him, "After eating my candy, you will be my little brother in the future."
艾米翻身坐了起来，认真思考了一会，有些苦恼道：“可是，我不会做饭啊。”
Amy sat up and thought seriously for a while. After that, frustrated, she said, "But I don't know how to cook."
艾米自己都惊呆了。
Amy had even shocked herself.
艾米认真听着，过了好一会，才道：“所以呢？我要做什么？”
Amy listened very seriously. After a while, she said, "So? What do I have to do?"
艾米认真的听着。
Amy listened seriously.
艾米认真的听着，过了一会，提问道：“那有毒的蜗牛是不能吃的，没毒的蜗牛就是可以吃的，我把蜗牛先给丑小鸭吃，要是丑小鸭没事的话，那就是没有毒可以吃的蜗牛了，对吧？”

Amy listened carefully and after a while, she asked, "We can't eat the poisonous snails, but we can eat the non-poisonous ones. Then, I can let Ugly Duckling eat the snails first, if Ugly Duckling is fine, that means the snail is not poisonous and we can eat it, right?"
艾米蹦跳着了来到门口，打开门。
Amy skipped to the door and opened it.
艾米重新回到了厨房里，怀里抱着个大盆，手边放着一排酱料，黄瓜蘸着酱料，吃的不亦乐乎。
Amy returned to the kitchen, with the large basin in his arms. There were a row of sauces by her side. She was eating the cucumbers happily with the sauces.
艾米重新躺回床上，左右看了一眼，确定没有人，才又在心里道：“你在我脑子里，是怎么说话的呢？为什么我和你说话是没有声音的？”
Amy lay back on her bed. She looked around, and after making sure there was no one, she thought to herself, How do you talk in my head? Why is there no sound when I'm talking to you?
艾许莉微微点头，然后翻看起图纸，过了一会才看着麦格道：“精灵并不擅长锻造，如果情况紧急的话，交由矮人铁匠或许会更有效率。”
Ashley nodded before flipping through the blueprints. After a while, she said to Mag, "The elves are not good at forging. If it's urgent, it'll be more efficient to let the dwarf blacksmiths do it."
艾许莉的目光渐渐清明，郑重点头道：“我会将此话传达给族人。”
Ashley had a clearer look in her eyes. She nodded and said, "I will pass this message to our people."

Babla took two kebabs from the grill and looked at everyone seriously as she said, "Guys, we have to treasure the delicacies before us. I feel that the Norland Continent is in a rather dangerous situation currently. If things get worse, ocme to the moon with me."

Although the cucumber did not have much taste, it had its unique fragrance.

The peanuts were peeled and fried, with a layer of chili and sugar on top. Multiple spices had already been infused into the peanuts, making the fragrance very distinct.

Maotai—2000 copper coins a bottle.

Maotai's aroma whiffed out slowly. Although it was very slow and diluted, it still continued to spread its steady and unique fragrance.

The 50 points that Maotai received was more shocking than the 50 points that Titan Liquor received. At the same time, it also triggered everyone's curiosity. How was the event organizers going to handle these two? Who was going to get the gold award?

Sally was silent.
莫非是……她反悔了？
