费奇摇头，歉然道：“抱歉，这是客人的隐私，我们不能对外透露。”
Fitch shook his head and apologetically answered, "I'm sorry. This is our client's privacy. We can't share it."
费奇有点慌，虽然他把那一百多栋楼的过户办理的非常干净，但随着罗莫街的继续落寞，那些临街的老房子价值只会越来越低。
Fitch was rather flustered. Although he had handled the handing over of the buildings very cleanly, as Romo Street continue to decline, the value of those old buildings would only get lower.
费奇看着两人，有些好奇的问道：“在下有些好奇，为何两位先生突然对罗莫街的商铺如此感兴趣呢？毕竟正如您所说，罗莫街的人气并不旺盛。”

Fitch asked the two of them with curiosity, "I'm a little curious. Why are you two gentlemen interested in Romo Street's shops suddenly? After all, as you said, Romo Street doesn't have the human traffic."
费奇笑着道：“这也没啥好说的，哈迪斯先生这是靠自己的本事赚的钱，要不是他入驻罗莫街，这条街的商业价值已经到底了，他将成为这条街新的缔造者。”

Fitch laughingly said, "They have nothing to complain. Mr. Hades did this with his own ability. If he didn't enter Romo Street, the commercial value of this street has already hit rock bottom. He would be the new creator of this street."
费奇翻出早上麦格给他的那份资料，很快找到了这栋楼的编号，答道：“这栋楼的单层面积是两百平方，地面三层，地下还有一个地窖，首年租金是20万铜币。”

Fitch flipped through the documents Mag passed to him that morning and quickly found this building's number. He answered, "The single floor area of this building is 200 square meters. There are three floors above ground and one underground cellar. The first year's rental is 200,000 copper coins."
费奇肃然起敬，他还为这两天的业绩沾沾自喜，没想到这根本没有能够入哈迪斯先生的眼。
Fitch was so respectful. He was still gloating over the past two days' result, but he didn't expect that was still not enough for Mr. Hades.
费奇转身，看到两个穿的颇为体面的中年男人站在他们的身后。
Fitch turned around and saw two rather well-dressed middle-aged men behind them.
费奇连忙说道：“是这样的，您之前让我审核那些想要租店铺的商家的资历，我现在已经收到了一百零八份意向书，其中不乏实力商家，而且也给出了不错的租金方案，所以我想来找您谈谈，看看能否确定下来一部分商家。”

Fitch quickly said, "Oh, it's like this. You asked me to audit the background of those business that wanted to rent the shops. I have already received 108 proposals and many of them are good business. They have also given very good rental suggestions, so I want to discuss with you to see if we can settle on some of them."
赫克托就是波比的那位前辈，而这位卢西恩大人也和他们一同喝过几次酒，和前辈的关系不错。
Hector was that senior of Bobby's. Lord Lucien had drunk with them on a few occasions, and was on good terms with Bobby's senior.
赫克托是他共事三十多年的同事，当年是同一批进入兵部的，这些年也时常一同喝酒，不曾想他却这般突然离世，着实让他有些难以接受。

Hector was his colleague of more than 30 years, and they were in the same batch entering the ministry. They had been drinking together frequently all these years, and he did not expect Hector to pass away so suddenly. That was indeed very difficult for him to accept.
走在他前边，穿着一身红色长裙，披着小坎肩的埃菲风韵迷人，手里牵着的艾米乖巧可人。
In front of him, was Eiffie in a long red dress and cute little Amy.
起初他还想让麦格口述，迈洛笔录，再加工成稿。
At first, he even wanted Mag to narrate and Mylo to write it down before writing it into a script.
趁着夜色，紫纹狮鹫再次升空，向着北方飞去。
Taking advantage of the dark night, the purple-striped griffin took to the air again and flew towards the north.
越是了解，越是敬畏，麦格在获得了大师们的经验之后，立刻发现了他自认为完美的绿豆糕，其实只能算是粗糙的次品。

The more he understood, the more respectful he got. After receiving the masters' experience, Mag immediately realized that the mung bean cake that he thought was perfect was only a substandard product.
距离土楼巷不远的一座三层木楼阁楼上，一个黑袍人冲着站在窗口的一道身影轻声说道。
In a three-storey wooden attic not far away from the mud houses' alley, a man in black robe said to a figure standing near the window.
路易斯的神情也是十分凝重，沉声道：“一个脱离了封印限制的魔鬼，才是最让人头疼的。而现在它还控制了数量庞大的古尸。”
Louis looked equally grim when he gravely said, "A devil that has escaped from the seal is the most problematic, and now, it's even controlling a huge number of ancient corpses."
路易斯看着站在一旁的道格拉斯声音沉重道：“正告书已经发往洛都，目前安德烈尚未给出任何回复，但如果这件事真如亚历克斯所言，为旧日支配者的阴谋，那我们当如何处置？”

Louis was standing by the road as he told Douglas seriously, "The warning letter was sent to Rodu. Currently, Andre has not given any reply yet. However, if this was as Alex said, and was the Great Old Ones' plan, what should we do?"
路过塞班酒馆的时候，两人停留张望了一会，然后啧啧称奇的离开。
The two of them stopped and gawked around when they passed by Saipan Tavern before leaving with surprise.
蹭饭毕竟不是长远之道，在没有嫁进这个家之前，还是要实际一点的。
They could not leech on Mr. Hades for a free meal forever. Before Eiffie marries over, she still had to be realistic.
蹲在一旁眼巴巴望着艾米碟子里的灌汤包的丑小鸭眼睛一瞪，连忙站起来，慢慢向后退去。
Ugly Duckling, who was crouching at the side looking at the soup dumpling in Amy's plate, widened its eyes. It quickly stood up and quietly backed off.
身体和木头在冰墙上留下了浅浅的痕迹，奴隶精灵们愤怒而无助的嘶吼着。
Their bodies and wood left faint marks on the ice walls. The elven slaves roared in anger and helplessness.
身体恢复了的梅兰特，将以洛都为中心，开始继续搜寻魔气。
Merante, who had fully recovered, began to search for the evil aura with Rodu as center.
身处高位，此事又十分敏感，只是谈论了几句，卢西恩便将此事揭过，换了个话题。
As a highly ranked courtier and due to the sensitivity of this matter, Lucien quickly changed topic after saying a few words about it.
躺在地上的巨汉瞪大了眼睛看着麦格，似乎有话要说，事关尊严。
The man, who was lying on the floor, glared at Mag, as though he was about to say something that had to do with his dignity.
转眼之间，皇宫已进入备战模式。

轰！轰！轰！

Boom!!!
辣味来的爽快，却不缠绵，香味更胜一筹，让人吃了还想再吃！
The spiciness came swiftly, and did not stick around for long. The fragrance was even better, making one feel like eating more!
辣子红油是现成的，凉拌猪耳朵和凉拌猪舌头都需要用到。
The red oil was premade since it was needed in the pig ears salad and pig tongue salad.

过了一会，他瞪大了眼睛，表情变得有些不可思议。
After a while, he widened his eyes with a disbelief expression.
过了一会，麦格突然笑了。
After a while, Mag suddenly chuckled.
过了五条街，拐进一条巷子，等从另一个口子出来的时候，麦格已经换了个装，成了一个满脸络腮胡的肥圆大汉。
After walking past five streets and turning into an alley, Mag had already changed into a large burly man with a moustache.
过了好一会，她才将绘本放下，起身从架子上取了一个酒杯，给自己倒了一杯酒，从盒子里抓了一把酒鬼花生，坐在窗边，独自饮酒。

She only put down the picture book after a while and got up to get a liquor glass from the shelf. She poured a glass of liquor for herself and grabbed a bunch of drunkard peanuts from the box. She sat by the window and drank alone.

After a long time, she looked and asked Helena, "Are you really ready to let Wind Forest go through through another revolution?"

Michael put down the missive, and said to Dicus, "Make some preparations. I want to write a letter to the Falk Tribe. All the pro-peace factions have to handle matters calmly now. The Norland Continent will descend into a new racial war once the situation goes out of control. By then, nobody will be able to do anything to salvage the situation."

Mylo sauntered into the Chief Editor's office and sat in front of Garlan. He crossed his leg and said slowly, "I think you should just get Boss Mag to write for you instead. This sales had already thrashed many famous food magazines."
迈洛闻言笑了笑：“不过事实倒也没有差太多，如果这是最后一刊，错过了麦老板的鱼香茄子教程绝对会成为最大的遗憾。”

Mylo chuckled when he heard that. "Anyway, the truth isn't too far off. If this is the last issue, missing Boss Mag's tutorial of the eggplant with garlic sauce will definitely be my greatest regret."

还有消息说此次进攻兽人族和精灵族的命令也是乔修背着国王陛下下的，因为事情败露，所以恼羞成怒灭了几位兵部大臣的门。

还有，地球的确存在着更高级的文明，只是不在瓦坎达，在昆仑山上的虚空界之中。”

Before even opening, there were already more than 10 customers waiting outside Saipan. Most of them were wearing courtier uniforms.

酒馆酒馆，卖酒当然是重中之重。

酒馆里人不多，不过一进门，亚伯罕便被那浓浓的酒香差点熏晕过去。

酒香散发出来，携着一股淡淡的焦香以及浓烈的烟熏味，两人拿起酒杯，都同时皱起了眉头。
The liquor's aroma spread out with a faint toasted scent and a rich smokey scent. The two of them picked up their glasses and frowned at the same time.
酒香朦胧，令人迷醉其中，恍惚间他似乎看到了当刚刚进入兵部时，意气风发，说要干出一番大事业出来，一晃数十年过去……却已物是人非。

The fragrance of the wine was intoxicating. In an instant, Lucien seemed to have gone back to the days when he just entered the Ministry of Defense. He was young and ambitious. He wanted to do great things. In a flash, decades passed… but nothing was the same.
酒香沁入心脾，只是闻着，便已有了三分醉意。

Drunkard peanuts and pig ears salad were two great dishes that went well with alcoholic drinks. They were a perfect match with the tavern.
酥脆的口感，轻轻一咬，花生的酥香便在嘴里炸裂开来。
It was crispy. A gentle bite caused the fragrance of the peanut to explode in his mouth.
酥脆的表皮裹着令人惊叹的美味，表皮的酥香、红豆馅的香甜、咸蛋黄的咸香……各种滋味在口中层层释放，然后交织在一起，绽放出不可思议的美味。

酥脆的鹅皮咬下还能听到一丝轻微的声响，而鹅皮之下，则是浸透了卤汁的鲜嫩鹅肉，一口咬下，肉汁在口中四溅。

酥香、柔软、香甜、咸香一下子充满了整个口腔。
Crunchy, soft, sweet, and savory. Different kinds of sensations filled the mouth.
酥香之外，麻辣的口感让他脸噌的一下涨红了，作为一个极少吃辣的少年，他对辣味的免疫力极低。
Other than the fragrance, the numbing spiciness made his face flush red immediately. As a young lad who barely took spice, Noya had a very low tolerance for spiciness.
酸、辣、甜、咸四种味道几乎同时在嘴里爆发，味蕾毫无征兆的在一瞬间被激发，那种直冲脑门的感觉，实在有些上头。

Sour, spicy, sweet, savory, the four tastes exploded almost simultaneously in her mouth. Her taste buds were triggered instantly without warning. It felt as though something was rushing right up her head.
酸甜的味道，让他的表情瞬间扭曲了一下，不过很快适应之后，这味道倒是挺让人着迷的。
The sourish sweet taste made his face scrunch up for a second, but after he got used to it, the taste was mesmerizing.

酸酸辣辣的，好好吃！

香辣田螺作为一道传统的下酒名菜，作为奖励倒也算是一个小惊喜。

香辣酥脆的酒鬼花生，无论是配上冰爽可口的啤酒，醇香柔绵的茅台，都是恰到好处的感觉。
The spicy and crunchy drunkard peanuts were perfect whether eaten with the cold and icy beer or the fragrant and mellow Maotai.
馥郁的酒香瞬间飘散开来，那是葡萄果香和陈酿木香的优雅结合，令原本有些沉闷的会场瞬间活了过来。
The rich liquor's aroma slowly spread out. It was a graceful marriage of the grape fruit's fragrance and aged wood's fragrance. It invigorated the initially dull venue immediately.
馥郁的醇香令人迷醉，葡萄的香味在橡木桶中发酵出了特殊的芳香，她是如此的独特，又如此的优雅，令先前的酒尽皆失色。

The rich fragrance was intoxicating. It was a unique fragrance that was created through the fermentation of the grape in a wooden barrel. It was this unique and elegant, making the wines that came before it lose their colors.
马车停下，洛拉打开车门，道：“公主，公爵大人，伊斯牛肉馆到了。”
The horse-drawn carriage stopped, and Lola opened the carriage's door. "Princess, Lord Duke, we have arrived at Iss Beef Restaurant."
马车向前行驶了一段路后停下。
The horse-drawn carriage stopped after moving forward for a short distance.

The horse-drawn carriage stopped in front of the biggest bookshops. Mag paid the coachman, and they alighted from the carriage.
马车在庄园外停下，麦格一家下车，便看到了几乎排满庄园外大道的马车。

马车很快来到城西，驶入荒凉的土楼巷，在巷子尽头停下。
The carriage soon reached the west of the city. It drove into a deserted alley among mud buildings and stopped at the end of the alley.
马车掉头在塞班酒馆门口停下，亚伯罕从马车上下来，先打量了一下这家看起来颇新的酒馆，目光很快被门口柱子上挂着的那个小铁笼所吸引，里边关着一盅酒，那诱人的酒香正是从那小盅散发出来的。

The horse-drawn carriage turned back, and stopped in front of the tavern. Abraham alighted from the horse-drawn carriage, and sized up this tavern that looked rather new. His gaze was quickly attracted by the small metal cage hanging on the pillar at the door. A cup of liquor was locked up in there. The enticing liquor's aroma came from that small cup.
马车驶出法克部落，很快消失在夜色中。
The horse-drawn carriage moved out of the Falk Tribe, and very quickly disappeared into the night.
骑士双手握剑，也是向着黑袍人发起了冲锋，同时发出示警求援。
The knight held his sword in both hands, and started rushing towards the man in a black robe. At the same time, he sent out a signal for help.
骑士双手握剑，向前一剑斩落，恐怖的剑气从剑上升腾而起，似乎能够撕裂一切。
The knight held his sword in both hands, and brandished it down. A horrifying sword projection rose from the sword, tearing everything in its path.
骑士面色一变，长剑想要反手，却被一样火热的东西戳中了后腰，猛然向前扑去。
The knight's expression changed. He wanted to retract his longsword, but was pierced by something fiery at the back of his waist. He suddenly fell forward.
高瘦中年人也只能无奈起身离去。
The tall and lean middle-aged man also resignedly left.
高等文明的存在果然不容小觑，竟然连他看见过克苏鲁都能够知晓，并且在一瞬间查探出安妮的身份。
The advanced civilization's being was indeed not to be underestimated. She even knew that he had met the Cthulhu before and found out about Annie in an instant.
高等文明终究是靠不住的，想要拯救诺兰大陆，还是只能靠他们自己。
The advanced civilization was undependable. They could depend on themselves to rescue the Norland Continent.
高级文明是否需要进食？他们的饮食习惯和口味又是如何的？这些都挺让他好奇的。
Did the advanced civilizaton need to eat? What were their eating habits and tastes? He was curious about all these.
鬼知道这段话，她拉着他排练了多少遍。
Only god knew how many times she had practised that speech with him.
魔法屏障已经被砍破，埃菲清楚那个可怕的暴徒马上就能进来。
The magical screen was already broken. Eiffie knew very well that scary assailant could enter very soon.
魔法师往身上拍了数张防护符，身形向后暴退的同时，高举手中的魔法棒，吟唱着魔法咒语。
The magic caster slapped a few protective talisments on himself. As he retreated rapidly, he raised his magic wand and chanted magic spells.
魔法师手里的魔法棒也化为了灰烬。
The magic caster's wands turned into dust too.
魔鬼现身极北冰原，并且集结了恐怖的亡灵军团的消息已经传出来两三天，各部落首领都有所耳闻。

The news of the devil showing itself at the snow plain in the extreme north and amassing a scary Army of the Dead had already been spreading for the past two days and the tribal leaders had heard of it.
魔鬼让诺兰大陆感到威胁，而身为洛斯帝国二皇子的乔修却向魔鬼出卖了灵魂，现在舆论将倒逼安德烈彻查此事，并且和乔修彻底割裂。

The devil made the Norland Continent feel threatened, yet the second prince of the Roth Empire, Josh, chose to sell his soul to the devil. The public opinion would force Andre to investigate this matter thoroughly and cut ties with Josh completely.
魔鬼，多么可怕的存在。
The devil was indeed a terrifying existence.
鲍里斯心中剧震，他如何也想不到破坏他计划的，竟然是麦格。
Boris was extremely shocked. He had never expected that it was Mag who thwarted his plans.
鲍里斯愣了愣，突然笑了起来，看着麦格表情有些狰狞道：“你想知道吗？放了我我就告诉你啊，不然你这辈子都不会知道，哈哈哈……嗝”

Boris was stunned for a minute before he suddenly burst out in laughter. He stared at Mag with a ferocious expression and said, "Do you want to know? Let me go and I'll tell you. Otherwise, you won't know for the rest of your life. Hahaha...burp."
鲍里斯的嘴角抽搐了一下，要不是碰上了麦格和埃菲，爆炸酒得的应该就是金奖了。
The corner of Boris's lips twitched. If it was not for Mag and Explosive Liquor, the Explosive Liquor would probably had won the gold award.
鲍里斯的尸体恰好滚到了街上。
Boris's corpse happened to roll onto the street.
鲍里斯的笑声戛然而止，捂着自己的喉咙，有些惊恐的看着，“你……你给我喂了什么？”
Boris's laughter ceased suddenly. He grasped his throat and glared at Mag with fear. "W-what did you feed me?"
鲍里斯的脸色快速发黑，用手扣着自己的喉咙，试图做最后无用的挣扎。
Boris's face turned dark rapidly. He used his finger to dig down his throat, attempting to struggle fruitlessly.
鲍里斯的表情依旧没有什么变化，向着埃菲微微点头致意，然后便转过身去。
Boris did not have much change in expression. He nodded to Eiffie and turned to leaves.
鲍里斯看着出现在楼梯口的麦格，眼睛一下子瞪大，眼中带着几分难以置信。
Boris saw Mag appear at the staircase and his eyes flicked open with disbelief.
鲍里斯看着麦格诚恳的说道：“哈迪斯先生是个耿直的人，其实我是想邀请你成为我的合伙人，我在洛都有十家大型酒馆，而麦格先生有着超高的酿酒技艺，如果我们能够合作的话，一定能够缔造一个酒界的传奇。”

Boris looked at Mag and said sincerely, "Mr. Hades, you're a straightforward person. Actually, I would like to invite you to a partnership with me. I have 1- large-scale taverns in Rodu and you have exceptional brewing technique. If we can work together, we would definitely be the legend in the world of liquor."
鲍里斯看着麦格，有些愣愣出神，似乎还么有从自己失败的阴影中走出来。
Boris looked at Mag in a daze. He couldn't seem to walk from the shadow of his failure.
鲍里斯瞪大了眼睛看着麦格，最后瞪了两下腿，彻底没了气息。
Boris stared at Mag with widened eyes. Finally, he twitched his legs twice and stopping breathing.
鲍里斯瞪眼。
Boris glared.
鲍里斯瞪眼趴在上，感觉自己遭受到了一万点伤害。
Boris slumped on the floor with widened eyes. He felt that he was hurt 10,000 points.
鲍里斯转身，看到了一个漂亮的女人和一个漂亮的小姑娘不知何时出现在阁楼上。
Boris turned around and saw a pretty woman and a pretty little girl appeared in the attic all of a sudden.
鲜美的汤汁，缓缓浸润味蕾，晞觉得自己的味蕾像是被细润的春雨滋润着，渐渐苏醒，那种被抚慰的感觉，实在是太美妙了。

The tasty broth slowly nourished the taste buds. Xi felt that her drowsy taste buds were slowly awakened as if they were being nourished by a spring rain. This sensation of being comforted felt so beautiful.
鲜！
Fresh!

The moment Mag closed the door, he met with Irina's smiling gaze.
麦格一出门，便看到了墙角潮湿处有三只小蜗牛挂着了。

麦格一出门，那三头怪蛇便已将他盯住。
That three-headed snake targeted Mag as soon as he left the tavern.

Mag sucked out five escargot at a go and had some spicy cucumber, then a sip of chilled beer.
麦格一时间竟是找不到拒绝的理由。

麦格一眼就看穿了艾米的小心思，笑着道：“楼下还有些下酒菜，你们两个小家伙要是饿了的话，可以再去吃一点。”
Mag could tell what Amy had in mind, and smilingly said, "We still have some leftover side dishes downstairs. If the two of you are hungry, you can go grab some."
麦格一脸惊讶，道：“这边可以娶八个老婆的吗？”
With a shocked expression, Mag asked, "You can marry eight wives here?"
麦格上前查看了一下那套看起来年代久远的蒸馏装置，很快便找到了埃菲酿的酒寡淡如水的原因。
Mag went up to chekc the old-looking distillation unit and quickly found the reason for Eiffie's wine being as tasteless as water.

麦格不信，依旧看着她。
Mag did not believe that was the reason and continued looking at her.
麦格不动声色的打量着波比，思考着一会他喝醉之后该怎么从他这里套些话出来。
Mag sized Bobby up silently, and thought of what he could get out of him after the man got drunk.
麦格不喜白酒，但在长辈的酒局上也喝过几次茅台，从香味来说，系统出品的茅台酒的确碾压了他在酒桌上喝过的，只是香味便勾起了几分酒虫。
Mag did not enjoy white wine, but he did have a few cups of Maotai before when drinking with seniors. Comparing the fragrance alone, the system's Maotai did thrash the ones that he had before.
麦格不在意她的紧身衣与这个世界如何格格不入，也不在意她看起来有多冷漠，他只在意虚空之门给出的反馈：
Mag didn't care that her bodysuit didn't fit into this world, nor did he care about how aloof she looked. He only cared about the feedback given by the ommipresent door:
麦格不是什么变态跟踪狂，世界太混乱，他只是担心伊丽莎白一个人在外面太危险，要是哪天像她爹一样一去不返，都不知道上哪找她去。

Mag was neither a pervert nor a stalker, but this world was too messed up. He was worried that Elizabeth would be in danger alone in the outside world. They wouldn't know where to look for her if she disappeared like her father one day.
麦格不是漫画家，但怎么说也是在各种漫画熏陶中长大的，欣赏能力还是在线的。

Mag didn't care who the hell the Holy Spirit was. He only knew that anyone who attempted to take Amy away from him was no good.

Mag and Rankster were almost at the climax of their battle. It was not something that they could take part or change.

麦格为那些客人们暗暗松了口气。
Mag secretly heaved a sigh of relief for the customers.
麦格主动打招呼，众街坊也是纷纷应和。
The neighbors all reciprocated since Mag took the initiative to greet them.
麦格也不知道这老板是如何让绿豆在绿豆酥中保持如此坚硬的状态，而在一道软糯的甜点之中，吃到坚硬的绿豆，的确是非常糟糕的体验。
Mag had no idea how the shop owner managed to make the mung beans in the mung bean pancake so hard. It was indeed the worst experience to bite into a hard mung bean in a soft pastry.
麦格也凑上前扫了几眼，任务千奇百怪，杀人的能占到三分之一，还有求购各种魔兽幼崽、精灵女仆、魅魔小姐、哥布林萝莉……

麦格也收到了许多街坊邻居的祝贺，对此他也是友好的表示感谢。
Mag had also received many congratulations from their neighbors and he also said thanks to them friendliness.
麦格也是不再言语，在一旁安静的站着。
Mag also stopped talking and watched at the side quietly.
麦格也是拿起勺子开动。
Mag picked up a spoon and started eating too.
麦格也是提剑后撤，这可是一艘高等文明的星空战舰的密集轰炸，他可不想被殃及池鱼。
Mag also backed off with his sword. This was the intense bombing by an advanced civilization's starship. He didn't want to get caught in between.
麦格也是有些意外的看着亚伯罕，没想到回到主场之后的亚伯罕，竟是如此的生猛霸道。
Mag looked at Abraham in shock. He did not expect Abraham, who was back in his place, to be so fierce and overbearing.
麦格也没有料到酒馆的人气增长会如此快，吃了晚餐，休息了一会，一开门，差点被门外站着的客人吓到。
Mag did not expect the popularity of the tavern to increase so quickly. After dinner, he rested for a while, and when he opened the door, he almost got a shock from the customers outside.
麦格也注意到这位进门来的客人，从熟悉的制服看得出这是一位兵部官员，不过职位不高，神情难掩疲惫，眼睛里布满了血丝，像是没有休息好。

Mag had also noticed this customer that entered. From the ever-so-familiar uniform, Mag could tell the other party was from the military. However, he did not have a high rank. The exhaustion in his face was apparent. His blood-shot eyes told everyone that he did not seem to have had proper rest.
麦格从冰箱里拿出各种食材，这才注意到切菜台上一道贯穿的切口。
Only after Mag took out all sorts of ingredients from the fridge did he see the slash on the cutting table.
麦格从怀中掏出了一块黑色的令牌，直接丢了过去。
Mag pulled out a black tablet from his pocket and threw it over.
麦格从柜台后拎出公告牌，刷刷写了一个歇业公告。
Mag took out the notice board from the back of the counter, and wrote a notice of a business break.
麦格从系统那里弄了一台电焊工具，将这套蒸馏设备的零件全部焊接起来，又给他们涂抹了一层防腐层。
Mag got some welding tools from the System and welded the parts for the distillation equipment together. After that, he painted a layer of anti-corrosion paint on it.
麦格从隐秘树洞获取了今日份的密报，然后稍加修改，添油加醋一番后，用百变面具换了一张脸，将这最新情报转手卖给了洛都城内的几家有偿情报所，同时给各家茶楼的说书先生们免费送了一份。

Mag got today's intel from the secret tree hole. He altered it a little and embellished it a little. He then changed his appearance with the face-altering mask, and sold this latest intel to the few information centers in Rodu. At the same time, he gave a free copy to all the storytellers in the teahouses.
麦格他们从教堂里出来，便看到手里拿着一堆好吃的的艾米和安妮坐在教堂前的秋千上，伊琳娜站在不远处，玛拉则在旁边守着两个孩子。

Mag saw Amy, who was holding a ton of goodies, and Annie sitting on the swing in front of the church as soon as soon as he walked out of the church. Irina was standing closeby, while Mala was guarding the children at the side.
麦格他们出门不算早，书坊里的书店大都已经开门，此时这家规模中等的书店里已经有不少客人。
Mag and his family went out rather late, so most of the bookshops in the book square were already open. This middle-sized bookshop already had many customers in it.
麦格他们深夜造访，大殿中灯火通明，却只有安德烈坐在主位之上。
Mag's night visit caused the hall to be brightly lit. However, there was only Andre sitting on the master seat.
麦格伸手在床头的衣服口袋里摸了个空，才想起来自己已经好久不抽烟了，不禁有点遗憾。

Mag reached over to the shirt at the bedside table and fumbled around in the pocket in vain. He sudenly recalled that he had not been smoking for a very long time and could not help but found it a pity.
麦格伸手在艾米面前晃了晃，笑着道：“小米发呆想什么呢？”
Mag waved his hand in front of Amy and smilingly, "What is Amy thinking in a daze?"
麦格伸手拉住了他，因为伊琳娜开始吟唱治疗魔法的咒语。
Mag held Noya back because Irina had started chanting her healing magic spells.
麦格伸手拦了一辆马车，一家四口上了马车，直奔洛都最热闹的商业中心塔克坊市而去。
Mag reached out to hail a horse-drawn carriage. The family of four hopped on, and headed straight for Rodu's busiest commercial center, Tuck Square.
麦格作为问话小能手，这种机会怎么能放过，自来熟的凑上前，在他们那桌坐下。

麦格侧头看向伊琳娜。

麦格侧头，看着出现在楼梯口的安妮，心中一突，暗道糟糕。

麦格倒不是特别介意别人自带米饭，毕竟温妮莎这妮子还没到喝酒的年纪，而且这种烈酒也不适合她吃。
Mag did not mind others bringing their own rice over. After all, Vanessa had not reached the legal age to drink, and such strong alcohol was not suitable for her, either.
麦格倒是不太担心吃不完的问题，这里至少有一半会进艾米的肚子。

麦格做了一桌丰盛的早餐，特意给自己盛了一大碗豆浆。
Mag made a table full of scrumptious breakfast. He specially scooped a big bowl of soybean milk for himself.
麦格做了条烤鱼，然后炒了几个菜，最后再上了两盘爆炒螺丝，一桌菜便有了。
Mag made a grilled fish and stir-fried a few dishes. Lastly, he served two plates of stir-fried escargots and all the dishes were ready.
麦格关上窗户，重新拿了一本《绿野仙踪》联系飞行。
Mag closed the window and picked up "The Traces in the Fields"[2. Its Chinese name is exactly the same as "The Wizard of Oz".] to practice flying.
麦格关上酒馆大门的时候，打了个喷嚏。
When Mag was closing the door of the tavern, he sneezed.
麦格关上门，结束了一天的营业。

麦格关了门外的灯，正准备上楼，一转身却发现伊琳娜和两个小家伙整整齐齐的坐在一张桌子后看着他。

麦格关了门，有点好奇的看着伊琳娜。

Mag shook his head slightly, indicating that he, too, was not very clear what that man was doing. However, it seemed like he was not waiting for a living person.
麦格微微摇头：“不，这是我将他重新封印的能力。”
Mag shook his head slightly. "No. This is the power that I resealed him with."
麦格微微点头，对于这个评审团的专业程度倒是有了几分认可。
Mag nodded slightly. He was rather convinced by with this panel of judges' professionalism.
麦格微微点头，情况和他想的果然一样，“既然如此，那就开始找他吧，或许他现在还在洛都。”
Mag nodded slightly. It was exactly as he thought. "In that case, let's start looking for him. Perhaps he's still in Rodu."
麦格微微点头，道：“看来基本可以确定是乔修做的了，混乱之城方面现在正在清查兵部，他应该越过了安德烈发动了这场战争，只为了吸收这些被无辜屠戮的人的怨气。”

Mag nodded slightly, and said, "Seems like we are basically sure that it was Josh who did this. Chaos City is investigating the ministry of defense right now. He should have gone over Andre to start this war so that he could absorb the resentment of those innocent people who were massacred."
麦格微微点头，重新坐下。
Mag nodded and sat down again.
麦格微微皱眉，感觉他好像两句话骂了两个人？
Mag frowned a little. He felt that the man was scolding two people.
麦格微笑着点头，差点忘了这茬。
Mag nodded with a smile. He almost forgot about that.
麦格微笑着目送四位大汉进门来，将亚伯罕抬出门去。
Mag watched with a smile as four big men came in to bring Abraham out.
麦格微笑着看着和孩子们玩耍的艾米，谁又知道她曾经也是他们中的一员呢，这样的事情，他决不允许再发生了。
Mag watched Amy playing with the children with a smile. Who could have thought that she was once one of them. He would never let that happen again.
麦格微笑着看着埃菲：“这么说，你应该会相信吧。”
Mag looked at Eiffie with a smile and said, "If I said that, you would believe me, right?"
麦格微笑着继续给孩子们烤串，发放的事情交给工作人员，他就能更好的烹饪食物。
Mag continued to grill the kebabs for the children. Leaving the distribution to the staff members allowed him to focus on cooking the food.
麦格微笑着道：“没准备什么礼物，这枚戒指是前些天我和艾米他们一起亲手锻造的，可能不是很漂亮，算是我的一点心意，希望看到戒指的时候，你能想到我们。”

Mag smilingly said, "I didn't prepare any gifts. I made this ring personally with Amy and the rest a few days ago. It's not very pretty, but it's a token of my well-wishes. I hope you will think of us when you see this ring."
麦格微笑道：“因为美人鱼没有吃过猪肉，也没有见过猪跑，所以吃到红烧肉的时候惊为天人，爱上了小王子。”
Mag smilingly answered, "Because the mermaid has never eaten pork, nor seen a pig run before, so she was amazed when she ate the red braised pork, and fell in love with the little prince."
麦格微笑道：“我会给你画好酒坊的设计图纸，蒸馏设备的图纸我也会给你画出来，你可以找几家不同的铁匠铺打制零件，到时候我来拼装。”

Mag smilingly said, "I will draw the brewery's design and the distillation equipment's blueprints for you. You can get a few blacksmiths to build the spare parts and I will come to assemble them for you."
麦格心情有些沉重，晞加上古老者最先进的战舰，依旧无法杀死克苏鲁，这不是什么好消息。
Mag felt a dread. Xi and the Elder Things' advanced battleship were still unable to kill Cthulhu. This wasn't a good news.
麦格心情有些沉重，没有想到只是来查探一个冰窟，竟然就遇上了克苏鲁。
Mag was feeling grave. He didn't expect to meet Cthulhu when checking out an ice cave.
麦格心里松了口气。
Mag heaved a breath of relief inwardly.
麦格心里清楚他们早晚会来，只是没想到来的这么快。
Mag knew very well that they would come sooner or later, but he never expected them to come so soon.
麦格心里顿时暖暖的，这就是信任啊。
Mag felt a warm feeling in his heart instantly. This was trust.
麦格恍然，不是系统骗他，而是他先入为主的认为先前那只牛蜗就是目标。
Mag finally realized that. The system didn't lie to him. It was him who thought that earlier snail was the target.
麦格悲惨沦为抱猫使者，一手提着三个女人买的各种东西，一手搂着一只国宝，跟在三人身后。
Mag became the cat-carrier. He carried all three women's shopping in one hand and the national treasure in the other as he followed after them.
麦格想借助安妮为他扩大影响力的同时，也给了安妮的漫画一个强大的内核。
While Mag was trying to expand his influence with Annie's help, at the same time, he had also given a powerful core to Annie's comic.
麦格感应到阿紫的气息，登上楼顶，便看到了俯冲下来的阿紫，以及趴伏在它身上的伊琳娜。
Mag could sense Ah Zi's aura. He saw Ah Zi dashing down with Irina on its back as soon as he got to the rooftop.
麦格感觉自己就像是在和一个没有感情的杀手在谈话，机械的交流，不掺杂一点情绪。
Mag felt as though he was talking to an assassin without any emotions. The interaction was mechanical without any hint of emotions.
麦格感觉自己还是错付了。
Mag felt he was still wrong eventually.
麦格愣是没有问出一句话来。
Mag didn't get to ask any questions.
麦格手执天都剑破冰而出。
Mag pierced through the ice with Tian Du sword in his hand.
麦格手握胖头鱼，立于眉间，神情庄重。
Mag held the fat head fish and placed it between his eyes solemnly.
麦格手起刀落，动如惊雷，菜刀落下的瞬间，手腕一翻，改劈为拍，在落到砧板的前一瞬间骤然减速，然后在那黄瓜上轻轻一拍。

Mag lifted the cleaver and moved as fast as lightning. The moment the cleaver landed. He rotated his wrist and instead of chopping, he smacked. Before the cleaver reached the chopping board, he slowed down suddenly to pat on the cucmber gently.
麦格手里的动作顿时一僵，缓缓转过身看向门口，身体微微前倾，保持着最佳的拔剑姿态。
Mag paused in his actions and turned slowly to look at the door. He leaned his body slightly forward, maintaining the best posture to pull his sword out.
麦格打了个哈欠，他也有些犯困了，侧头一看，目光落到了一旁工作人员手里端着的圆润酒瓶，眼睛一亮，顿时来了精神。
Mag yawned. He was also tired as well. He turned aside and his gaze landed on the rotund bottle that the staff member was carrying. He became energetic instantly.
麦格打开冰激凌机，四种口味任选，开始给孩子们发放冰激凌。
Mag turned on the ice cream machine, which had four choices, and began distributing the ice cream to the children.
麦格打开食盒，取出了三碗加了各种菜的糊糊，面上撒了几颗绿色的葱花，看起来倒是挺不错的。
Mag opened the lunchbox and took ut three bowls of soup with various vegetables in it. There were some chopped green onions garnishing it and it looked rather delicious.
麦格托着下巴思考了一会，突然问道：“我突然很好奇天道究竟是什么？究竟是什么样的存在？为什么要创造出系统，并且分发到各个世界？”

Mag propped his head on his hand and thought for a while. Suddenly, he asked, "I am suddenly curious about what God is? What kind of existence is it? Why did it create the System and send them out to various worlds?"
麦格扫了一眼目录，翻到了位于中间的第二篇文章，跳过自己写的菜谱，果然看到了那副非常有二次元感的画像。
Mag skimmed through the content page, and he flipped to the second in the middle of the magazine. He skipped over his recipe, and indeed saw that very cartoonish drawing.
麦格扫视了一圈，看着正准备给他介绍的费奇说道：“就这家吧，把屋主叫来谈谈价格。”
Mag scanned around before turning to Fitch, who was about to continue his recommendation, and said, "This one will do. Get the owner here to discuss the price."
麦格扶着腰从床上坐起身来，看了一眼身旁还在睡梦中，一脸餍足的美人儿，脸上也是不由的露出了几分的得意的笑容。
Mag sat up on the bed with a hand on his back. He glanced at the sated-looking beauty who was still sleeping at his side and he couldn't help but smile smugly too.
麦格把两个烤架的炭火都点上，考虑到孩子们都刚吃了午饭不久，所以这炭火慢慢燃烧了半个小时，他才打开保险食材箱，拿出两大把牛肉串和羊肉串放上烤架，然后熟练的烤制起来。

Mag lit the charcoal up for the grills. Considering the fact that the children had just eaten not long ago, he took 30 minutes to light up the fire before opening the ingredient's crate. He took out two sets of mutton kebabs and beef kebabs, and began to grill them skillfully.
麦格把手里剩下的半个绿豆酥塞进嘴里，提着袋子不紧不慢的绕着将军府转了一圈，然后重新进了美食街，找到了伊琳娜和两个孩子。

Mag placed the other half of the remaining mung bean pancake into his mouth, and went around the general mansion leisurely while carrying his bag of pancakes. After that, he returned to the food street to look for Irina and the two children.
麦格把手里的封条往地上一丢。
Mag threw the seal onto the floor.
麦格把手里的蛋黄酥拿起咬了一口，那种将各方面做到极致，满满匠心制作出来的蛋黄酥，果然好吃到令猛男流泪。
Mag picked up the salted egg yolk pastry, and took a bite. This salted egg yolk pastry that was perfectly done in every aspect was indeed so scrumptious that it could make a grown man weep.
麦格把托盘放在小板凳上，托盘里有一盘酒鬼花生，还有半瓶刚刚那群人喝剩下的小半瓶茅台酒，因为人数太多，麦格不知道给谁打包好，就只能这样处理掉了。

Mag placed the tray on the little stool. On the tray was a plate of drunkard peanuts and slightly less than half a bottle of Maotai left behind by the group just now. Because there were too many of them, Mag didn't know whom to pass it to, so he decided to settle it this way.
麦格把灌汤包拿了过来。
Mag brought the soup dumplings over.
麦格把玩弄的差不多的绿野仙踪放回到书架最上层，这才出门下楼。
Mag placed the "The Traces in the Fields" back to the topmost level of the bookshelf after he was done playing with it. Then, he went downstairs.
麦格把盘子和碗放进洗碗机，清洗完成后碗柜会自动将碗碟送入碗柜。
Mag placed the plates and bowls in the dishwasher. The dishwasher would convey the dishes back to the dishes' cabinet after they were cleaned.
麦格把诺亚准备铺的破棉被踢开，从系统那里给他们买了两套新棉被，帮助他铺上后，看着他把梅兰特轻轻放在床上。

Mag kicked away the torn blankets that Noya was about to lay out. He bought two new sets of bedsheets from the system, and helped Noya lay them out. After that, Mag watched Noya place Merante gently on the bed.
麦格把诺亚和梅兰特带回了洛都，依旧安置在之前的那栋房子里。
Mag brought Noya and Merante back to Rodu, back to that house they stayed at.
麦格把那张纸收起，把伪装收了，处了巷子拦了一辆马车，直奔城西土楼巷。
Mag kept the paper, kept his disguise, and stopped a horse-drawn carriage at the alley. He went straight to Tulou alley at the west of the city.
麦格把钱袋在手里颠了颠，随手系在腰间，但依旧站在原地没动，而是笑吟吟的看着那黑袍人道：“我很好奇，究竟是哪位老板肯花这么多钱让我们绑这个女人。”

Mag weighed the money bag in his hands before attaching it to his waist, but he was still standing there and smilingly saying to that man in black robe, "I'm very curious. Who is the person that is willing to spend so much money to abduct this woman?"
麦格把门从里边反锁上，看着怀里抱着一个刚从许愿井里提取的零食大礼包的艾米和安妮说道。
Mag locked the door from the inside and said to Annie and Amy, who had just returned from the wishing well with the snack gift package.
麦格把门反锁上，动作有点僵硬的转身，看着伊琳娜挤出一点笑容：“这邻居还挺好客……”
Mag locked the door from the inside, and turned stiffly. He squeezed out a smile as he looked at Irina, and said, "This neighbor is rather friendly…"
麦格把门重新关上，被盯着看的有些不太自在，露出了职业微笑，“姑娘需要喝点什么？”
Mag closed the door again. He felt quite uncomfortable being stared at. He showed a professional smile. "What would you like to drink, Miss?"
麦格抓了一把花生，当一个合格的吃瓜群众。
Mag grabbed a handful of peanuts, and became a qualified audience.
麦格抓起那擀面杖，口中轻声念道：“小、小、小……”
Mag grabbed that roller pin, and chanted softly, "Small, small, small…"
麦格抛了抛手中的银币，看着那老管家坐上马车离去，转身进了酒馆。
Mag tossed the silver coin into the air as he watched the butler leave in a horse-drawn carriage before going back into the tavern.
麦格抬眼，认出了波比，而从他稍稍谦卑的态度来看，跟在他身后进门来的那位中年男人，官职要比他大不少。
Mag looked up and recognized Bobby straight away. From Bobby's humble attitude, Mag could tell right away that the middle-aged man that came in after Bobby was way higher in rank.
麦格抱着伊琳娜下楼，轻轻放到了床上。
Mag carried Irina downstairs, and placed her gently on the bed.
麦格拔开瓶塞，然后在两个酒杯里倒上酒。
Mag pulled out the cork, and poured it into two glasses.
麦格拦了一辆马车，和车夫说了一声，直奔城西书坊。
Mag hailed a horse-drawn carriage. He gave the coachman instructions, and they headed straight for the books square in the west of the city.
麦格拿着奖杯来到秋千前。
Mag went to the swing with the trophy.
麦格拿着特制的小酒盅出门，手里还拿着一个铁制的小笼子，将小酒盅放在笼子里，挂上一把小锁，这才把它挂在门口的柱子上。
Mag took the specially made liquor holder out with a small iron cage. He placed the little liquor holder into the cage, and put on a small lock before hanging it on the pillar in front of the door.
麦格挑眉，这场面，就像是一群黄铜无畏的冲向王者，令人肃然起敬。
Mag raised his eyebrows. This scene was equivalent to a bunch of noobs rushing towards a king. It was admirable.
麦格挤出了一点勉强的笑容，无懈可击的答复。
Mag made a forced smile. It was an impeccable answer.
麦格掀开车帘走了出来，看着面前崭新的绿色房子和画满了图画的围墙，脸上露出了笑容。
Mag flipped the carriage's covers, and walked out. Looking at the brand-new green house and walls that were covered in drawings, a smile appeared on Mag's face.
麦格接着去了一趟纺织厂，见了艾许莉。
Next, Mag went to the textile factory and met up with Ashley.
麦格接过画册翻开，里边果然是美人鱼的故事。
Mag took the picture book, and flipped it open. It was indeed the story of "The Little Mermaid."
麦格推断道：“我推测那可能是一个更高等级的文明，他们有着更强大的实力和武器，但他们选择隐藏起来，没有在诺兰大陆上现身，甚至在所有典籍上都找不到他们的踪迹。”

Mag speculated, "I think it might be an even more advanced civilization. They are even more powerful and have better weapons. However, they chose to hide and did not appear in the Norland Continent. We coul dnot even find traces of them in the classical books."
麦格提着一个菜篮子从菜市回来的时候，‘偶遇’了已经跟了他三条街的埃菲。
When Mag returned from the market with a basket, he "bumped" into Eiffie who had been following him for three blocks.
麦格提着剑站起身来，看着那熟悉的面孔，神情有些复杂。
Mag stood up with his sword in his hand, looking at that familiar face with mixed feelings.
麦格提着食盒进门，一边随口道：“对了，今天许愿井要是灵验的话，就让它送我们一台车吧，最好是全地形的那种，这样买菜就方便了。”

Mag brought the lunchbox in and said, "Oh, right, if the wishing well works, let's make it give us a vehicle, best if it's an all-terrain vehicle. That way, it would be more convenient for grocery shopping."
麦格搀着伊琳娜下楼来，诺亚快步上前。
When Mag and Irina arrived, Noya quickly went up to them.
麦格摇头道：“不，是一个从地底深处挖出来的破旧装备仓，里边有少量的机械和一些零散的书本，其中包括那台印刷机。”
Mag shook his head, "No. I got it from an old equipment bay that I dug out deep underground. There was some machinery and books in it, including that printing machine."
麦格摇头，表情肃然道：“我不会将她的任何东西交给你们，也希望你们不要试图打她的主意，否则，就算是神，我也杀给你看。”
Mag shook his head and solemnly said, "I won't hand any part of her to you and I hope you guys will stop having designs on her. Otherwise, I will kill you even if you are a God."
麦格摸了摸她的小脑袋道：“这次不行，那个坏蛋很危险，等艾米再长大一些，变得更强大了，就可以去了。”
Mag caressed her head and said, "Not this time. This bad egg is very dangerous. Amy can go when you are older and stronger."
麦格撇了撇嘴，手里的菜刀晃了晃，思索着这家酒馆还要不要。
Mag pressed his lips together. He swung the cleaver in his hand, and decided that he would not want this tavern anymore.
麦格收了两个水杯，准备去研究一下酿酒，门外又响起了铃铛声。
Mag kept the two water glasses, and was going to go study up on the brewing when the doorbell rang again.
麦格收回目光，径直走向一旁的任务兑换厅。
Mag looked away and went to the mission exchange hall at the side.
麦格收回脚，有些鄙夷的看着惨叫的巨汉。
Mag retracted his foot and looked at the crying man in despise.
麦格收回脚，转身看着来人。
Mag retracted his leg and turned to look at the person.
麦格放下了手里的古籍，问道：“这代表着什么？”
Mag placed the ancient book downa nd asked, "What does this mean?"
麦格放下手中还剩下小半杯的酒，看着诺亚道：“明早过来吃早餐，事情明天再谈。”
Mag put down his Maotai, which still had half of a small cup left, and said to Noah, "Come and have breakfast tomorrow morning. We'll talk about it tomorrow."
麦格放下手里的书，表情略显不自然。
Mag put his book down with an unnatural expression.
麦格放下画册，看着安妮沉吟道：“不过，要是中间能够再加入一个小王子给小美人鱼做菜的环节就好了，这样就可以解释为什么小美人鱼会爱上小王子，并且爱的如此深刻的问题。”

Mag put down the picture book, and lamented to Annie, "However, if only we could add a scene whereby the prince cooks for the little mermaid, it would then explain why the little mermaid fell in love with the prince and why she loves him so much."
麦格放下酒杯，说道：“酒味寡淡，适口性极差，香味混乱，而且很快便消散，没有回味。”
Mag placed the glass down and said, "The wine is tasteless and had a very distorted fragrance which disappeared quickly and there was no lingering taste."
麦格无意多干涉埃菲的生活，看着伊琳娜微笑着问道：“品酒大会的重头戏已经结束了，一会还有一场宴席，我们是吃了回去，还是回去吃？”

Mag didn't want to interfere in Eiffie's life. He turned back and smilingly asked Irina, "The highlight of the liquor tasting event was already over. There's a banquet afterwards. Shall we go for our meals, or return home for our meals?"
麦格昂首挺胸，嘴角挂着一丝成功人士的笑容。
Mag puffed out his chest with a successful man's smile on his face.
麦格最后一把烤肉串给了工作人员们，也算是对他们的帮忙表示感谢。
Mag gave the last kebabs to the staff members as a gesture of appreciation for their help.
麦格最终还会成功买到了四本杂志，也算是为自己应援了一波。
Eventually, Mag managed to buy four magazines. It was also considered as supporting himself.
麦格最近没别的爱好，就喜欢在客人喝醉之后凑上去和他们瞎聊几句，比如昨天晚上刚被他们弄死的布卢姆，比如最近官场的大人们心情如何，对乔修有什么看法啊。

Recently, Mag did not have any hobbies other than listening to drunk customers and chatting with them. For example, about Blum, who was killed by him and Irina, or about how the courtiers were feeling recently and what they thought of Josh.
麦格有些兴奋，感觉自己好像即将接触到这个世界的本质，就像当年麦哲伦证明世界是圆的时候一样。
Mag was getting a little excited. He felt that he seemed to have touched the essence of this world, just like how Ferdinand Magellan proved that the world was round.
麦格有些失望。
Mag was slightly disappointed.
麦格有点心虚，不过看着相对而坐的两人，气氛好像比他预想中的更和谐一点。
Mag felt a little guilty, but the ambiance between the two people sitting across from each other seemed better than he had anticipated.
麦格有点惊讶的低头看了一眼伊琳娜挽着自己的手，这宣示主权的小动作，还挺可爱。
Mag looked down on Irina's arm wrapped around his in shock. This little move of proclaimation was rather cute.
麦格有点惊讶道：“哦？小米还做了这样有趣的梦呢，那笑话大王和你说了什么好笑的笑话呢。”
Mag said with surprise, "Oh? Little Amy had such a funny dream. What funny jokes did that king of jokes told you?"
麦格有点无辜，他只是实事求是而已。
Mag was rather innocent. He was only stating facts.

麦格没有在酒馆里呆太久，主要是和系统讨论酒馆装修的问题，一百五十平左右的小酒馆，相比于餐厅并不需要过大的厨房，酒窖也可以放在二楼，倒也能够容纳不少客人了。

麦格没有急着上楼，他今晚也有许多事情要做。

Mag wasn't in a hurry to leave. Instead, he prepared a sumptuous breakfast, and announced the news of the restaurant's one-month break after everyone arrived.

Mag made an inventory of Eiffie's cellars. There were a total of 12 cellars and they were differentiated by their time. Every cellar held about 300 barrels.

Mag walked between the two grills. Both sets of mutton kebabs and beef kebabs were completed at the same time, and were placed on two long metal plates.

麦格点了点头：“或许我该找时间去一趟洛都了，时间拖得越久，他只会变得越强，等到他被旧日支配者彻底代替的时候，恐怕为时已晚了。”

麦格点点头，也是多看了几眼鲍里斯。

麦格特意选了一家还算热闹的书店，就是想看看食全食美的知名度，是否真有那两个家伙吹嘘的那么强。
Mag deliberately chose a bookshop that was rather boisterous so that he could see for himself if the Perfect Food was indeed as popular as those two chaps said.
麦格用了半小时的时间，向费奇转达了系统设计的罗莫街商业分布和组成，以及让费奇吃惊的租金价格。
Mag used 30 minutes to convey to Fitch the distribution and composition of businesses that the system designed and the rental that shocked Fitch.
麦格用筷子夹起一只灌汤包，原本扁圆的灌汤包一提起就变成了灯笼般圆润的模样，汤汁满满，却没有爆开。
Mag picked up a soup dumpling with a pair of chopsticks. The flat soup dumpling immediately became round like a lantern. The soup filled the dumpling up but it did not explode.

麦格略一思索道：“两种可能，一是海伦娜已经意识到自己的政策和方向错误，打算痛改前非，从此做一个好人，并将政策逐渐扭转。

麦格略一思索道：“完全随机的目标，更能制造恐慌，以及让对手陷入毫无头绪的调查。”

麦格略一迟疑道：“他是我的一位朋友，如果你找到他的话，哪怕是最糟糕的情况，也希望能够让我再见他一面。”
After a brief interaction, Mag said, "He's a friend of mine. If you found him, I hope I can meet him even if it's the worst situation.
麦格的厨神之路，也是蹭蹭连升两级。
Mag's path to become the God of Cookery had also risen by two levels.
麦格的声音有些冷，心也有些冷。

麦格的表情顿时僵住，他刚刚才信誓旦旦的说后院的蜗牛绝对不能吃，现在却要带艾米去后院找能够食用的蜗牛吗？
Mag's expression froze on his face. He'd just said that the snails in the back yard were absolutuely inedible earlier and now he had to bring Amy to go look for edible snails in the back yard?

麦格眉梢一挑，顿时多了几分紧张。

Mag looked at the dragon coins and gold coins scattered on the floor and went forward with a smile. He stepped on that big guy's hand that was grabbing the axe's handle again.

麦格看了一眼那堆成小山一般的大肥鹅，一只差不多有十斤重了，这可是三百多斤的鹅，而且还是活的。
Mag flicked a glance at the big, fat geese that piled up at the side. Every goose was about five kilograms heavy, so there were about 150 kg of geese here. Furthermore, they were alive.

麦格看得出费奇的想法，但对方态度友好，业务能力也不差，也就值得合作，其他的想法根本没有被他放在心上。

Mag looked at the empty empty map.

麦格看着伊丽莎白，人是他从龙岛救回来的，进入餐厅工作算是意外，但这段时间的相处，每天一起吃饭工作，感情肯定是有一些的。

Mag frowned when he saw the two mini motorcycles parked at the backyard.

麦格看着埃菲受伤的表情，也意识到自己好像不小心暴露了本性，连忙安慰道：“当然，可能罗莫街上的其他酒馆的酒比这更差。”

Miss saw the seriousness in Eiffie's pleading eyes and hesitated. In the end, he nodded and said, "Actually, I'm not very knowledgeable about wine brewing but if you trust me, I can give it a try."

麦格看着埃菲，真诚道：“这是令人觉得不可思议的美酒，酒味醇和，口感甘冽，酒香浓郁且迷人，喝下之后，唇齿留香，令人迷醉。”

麦格看着城楼上那位身披铠甲的将军，高声道：“多米尼克元帅，我有要事见安德烈国王，事关诺兰大陆安危，请代为转告。”
Marshal looked at the armored general at the city wall and said loudly, "Marshal Dominic, I need to see King Andre. This concerns the Norland Continent's safety. Please pass the message to him."
麦格看着外边越来越多的客人，眉头微皱，吐槽道：“看来我们酒馆也该招员工了，不然客人都招待不过来了，以后咱们走了，也得找个人把酒馆经营下去才行。”

Mag looked at the increasing number of customers outside and said with a frown, "It looks like our tavern should start hiring service staff. Otherwise, we won't be able to cope with the number of customers. In the future, when we leave, we also have to find someone to operate the tavern."
麦格看着天边渐渐明亮的鱼肚白，寻觅了整整一夜，还是没有能够找到乔修，这家伙的反侦察能力是最让人头疼的。
Mag saw the sky slowly turning bright at the horizon. They still couldn't find Josh after searching for the whole night. This fellow's anti-detection ability was giving them a headache.
麦格看着她不服输的目光，迟疑了一下，还是重新坐下。
Mag saw her perseverence, hesitated for a while, and sat back down.
麦格看着她就着酒鬼花生，喝完了一整瓶的茅台酒，然后没事人一般淡定的打开了那瓶威士忌。
Mag watched her finish the whole bottle of Maotai with the drunkard peanuts and then open that bottle of whiskey calmly as if she wasn't affected.
麦格看着她，有些嘲讽的笑了笑：“你说是就是？那我说你们教皇是被厨神选中的人，是我麦米餐厅圣子，让他来我餐厅上菜吧，好好干，他将成为下一任店长。”

Mag looked at him, and mockingly laughed. "Why should I believe your words? What if I say that your pope is the one chosen by the God of Cookery, and is the holy child of my Mamy Restaurant, so it's best for him to come and serve dishes in my restaurant, and he will be the next manager if he does the job well?"
麦格看着她，笑着指了指她的嘴角，“有颗粥。”
Mag looked at her and smiled as he pointed to the corner of her lips. "Porridge."
麦格看着小家伙眼中闪烁的微光，心中不禁有些触动。
Mag looked at the gleam glittering in the little one's eyes, and couldn't help feeling touched.
麦格看着屋子里已经清点出来的三十多个亿的现金和钱票，有些感慨道。
Mag looked at the three billion worth of cash in the house that was being counted and lamented to himself.
麦格看着希利，思索了一会，还是让开了门，道：“进来吧。”
Mag looked at Seely, and pondered for a moment before he opened the door, and said, "Come in."
麦格看着情绪有点低落的艾米，心里却觉得暖暖的，有些感动。
Mag looked at Amy, who seemed a little dejected, and felt a warm feeling in his heart.
麦格看着手中的银色戒指，上面刻着一串神秘的符文，触感冰凉，看不出什么蹊跷。
Mag looked at the silver ring in his hand. A line of mysterious runes was engraved on it. It felt cold to the touch. Nothing unusual could be seen.
麦格看着晞。
Mag looked at Xi.
麦格看着晞的虚拟屏，点点头道：“只要能够确定他的位置，封印阵法能够解决，如何将其重新封印也能想办法。
Mag looked at Xi's virtual screen and nodded. "As long as we can locate him, we can resolve it with the seal spell formation. We can also think of a solution to reseal it.
麦格看着晞道：“我身上的气息可以留着，但前提是你帮忙隐藏安妮的气息，否则我无法保证下次在你赶到之前，还能收到它的魂魄。”
Mag said to Xi, "You can keep the aura on me, but the premise is you have to help conceal the aura on Annie. Otherwise, I can't promise you can still keep its soul after you arrive next there."
麦格看着有些紧张的埃菲和玛拉，连忙笑着摇头道：“不要误会，我是说，我们可以导演一场戏，亲自去会会那个幕后黑手。当然，酒馆是不能烧的，酒窖也不能毁掉。”

Mag looked at the nervous Eiffie and Mala and quickly shook his head. He said with a smile, "Don;t misunderstand me. What I'm saying is we can put up a show to meet that mastermind. Of course, we can't burn the tavern or the cellar."
麦格看着瘫在他怀里的埃菲，脖子有些僵硬，已经感受到了来自身后的冰冷杀气。
Mag looked at Eiffie, who was in his embrace, and his neck turned stiff. He could already feel the cold murderous intent from behind him.
麦格看着目光猩红的兰克斯特，一边招架，一边用余光扫视着天空。
Mag looked at Rankster with his blood-red eyes and while he blocked the attacks, he glanced across the sky.
麦格看着砧板上那布满裂纹的黄瓜，满意的点了点头，然后用刀将他们切成小段。
Mag nodded as he looked at the cracked cucumber on the shopping board. After that, he cut them into small pieces.
麦格看着绿豆都能玩的兴致勃勃的三个小家伙，笑着摇了摇头，取了一个大盆，盛了半盆绿豆，然后直接加水开始浸泡。

Mag looked at the three little fellows who could have so much fun with mung beans, and smiled as he shook his head. He took out a big pot, and filled half of it with mung beans. After that, he added water into the pot to soak the beans.
麦格看着艾米湛蓝色大眼睛扑闪扑闪的可爱模样，心里只剩下一个念头：“答应她！”
Mag looked int Amy's azure blue eyes blinking adorably at him and ther was only one thought in his head: "Say yes!"
麦格看着艾米脸上一如初见时干净的笑容，眼里那份期待让他不忍拒绝，稍稍迟疑，还是拿起勺子舀了一勺黑不溜秋的炒饭喂到嘴里。

Mag looked at the pure smile on Amy's face. Seeing the expectations in her eyes, he simply couldn't reject her. After a brief hesitation, he still picked up the spoon and fed himself a mouthful of that black fried rice.
麦格看着艾米，眉头微皱，又是很快舒展开来，他知道了，小家伙一定是收到了新的系统任务，而且肯定是和找可食用的蜗牛有关。
Mag looked at Amy with furrowed brows. Then, he quickly unfurrowed his brows. He got it. The little one must have received a new system's mission and it must be related to finding edible snails.
麦格看着艾米，笑着道：“小米同学，那么今天就有我们来接待来酒馆的客人们了。”
Mag looked at Amy, and smilingly said, "Little Amy, let us serve the customers that come to the tavern today."
麦格看着艾米，道：“今天，我们去逛城西的书坊吧，听说那里是诺兰大陆规模最大的书坊，大大小小的书店无数，只要用心去淘，什么书都能找到。”

Mag looked at Amy, and said, "Let's go to the book square in the west of the city today. I heard it's the biggest book square on the Norland Continent, with countless big and small bookshops. We can find any books if we look hard enough."
麦格看着被圣光烤的龇牙咧嘴的梅兰特，同样眼皮狂跳了几下，看了眼醉意未散的伊琳娜，想着这会不会变成一场惨烈的医疗事故。

Mag watched as Merante was roasted in the Holy Light, and his eyelids twitched frantically. He glanced at Irina, who seemed rather drunk, and was worried if this would end up becoming medical malpractice.
麦格看着那巨汉，微笑着问道：“是这样的吗？”
Mag looked at that big guy and smilingly asked, "Is it so?"
麦格看着鲍里斯脸上的九宫格血痕，笑着摸了摸艾米的脑袋。
Mag saw the grid bloody scratches on Boris's face and patted Amy's head with a smile.
麦格看着鼻子冻的通红，眉毛上都挂着冰霜的诺亚，笑着取出了一个还冒着热气的泥团和一个小盅。
Mag looked at Noah whose nose was red and eyebrows had icicles, and smilingly took out a steaming mud case and a small soup pot.
麦格眼睛一亮。
Mag's eyes lit up.
麦格眼睛一亮，兰克斯特似乎还存着一点意识，并未完全被控制。
Mag's eyes lit up. There seemed to be a little consciousness left in Rankster. He was not completely under control.
麦格眼睛一亮，没有想到冰下竟然别有洞天。
Mag's eyes lit up. He didn't expect there would be a cave under the ice.
麦格眼睛一亮，这高雅醇和的酒香，比起茅台或许差了点，但也足够令人惊讶。
Mag's eyes lit up. Such a mild and elegant fragrant might be incomparable to maotai but it was still shocking.
麦格睁开眼睛，对上了有些忐忑的埃菲。
Mag opened his eyes and met with Eiffie's nervous gaze.
麦格瞄了一眼伊琳娜，见她神态自若，稍稍放松，走到街口拦了一辆马车，直奔品酒大会会场。
Mag glanced at Irina. When he saw her calm expression, he felt slightly relieved. Mag went to the roadside to hail a horse-drawn carriage and went straight to the liquor tasting event.
麦格瞄了一眼被以龟甲缚的方式绑住的埃菲，眼皮跳了跳，也不知道伊琳娜是从哪里学的手法……
Mag flicked a glance at Eiffie, who was tied up in the tortoise shell bondage and his eyelids twitched. He wondered where did Irina learn it from...
麦格知道她多半是看到先前的状况，心中暗自庆幸自己的自控能力。
Mag knew that she probably saw what happened earlier, and was pleased with his self-control.
麦格知道小家伙心里，赚更多的小钱钱一定是更重要的目的，对于小家伙小小年纪就对赚钱有着这样现实的认知，他很欣慰，至少以后不用担心她会缺钱。

Mag knew what the little fellow was thinking of. Earning money was definitely the more important goal; he was rather glad that the little fellow had such a realistic sense of money. At least he would not be worried about her being in need of money.
麦格知道汉娜有管理这家工厂的天赋，又是问道：“机器运作的如何？什么时候可以开始量产了？”
Mag knew that Hannah had the talent to manage this brewery, so he then asked, "How are the machines running? When can we start mass production?"
麦格稍稍松了口气，又道：“还有一个问题，如果高级文明真的存在，那他们是否会对旧日支配者负责？如果有他们的加入，那些让人头疼的家伙，或许应对起来会更容易一些。”

Mag heaved a sigh of relief and said, "1 more question. If a even more advanced civilization does exist, would they be responsible for the Great Old Ones? If they join us, it might be a little easier to handle those fellows."
麦格穿行于衙门屋舍之间，巨蛇在数次俯冲都未能将他抓住后，还是开始发动了攻击。
Mag dashed in between all the government buildings. After the giant snake failed to catch him after dashing at him a couple of times, it began to launch its attacks.
麦格突然想起自己好久没有关心精灵族和暗夜精灵的状况了，而且这封信上也没有表明精灵族的态度。
Mag suddenly recalled that he had not asked about the Elves and Night Elves for a long time. In addition, the letter did not state the Elves' stand.
麦格站在紫纹狮鹫背上，背负着双手，静静的装了个逼。
Mag acted tough with his hands behind his back as he stood on the purple-striped griffin's back.
麦格站在门口，看着他一直消失在街头，确定他能够自己回家，这才转身进了餐厅，关了招牌灯。
Mag stood by the door, and watched him disappear down the street. After ensuring that Pasa could go home on his own, he turned to enter the tavern, and switched off the light for the signboard.
麦格站在门外看着，独栋的二层小楼，层高还不错，和两旁的店铺相隔了一些距离。
Mag stood at the door and looked in. It was a two-story building; it was tall enough, and it had some space between it and the shops at its side.
麦格端了一碗十全大补的鸡汤放在伊琳娜面前，笑着道：“特意给你炖的，放了些生命之水，好好补补。”
Mag placed a bowl of "Ten Essence Herbal Soup" in front of Irina and smilingly said, "I brewed this specially for you. I have put in some Spring of Life. You deserved some nourishment."
麦格端正坐着，看了一眼坐在高脚凳上的伊琳娜，有种被审判的感觉。
Mag sat upright and glanced at Irina, who was on the barstool. He felt as though he was interrogated.
麦格端着重新做好的早餐出来，颜色鲜亮的扬州炒饭，豆浆与油条的经典搭配，一碗养胃的皮蛋瘦肉粥，以及一碗麻辣扑面的红油抄手。

Mag came out with breakfast that he made again. The brightly-colored Yangzhou fried rice, the classic pairing of soybean milk and youtiao, a bowl of stomach-nourishing congee with pork and century egg and a bowl of Sichuan spicy wontons in red oil.
麦格端起粗陶的酒杯，先嗅了嗅。
Mag picked up the coarse ceramic glass and took a whiff of the wine.
麦格笑容温润，语气和善，俨然一副慈父贤夫的模样。
Mag smiled gently and spoke very gently like a benevolent father.
麦格笑着上前，摸了摸艾米的头，安慰道：“好了，如果你们想吃的话，父亲现在就给你们做，麻辣小龙虾、烤羊肉串、烤牛肉串、烤鱼……想吃什么，你们自己说。”

Mag smiled and went up to Amy. He stroked her head, and consoled, "Alright, if you want to eat, I'll make it for you right now. Spicy crayfish, roast mutton, roast beef kebab, grilled fish… whatever you want to eat. Name it away."
麦格笑着坐回了自己的位置，拿起一根油条咬了一口，又是喝了两口豆浆，他也饿了，需要补充能量。
Mag sat down at his seat with a smile. He took a bite of the youtiao and drank two sips of soybean milk. He was also hungry and need to replenish his energy.
麦格笑着打开了酒馆大门，看着门外等候开门的十几位客人，说道：“久等了，欢迎光临。”
Mag opened the tavern's door, and smilingly said to the 10-odd customers waiting outside, "Thank you for waiting. Welcome to Saipan Tavern."
麦格笑着摇了摇头，继续拍手里的黄瓜。
Mag shook his head with a smile and continued to smack the cucumbers in hsi hand.
麦格笑着点头：“她的命令应该在明天会送达。”
Mag nodded with a smile, "Her order should reach by tomorrow."
麦格笑着点点头，他很难不赞同伊琳娜的这个说法。
Mag nodded with a smile. It was difficult to disagree with Irina.
麦格笑着看着她，小家伙还真是随时随地能够找到让自己开心的事情。
Mag looked at her with a smile. This little fellow could find something to make herself happy any time.
麦格笑着说道：“那好，你先根据自己的喜好继续画画吧，要是你真的感兴趣的话，晚些我会给你一份剧本，你就可以按照剧本来画一个故事了。”
Mag smilingly said, "That's great. You can continue to draw whatever you like first. If you are really interested, I will give you a script later, and you draw a story according to the script."
麦格笑着道：“一千个客人吧。”
Mag replied with a smile, "Maybe 1000 customers."
麦格笑着道：“有流星的话，你可以朝着流星许一个愿望，就会实现了哦。”
"If there's a meteor shower, make a wish and it will come true," Mag said with a smile.
麦格笑着道：“那就对了，冰激凌店你看着经营吧，不要太累了，每个星期还是休假一天，给自己和姐妹们放个假。”
Mag smilingly said, "That's right. Pace yourself with the ice cream. Don't tire yourself out. Take one day off every week, and give yourself and the girls a break."
麦格算是差不多听明白了，这客人的确是兵部官员，而且有个亲近的前辈被此次案件牵连，还是前夜被灭了门的官员之一。

Mag understood what was going on. This customer was an official from the military, and he had a close senior who was involved in this incident. He was one of the generals whose family was wiped out the night before.
麦格红着眼睛一剑劈飞了兰克斯特，然后用尽全力将天都剑甩了出去。
Mag sent Rankster flying with one strike before tossing the Tian Du sword out with all his might.
麦格细细回味了一会自己先前那一拍的动作，尝试着控制自己的力量和拍落的角度，再次挥刀落下。
Mag recalled his smacking move just now and tried to control his stregth and the angle of his smacking. After that, he wielded his cleaver again.
麦格结束了和系统的对话，坐在书桌前发呆。
Mag ended his conversation with the System and sat by the study table, spacing out.
麦格给两个小家伙倒了杯热牛奶，下酒菜和牛奶，其实也挺配的。
Mag warmed some milk for the two little fellows. The side dishes actually went quite well with milk too.
麦格给两个小家伙讲了个睡前故事，等她们都睡着了，这才悄悄推出房间，关上门。
Mag told the two fellows a bedtime story, and left the room silently only after they had fallen asleep, not forgetting to close the door behind him.
麦格给两人倒了两杯水，在他们对面坐下，平静的问道：“不知大主教今日来访有何事？”
Mag poured two glasses of water for them before sitting down across from them, and calmly asked, "May I know the purpose of your visit here today, Archbishop?"
麦格给他再满上一杯，不过这次没有再急着和他干杯，这可不是啤酒，一杯接一杯的干，小半瓶可就没了，而且这家伙要是醉了，他还不知道怎么安排才好。

Mag filled up Pasa's glass once again. However, he did not clink glasses with him again. This was not beer. If they drank one cup after another, this leftover wine would be gone in no time, and he would not know what to do if this fellow got drunk.
麦格给汉娜的朗姆酒工厂设计了全套的设备，自然能够一眼看出这套设备的缺陷。
Mag had designed the entire set of equipment for Hannah's rum brewery, so naturally he could see the defects in this set of equipment.
麦格给自己也夹了一只蟹黄灌汤包，动作轻快，趁灌汤包不注意，夹住褶皱轻轻一提，然后快速放进自己的碟子里。
Mag also picked a crab roe soup dumpling for himself quickly and gently. Before the soup dumpling even noticed, it was picked up gently by its fold and was quickly placed on Mag's plate.
麦格给足了提示，让一起同行竞争，黑市买凶，掳掠女老板，惊魂一天一夜的大案，得以快速告破。

Mag gave enough hints, allowing the case of buying a killer on the black market and kidnapping of the female lady boss due to business competition that shocked the city for a day and night to finally come to a close.
麦格翻看了一遍，画风可爱，节奏流畅，完全能够胜任寓教于乐的功能。
Mag flipped through the book. The drawing style was cute and the story was paced well. It could achieve education and pleasure at the same time.
麦格翻阅了几座院墙，来到了土楼巷尽头的那座院落外，没有直接走进土楼巷。
Mag flipped over a few courtyard walls and came to Tulou alley. He stood outside and did not walk in straightaway.
麦格能够感受到露娜对这所学校投注了极大的心力和希望，相比于混乱学园勉强扩招的几百个学籍，希望学园才是能够真正解决底层孩子上学的办法。

Mag could sense that Luna had put great energy and hope into the Hope School. Compared to the Chaos School trying to expand its recruitment by a few hundred students, the Hope School was the real solution to resolve the problem of schooling for the children from the lowest rung of society.
麦格能够理解她的感受，毕竟诺兰大陆上的人们应该都认为自己在世界的中心，天地都是围绕着自己转的。
Mag could understand what she was feeling. After all, the people in Norland Continent all probably think that their world is the core and the sky and earth revolved around them.
麦格能够酿出不弱于泰坦酒的美酒，她的防备心也就没了。
Her guard was down as long as Mag could not brew anything better than Titan Liquor.
麦格脸上也是露出了几分兴致，以泰坦酒的品质，加上三十年的窖藏酝酿，秒杀那所谓的爆炸酒自然不在话下。
There was also a hint of interest on Mag's face. With Titan Liquor's quality and 30 years age in the cellar, it would unquestionably vanquish that so-called Explosive Liquor.
麦格脸上的笑容渐渐僵硬，有点心虚道：“事情其实不是你想象的这样的……”
The smile on Mag's face stiffened gradually. He said guiltily, "It's not what you think it is…"
麦格脸上的肌肉抽搐了一下，这个女人过于冷漠且直接的对话方式，让他有点不太适应。
Mag's facial muscles twitched. He wasn't quite used to this woman's cold and direct way of talking.
麦格自从与克苏鲁一起渡过天劫之后，已经很久没有感受到危险的存在，这一刻却在这个女人身上感受到了。
Ever since Mag passed the test together with the Cthulhu, he had never felt the presence of danger for a long time. However, he felt it on this woman right now.
麦格若有所思的点点头。
Mag nodded htoughtfully.
麦格若有所思，看来回去之后他要好好去找一些关于鬼族的资料看看了，对这个种族了解太少。
Mag was thoughtful. It seemed like he had to go back to find and read up on information about the Ghost Clan. He knew too little about them.
麦格落到了紫纹狮鹫背上，看着下方的深坑，有点惊讶道。
Mag landed on the purple-striped griffin's back and said with surprise as he looked at the crater below.
麦格表情先是一惊，想着自己今天是否还约了其他女人上门切磋。
Mag jolted first. He thought carefully about whether he said anything about exchanges to other women.
麦格表情变得有些凝重，沉声道：“那些仆从现在何处？是否还活着？”
Mag turned solemn and gravely asked, "Where are those servants now? Are they still alive?"
麦格表情有点僵，毕竟他刚刚才信誓旦旦的说这是可以食用的蜗牛，现在却惨遭伊琳娜否定。
Mag had an awkward expression. He had just said that this was an edible snail and now he was proven wrong by Irina.
麦格表情淡然，心里却是有些惊讶，没想到才两三天的时间，竟然已经有那么多商家找上门来。
Mag might look calm but he was rather shocked inwardly. He didn't expect so many businesses to come looking for rental in just two to three days.
麦格被小家伙软糯糯的话语说的心都化了，什么焦黑的炒饭、一片狼藉的厨房都通通被他抛到脑后，满口答应道：“好好好，父亲大人教你做拍黄瓜。”

Mag's heart was melted by the little fellow's adorableness. The burnt fried rice, chaotic kitchen, and more, were all thrown to the back of his head. Mag agreed, saying, "Alright, alright, I'll teach you how to make the Smashed Cucumber Salad."
麦格要哭了，早知道刚刚一开门就给那妖精来一发大威天龙，收了那妖孽，也就没这么多事了。
Mag was on the brink of tears. If he'd known, he would have subdued that demon the moment he opened the door, and there would not have been so much trouble.
麦格见埃菲点头，也是笑着道：“行，既然埃菲小姐同意，那一会吃了饭我测试一下你的天赋，要是合格的话，你可以跟着学做菜。”
Mag looked at Eiffie and nodded as he said with a smile, "Sure. Since Miss Eiffie is agreeable, I'll test out your talent after the meal. If you pass, You can learn from me."
麦格觉得自己就是一条无辜的小鱼儿。
Mag felt as though he was an innocent blade of grass.
麦格觉得这下真是越抹越黑了。
Mag felt it got worse as he tried to explain.
麦格解释道：“漫画家，也就是专业画画册的画手，这些画册就是由漫画家创造出来的。”
Mag explained, "Comic artists are professional picture books' illustrators. These picture books are created by comic artists."
麦格说道，已是夹起了一颗田螺放到嘴里，嘴唇含住田螺，气沉丹田，然后趁着田螺不注意，快速一嗦。
Mag put an escargot in his mouth. He held it with his lips and using his diaphragm, he sucked the meat in quickly.
麦格说道：“昨夜洛都发生了几起灭门惨案，死者是和此次兽人战争有关的兵部大臣的家眷，手段残忍，而且最后也都放了火，我怀疑此事与乔修有关，他可能已经回到洛都。”

Mag said, "There were a few family murder cases last night in Rodu. The victims were all the generals related to this campaign against orcs and their families. The murder means were very cruel. In addition, the murderer set everything ablaze to end off. I suspect that this incident is related to Josh. He might have returned to Rodu."
麦格走入酒窖，伸手抚摸着橡木桶，提议道：“个人建议你用这个酒窖里的酒参加本届品酒大会，然后用这一批泰坦酒替代你的酒馆里现在卖的泰坦酒，小瓶灌装，提高酒的单价，让泰坦酒馆重新步入高端酒馆的行列。”

Mag entered the cellar and reached out to touch the oak barrels. He suggested, "I personally suggest that you use the liquor in this cellar to take part in this year's liquor tasting and then use this batch of Titan Liquor to replace the Titan Liquor that you are selling in your tavern now. Put them in small bottles and increase their individual price to put Titan Tavern back into the realm of high-end of taverns."
麦格起身准备去取样酒。
Mag stood up and got ready to take the wine sample.
麦格蹲在不远处的树梢上，看着端坐在那房间门口的十级骑士，长剑立在他的身侧，虽然闭着眼睛，却也能够感受得到他的强大威慑力。

Mag squatted on a tree branch not far away. He watched the 10th-tier knight who was sitting upright outside the room door. He had his longsword by him, and although his eyes were closed, Mag could sense his strong powers.
麦格转了一圈，失望而归。
Mag walked around before leaving with disappointment.
麦格迈出去的脚步又缓缓收了回来，表情略显古怪的在门口听着，没想到从他那里拿了几本企业管理的书，汉娜厂长就当的有模有样了。

Mag retracted his steps slowly, and listened at the door with a weird expression. He didn't expect Hannah to behave exactly like a brewery director after receiving a couple of books on business management from him.
麦格还没有从蛋黄酥的噩梦中回过神来，眨了眨眼睛，侧头看了一眼床头的闹钟。
Mag still hadn't recovered from the salted egg yolk pastry's nightmare. He blinked and turned to look at the alarm clock at the side of the bed.
麦格还没来得及阻止，那瓶可口可乐已经被暴力掰开，可乐喷涌而出，在空中画出了一道彩虹。
Before Mag could stop her, the Coca-cola was already forcefully opened and the drink burst right out, forming an arch in the air.
麦格还真不知道该怎么形容。
Mag really didn't know how to describe it.
麦格这边玩的不亦乐乎，另一边坐在窗边，托着腮帮子，还在生闷气的埃菲，被一本飞来的书啪的盖在脸上，差点当场去世。

Mag was having a lot of fun here. On the other hand, Eiffie, who was propping her face on her hand and sulking by the window, was hit right in her face by a book that flew in. She almost died right on the spot.
麦格连夜给伊琳娜顿了一锅大补的佛跳墙，第二天一早等她醒来后，先喝了一碗粥，便直接能够喝道刚刚炖好出锅的佛跳墙。

Mag made a big pot of nourishing Buddha jumps over the wall for Irina overnight. She could have a bowl of freshly made Buddha jumps over the wall after she woke up tomorrow and had a bowl of porridge first.
麦格连忙向后再退两步。
Mag quickly took two steps back.
麦格连忙把她搀起来。
Mag quickly helped her up.
麦格连忙摆手：“不不不，不是这样的！”
Mag quickly waved his hands. "No, no, no, it's not like that!"
麦格连忙摇头：“没有，是挺正常的，以前我也经常把切菜台剁了做菜。”
Mag quickly shook his head, "No. It's pretty normal. I used to hack the cutting table when I am cutting up the ingredients."
麦格连忙起床穿好衣服，拉好被子给伊琳娜盖好，遮住她那双修长白皙的长腿，这才开门出去。
Mag quickly got up to put on his clothes. He pulled the blanket over Irina and covered her long and fair legs before he opened the door and go out.
麦格连忙起身帮她拉开椅子，自然的牵过她的手，扶她坐下。
Mag quickly got up to pull the chair out for her. He held her hand naturally and helped her sit down.
麦格闭上眼睛嗅了嗅，典型的甜味果酒，酒香尚可，没什么特别的感觉，也就比寻常人家自酿的果酒好一点的程度。
Mag closed his eyes and took a sniff. It was a typical sweet ratafia. It smelt alright but there was nothing special about it. It was simply slightly better than the homemade ratafia.
麦格闭上眼睛，细细品味着美酒带来的愉悦体验。
Mag closed his eyes and indulged in the joyful experience of tasting the wine.
麦格闻言倒也不恼，这说明福利院的规章制度贯彻的很好，工作人员和很负责。
Mag wasn't annoyed when he heard that. This meant that the orphanage's rules and regulations were firmly enforced, and the staff members were very conscientious.
麦格闻言沉默了，认真思考着伊琳娜说的话，旧日支配者赋予乔修的能力是未知的，而且他的=身份也的确很特殊。
Mag turned quiet after hearing that as he considered Irina's words seriously. The power that the Great Old Ones bestowed on Josh was unknown yet, and his identity was indeed very special.
麦格闻言皱眉，“这里没有神女，看来两位是找错地方了。”
Mag frowned after hearing that. "There is no holy maiden here. Seems like you guys have to come to the wrong place."
麦格阔气的给他们免了一份酒鬼花生的钱。
Mag generously waived the cost of a helping of drunkard peanuts off their bill.
麦格随手把那封教皇的亲笔信丢进了垃圾桶，无论那个家伙说了些什么天花乱坠的话，他都不可能把艾米送到教廷。
Mag tossed the pope's letter into the trash can casually. No matter what flowery words that fellow said, he would never send Amy to the Holy See.
麦格随手翻看着书架上的画册，有一句没一句的和老板聊着，脑子里则在思考将做菜教程变成画册的可行性。
Mag flipped through the picture albums on the shelves casually as he chitchatted with the boss. He was thinking about the probability of transforming the teaching tutorials into picture albums.
麦格隐匿了气息，在不远处停下看戏。
Mag concealed his aura and stopped to watch the show close by.
麦格隔着小板凳和帕萨一眼在台阶上坐下，身后门完全开着，温暖的暖气从身后吹来，吹走了寒气。
Mag sat down beside Pasa on the step with the stool in between them. The door behind them was wide open, and the warm air from inside blew out, chasing away the chill.
麦格非常尊重孩子们的选择，所以捧着金奖杯，一家人就径直离开了庄园，在路边准备拦一辆马车回家。
Manor respected the children's choice. Therefore, the entire family left the Manor straightaway and hailed a horse-drawn carriage by the side of the road with the trophy in their arms.
麦格面色微变，意识到自己失态了，连忙正色道：“不不不，我怎么会有这种骄奢淫逸的想法呢。”
Mag went white. He realized that he had said the wrong thing, and quickly corrected himself, "No, no, no. How would I ever have such lustful and extravagant thoughts?"
麦格高声道，手一扬，天都剑已是化作一道流光飞向兰克斯特，直刺他的心脏。
Mag shouted. He waved his hand and Tian Du sword transformed into a flash of light as it flew towards Rankster, striking his heart.
麦格默默为那系统叹了口气，就这语气和说的话，完全看得出是自导自演的好吗。
Mag sighed for the System. That tone and sentence told him that it was all a self-directed performance.
麦米餐厅。
Mamy Restaurant.
麦米餐厅作为混乱之城当下最负盛名的餐厅，以美味的食物和高昂的价格而闻名。
Mamy Restaurant, as the most popular restaurant in Chaos City, was known for its prices and delicacies.
麦米餐厅歇业一个月，这是开店以来前所未有的，客人们肯定要炸。
Closing Mamy Restaurant for one month was unprecedented since it had been open for business. The customers would definitely be in uproar.
麦米餐厅毫无征兆的关门歇业了，而且时间长达一个月。
Mamy Restaurant closed for business without any warning, and for a whole month at that.
麦米餐厅门口少了长长的队伍，却多了不少拿着小板凳和小本子，坐在餐厅门口认真观看教学视频的家庭主妇和各家餐厅的学习团。
The line outside Mamy Restaurant was a lot shorter, but there were more housewives and restaurant chefs with stools and notebooks outside, watching the tutorial videos seriously.
麦老板实在是太厉害了，作为一个吃遍洛都大小餐馆的男人，卡诺也认定麦老板是最牛逼的。
Boss Mag was simply too formidable. As a man who had eaten in all the big and small restaurants in Rodu, Canault also thought that Boss Mag was the most impressive.
麦老板是她见过最厉害的厨师了，她可不觉得一个小酒馆的老板能够做出与他媲美的食物。
Boss Mag was the best chef she had ever seen. She did not think that the owner of a small tavern could make food comparable to Boss Mag's.
麻婆豆腐里没有看到麻婆这是让希利松了口气的事情，而鱼香茄子里没有鱼，则让他觉得有些欺诈。
Seely heaved a breath of relief when he didn't see Mapo in Mapo Tofu, but failing to find fish in the eggplant with garlic sauce made him feel cheated.
麻辣的感觉让她浑身有些燥热，而鲜美的鱼肉则是将她带入了另一个世界，仿佛在炎热的夏日里跃入了水池之中，有种通透的爽快感。
The spiciness made her feel hot all over and the freshness of the meat brought her to another world, as though she had jumped into a pool on a hot summer day. It was refreshing.
麻辣的汤汁，配上弹性十足的螺肉，嚼起来鲜辣带劲，有着极为美妙的口感。
The spicy sauce, coupled with the chewy meat, gave the fresh escargot a marvelous texture.
麻辣的红油先在口腔中炸裂，浓香与麻辣在舌尖上绽放。
The spiciness of the red oil exploded in his mouth first. Its rich fragrance and numbness spread from the tip of his tongue.
麻辣脆爽的花生，让味蕾瞬间被激活，再来一口温热的海鲜粥。
The thrill of the spiciness woke his taste buds up immediately. He took a sip of warm seafood porridge.
麻辣鲜香，在这一口之中尽显。
The freshness and numbing spiciness were all encapsulated in this mouthful.
黄瓜依旧翠绿，其间点缀着蒜蓉和几颗鲜红的朝天椒段，酸辣味徐徐飘来，让人忍不住咽口水。
The cucumber was still very green and there were some garlic bits and red Chaotian Pepper decorating it. The sour and spicy fragrance wafted over, making one swallow their saliva instinctively.
黄瓜备好，接下来要准备的就是料汁了。
The cucumber was prepared and next, it was the flavoring sauce.
黄瓜本味清淡，料汁将决定它的味道。
Cucumbers were light and refreshing so the flavoring sauce would determine its taste.
黄瓜洗净放在砧板上，没有去皮。
A cucumber, washed cleanly, was placed on the chopping board with its skin on.
黄瓜的口感是靠着水分支撑的，水分流失过多会导致口感直线下降。
The cucumber's texture relied on the juice in it. Loss of liquid would result in its texture going bad.
黄金龙岛。
Golden Dragon Island.
黑市的任务谁都可以接，没有任何限制，他们只在乎结果和佣金。
Anyone can accept the missions in the black market and there were no restrictions. They only cared about the result and the reward.
黑市，是洛都城地下世界的一个秘密组织。
The black market was a secret organization in the underground world of Rodu.
黑暗中突然冒出了无数火把，吊桥被砍断，城门被打开，无数兽人战士涌入奥格部落。
Countless fire torches suddenly appeared in the dark. The drawbridge was cut, the gates were opened and countless orc warriors dashed into the Aug Tribe.
黑暗中，响起了几道抽噎声。
In the darkness, there were a few stifles.
黑暗中，有人说道。
Someone said in the dark.
黑暗潮湿的奴隶宿舍里，一个年迈的精灵翻了个身，脚上的镣铐在木板上发出了声音，透过稀疏的木板缝隙，看着夜色下，挂在栏杆上寂寥的尸体，声音低沉道。

In the dark and damp slave dormitory, an old elf turned over. The chain on his feet that was cuffed to a wooden pole clanked. He looked at the lonely body hanging on the pole under the moonlight through the small gap between wooden planks.
黑沉沉的天空突然被撕开了一条裂缝，一道金光落在了伊琳娜的身上，将她照亮。
A crack was torn open in the dark sky. A beam of golden light landed on Irina and lit her up.
黑白相间的毛色，两个浓浓的黑眼圈，除了脑袋小了点，看起来竟是毫无违和感。
With the black fur and two black eye circles, other than having a smaller head, it looked exactly like a panda.
黑色旋风如利刃一般撕裂了紫纹狮鹫坚硬的鳞甲，只是触碰便在它的身上撕裂出一道巨大的血口。
The black hurricanes tore open the tough scales on the purple-striped griffin. Just touching the griffin could tear a big wound on it.
黑色的魔气与圣光在碰撞中发出了令人牙酸的腐蚀声，克苏鲁的身体被圣光包裹，竟是开始微微发颤。
The black evil aura collided with the Holy Light, making a corroding sound. Cthulhu's body was engulfed by the Holy Light and it actually began to shudder.
黑衣人默然，没有接话。
The man in black remained silent.
黑袍人刚要点头，脸色剧变，一回头，便看到了一把迎面砍来的巨斧。
The man in black robe was about to nod when he went white. He saw the giant ax that came right into his face as soon as he turned around.
黑袍人啐了一口唾沫，这是他经历的最畅快的一次对决，酣畅淋漓啊！
The man in black robe spat. This was the most enjoyable battle in his life!
黑袍人回头看了一眼府邸的方向，很快又化作一道黑雾消失无踪。
The man in black robe turned his head in the direction of the mansion, and quickly became a cloud of black fog and disappeared.
黑袍人大惊，但反应尚可，手中长剑挥舞，一剑便将那巨汉的一只手臂斩断。
The man in black robe was alarmed, but his reflexes was still fast. He swung his longsword and cut off the giant guy's arm.
黑袍人快步下楼离去。
The man in black robe went downstairs and left.
黑袍人愣了一下，似乎没想到自己竟然有这般神勇。
The man in black robe was stunned. He didn't expect himself to be so valor.
黑袍人挥了挥手，四个黑袍人纷纷拔出武器向着麦格冲来。
The man in black robe waved his hands and the other four of them drew their weapons and dashed towards Mag.
黑袍人脸上露出了一丝纠结，不过还是从怀中掏出了一颗药丸含在嘴里。
A conflicted expression appeared on the man's face, but he still took out a pill and put it into his mouth.
黑袍人连忙再次挥剑应对，又一剑斩断了那巨汉的另一只手臂，顺便给他的心口补了一剑，然后抬腿一脚把他踹翻。
The man in black robe quickly swung his sword again and sliced off the other arm of the big guy. He also gave him a stab at the heart before kicking him over.
